Summary: Rooms were clean and the suites are a great size for a family of 5. We had 2 bathrooms and it was wonderful. Hotel is on the bus route and made getting to and from Disneyland so much easier. Pool was great and is a great size. Staff are very friendly and breakfast had tons of options.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk staff were helpful and professional. I really appreciated the help provided to me by a staff member named Maria, Mariana. My son has an egg allergy and she was knowledgeable about the food and ingredient's served in the kitchen. She went above and beyond to help me prepare breakfast for my family. I was so happy that my son was able to enjoy waffles with us (his first waffles ever without egg) and we could begin our day with ease because of the help she provided!  The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff was friendly. All around it has been a good experience at the hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great rooms super clean and comfortable and GREAT breakfeast super delicious! Thanks to Mariana and Maria for their great service during breakfeast ! Also very clean pool and jacuzzi!! Will be back again. Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Waffles, full fat full sugar yogurt, assorted cereal, juice, and if you’re lucky a couple apples or oranges.

We parked and I seen housekeeping cleaning the the same room up stairs (222) that we always get on our previous stays and she said she was almost done cleaning that room and needed 15 mins more. I went to the front desk and I told her we wanted that room. She said i needed to pay an early check-in. Are you serious? Only for 50 mins? After i was told it was free after 1:00pm. However we decided to wait in the parking lot. At
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice and Affordable Place to Sleep Near Disneyland
Summary: Firstly I love that they had a discount for staying 3+ nights. Any time Disneyland is involved saving money where we can us crucial!   We arrived near 1am and the front desk for late night was friendly and she made check-in so easy, much appreciated after a long drive. The room was simple and had everything you need to rest and clean up. The breakfast in the mornings had a lot of options which was really nice when traveling with a 4yr old. If you slept in a little you would miss brekkie time though. The ART bus has a stop at the hotel which was super convenient and easy to use.  The only thing I didn't like was work being done on an adjoining room during one late afternoon when we were trying to rest. I do understand they have to upkeep the rooms and sometimes there will be
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Exceptional service is our highest priority so we are glad to know our front desk made it an easy check in. Summary: Pictures showed disney themed. My room had nothing disney related which was disappointing for my family has it was my son's birthday. The hotel has a shuttle to disney listed on the website. It is just the city bus that has a city bus stop outside the hotel. Bed and pillows weren't great. Not terrible for the price but as we were going to disney it was very disappointing. We would have chosen another more convenient hotel.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Guest feedback is very important to us as it shows where improvements can be made. We have a minimal amount of themed rooms that can be requested, however it is based upon availability on the day of arrival. We don't have a shuttle of our own we do have it stated on our website that its The anaheim resort transportation (ART) that is ran through the city of Anaheim and stops in front of the hotel. Thank you again for your time and we hope you have a great day!

Summary: This is one of the only budget hotel options near Disney that still offers breakfast, so that was the main reason we chose Stanford. Breakfast was hearty and plentiful, but exactly the same all six mornings..no variety. There is no meat option, so plan on eggs, potatoes, and waffles as your main warm offerings. We bought flour tortillas, shredded cheese, and precooked bacon from Target and made breakfast wraps after the first couple mornings. There is no microwave in the breakfast room, but our room had one for warming our wraps and reheating coffee and tea. There are plenty of carbs to choose from at breakfast (muffins, bread, bagels) as well as yogurt, peanut butter (most mornings), and cream cheese for some added protein. Stanford is a short couple block walk to Target, not
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know we were a good value and convenient for your needs. Summary: We checked in on Monday, November 7th around 9:30pm. I went in before my family and noticed the air felt a bit off but brought them in anyways. Quickly my wife noticed there were no blankets and after a couple minutes of my baby walking around her feet turned black from either dirt or dust or something. I already had been complaining about the air and I noticed my son then started coughing. I checked the hotel reviews online and saw that was complaining about possible mold so I went to the front desk and told him that we were leaving and wanted a refund. The front desk agent said we’d need to go back through Hotels.com. I booked a Marriott hotel down the street and we left within about 20-25 minutes total time there.   Today my wife received an email from Hotels.com saying we
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. Exceptional service for all of our guest is our highest priority, our front desk is open 24hrs to be of service to our guest at anytime. When our guest are unsatisfied we try our best  to make it a better experience so our guest don't have the inconvenience of having to find and relocate to a different hotel. Unfortunately we were not  given the opportunity to do so being that you chose to relocate. We were unable to refund the entire stay due to the cancellation policy and made the exception to refund the second night. Thank you for your time and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: The room wasn't too small but it was nice. The beds were comfortable and the pillows were great! Room and bathroom were clean and towels were provided. The breakfast wasn't too bad and staff was very kind. Mariana, one of the workers, was very friendy and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to know you had a great stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendant Mariana. Thank you  for choosing to stay  with us , and we look forward to having you as one of our guests again in the future. Have a great day!

Summary: Breakfast is amazing!  Mariana and Maria make sure everything is clean and refreshed! No complaints at all! When we requested we had fresh towels and a clean room. Everyone was very nice and pleasant to be around.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Exceptional service is our highest priority for every guest, so we are glad to see you  had a great stay. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you as a guest again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary: The food was good, had a variety of food and the waffles were fresh. I like the fruit and Brandt butter. Maybe next time you will have orange juice. Maybe also you can have beacon or sausage. I have been coming to this hotel for about 8 years.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad to see you had a great stay and you were able to enjoy our daily breakfast. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. Guest feedback is very important to us as it shows where improvements can be made to make it a better experience for all of our guests. We appreciate you being a loyal guest and  we look forward to having you stay with us  again. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: The stay was really good, everyone is very polite and helpful. The food was good and they kept everything stocked. Maria and Mariana kept the dinning area clean.  I definitely would refer anyone to this spot! When we come to visit Disneyland this is the hotel we come back to! Very convenient and price is great!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to know you had a good stay and you were able to enjoy our daily breakfast. Exceptional service for every guest is our highest priority so we are happy to hear Mariana and Maria were able to do that. It is so great to know that you would refer us and we greatly appreciate it. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to having you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Excellent, family oriented , we will be back !
Summary: We were looking for a place to  stay after having to cancel a reservation and found Stanford Inn. The staff was very professional and kind, making us feel like family , the facility super clean and well maintained. The complimentary breakfast was absolutely satisfying and the rooms were family friendly. We will definitely make this place our stop when coming to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to know you had an excellent stay. Exceptional service for every guest is our highest priority. It is so good to know you will be back, we appreciate you choosing to stay with us and we look forward to having you stay with us again  in the future. Have an amazing day!

Summary: We stayed there for our Disneyland trip with my husband and friend. We checked in at around 7pm and they put us on the second floor. We brought 4 luggages, it’s hard because there’s no elevator and no help from the staff. The room is okay but the AC is loud, the sink is quite short. The nice thing is there’s complimentary breakfast and the location is close to Disneyland. We took Lyft on the way to Disneyland then we walked on our way home which takes about 20mins. Overall, we had fun on our trip!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to see you had a good stay. Guest feedback is very important too us as it allows us to see what areas we can improve in to make it a better experience for all of our guests. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: It's been several years that my families taking a vacation. I I was having trouble finding reservations all around town. Philip at the Stanford Inn was phenomenal!  He bent over backwards to accommodate me. She was wonderful personable and very informative. Although we have not stayed there yet, I can't wait! The hotel sounds great and very close to Disney.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are thrilled to know you are beyond impressed and have decided to stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We appreciate your kind comments about our front desk agent Phillip and we are glad to hear he was able to accommodate you. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: My family and I took my son to Disney for his birthday and stayed here for three night. Mariana and Rebecca made us feel at home with the breakfast. My family and I had a great experience! Everyone at the hotel was very nice!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to review us. It is so good to know you had a great stay with us. Our team works hards to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Rebecca. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you as one of our guests  again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: We had fun,we were comfortable in the beds. Roomy for the 5 of us. The price was affordable. Pool and hot tub were clean. It is our 2nd stay in the rooms past 2 years. Nearby plenty of dining and so much to do!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to know your family enjoyed their stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has pleasant stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you and your family as our guests again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary: The included breakfast has been great, especially the potatoes and waffle makers.  Maria and Mariana were super nice and welcoming every morning.the rooms are clean and bright, plus the air-conditioning kicks in right away, perfect for when you need a reprieve from the California heat.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your  feedback, We are thrilled to know you had a great stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest  has a pleasant experience. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana. Thank you for choosing to stay with and we hope to have you and yours as our guests again in the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: Great quality-price relation, excellent attention from the Staff members. Really close from Disney. Comfortable mattresses, clean room, good variety of breakfast. Need to check sewer system smell in the washbasin of the room
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time  to share your feedback. We are glad to know you had a good stay.  Our team strives to provide all of our guests with the best customer experience. We have shared your feedback with our maintenance team to look into the washbasin to  ensure  better outcome going forward. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary: Never disappointed. My kids love it. And are always excited to see what theme we will get. So far we’ve had cars and avengers.  Thank you stanford inn  for your hospitality and friendly staff. Can’t wait to book again.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so glad to know you had a great stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. It is so great to hear you are a returning guests we greatly appreciate it and,  look forward to having your family and you stay with us in the future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Pretty good and about a 30 minute walk from the Park
Summary: We booked here for a full week with three days at Disney. The walk to the parks is about 30 minutes at a regular pace. The rooms were clean but you could hear a decent amount of activity from the other rooms. Standard continental breakfast and the employees were very nice and accommodating. Something that we truly liked was that we could do laundry while enjoying the pool area.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We a glad to see you had a good stay. Our team strives to provide the best customer experience to all of our guests. It is great to hear our team was able to accommodate your needs. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in  the  near future. Have  a wonderful day!

Summary: Mariana and maria were super helpful and kind. They answered my questions and helped me with the waffle machine (when i never used one before). The only thing i would say is a more hotter hot suace but thats just me. Thank you for a wonderful trip
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to see you had a wonderful stay. Our team strives to provide them best customer experience to all of our guests. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria  and Mariana. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary: Great service! Excellent customer service! Was here for for a family vacation and everyone was super happy with the breakfast. Great way to start the day at Disney with a great breakfast. Maria and Mariana were great!!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so glad to know you had a great stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We appreciate your kind comment about our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary Heading: Great location and value for family accommodations
Summary: The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The rooms were super cute with Disney themed. The family suite with the separate room and bunk beds was perfect for our family if 5’s week long stay. Conveniently close to the parks, you could easily walk if you want or take the shuttle for a small fee. The only negative thing was the guests in the room next to us who had a very upset toddler that screamed and cried for several hours in the middle of the night 2 nights in a row. Definitely was not the fault of the hotel, but just be aware of the thin walls. Lol
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to know you had a great stay and enjoyed one of our family suite themed rooms. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. We are sorry to hear about the inconvenience you encountered during your stay. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you as one of our guests  again in the  near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: The hotel , the personal the swimming pool and food everything was good thank you. My children my husband and enjoyed the staying a lot. We will recommend to everyone of our family and friends. And definitely we will come back for our vacations
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are thrilled to know  you and your family enjoyed your time staying with us. Our team strives to provide the best customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we greatly appreciate you wanting to recommend us. We look forward to having your family stay with us  again.  Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel at a great value.
Summary: Would definitely stay here again. Breakfast was nice to have and hot options were great. It does get busy so plan accordingly. Very convenient. Super clean and staff were very friendly. Book directly with them as you get the best rate.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are glad to see you had a great stay. Our team strives to provide the best customer  service to all of our guests. Thank you  for choosing to stay with us and  we look forward to having you as one of our guest again. Have a great day!

Summary: Mariana and Maria we’re very friendly and served really good food. Big space and lots of decorations. Lots of decorations which made us get hyped up and ready before going to the parks. Definitely will be back
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so glad to know you had a great stay. Our team strives to provide them best customer service to all of our guests. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to you being one of our guests again in the near future. Have an amazing day!

Summary Heading: It's Ok but not a repeat
Summary: The AC kept turning off in the bunk bed room and the kids were hot and there was a dampness to the room and smell like mold or something. Overall it was fine. We won't stay there again because for how much the room was...it's not worth it. I would also get it inspected for mold.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are sadden to see your stay wasn't up to par with our usual standards. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate individuals to ensure a better outcome going forward. Thank  you for staying with us and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: We have been here before and it has always been a down stairs room and is always clean but this time it was dirty I ended up buying supplies and cleaning the whole room my self. Front person was disorganized they changed informs and didn’t tell the guest upfront. We come here once a year and for them to not leave a voicemail and almost giving away our room then telling us to pay to hold a spot this was all new and not professional handled well. Te new deposit that we didn’t know about either should of been better informed prior to us showing up
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our team we strives to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests. We are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations with regards to your room. We were unaware of the cleanliness that you outlined and would have like to make it a better experience.  When guest request a certain room or a certain location of the hotel we do try our best to accommodate however it is based on availability and can not be guaranteed.  We do charge the first night and tax 24hrs prior to guests arrival to guarantee the reservation  we apologize that you were not informed. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We genuinely value you as a guest and hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Great service from all the staff specially on the breakfast area
Summary: All the staff @ Stanford inn is friendly and willing to help, from the front desk to the maintenance staff, however Mariana & Maria at the breakfast cafeteria do it even better and are always attentive to your needs and always with a smile and nice attitude! I totally recommend to stay there if you are going to Disney!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for  taking the time to share your experience. We are so thrilled to know you had a great stay. Our team strives to provide the best customer service to all of our guests. We appreciate your kind comments about our staff and our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana. Thank you for choosing our hotel, it brings us so much joy to know you wold recommend us. We hope to have you as one of our guest in the near future. Have wonderful day!

Summary: For the price we paid, the quality was very lacking. The room had small cracks in the door which meant we had mosquitos in the room and we could not appropriately control the climate of the room. There was a lack of maintenance and detail. They seemed to try and make up for it with Avengers decoration all over, but it was haphazard and I'd rather have a comfortable and clean room. The employees were great, but the quality was disappointing. We have decided it would be more worthwhile staying somewhere else, even at a higher cost. We don't feel we received a good value for all of the faults our room had.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience . We are sadden to see your room wasn't up  to par with our usual standards. We were unaware that you were dissatisfied with the room and would have liked to make a better experience. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate individuals to  ensure a better outcome moving  forward. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: Great experience overall very clean for the value close to Disney and have easy access to art transportation. Overall very clean and accommodating. Didn't feel uncomfortable or had any issues. Was happy with the breakfast options as well. Coffee was great!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank  you for taking the  time to share your review. We are so  glad to know you had a great experience. Our team strives to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for choosing  our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guest again in  the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: Mariana and maria were amazing and so sweet guiding us through everything yummy they had! And that made our breakfast experience really nice! They even helped my daughter make a waffle :).  This type of services really makes us want to come back.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are thrilled to know you has a great stay with us. Our  team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and  Maria. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guest  again in  the near future.  Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Everything was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful! The access to the park via ART was easy.  I will be bringing my kids later this year and will try out the breakfast and the pool.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to know you had a great stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to hosting you and your family later in the year. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: We were very pleased to catch the ART bus to the Disney parks! Great location! We always come back to the Stanford Inn for our stays in Anaheim.  Very comfortable and pleasant.  Breakfast is always a plus and with a great variety.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are glad to know you had a great stay with us. Our team strives to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. Thank you for being a loyal guest we greatly appreciate it , we look forward to seeing you on your next visit with us.  Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Close to Knotts, Disney and Angel's + free Breakfast!!
Summary: Front Desk, Room Attendants, Breakfast staff all great.  Nice and accommodating.  Room nice, close to everything.  Eggs, Potatoes, Waffles, Bagels, Toast, Yogurt, Oatmeal, Coffee what more could you ask for?  I'd say the only thing I wasn't happy about was there was no laundry detergent available to do laundry.  Had I known this (because it is advertised on their website, ask front desk) I would have brought some or even bought it the morning I needed it.  So please if you advertise it, have it.  If you run out, replenish it.    Otherwise.  5*
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so glad to know you had a great stay. Our team strives to give every guest the best experience possible.  We apologize for not having laundry detergent available we. Thank you again for your time and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: The rooms were nice. The price was reasonable for the area especially with how close we were to Disneyland. The breakfast was limited but better than continental. The staff (Rebecca and Maria) were friendly and accommodating to the guests getting breakfast. Overall, a great experience. We’d stay here again.,
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are thrilled to know you had an overall good experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure each of our guest has a pleasant stay. We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Rebecca. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to having you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Maríana and Maria were so helpful during breakfast! We had a great time at the hotel. The rooms were clean and big. The location was so close to Disneyland and to the best ice cream place! We will be coming back
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you had a great stay and that our breakfast team was so helpful during your stay. It is so good to know that you would stay again. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to having you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Professional and friendly staff, comfortable and clean room, small but cozy pool and hot tub. I would definitely recommend it to all seeking a bed & breakfast style stay close to Disneyland park at Anaheim
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to know you had a great stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: The Stanford is very close to Disneyland and my son and I were very comfortable. The beds were nice and the rooms had everything we needed. The staff at this hotel is incredible, from the front desk, to the breakfast staff, to the housekeepers. We  had a 7 day stay and would have been happy to continue. The quality of stay for the price was incredible. The hotel is very central to stores, restaurants, and any stops we needed to make for essentials and meals along the way. The on site laundry mat was an additional bonus for a week long stay. The free breakfast was beyond expectation with bakery items and fresh waffles, eggs, and potatoes among other items.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you loved it. Our team strives to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests, so we are thrilled to hear you received amazing service and that everything was perfect. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: I went to breakfast when I got back they emptied my room and they kept my two brand new t-shirts please no come here sink no works too I’m never back here a also need 100.00 dollars deposit this is absurd
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you taking the time to share your review. Unfortunately, it seems that none of your concerns were brought to our attention but we would love to help. When our housekeeping team services a room they work around guest items. If Items are caught in linens and/or found in our laundry we keep a log of any lost items. Whatever the case, we can help you find a resolution to your lost shirts. If there are any maintenance issues, we have a team ready that could have solved your issue. FInally, to clarify, hotel deposits  are used to cover any of your incidentals and they also help protect us for any loss or damage. They are standard in the industry. Hopefully this clarifies some of your concerns, and if there is anything else please reach out to us. Have a great day!

Summary: This hotel was great! Amazing value, we got a deal booking directly through their website. The breakfast had lots of choices, and the coffee was even good, which saved us a ton of money. We used the Anaheim Resort Transit bus to get to and from the parks, they stop right outside the hotel. The room was wonderfully decorated, the beds were comfortable. They have an outdoor dining area for breakfast but also it’s open the rest of the day for when you don’t want to eat takeout in your room. Housekeeping wasn’t daily but I don’t think that exists at most places these days. The front desk and/or housekeeping offered extra towels and amenities whenever we needed, and they have several trash cans to dump your room garbage into (we have a kid in diapers so we didn’t have to smell them).
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you loved it. Our team strives to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests, so we are thrilled to hear you received amazing service and that everything was perfect. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: Great family hotel.  Nice pool area.  No big frills but close enough to the park.  I didn’t like that they charged extra for early check in when the room was ready 2 hours early.  We did not eat the breakfast and Ubered to Disney because it’s cheaper than taking the bus that is $6 per person.  An Uber each way is $10
Manager Response: Hello,   We are glad to know you had a great stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about the check in process. To clarify, the standard times for our hotel reservations are from 3:00pm to 11:00am the next day. Early check in or late check out fees factor in the extra time and resources used in the room. We appreciate you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Very good location. Confortable room. Poor breakfast
Summary: It was just fine. We dont spend time on it, just sleeping. The location was great as it was very close to many restaurants, Disney and Target!  The room was comfortable and spacious.  The breakfast was very poor… just artificial juices, some white bread, ready to make waffles, cereal, terrible eggs, and no more.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are glad to see you had a great stay. We appreciate your feedback. Guest feedback is very important to us. It allows us to see improvements to make it a better experience for all of our guests. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we hope to have you as a guest again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Just what we needed for our week at Disneyland
Summary: Clean rooms with no frills, and a great value for what we paid. Just what we needed for our three days in the Disney Parks: a filling breakfast, a firm bed, and comfortably air-conditioned rooms. Appreciated that the in-room fridges had a freezer shelf so that we could re-freeze our icepacks every evening in order to pack our snacks for the park the next morning. Our family chose to walk the 15-20 minutes to the Toy Story parking lot to catch the tram rather than wait for the ART in the heat.   We'll definitely return to Stanford Inn & Suites on a future visit. Having a budget-friendly option like this makes Disney trips affordable and within reach for families!
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you had a great stay. It is so good to know that you would stay again. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we look forward to having you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Does what it needs to do
Summary: For a long weekend, family trip to Disneyland, this hotel does what it needs to do. The staff was nice, but the rooms left something to be desired. 1) The floor was filthy - walking around for a few minutes barefoot left your feet black from dirt and grime 2) Found 2 dead roaches in the room 3) Parking is available for a fee ($10/night) but there aren't enough parking spots to accommodate everyone. We got lucky and arrived as someone else was leaving. But the 2 other cars that came in behind me didn't have spots available for them.  I fully understand that I chose a more budget hotel so I shouldn't expect all the bells and whistles. And to be honest, we were only ever really there to shower and sleep. But it honestly wasn't THAT much different in price compared to other hotels
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to review us. We sincerely apologize for what you encountered during your stay, this is not a common occurrence, and we would have been glad to have switched your room immediately if we had been made aware of your issues during your stay. A pest concern is not taken lightly, and we will have the room inspected. We have shared your review with the appropriate individuals and will look into your concerns so that they are addressed. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day.

Summary: We just got back from a 6 night stay here. The first night we awoke to the smoke detector beeping at 2am. When we called the front desk we were told the only thing we could do was switch rooms. So we had to wake our kids up and pack everything up at 2am and move to a new room.   The next day we got back from Disney and found that in our new room the toilet would not flush, the safe wasn’t working, the ac unit leaked all over the carpet and the fridge wasn’t working and smelled terrible when we opened it so obviously hadn’t been working for a while. Called front desk who said we would have to switch rooms AGAIN.   The third room was fine but with all the packing and unpacking, moving in the middle of the night it was incredibly frustrating and time consuming. For the amount we
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are sorry to hear your stay wasn't up to par with our usual standards and was not a comfortable experience. We have shared your review with the appropriate individuals and will look into your concerns so that they are addressed. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: We reserved thier double queen bed room, it was more like doubles or even full size. The wall unit linked as soon as we turned it on saturating the floor.  Maintenance was supposed to come fix it but never did. They service the rooms every other day which was not logical for our size family. Garbage was over flowing with trash because of the size of the waste can. Towels are small, big enough to cover an infant child. And we're a family with five children and two adults, just enough towels for one each. You can hear everything outside through the windows. Not nearly enough parking for all guests. We had to park in the back of the hotel and because they don't service the rooms daily we had to go down and get our own towels after get back from Disneyland at 12am. The room's are
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our team works hard to ensure each of our guest has a great experience. We are sorry to hear your stay wasn't up to par with our usual standards. Guest feedback is very important to us it allows us to see what improvements could be made. We had shared your feedback with the appropriate individuals to see how we can fix the issues encountered during your stay. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: I arrived to a room that had the heater set at 80 degrees and smelled musky and mildew turn on AC and smell was tolerable next night got to cold turn AC off and in morning just mildew smell and muggy.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are sorry to hear you did not have a great experience with us, if you had any issues during your stay, we could have helped resolve it at the front desk. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Stayed here on a 2 day visit to Disney and CA adventure. Convenient location, staff was very nice and great price for middle of summer. Staff provided solutions to problems and above and beyond service.
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you loved it. Our team strives to provide the very best customer service to all of our guests, so we are thrilled to hear you received amazing service and that everything was perfect. Thank you for choosing our hotel and we hope to have you as one of our guests again in the near future. Have a great day!

Summary: A decent no frills Hotel within walking distance(for fit people) of Disney . Most of the staff are very friendly and helpful and the rooms are a good size for families, especially if you can get two bathrooms. We have probably outgrown the place now but it has provided good value for us on the occasions we have stayed.

You can also purchase an ART bus ticket that will pick you up near the hotel. you can order those daily as needed. It was overall a great stay!

If you can, bring one of those plug-ins where you can turn 1 outlet into 3-4, there's virtually no usable outlets by the beds/nightstand unless you unplug the alarm clock and reading lamps. Summary: The hotel staff were friendly and kind and helped. Thought this is where the story changes, I have a service dog for ptsd and tbi in which they decided to charge me for a cleaning fee. Which I stated you can’t do that because he’s a service dogs and it’s against ADA guidelines. Brian then told me because I didn’t take my dog with me the entire time that he’s not considered a service dog. First the temperatures were getting hot and I did leave my dog because I didn’t want to put him through that. Secondly he’s trained through a program and you have no right to say that my dog isn’t a service dog. This is unacceptable and unbecoming of any organization to treat a disabled veteran on Memorial Day. This will be the last time I ever book with them and will be reporting them to ADA
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback. At the hotel, we follow all ADA guidelines accordingly as we do not discriminate against any of our guests with disabilities or service animals. As it states through ADA.gov, the hotel cannot refuse service to the guest or their service animal, however the guest is still expected to follow the rules for the hotel as they are set for all our visiting guests. Prior to checking in, the guest is required to notify the front desk of a service animal, and sign our hotel policy regarding service animals in the rooms and are expected to follow those guidelines. The hotel and ADA state that the service animal is to not be left unattended in the hotel room and must be on the handler at all times, if fail to do so may be asked to leave the premises. ADA also states that any damages caused by the service animal are subject to the cost of the repair if it is the hotel’s policy to charge when non-disabled guests also cause such damages as it is addressed on each guest’s registration card. We apologize for the experience you had staying at our property as we want all of our guest’s feel welcomed and come back for future stays at the Stanford Inn and Suites. All issues and concerns that are reported are addressed immediately and further investigated to ensure proper actions are taken.

Summary: The front desk lady was friendly and kind. Our room was clean and really comfortable. The price is really affordable, our room was big with two queen beds and two bunk beds.  Really close to Disney land. Only problem, we found roaches. No Good . Breakfast really great, Marianna and Maria very friendly and kind with a big smile and helpful.

Summary: EVs: We chose this hotel for only one reason: they had free EV charging (level 2).  They have two charging stations, each with two chargers, thus four total chargers.  You will need to ask the maintenance person to turn on the chargers.  The front desk people didn't know how.  The chargers are free, but everyone--EV and ICE--must pay $10/night parking fee.  Location: If you're in shape, you can walk to the Honda Center and Disneyland from this location.  The way to these two locations is well-lit, entirely over sidewalks, and appears to be in a safe neighborhood.  After a day standing in lines at Disneyland, you'll likely prefer to take Lyft/Uber home.  Hotel room: Nice tiled bathrooms.  Everything else was adequate.  You get what you pay for.    Breakfast: not super vegan

Summary: This is our third trip to Disneyland. We have come back two more times to the same place. We were asked if we wanted upstairs or downstairs which I appreciated as we have problems with our backs. We had an excellent experience this time as well. The receptionist explained the changes in riding the ART bus to Disneyland which was very helpful. My only suggestion is in room 103, the bathroom door is significantly swollen on the bottom and needs to be changed and the housekeepers need to make sure an extra roll of toilet paper is in the bathroom. It was a bit

Summary: Overall I was pleasantly surprised by our stay at Stanford Inn & Suites. We stayed in the 2 bedroom/2 bath suite and there was plenty of room for our family. The room was decorated in a Star Wars theme which was a fun surprise. My youngest children enjoyed having their own room, bunk beds, tv and bathroom. Daily breakfast options included make your own waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereal, yogurt, bread, fruit, juice and milk. My children used the pool once and enjoyed it. The water was quite cold so I'm not sure if it is really heated as advertised. Parking was easy and convenient. I would not consider this property to be in walking distance of Disneyland, especially if you have young children.  We choose to drive a mile each day to the Toy Story Parking lot and ride the

Summary Heading: Great location, OK Room, Poor service
Summary: Location is the big selling point for this property. Easy, quick access to shuttle to Disneyland. Room was fairly generic. A/C unit had stains on it like something had spilled on it and never got wiped up. Bed was comfortable. Service was poor. Left my pillow in the room after checking out and, after calling a few hours later, was told it "hadn't been turned in yet" but they would call when it was. Never heard back so, either the staff took it or they simply left it in the room for future guests to use which, during a pandemic, is extremely reckless.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room had a smell as soon as you walked in as well as the bathtub being gross and clogging up leaving the water to collect as you showered. They also bugged trying to open the door as I slept a lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is affordable to stay mins away from Disneyland. I’ve stayed here twice with my family, and it works perfect, with the two bedroom and basically 4beds. The facility is clean, the rooms are clean! Their breakfast is not just fruit and a muffins, you get Belgian waffles, eggs, potatoes the list goes on and on. Overall I recommend this hotel is you’re looking for something affordable for a Disneyland trip!!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It is great to hear you would recommend our hotel we greatly appreciate it. It was a pleasure having you stay with us and and hope to host you again in the future. Thank you once again and have a great day!

Summary: It was really nice not to worry about breakfast before heading out each day.  There was always the option of eggs, waffles, cereal, yogurt, bread/toast, orange, apple, oatmeal and coffee and juices. Then some days there were potatoes or sausages. Plenty for everyone.  We got the suite with one bathroom and bunkbeds. The space was perfect for our family of 6. They were helpful at the front desk when I wanted an upgrade last minute and they quickly moved the crib from our previous room (I'm impressed it was already in place) to our new room. The kids loved the mickey themed sheets and blankets. We did have fruit flies in our room which seemed weird. We didn't do anything about them. No bad smell but did seem like it was hard to air out after a shower. 'Course I live in the desert

Summary Heading: Best hotel to stay (specially with grandparents or separated parents)
Summary: This was the best experience.  The Stanford really is spacious and isn´t kidding about how practical its rooms are. The kids can stay in their private room with bathroom, while grandma and I stayed in our amazingly comfy beds on the other side of the room.  We each had our bathroom, TV and the little fridge is just right to keep snacks and beverages. The service is great too. Perhaps a bit of protein with the breakfast would be best, but the strawberry waffles were great. Don´t know if I should tell about this perfect cost-benefit because then they´ll be booked forever but, if you´re traveling with grandparents or separated spouses, it´s the best place to go. ;)
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so thrilled to hear you and your family enjoyed our family suite with two bathrooms and our daily breakfast. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to have you stay with us again. We hope you have a great day!

Summary: The location is surrounded by many stores and restaurants, which we appreciated. We were less than a block away from the Toy Story parking lot for Disney, so we just walked over and hopped onto their shuttle. We have a family of 6, so the 2 bd room/ 2 bath “suite” worked best for us to all sleep comfortably and be able to get ready every morning without the haste of sharing one bathroom and vanity. The rooms are a little outdated, but it’s nothing a nice coat of paint with modern decor and new carpets can’t fix. The circulation in the second bedroom was very poor and the room felt stuffy. It wasn’t a good fit for our asthmatic kids, so we had to leave the door open with the main AC unit running all day. Our main room was freezing and made it a bit uncomfortable for us to sleep,
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are sorry to hear about the inconvenience you endured in your room. The location is well within walking distance of Disneyland - about 20-25 minutes from the gates.  The rooms were quiet, pool area was clean with plenty of towels, and we felt very safe staying here.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Service - Low Price for the Area
Summary: We had to leave a brand name hotel at 11:30 p.m. because of mold in the room (which was making me sick as I have severe allergies) and other cleanliness issues. We were lucky to get last room here. The hotel may be small and older but it's very clean. The staff is amazing. Maria and Marriana took great pride in keeping the breakfast room stocked and clean. They also helped guests if needed. Alice at Front Desk came to our rescue on second night when we walked in to damp smell and wet carpet by sink. She had maintenance come right away. They were going to clean carpet and put in dehumidifier since there were no more rooms. But then Alice called her manager and moved us to a room where people hadn't shown up yet because I have severe allergies and was starting to get sick. You
Manager Response: none

Summary: Maria and Mariana were amazing servers for breakfast! They topped off this hotel for me! It is amazing overall! The room service was great too. My family loved the pool and hot tub the most overall . I cannot wait to come again!

Summary: Our 1st day there bathrooms overflowed with water , it was 7:30 they had no manager or maintenance person on staff only girls working were the maid which she was awesome she made the final say and moved us out of the room when she realized how bad it smelled we received $100 back for the inconvenience, we lost time at Disney since we had to move to another room ,Manager never called to apologize
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: So Clean and location is fantastic
Summary: This hotel is clean in fact on check in our room was spotless you can tell they really do a great job keeping these rooms super clean.   Check in was a bit of a challenge we reserved the 2 bed 2 bath suite but were told the room had a mechanical issue so we were given a 2bed 1bath room for 5 people (4 teenage boys (only 2 were mine) and myself) this was a huge issue and presented many challenges. I was told since we were being upgraded to a themed room no discount would be offered,  Breakfast was good with a waffle maker, cereal and some Danishes sadly no protein but that's pretty standard.  No shuttle to Disney and its just over a mile to walk to the gates we ubered and it was fine about $18 for a 5 person vehicle each way.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Mariana was very helpful and attentive when it came to our stay here at Stanford . Summary: We've stayed at your property several times in recent years. Each experience (prior to our most recent trip) was exceptional. Great service, very clean, very accommodating. This trip was quite different. Our room wasn't clean when we arrived. There was sand on the floor and in the bed sheets. After the first night I requested that our sheets be changed and floors cleaned while we were out for the day. That didn't happen. We got into the room around midnight, exhausted from our day, and nothing had been touched. I called the desk and they sent over a gentleman with a couple bed sheets, not nearly enough to change all four of the beds. It took four trips from various hotel staff members before they delivered enough of the right linens to change over the beds. And we had to change
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we travel we are in our motel room very little so we dislike spending great amounts on something we are using basically only to sleep.  The Stanford Inn and Suites was a wonderful motel for a great price.  We had a 2 room/2 bathroom suite - 2 Queen beds in one room with a bathroom and then a "kids" room with bunkbeds and a bathroom.  The ability to shut the door and have separate spaces was wonderful.   The breakfast offerings were your typical motel continental breakfast. Which is exactly what we wanted.  The staff was EXTREMELY helpful when my flight was cancelled and I had to change my reservation, it was no hassle at all which was welcomed since I had just had a flight cancelled that threw my vacation into disarray!  I would stay at the Stanford again and recommend it

Summary Heading: Are you a Motel 6 or Not?
Summary: Firstly, I wanted to like this hotel a lot. It tries to be more than the Motel 6 next door by charging you a bit more but then offering a bit more (huge TV, nice fridge and microwave, breakfast etc.)   But then it shoots itself in the foot by acting like a Motel 6. Charging $100 fee just in you steal towels and rip sheets? What does that say your opinion of your customer are?  Also if your going to charge $100+ for a hotel room then have decent coffee not the instant machine stuff that is horrid. Good coffee isn't hard to do and it makes a difference.

Summary Heading: a great find near UC Orange medical center

Not correct. also i called three days in a row for housekeeping to take out trash and bring new towels but they never came.  in spite of this, i would stay here every time if possible and cannot say enough good about the front desk staff.  i would call them directly if you have any third party site problems because they will work with you.

Summary Heading: The stay was good, no major problems.
Summary: I guess I didn't read the fine print on parking, I thought it was free.  So I paid $7 for each vehicle for 3 nights, we had 2 of them.  Then an additional $40 for an early check in which I didn't mind. The free breakfast is served from 630a to 930a, it was okay.  Maria & Mariana was the workers that was taking care of the breakfast, they did a good job on everything from maintaining the area with wiping down tables, emptying the trash as they got full, restocking/replenishing breakfast items.  Our room was just right  for a party of 6, kids loved the bunk bed & the adults liked the 2 queen size beds. TV in both the main area & in the kids room. The room was clean but we always sanitize & disinfect the hotel rooms before we settle in. Overall stay was good & would stay again if

Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review and kind comments of our breakfast attendant Maria. We hope to see you again in the future! Thank you again and have a great day!

Summary: Breakfast was awesome  And the server maria she did a great job  She is very fast  Thank u for ur service. Highly recommend this place if u visiting disneyland  4 min away reasonable price  Maria such a kind lady she serve everyone in the breakfast room …
Manager Response: Hello!   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review and kind comments of our breakfast attendant Maria. We cant wait to see you again in the future! Thank you again and have a great day!

Summary: Great Breakfast service,  was here 4 days Mariana & Maria did a great job keep everything well stocked,and cleaned, consistently each day. Nice to have fresh made waffles for the kids and an assortment of cereals
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our daily breakfast and cant wait for your return in the future! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: The service was excellent from mariana and Maria but next time my comadre wants some eggs and sausage, other than that everything was fresh and tasty like always. Thank you for all the help, would definitely highly recommend this place over and over. Thank you
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our property.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us we are and we cant wait for your return in the future! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Mariana and Maria were very nice and great help. Very good customer service.they helped me with making waffles when I did not know where the mix was. 10/10 I would recommend to a friend. I will be returning for more service
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and cant wait for your return in the future! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Our service to us was rated 5 star quality. However, the treatment of a certain worker. She was a laborer/house keeper being treated harshly out on the open. But besides that. Service was really awesome will come back again most definitely
Manager Response: none

Summary: Mariana was very helpful and very friendly, would come back love the friendly and nice service from mariana. Smile on face and helpful room was very good as well comfortably was in the room and very clean no room service when i was on my trip but so well good.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your kind comments about out breakfast attendant Mariana we greatly appreciate you taking the time to review our property. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Mariana was very helpful at the cafeteria. everything was clean and ready for everyone to eat breakfast. Tables were very clean and everything else as well! thank you very much.      we hope to come back soon
Manager Response: Hello Andrea,  Thank you for taking the time to review us! We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendant Mariana. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon!!!

Summary: They are charging $150 security deposit for older rooms. No amenities offered at all. Says breakfast not offered at all due to COVID but others are doing it. Not worth it. I wouldn’t come back at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were clean we stayed on the family rooms with 2 beds and bunk beds. Beds were comfortable. Unfortunately no shower gel. Called a couple of times never received it. Had to go to Walgreens and purchase it myself.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Price is too high, no breakfast and you have to pay to park.  Room was clean though and close to many attractions and businesses.  Staff was very nice.  Extra roll away bed is $15 a night which we also thought was too high considering price of room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Horrible hospitality, left with dirty linen
Summary: Stayed here with my family because of the pandemic. I was left with the same linen and towels for days and I kept calling and was told the same thing but nothing.  They then charged me for them being dirty. If a staff member name Alex helps you , she will not give and send anything. I then had to pay more than $100. Wow. If you're planning to stay here being firm with the staff might help you.  I'm not one to say anything so it was hell.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay was excellent from check-in to checkout.  Courteous staff and very helpful with my questions.  Clean room with amenities. The suite is perfect for families with children.  Separate bathroom and bedroom.  Nice pool and jacuzzi.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent pool, good parking, room cleaning, we went to California for vacation we my wife and my 4 kids excellent area from desk fantastic customer services help me all time wen we was there thank you all employers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Unfortunately, on our first night, we found a live roach in our room (and then found parts of dead ones upon closer inspection). We were offered another room but found a dead roach under a bed in that room. We decided to leave for another hotel but were charged for the first night's stay. We eventually got a refund on that but it took 3 calls to the hotel to get a manager who could do the refund. It was very disappointing. We had stayed in 2019 and had a wonderful stay. I hope they can get the pests under control.
Manager Response: Hello dear guest,   Thank you for sharing your review with us, we are truly sorry to hear about your experience. We work hard to ensure our guests are completely satisfied during their stay and unfortunately that was not the case with you. We have taken your comments into great consideration and we have increased our pest control services so we prevent any further issues. We are sincerely sorry for your experience, and please contact me in the future as I'd love to personally take care of you and provide you with an exceptional experience.   Sincerely,

Summary: Was one of the cheaper options around Disneyland, I was drawn to it due to the optional buckled kids room. Wasn't disappointed, my little girls loved the room with Elsa and Anna sheets.   Pool was nice, too! They weren't offering  breakfast due to covid but did octave a coupon for the local McDonald's instead.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,   Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We appreciate your positive review and we appreciate you for choosing to stay at our hotel! It's fantastic to hear that your family enjoyed the property and our themed rooms. The separate rooms is an absolute must for a family that wants the comfortability and privacy it has to offer for both the kids and adults! We hope to open up our breakfast room in the near future. We hope you consider us for your future adventures in Anaheim!  Sincerely,

Summary: The Stanford Inn and Suites in Anaheim was a pleasant surprise.  I had a great stay there.  The staff, and Celina in particular were great, very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are nice and clean.  Many restaurants nearby.   Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear AZtravllr,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review with us! We appreciate you staying with us and it brings us great satisfaction to see that you had a positive and memorable experience! We are thankful to hear that our staff and in this case Celina, was able to take care of your needs. We will share your positive review with her. Thank you again for choosing Stanford Inn & Suites, we hope to see you back soon!  Thank you,

Summary: My family and I spent a few days at Stanford Inn, Celina was always of great help, mind you I have two toddlers that tend to be messy, so room service is a must around the clock. Alejandra the room service lady was always glad to help.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,   We are truly thankful for your patronage and your feedback. It is fantastic to see that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel! It's also encouraging to hear our team took care of your needs. We work hard to ensure our guests and team members are all happy and your feedback reflects this! We will continue to work hard to ensure our guests receive the best quality and service from us. Thank you again for being our guest and for sharing your review! Until next time.   Sincerely,

Summary: I made a reservation at 1:30a for a day stay, because i had a late flight and my other reservation fell through. I was exhausted and desperately needed to crash into bed and take a shower in the morning. The hotel was clearly advertised as open and accepting reservations for the  current day stay. It was 1:30 am so technically it is the 4th, but thats why i made the reservation for the 3rd to the 4th. When i arrived 15 min later (1:45am-ish) the hotel lobby was dark as the early morning sky above me. No staff, just a maintenance guy who did not speak english and wio communicated using his phone and typing things into a translation app and holding up the text. Hotels.com was no help, and i had to sleep in my car because a $100 of my money was now tied up in processing. When it
Manager Response: Dear SassySkyy,   We would like to thank you for letting us know about your experience and at the same time sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you encountered. We are working hard to be able to stay open 24/7  in order to accept customers at any time of the day. We do have specific verbiage on each of our partner's websites that states our front desk operating hours however we certainly  understand this can get lost in communication. If you are ever back in the area, please reach out to me directly, I promise to ensure you are well taken care of. Thank you again for your review, and again please accept our sincerest apologies, it is not our intention to cause any inconvenience to our guests.  Sincerely,

Summary: Staff is great. Clean rooms. Clean pool area. Overall very happy with our stay. The only thing is that the breakfast was unavailable due to COVID precautions. The breakfast was our favorite last time and we are hoping next time we stay here it’ll be all set.
Manager Response: Hi Rungirrrl,   Thank you so much for your loyalty throughout the years, it inspires us to keep striving to be the best! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us yet again. We are so sorry that the breakfast is not open however you can count in it being open as soon as possible and hopefully by the time you return with us! Thank you again for visiting, we can't wait to see you again soon!

Summary: Great family hotel & great staff.  Great disney decor for the kids+bunks & crib. Tvs a great sizes. And they have really great deals!  Comfortable beds & cute themes. Plus gym, pool & jacuzzi!  I recommend this place to all families visiting anaheim.
Manager Response: Hi Desirees,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are ecstatic to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our team gave you excellent service! This is why we do what we do, to see your satisfaction! It seems like you truly described our hotel to a tee, we love that you enjoyed our awesome deals, great rooms and the amenities! We cannot thank you enough for choosing to stay with us, and please visit again in your future travels to Anaheim!  Sincerely,

Summary: Amazing stay great value lots of cool places around the hotel! Right down the road of Disney. Pools are open and they follow COVID guide line nothing to complain about will be staying here again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Jayzmd2021,   Thank you for your amazing review, your feedback means the most to us! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel's proximity to all of the awesome restaurants nearby! It's also fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the pool, there is nothing better in this hot weather! We take Covid-19 seriously and take the proper measures to ensure your safety! Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, we appreciate you so much!

Summary: This property is excellent. The staff, the clean rooms with all the amenities, and the wonderful pool and jacuzzi make it the perfect spot for me. And hopefully, when Covid restrictions are over, the amazing breakfast will be back.
Manager Response: Hi Kcathmoore,   Thank you kindly for your gracious review! It's certainly great to see that you enjoyed all of our amenities and especially the pool area which we have recently renovated! Our goal is to open the breakfast room as soon as we are able to safely do so, you can count on this! Thank you for being our guest, we truly appreciate you and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Clean and a good budget option. Bring your own shampoo and conditioner! Also, some ear buds if the revving engines from the road will keep you up. Otherwise, for a cheap option for a family or couple, it would be a good choice!
Manager Response: Hi Sarah,   Thank you kindly for sharing your experience with us! We truly value your feedback and it was a pleasure to serve you! We do apologize to hear that you did not enjoy the location of your room, however please be advised we can always move you to a quieter location, we are here to ensure your satisfaction! We are also sad to hear that you did not enjoy our shampoo however we do have some alternate options available at the front desk which may better suit your needs. Thank you again for your patronage and your feedback. We can't wait to see you again!  Sincerely,

Summary: We checked in and thought everything was good. Walked into the room and the second bedroom with the bunk bed was nice. The cleanliness was Horrible... soap scum all over the shower head, all of the furniture was dusty, and the carpet was nasty. We ended up having to wear shoes everywhere because it would turn our feet black. When was the last time it was cleaned?   Also, the whole hotel room stank strongly of mold and mildew from the rooms never having been aired out. It got to the point of affecting our health and we had to leave.   Housecleaning is only available once a week (but they obviously don’t do that much on the one day) and maintenance was socializing rather than fixing things.  Also, we had to pay for parking, there was no breakfast available, and there were no
Manager Response: Hi Michelle,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate your feedback and we regret to hear that your stay wasn't satisfactory. Our goal is to exceed each of our guest's expectation when staying with us and we did not achieve our goal with you. We will take your comments and experience and take action to rectify the issues described, we have some work to do and we thank you for pointing this out to us. We will work hard to improve our property and rooms to ensure a more enjoyable stay, should you decide to visit us in the future.   Sincerely,

Summary: The family rooms are great. This time we went on business without the kiddos. Our room had an odor of cat urine under the long mirror by the door. That had my allergies going crazy. Still a good trip and good location. Better for families.
Manager Response: Dear Selkha,   Thank you for being our valued guest and sharing your experience. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We do have some rooms that are catered towards working guests, so feel free to request one of these rooms from us in the future. Thank you for noticing we are a family friendly hotel, that is our specialty and we hope you come back and visit us with the family! Thanks again for sharing your experience!

Summary: We stayed for 1 Saturday night, 04/04.  The operations manager was so very helpful in accommodating our needs as my husband is disabled and can't do stairs.  Our room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanine,   Thank you for your fantastic review! We sincerely appreciate you staying with us and sharing your experience with the world! We are glad to hear Alexandra our Operations Manager was kind and able to assist you with your needs, we will be sure to share this review with her. We are also happy to hear that your room was clean and comfortable, which is the experience we always aim to provide! Thank you again for being our guest, and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: We stayed there 4 nights, I booked through Hotels.com, the receptionist at the check-in process was so rude, unprofessional, and not kind at all! This first left a very bad impression on how awful our stay will be! Room was OK, but the ground was so dirty, we could not walk on the ground without our shoes at all times! We notified them and they never cleaned it even after the first routine! On Hotels.com they announced breakfast included, but the rude receptionist said it won’t be included!
Manager Response: Hi Mr Abuserriya,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are truly sorry to hear about your experience at our hotel as your experience is not what we strive to provide. We have taken your review seriously and have already worked with our team to improve the rooms and the service level of our team. As we discussed, we truly apologize on behalf of our organization to you for the negative experience and we will welcome you with open arms in the future, where we guarantee you will have a memorable and positive experience. Thank you again for your business and for sharing your experience with us.   Sincerely,

Summary: I was put in a room on the backside and there was A HUGE horse fly inside I had to kill. The floor wasn't vacuumed. And they never put my deposit back into my account. When I asked about it, he's just told me it takes 2 or 3 days but it had already been 4 days and my back account showed that money as posted after saying pending for 2 days
Manager Response: Hi Autumn,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are truly sorry to hear that you haven't received your deposit back. We release the deposit on our end the day after you check out, at which point it may take anywhere from 3-5 business days to for the funds to be returned to your account. We certainly understand your frustration and we are here to help, please call us directly if you are still having issues and we can work with you to resolve your situation. Thank you again for your business and again apologies for any inconvenience you have experienced.

Summary: We know Disneyland is closed but we still wanted to drink in the magic and found it easy to do at the Stanford Inn and Suites in Anaheim. The rooms were fabulous, it’s central location not only near to Disneyland and Downtown Disney but so many other fun places was exactly what we were looking for!!!!! We loved swimming in the fantastic pool and spa, found the customer service great and felt safe and happy there!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for your great review! It was a pleasure to serve you and your family, and it brings us so much joy to hear that you enjoy our property! We will continue to work hard to provide these experiences to all of our guests, thank you again for allowing us to serve you, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I chose this room because it had 2 full baths. We had 4 adults and 2 babies. The beds were comfortable including the bunk beds. The room was Marvel theme which was a bonus. It was clean and quiet. The staff was friendly. The location to Disney was just down the street. The price was affordable.
Manager Response: Hi Ronna,   Thank very much for your kind and perfect score review. We truly work hard to keep our guests value and keep you happy. We strive to provide consistent "5 star" experiences and we are glad you experienced this during your stay. Our two bathroom family suite is the most popular room we have for a reason, and we are happy you enjoyed the Avengers theme! We hope you will consider staying with us in the future, thank you again for your kind words and more importantly for being our guest!

Summary: I only stay here when I come to the area. The staff is a pleasure and very accommodating. Rooms are very clean and the beds are amazing. It’s close to the freeway, Disneyland, great food choices, and right across the street is Joe’s Italian Ice!!
Manager Response: Dear kmoore547344,  Thank you kindly for sharing your great review with us! It's incredible to hear that you only stay with us, that is our goal with all of our guests. We are honored and will continue to work hard to keep you coming back for more. You hit the nail on the head with the local dining options, definitely lots of choices close by and you cannot forget about Joe's Italian Ice Cream, best Ice Cream in the OC! Thank you again for your 5 star review, we truly appreciate you and hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Choose this hotel because it has an EV charger on site. Property is in a great location and staff was excellent. I would stay again next time I am around. The room had a Disney theme and separate bedroom with bunk beds.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Found this because it meets my budget, not so far from Disney Park yet cozy enough for 2nights stay. I can walk to and from Disney Park. Staffs also helpful, they are nice to let me drop the luggage before check-in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the 3rd time we have stayed here when taking our grandkids to Disneyland. Always clean and friendly staff. ART bus stops right in front of Hotel so easy access to the park. Breakfast buffet is very good ALTHOUGH THEY SHOULD COOK THE SAUSAGE A LITTLE LONGER AND LESS PEPPERS IN THE POTATOES WOULD BE NICE. 2 waffle irons available Eggs, cereals, juice ,toast , bagels , coffee and all the condiments . Beds are comfortable and coffee maker in the room was a plus! Itzel at the Front Desk was most helpful and friendly even when she was the only person at the desk and quite busy. Took the time to explain everything and took care of the customer in front of her before moving on to next task. EXCELLENT customer service!
Manager Response: Hi Sherry,  Thank you so much for your kind review and more importantly for being our guest! Seeing that you had a 5 star experience brings satisfaction to us and we will strive to continue to provide these experiences for our guests! We will definitely take your kind advice into consideration for our breakfast.  We are also glad to see our team is giving excellent customer service as we truly care about our guests and we love to connect with you! Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Mariana & maria  Excelent attention polite and clean food, was hot, front desk with good attitude, Good food  Clean rooms  I'll come back soon in the summer its close to diney and restaurants near the hotel
Manager Response: 178gabel  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback! We are glad you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. and had a great experience during your stay.
