Thank you for you wonderful comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate. We cant wait to have you stay with us again!

Summary: Mariana and Maria were very nice and helped us clean up our mess. They helped us with our waffles and were very helpful to everyone and kind. This is our second time to this hotel because we love it so much.
Manager Response: T5084KCamyv,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! It is so great to know you are a returning guest thank you for coming back! We appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate it1 We hope you continue to come back in the future!

Summary: In February 2020, I stayed three days at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim, CA.  I accidentally left my white hanging garment bag on the bed; it blended in very well with their white bed comforter.  Within 30 minutes I called back to retrieve my garment bag. I was told by the front desk clerks that she had to call housekeeping to confirm they had found my garment bag and she would call me back; which she never did.  I was in the Los Angeles area for the following three days. I  called twice a day to confirm it was OK for me to come back and retrieve my item.  Finally, a week later, I got a return call from Ray Reyes the general manager at the Inn. Reyes told me that my garment bag was placed in a BLACK TRASH BAG (by housekeeping) and then put in the supervisor's office. Reyes said
Manager Response: Letthelastcheckbounc,  Thank you for your review and feedback. We sincerely apologize that this has happened. We have taken the correct precautions with our team to ensure that this will not happen again.

Summary: Me and my family always stay here when we come out to Disneyland. The customer  service is awesome. THe General  manager Ray has always been great along with some of the staff we know by name such as Celina (asst mgr). Jose (mtn) hr makes us feel like family. Marina and maria here in the breakfast area, they whip up up a great breakfast! I definitely give this place 5 stars at everything because if something is wrong they will definitely take care of it and fix it. Thank you team Stanford inn & suits for all you do for us. We apprecuate you all!!! See you again soon
Manager Response: Jr22m,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! We are so ecstatic to know you always stay with us when you visit Disneyland, thank you so much for being one of our loyal guest! Thank you for your kind comments about our staff members they are greatly appreciated!  We cant wait to have you and your family stay with us again!

Summary: Awesome staff  Super welcoming Mariana & María breakfast room was clean and delicious food. The food is delicious. All clean. The food is delicious. Awesome staff. Super welcoming . All good. Very delicious.
Manager Response: bettyrB3820MJ  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback! We are glad you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. and had a wonderful experience during your stay. Thank you for you wonderful comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate. We hope you will be back in the future!!

Summary: The food and crew was great very efficient and friendly. We stayed at this hotel for four days and had a completely wonderful experience. Mariana and Maria in the breakfast room were amazing. Not only did they make sure to keep the food fully stocked but they even helped my son when he needed assistance getting more food he could not reach. Very happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback! We are glad you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. and had a wonderful experience during your stay. Thank you for you wonderful comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate it . We hope you will be back in the future!!

Summary: The food was hot & delicious! The staff was friendly, everything was clean. Highly recommend. Mariana & María were great. The food was delicious. The staff was friendly. Mariana y María were great. All clean.
Manager Response: 404missyb,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are glad you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for you wonderful comments about our staff and breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate. We hope you will be back in the future!!

Summary: Mariana and Maria were very friendly and helpful. They answered all the questions me an my family had. Breakfast was so organized and the food was hot. They were amazing and made my trip a little better.
Manager Response: C2434ODangelg,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are glad to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria. We hope you will return again soon!

Summary: Came here before Disneyland for breakfast. Everything was hot, food was super good and there was tons of variety! Mariana and Maria were so sweet! The restaurant was clean, they had tons of coffee too
Manager Response: 23darenc,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are glad to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria. We hope you will be back in the near future!

Summary: The front desk was very helpful and handle all our Disneyland needs.  Our room was excellent and everything was perfect.  Enjoyed my experience immensely.  Would definitely stay there again.  Just hat we needed after a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: mroland2020,  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback! We are so ecstatic to know you enjoyed your experience immensely during your stay! It is great to know you enjoyed your room and everything was perfect. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: We rally enjoyed the selection and the food was fresh! The area was clean and there was plenty of seating for our family of 9. Thank you Maria and Mariana for helping us before we start our busy day at Disneyland
Manager Response: Trail569803,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! We are glad you really enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast! We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana! We hope you will be back again soon!

Summary: Above standard service in an otherwise standard hotel. The experience was generally good at the hotel and the breakfast was pretty damn good too. Additionally there was the friendly environment that was present.
Manager Response: matricom,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! Our staff works hard to ensure all of our guest has a great stay with us, and  we are pleased to know you had a good experience during your time here. We are happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your kind comments about our hotel we greatly appreciate it!

Summary: Maria and Amanda did awesome on the breakfast this morning. They have everything nicely set up and the area is kept clean and inviting for you to enjoy. We definitely enjoyed the eggs, potatoes,  and bacon we had.
Manager Response: rosalial514,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are glad to know you enjoyed the food options we serve at our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for you kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Amanda. We hope you will return again soon!

Summary: Maria and Amanda were the best at breakfast. They were very pleasant and helpful staff. The food was excellent and  hot choices were good different choice everyday. coffee was great. I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: clarissafina86,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are very pleased and happy to know you would definitely stay with us again! Thank you for your wonderful comments about our staff and breakfast attendants Maria and Amanda. We are glad to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Amanda y Maria breakfast was amazing. Great taste on the potatoes which had some great seasoning. Place was very neat n clean. Great customer service by them and were very attentive. Overall the breakfast exceeded our expectations.
Manager Response: Equijas9,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are so happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Amanda and Maria we greatly appreciate it!! We hope you will return again in the future!

Summary: This is our first stay at the stanford hotel and it has been great this far! The breakfast has surpassed our expectations, the attendants at the waffle bar are super helpful and nice! Would stay again.
Manager Response: mariatR4972VI,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! It is so great to know we have surpassed your expectations with our daily complimentary breakfast. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had a pleasant time at Disneyland and the hotel was at our liking  breakfast was good Beds were comfortable The staff was friendly and helpful overall our stay was plesant and nice  we have nothing to  complain about we
Manager Response: Maps11668407193,  Thank you for your review and feedback. We are so happy to know you had a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our daily complimentary breakfast, staff, and our beds, we greatly appreciate it! We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: As soon as we got here we were well recieved,and the staff were very nice.The breakfast was really good and the area was clean.My overall experience was good and i hope to be coming back. Maria-Amanda
Manager Response: gloriaa314,  Thank you for your feedback and review!! We are so happy to know you had a great experience during your stay with us! Thank you  for your wonderful comments about our staff and daily complimentary breakfast we greatly appreciate it! We hope to see you again in the future!!

Summary: Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. One day we left the hotel a little later around 3:30. We saw a note that said if we left later than 3:00 we wouldn’t be able to have the rooms cleaned. No big Deal. We came back late that night to our rooms cleaned. I really appreciated that. The beds were uncomfortable, I think the detergent they were using was cheap, made me really itchy and sticky when I woke up. The blackout blinds didn’t close all the way so it was pretty bright in the rooms during the day.
Manager Response: rccbuilder2790,  Thank you for your review and feedback! Our staff works very hard to ensure each of our guest has a pleasant stay and try to accommodate our guest needs as much as possible. Thank you for your kind comments about our hotel staff we greatly appreciate it! We are sorry to hear about the inconveniences that occurred during your stay. Guest feedback is very important to us and we will look into these issues and do what we can to improve.

Summary: Breakfast was stupendous this morning ! Maria and Amanda were extremely helpful to my family and I ! From teaching my mom how to make a simple waffle to refilling the eggs to making sure we were all having a great morning ! Our morning started off GREAT because of them!
Manager Response: L392ESjesusl,  Thank you for your review and feedback!! Its so great to know our breakfast attendants Maria and Amanda were of great help during breakfast. Thank you for your wonderful comments we greatly appreciate it! We you and your family will be back again soon!

Summary: Service was superb as well as the servers (Maria/Amanda) they were just excellent and provided me the best service I’ve had in this state ! The highest reward should be given to them for their bright smiles that made my morning perfect!
Manager Response: Johnny420bruh,  Thank you for your five star review and feedback we greatly appreciate it! We are happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your wonderful comments about breakfast and breakfast attendants Maria and Amanda. We hope to see you again in the near future!!

Summary: Maria y Amanda. Great food. Great service!!! Definitely made my families breakfast delicious and made the trip much more enjoyable!!! Will definitely recommend this hotel to family members and also for mysel!
Manager Response: 7julianl,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for you kind compliments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Amanda it is greatly appreciated. We are ecstatic to know you will be recommending our hotel thank you so much!! We hope you will be back soon!

Summary: Amanda and Mariaare really nice and kind. They are very helpful when you need help. The food for here is really good. They always keep the kitchen nice and clean. They are every respect full to everyone.
Manager Response: 288emanuelh,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback!! It is so great to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendants Amanda and Maria! We hope to see you again in the near future!!

Summary: Amanda and Maria were excellent during our breakfast visit. They kept the area clean and organized. Greeted everyone customer with a smile and "Good Morning". It always makes my trip a pleasant one when dealing with such wonderful customer service.
Manager Response: jen_gem_paul,  Thank you for your review and feedback!! We greatly appreciate you wonderful comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendants Amanda and Maria. We are glad you had a pleasant trip while staying with us, we hope you will be back again soon!!

Summary: We have stayed here for over 5 years and have never been disappointed.  Through the years they have made SO many improvements: parking lot repaved, pool upgraded, all rooms upgraded and refreshed, breakfast area updated with a much better flow and plenty of seating!  Check-in is easy, room is always ready, breakfast is good quality!  ART shuttle stop right in front of the hotel.  When we come as the whole family, we love the 2 room suites: 1 room with 2 queens and 1 room with bunk beds - your choice of 1 or 2 bathrooms!  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: jsousa81,  Thank you for your review and feedback we greatly appreciate it. It is so awesome to know you have stayed with us over the years and have been able to see the improvements we have made over time. Thank you for you continued loyalty! We are so glad to hear you enjoy your stays with, thank you for your kind comments about our property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Poor Experience, Dirty, Hidden Fees, Deceptive Amenities
Summary: Poor Experience, Dirty, Hidden Fees, Deceptive Amenities Overall poor experience and will not go back! - When we entered our room, there was a glob of something nasty on the bathroom floor and a dead beetle next to the microwave (see pictures) - Hidden fees! “Self Parking” advertised in two places in the description. Only in the fine print does it talk about the nightly fee! - Deceptive amenities! "Theme park shuttle" advertised in two places in the description. Only in the fine print does it talk about the fact that it is an extra charge. It is not even hotel-run, it is the slow public bus! - Definitely not a 2.5 star hotel - old, dingy facilities and rooms - Flimsy, cheap furniture - Bad caulking jobs in the bathrooms shows no pride taken in maintaining facilities - “2
Manager Response: nwardrip,  Thank you for your review and feedback. We sincerely apologize and are sadden to hear about the experience and inconveniences that occurred during your stay. We will let our maintenance and housekeeping departments know about the issues that occurred to ensure it does not happen again. We try to be as transparent as possible with our guest about our parking fee. Unfortunately we do not have any control how third party reservation sites post our information. We do let all of our guest know at the time of check in and state it on our website so it is visible to our guest. Unfortunately we do not have any shuttle services of our own , and we provide our guest the information that's given to us by the Anaheim resort transportation. Thank you once again for your feedback, it is very important to us so we can make changes and continue to improve our facilities.

Summary: We had a late reservation. This stay was way better then we expected. The coworkers were amazing. Especially Maria and Mariana. Breakfast area was clean and they were very attentive. We will be returning for our next visit.
Manager Response: esmeraldaa845,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! We are so ecstatic to hear your stay was better than expected and so awesome to hear you will returning. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Maria and Mariana and our daily complimentary breakfast!

Summary: Mariana and Maria provided some great services during breakfast which helped our morning run smoothly. The food was tasty, thank you for the awesome hospitality. I would recommend this place stay to everyone.
Manager Response: kalisav2020,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Maria we greatly appreciate it. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a total of days and what I enjoyed the most was the breakfast. Both Mariana and Amanda made our experience each morning amazing, they were there for all of our needs, the food was delicious, everything was clean and well maintained. Thank you again for such wonderful service and amazing experience.
Manager Response: Leormrz,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are so glad to know you had an amazing experience during your stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants Mariana and Amanda we greatly appreciate it. We hope you will return in the future!

Summary: The staff was friendly and accommodating. The lady who checked us in told me the theme of our room and offered to let us choose a different room if I thought my kids would like something else better. The ladies at breakfast were very helpful and were right there offering to clean up our kids many spills. Our kids were so excited about the Frozen room and we love the convenience of a short drive to the Toy Story parking lot.
Manager Response: bethanykertson,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! We are so happy to know you had a great stay with us. We are glad your children enjoyed our frozen themed family suite. Thank you for your kind comments about our staff we all work very hard to ensure each of our guest has a pleasant stay and do what we can to accommodate the best we can. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: Great place to stay for a business trip while I was working at the Anaheim convention center. Service was great thanks to Gelina for a smooth check in and check out especially with all of the chaos going on. P
Manager Response: tylergD3904NS,  Thank you for your great review and feedback!! We are happy to know we were a great place to stay during your business trip. Thank you for your kind comments about our front desk agent Celina we are glad she was able to assist you with needs. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Love it too much!!! Wouldn’t stay anywhere else
Summary: What can we say, we absolutely LOVE this place! It’s our 6th or 7th time staying here for our Disneyland vacation. We find the location to be  very convenient when visiting Disneyland. Their staff is very friendly and the rooms are clean! I’m very picky when it comes to that so they’ve exceeded my expectations.  We’re a family of four and have stayed in their family suit (Avengers room) and also stayed in their regular king size rooms. Both were great!   Their breakfast area has always been good and food options just got better. The parking lot is safe also and never had to report any suspicious activity. I really appreciate the pool and gym, both come in handy!    The only negative thing was that I wasn’t allowed to take their comfortable mattress home with me haha
Manager Response: XQuintana,  Thank you so much for your awesome review and feedback!! We are so happy to hear we have exceeded your expectations!! We cant thank you enough for your continued loyalty and business we greatly appreciate it! Thank you for your kind comments about our staff, rooms, and breakfast. Thank you again for continuing to choose to stay with us, we hope to see you and yours soon!

Summary: This hotel has been our go to hotel when visiting Disneyland for the past 10+ years. The rooms are very clean and spacious. The variety of breakfast items it has to offer before hitting a long day at the parks is great! The staff is very friendly and helpful. I love they offer a shuttle to Disney daily for a small fee. Its close to target for last minute or things forgotten at home, and also close to a lot of eatery's.
Manager Response: Mindy,  Thank you so much for your feedback and review we greatly appreciate! We are so thrilled to hear we have been your go to hotel, thank you for your continued loyalty and business! We are glad you enjoy our daily breakfast thank you for your kind comments about our staff. We hope we see you again soon!!

Summary: I had a great time in Anaheim with my stay at the Stanford Inn and Suites. It was only a 10 min walk to the convention center, and there were plenty of food places around. The hotel was basic but it was neat and clean and the bed was very very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast had variety and all the staff was most helpful., especially Elaha!!
Manager Response: miatadea,  Thank you for your great review and feedback!! We are so ecstatic to hear you had a great time staying with us. We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our beds, complimentary breakfast and front desk agent Elaha. We hope to see you again in the near future!!

Summary: Close to everything; grocery stores, good selection of restaurants, convention center, Disneyland , everything is within walking distance. Did not have to move our car for anything while we were there,
Manager Response: mwright576,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! Thank you for your kind comments about the location of our hotel and choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We were there by 2nd time.  It is very convenient location, close to Disney parking lot, near different restaurants, clean rooms, good breakfast provided (eggs, pancakes, cereal, cofee, juice), small fee for parking.
Manager Response: Cesarmol ,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are happy to hear this was your second time staying with us, we hope you continue to come back. We are glad you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast and the variety of options we have. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Today there were 6 confirmed cases of corona virus in the US today. Disneyland seems like a massive breeding ground for this. I made the decision to cancel my family trip and re schedule so my little baby didn’t have that extra chance of catching something deadly. At the decision of the manager, they were not willing to change dates, leave credit, or cancel the reservation. I understand not giving a full refund but when a state of emergency is about to Be called in the US, I figured they would be willing to help out in any way. As an event manager who deals with major chains such as Marriott and Hilton, this would be absolutely unacceptable service. I am happy to light up your hotel With horrible reviews with every avenue I can find through my hotel connections.
Manager Response: Dear 105kylem,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are terribly sorry to hear about your experience with us and we certainly understand your reason to modify your reservation. There must have been some miscommunication with our team and yourself however we are more than happy to work with you in regards to your reservation modification. Please contact us directly at your earliest convenience and ask for Ray the General Manager or Araceli the Assistant General Manager, they will take care of you and ensure you are satisfied. Again please forgive us for the inconvenience you experienced but rest assured we will ensure you are taken care of and we will discuss with our team to prevent this from happening again.

Summary Heading: Breakfast at Stanford Inn and Suites
Summary: We had a lovely stay here. The rooms were very clean and nice, great customer service. The complimentary breakfast was better than most other places I’ve stayed. The food (eggs, sausage, potatoes) were cooked really nicely, and there’s was a ton other items to choose from. My kids loved the waffle maker. Mariana runs the kitchen and dining area there, and she runs a tight ship!! Everything was so clean; she was out there constantly making everything fresh and clean! We really appreciated how hard she worked and how sweet her demeanor was.
Manager Response: 918clairee,  Thank you so much for your great review and feedback!! We are so happy to know you had a lovely stay with us. We greatly appreciate your kind comments about our facility, our daily complimentary breakfast and breakfast attendant Mariana we greatly appreciate it. We hope to see you again soon in the future!

Summary: I had a very amazing experience here the lady’s up front and in the kitchen are very sweet! Mariana was very helpful with me and my son I recommend this place very family friendly. Breakfast made fresh every morning it’s amazing (:
Manager Response: K3094SSfatimam,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! We are so happy to know you had an amazing experience during your stay. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendant Mariana. We are so grateful that you would recommend our hotel. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Staff was amazing especially Itzel, she was so sweet and helpful. I had a wonderful stay here, thank you. Hotel was clean and comfortable. I love the homey atmosphere I will definitely come back soon.
Manager Response: Weareallmad,  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback! We are so happy to know you had a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our front desk agent Itzel and our hotel. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: We had an impromptu Disneyland day planned and decided last minute that we would rent a hotel room for the night. Standford Inn & Suites had affordable and comfortable accommodations for me and my family. The kids loved the small attached children’s suite decorated to different Disney themes. Itzel was super nice and when she realized my kids liked Star Wars changed our room so that the kids got a room with that theme. I definitely will be looking to stay here again. The ART picks you up right in front of the hotel which makes this place ideal for a Disneyland stay.
Manager Response: ryanandmiriamb,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback we greatly appreciate it!  We are so glad to know you had a great stay with us and you enjoyed our star wars themed family suite. Thank you for your kind comments about our front desk agent Itzel and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for our visit to Disneyland.  It was very convenient and close to the park. Our host Celina was awesome,  very polite and answered all our questions and even gave us advise as to where to eat.
Manager Response: Siksixstang,  Thank you for your feedback and review! We are happy to know you had a great stay with us and that our front desk agent Celina was able to help you with recommendations. We hope you will be back soon for another stay!

Summary: Staff is super friendly and so helpful! The rooms are very neat and the kids love the bunk beds! Not to mention it’s such a close distance from Disney park. For the prices on the rooms this place is GREAT! Definitely recommend this place and will most likely be booking with them again :)
Manager Response: karendh05,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback!! We are so delighted to know you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our family suite. It makes us so happy to know you would recommend us thank you! We hope to see you and yours again soon!!

Summary: Great Customer Service. Food was great!!! Nice to have kids with full tummy’s for the day’s adventure. Mariana was wonderful! Would definitely come back on next visit!!! Beds were very comfy and slept great after long days.
Manager Response: torir752,  Thank you for your review and feedback!! We are so happy you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our breakfast and rooms. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendant Mariana, and we can wait for your next visit with us!!

Summary: Fabulous service! We forgot our toothbrush and toothpaste and they had some at the front desk. PRISMA WAS VERY HELPFUL. The breakfast was delicious and the room was clean. We had a great time in the spa and pool as well.
Manager Response: Sunshine640986,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback!! We are so ecstatic to know you had a fabulous stay with us and you enjoyed some of the amenities we offer. Thank you for your kind comments about our front desk agent Prisma we are happy to know she was able to help with your needs. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: Good breakfast, lots of options, nice service. The food was always fresh and the service was on point. They were always ready to refill any empty tray and kept the whole breakfast facility clean and sanitary. My server was Mariana.
Manager Response: lukewF9969ZL,  Thank you for your great review and feedback! We are so happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast! Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast and breakfast attendant Mariana we greatly appreciate it!

Summary: Celina is great. She is very friendly and definitely didn't hesitate in helping us with park tickets. The hotel is great! We enjoy the family suite. It's perfect after that long day! The rooms have 2 full baths and a microwave and fridge. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: cartinar2020,  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback!! We are so ecstatic to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our hotel and our front desk agent Celina it is greatly appreciated. We cant wait to have you stay with us again!!

Summary: Breakfast was really good! The ladies were very helpful & help clean up the mess my toddler made thanks to Mariana. Super friendly, clean, & yummy! They had scrambled eggs, make your own waffle & breafast potatoes with sausage!
Manager Response: palomamP6181RO,  Thank you for your wonderful review and feedback we greatly appreciate it!! We are delighted to know you enjoyed our daily breakfast. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendants, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Awesome service! Thank you Mariana! We appreciate how clean and fast the service was for all of us! The waffles are delish! Eating outside was delightful. Please keep up the great work and we will see you next trip.
Manager Response: lorrainecO7369NV,  Thank you for leaving your review and feedback!! We are so pleased to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. Thank you for your kind comments about our breakfast attendant Mariana and we hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at so many hotels in the Anaheim area but this might be close to my favorite. The staff is always so helpful and friendly. Itzel genuinely seems to care about those staying with the hotel and is super sweet. The breakfast in the morning definitely takes away a big pressure of feeding a family of four, which can get pricey in the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: smithers12345789,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are happy to know you loved your stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our staff and our front desk agent Itzel we greatly appreciate it. We hope to see you again soon!!

Summary Heading: Our happiest place to sleep after a day in the Happiest Place on Earth!
Summary: Celina and staff are always helpful, pleasant and willing to make sure your stay is great.  They are always accommodating for our early check-in and willingness to help with our luggage since my husband recently had surgery.  Great breakfast!
Manager Response: anitaaJ4092MN,  Thank you so much for you review and feedback!! We try our best to accommodate each of our guest to the best of our abilities and we are happy to know we've been able to do it each time you have visited. Thank you for your kind comments about our front desk agent Celina and  our staff. We hope to see you all again soon!!

Summary: Stanford Inn and Suites is our favorite local Anaheim hotel. From the friendly staff, clean rooms, and free breakfast, this hotel is a no-brainer. We will continue to stay here and recommend it to our friends every single time.
Manager Response: kyla2020,  Thank you for your great review and feedback we greatly appreciate it!! We are ecstatic to know we are your favorite local Anaheim hotel, thank for your continued loyalty! Thank you for your kind comments about our staff, rooms, and breakfast. Thank you once again for your review we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great service ! Love the theme of the hotels , very close to attractions , would stay again ! Celina the staff member was very nice to provide us with Answers to our questions. The atmosphere was just awesome
Manager Response: 288fabiolag,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback!! Our staff works very hard to ensure our guest have the best stay as possible. Thank you for your kind comments about our staff member Celina and our Facilities. We are so happy to know you had a great stay and will stay again, we can wait to see you here again soon!!

Summary: Friendly service at front desk thank you celina for assisting us checking in.  So excited to start our vacation cheap parking compared to other hotels ready to enjoy our family suite with two bathrooms
Manager Response: Brittany1609,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and feedback!! We are so excited to have you and yours stay with us. We hope your stay goes as well as check in did with our front desk agent Celina. Thank you for choosing to stay with us!

Summary: Celina was so kind and helpful, she even give us some advice to visit Disneyland. Our English is basic and we were glad that she speak Spanish and take the time to explain to us. We’re defendly come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: MXMD86,  Thank you for your review and feedback!! We are happy to hear our front desk agent Celina was able to help you purchase Disneyland tickets. It is so exciting to hear you will be back again, thank you for choosing to stay with us!!

Summary: Family vacation. Had several hotel options in getaway today but Stanford Inn had great reviews. Hotel room was clean and my kids loved the bunk beds decorated with Disney characters. We received great customer service by Celina in the front desk. Would choose this hotel with no doubt again.
Manager Response: janicepW9723XJ,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback!! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our kids family suite. Our team works very hard to ensure each of our guest has a pleasant stay we are glad you were able to experience that with our front desk agent Celina. Thank you for choosing to stay with us we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Check in staff are friendly, our room was clean & the complimentary breakfast was great. There was a bit of a urine smell but ok if you keep the bathroom door closed. Only a 20 minute walk to Disneyland gates.
Manager Response: DanielleW2662,  Thank you for your review and feedback! We are happy to know you enjoyed our daily complimentary breakfast. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience that occurred during your stay in the room we are having our team look into to ensure the issue is taken care of. Thank you once again for your feedback.

Summary: Room was very clean.  Beds were very comfortable - we all slept great.    Staff was friendly and helpful.   Would definitely stay here again and would recommend.   Only about a five minute drive from the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: kother907,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review and feedback!! We are ecstatic to know you had a great stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a great experience during their stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. So awesome to know you would recommend us thank you so much for that!! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful. Enjoyed stay. Art shuttle convenient. Breakfast was great. Room with bunk bed option was also convenient and fun. Had enough room for whole family. Can't wait to return
Manager Response: gelidre21,  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback we greatly appreciate it!! We are so happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your kind comments about our staff, room, and our daily breakfast. Its so great to know you will be back we cant wait for your next stay with us!!

Summary Heading: My "Go To" motel as a Solo Traveler!
Summary: This is my "Go To" motel as a Solo Traveler and with my daughter and grandsons.  The 2-bedroom/2-bath rooms are great for kids, the ART bus picks up right outside of the motel and is the closest bus stop at Disneyland for your trips back.  I recommend this motel for your family stay at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dlarrick,  Thank you so much for your great review and feedback!!! We are so thrilled to hear we are your go to motel thank you for continuing to come back. We greatly appreciate your loyalty and business we hope to se you again soon!!

Summary Heading: I give the Stanford 5 stars for excellence!
Summary: I've stayed at the Stanford probably 10 times now and it has consistently been good. The rooms are clean, staff is super friendly, free breakfast is great, no resort fee, reasonable parking and closeness to the convention center are  definite pluses. I arrived at one in the morning after traveling all day and my phone charger was not working. The desk person actually let me borrow hers for the night and you can't ask for much more than that.
Manager Response: Robert,  Thank you for your review and feedback!!  We are happy to hear you had an excellent stay with us. Thank you for all your kind comments about our rooms and staff we greatly appreciate it! Our staff works very hard to ensure all of guest has an exceptional stay. Thank you for being a loyal guest and for your business we hope to see you again soon!!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Big Family
Summary: We had a great experience. All  the employees were kind and  helpful, breakfast was delicious and had a good variety, and we loved that the ART bus stop was right in front of the hotel. Plus being able to have two bathrooms in one suite was awesome.
Manager Response: Misty,  Thank you so much for your review and feedback! We are so happy to hear you had a great experience during your stay with us. Our staff works very hard to ensure all of our guest has an enjoyable and comfortable stay. We are glad to know you enjoyed our breakfast and our family suite. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!!

Summary Heading: Excellent property, convenient location to Disneyland, the bus was very easy to use
Summary: Will definitely stay here another time, enjoyed the location to the park and easy out of park dining for the kids . Actually booked this hotel by mistake but glad we did. The breakfast was good though very crowded on Friday morning. Need to fill things more often.
Manager Response: Getaway65015586821,  Thank you so much for your awesome review! We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and you liked our daily breakfast. We will make sure food items get replenished frequently.  Thank you once again for your review, we are ecstatic to hear you will be back to stay with us again!!

Summary: Negatives:We didn’t get the room we asked for. Our rooms floor (wood laminate) was so dirty our feet kept getting black. Even asked if they could clean it. Some of the linen was dirty. No curtains to block out light, other rooms had them. Tv in bedroom didn’t work on the remote. One of the cleaning maids lied about us not wanting our room cleaned. We tipped well too.  Positives: Close to Disneyland, good breakfast, good pool.
Manager Response: smartkiwi77,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and feedback. We are sorry to hear you did not receive the room you asked for, all request are based upon availability on the day of arrival. We sincerely apologize for the experience you had during your stay. We will make sure to talk to all departments to ensure these issues get handles as soon as possible. Thank you once again for your feedback.

Summary: Great value, close to the mouse.  Booked online, the staff was quite friendly.  The room is nothing fancy, but some of the rooms have Disney decals that the kids thought were awesome.  We didn’t have breakfast, but it comes with the room.
Manager Response: nh0ffman,  Thank you for your review and Feedback!! We are happy to hear your kids enjoyed the Disney decals some of our rooms are themed and you can always request one. However they are based upon available but we do try our best to accommodate. Thank you for choosing to stay with us we hope to see you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Good luck getting your deposit back
Summary: The stay was nice except might as well count all the deposits they add on as part of costs as they do not give back the deposits. Just a forever charge On your card that “ they can’t find in their system” then they hang up on you.
Manager Response: crystalc461,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you have encountered. Unfortunately the length of the hold on the credit card varies depending on the bank or credit card. Once it has been released  it can take up to 3-5 business days. Please contact us directly so we can assist you with this matter.

Summary: Enjoyed the quiet location after a busy weekend at NAMM. Was able to check in at noon. We also had no problem getting a late check as well. The room was quiet and clean. Service was perfect! They also provided a free breakfast. Which was super helpful for a long day.
Manager Response: mikera0,  Thank your great review and feed back!!! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do try our best to accommodate our guest to the best of our abilities with having an early check in and check out, glad we were able to do that for you and provide perfect service. We hope to see you again soon!!!

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and great value hotel compared to other hotels near Disneyland. We got the 43 bus out the front for $5 all day pass just check timetable online so easy. Comfortable room to come back to after long days at Disneyland, good shower and wifi was good. Breakfast was good but can get crowded, not an issue was seating outside. Good friendly staff,fast and easy check in  and out and would stay here again.
Manager Response: jimiUnanderra,  Thank you for your awesome review and feedback we greatly appreciate it!! We are so happy to know you know enjoyed your room and some of our amenities during your stay. Our team works hard to ensure each of our guest has an enjoyable stay. Thank you again for your kind comments about our facilities we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: We loved the convenience to either hop on the bus or walk to Disney. Excellent breakfast. Our daughter loved the bunk beds. Great place to stay with little ones. We will be back with our friends for sure!
Manager Response: B6296EZkatieg,  Thank you so much for awesome review we greatly appreciate it!! We are so happy your daughter enjoyed our family suite. We are happy to hear you will be coming back and cant wait to see you all soon!! Thank you once again for your review!

Summary: The room was stinky, breakfast way to crowded, bus regularly late.  The room smelled of urine and was old.  The breakfast was so crowded you couldn't get a seat.  The bus, which you had to pay for was continually late picking up ant the hotel and from Disneyland.
Manager Response: kelliraetaylor,  Thank you taking the time to leave us a review. Your feedback is very important to us so we can ensure we are doing our job to keep our guests happy. We are sadden to hear that you did not have an enjoyable experience during your stay. We sincerely apologize for the issues you have encountered. As a team we will ensure each of these issues get handled as soon as possible. Unfortunately the  Anaheim resort transportation is something we do not have control over however we do try our best to keep our guest updated with times they are running by calling their dispatch number. Thank you once again for review and feedback.

Summary: Large room, very clean, well maintained facility, excellent staff, comfortable bed. Disneyland bus stops in front of hotel. Good safe area with plenty of places to eat within walking distance. A bargain find.
Manager Response: Vernon,  Thank you so much for your five star review!!! We are so pleased to hear your enjoyed your stay at our facilities. Our team works very hard to ensure each and everyone of our guest has an enjoyable stay. Thank you once again for your review we hope to see you again soon!!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with just an uber or lyft to Disney.
Summary: We stayed in a King bed themed room. It was star wars themed, and we loved it. However for what you pay they might want to make it better decorated. It looks like they went to target down the road and just picked up misc. things. The room was clean, and they were very quick to get you something if you needed it. The front desk staff was awesome. The only reason I gave it a 4 out of 5 was during the morning we had some type of construction above us and woke us up. You would think they would warn us or not put someone below the construction???
Manager Response: JnGosser,  Thank you for your review and feedback. We are glad to hear you were able to enjoy our star wars themed room during your stay. Our team works very hard to ensure each and everyone of our guest has an enjoyable stay, we sincerely apologize for the construction noise you encountered. As a team we will be sure moving forward we do not disturb any of our guest. Thank you once again for your review!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for price and location to Disneyland
Summary: Room was clean, and good sized. Nice pool and hot tub. Good location to Disneyland. Room had a slight odor to it, and bathtub backed up occasional. Also poor water pressure in shower.  Staff was very friendly and allowed us to check our bags the day we traveled to the airport.
Manager Response: Coove14,  Thank you for your review and feedback!! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room and some of our amenities. We apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay we will have out team look into the odor and plumbing. Thank you once again for taking the time to review us, we hope to see you again soon!!

Summary: Clean and comfortable.  Good breakfast but get there early before they run out of eggs. It is about a 25 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure but the shuttle is an option too. The rooms are theamed, ours was Star Wars and our friends was Mickey Mouse.  Nice touch to make it fun.
Manager Response: ScottMedlock77 thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our themed rooms during your stay. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Meets expectations for the price and location, great for family.
Summary: Things that went well :  - Great location. It is pretty convenient to reach the parks. It is about 45 min from LAX airport (depends on LA traffic) - Room had refrigerator and fridge which made it easy to manage with kids.  - Rooms are clean and adequately lighted.  - Good daily housekeeping. They arranged my daughter's doll on the beds every day (this was a delight, thanks to whoever that was).  - Showers were good. Room had walk-in closet and air conditioning (heating + cooling). - Breakfast was generously served, quite a few options for the family staff was courteous and very prompt in service.  - Wifi connectivity was stable and fast.   Things that could have been better :  - ART shuttles are there, but it was a waste of time researching their prices and service timings. Very
Manager Response: Hello Sumanta_2000,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review and giving us your feedback. We are glad to hear your stay with us went well and our staff was able to give you prompt service. Thank you once again for your feedback we will definitely take it inconsideration to give our guest the best experience possible!

Summary: I would only change that we had to ask for extra towels eXh time our room was cleaned. We were 6 people and 3 girls with long hair. They did not complain when we did ask and were very courteous and kind every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for communicating your hotel needs with us! We are glad we are able to help you feel comfortable during your stay!  Thank you for taking the time to give us such a great review! We really appreciate the 5/5 rating!

Summary: We loved the place, clean and the staff was great, breakfast was very good also, close to restaurants, target and Disneyland of course, parking lot was clean and the Internet very strong and reliable,
Manager Response: Thank you, Ms. Rosa, for taking the time to give us such a great review! We are happy to hear that there were several things that you enjoyed about the hotel!  We really appreciate the 5/5 rating, and we enjoyed having your family stay with us!  Happy 2020!

Summary Heading: Good stay, and not too far away
Summary: Solid place. Check-in was fast and friendly.  They had our 2 queen with 2 bunk beds(and 2 bathrooms) room ready when we got there. Room was clean, had good parking. Beds could be a tad now comfortable. The room had a very slight smell of mildew or some water damage but nothing unbearable. Liked having the microwave and mini fridge. Wish there was a couch with sofa bed and a king bed instead for the 2 queens. Housekeeping did a great job every day.  Breakfast was meh, eggs and sausage not the best, but the make your own waffles were excellent. Also took a dry cup of fruit loops for the kid to munch on while walking. Just found out this stay that they now charge for parking, which used to be free. We've stayed here multiple times and will continue to do so. It's one of our 2 go to
Manager Response: jsers1! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and give your feedback!  Thank you for being a loyal guest of ours we are happy to hear we are one of your go to hotels during your visits to the Anaheim area. We are sorry to hear the issue of the smell you encountered in your room during your stay and we will be sure our team gets notified to handle that.

Summary: 3 generations, comfortable for everyone.  Great staff.  Close to bus. We had a great time!  We had 2 bedroom, 2 bath room.  Everyone had their own space.  Great base location.  Close to everything. Couldn’t have asked for a nicer place.
Manager Response: Thank you rhondamanfredo for a great review!!! We love to hear our guest had a great time during their stay. Thank you again for taking the time to write about your experiences at the hotel, and for making such kind comments about our staff and property!

Summary: My only complaint is the room constantly had a musty smell and was very humid unless we had the fan and heat on.  the breakfast that was offered was decent.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  We would stay here again
Manager Response: Susan thank you for taking the time to share your review and feedback! Were are sorry to hear the issues you experienced in the room during your stay.  We will notify our team about the issue and be proactive in eliminating the musty smell  and humid feel in the room. Thank you again for your review!

Summary: This isn't a flashy hotel but  its great value for money and excellent for familys. The rooms are always clean (comfy beds) and the staff are real friendly and helpful. A decent breakfast included, self serve laundry, Target just down the road for bits and pieces, Carls Jnr nxt door and the Art bus stops right outside the hotel for easy transport to Disneyland and wherever else you need to get to. Hop on, hop off for $6 per day for a adult. Cheaper if you get 3 or 5 day hop on hop off passes. What else could you ask for for the price.  We have never been dissapointed when we have stayed here.
Manager Response: Travel53399442942 thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review!! We appreciate you for being a loyal guest and for your business. We work hard everyday to offer our guests the best possible service and experience while staying at the Stanford inn!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney!
Summary: We stayed here during our recent Disneyland trip. The star wars themed room was fun for the kids and there was plenty of space for everyone with bunk beds. The staff was friendly and accommodating and the breakfast was good. The only drawback was the distance from Disneyland, but we just took the shuttle every day so it was fine.
Manager Response: Hello Rcamillew,  Thank you so much for your review!!! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us for your Disneyland trip and happy to hear our star wars theme family suite was suitable for your family. Hope you to see you and your family again soon!

Summary: Amazing staff, comfortable and clean rooms and amazing breakfast! Seriously can’t ask for more for your money. About a 10-15 min walk to Disney or take the bus which picks up right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello 572natashaw,  Thank you for your five star review!! Our staff works very hard to ensure our guest have a great experience during their stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our daily breakfast. Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review!

Summary: We found this hotel hours before arrival based on reviews.  It is motel style, so your door goes outside and faces the parking lot.  There are two levels and we asked to be on bottom level because we arrived with 3 sleeping kids. The lady at the front desk was very friendly.  The room was simple but very clean.   The breakfast in the morning is incredible. so much food to choose from, everyone was happy and full.  The Disneyland rush did come around the time people were heading out to the park, so if you're an early riser, maybe go before then.  Hot waffles, bagels, eggs and sausage, cereal, coffee and juices...hurray!   It is also nice that it is close to a Target and there were a lot of families at the bus stop with kids in princess dresses, so that must be a good option that
Manager Response: Hello 690rj,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such an awesome review!! We appreciate you choosing our property to stay during your Disneyland trip. We do try our best to accommodate each of our guest to the best of our abilities. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our daily breakfast we do have a variety of items for our guest to choose from, a little something for everybody. We are very close to target at a walkable distance also a lot of restaurants near by. The shuttle is very convenient that stops right out in front of the hotel and passes are sold at the front desk. Thank you once again for your feedback!!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland, a bus stops right at the hotel. It is also walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. You do have to pay a small fee to park there just a heads up.
Manager Response: amford825,  Thank for taking the time to leave us a review and your feedback! We are so happy to hear you would consider coming back. We are glad our staff was pleasant and helpful we thrive to ensure our guest are well taken care of. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel for the Price close to Disneyland!
Summary: We are “return visitors”. My family tries to go to Disneyland once a year. We always stay here. The staff is great! The rooms are big, clean, and comfortable. The property is located close to the Disneyland Character parking area.  Plus...you get return customer discounts!
Manager Response: Mr Jordan,  Thank you for being a loyal guest we appreciate your business!!! We are so happy too hear we are your families go to place for Disneyland trips. Yes our property is vey close to the toy story parking lot at a walkable distance and we also have the art shuttle stop right in front of the hotel! Thank you for taking the time to leave an awesome review we hope to see you all soon!!

Summary: Great price and  great breakfast.  The bus stop to get to Disneyland is right in front of the hotel.  We only stayed one night because it was a short trip, but would have stayed there longer if we could have.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, Vivi!  And an extra thanks for the five stars! We loved having you! Until next time! We'll be here!

Summary: Thank you and the staff for everything we enjoyed our stay and recommend Stanford inn and suites rooms were clean and staff was prompt  when requesting extra towels and other necessities highly recommend this hotel for future stays only thing I didn’t like was having to pay for parking as a guest should be included for one vehicle in the cost
Manager Response: Thank you so much, Mr. Naranjo, for your five star review!  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate it!

Summary: If you are staying off site this is a good value. Two rooms with two bathrooms a big plus, but the bunk beds were pretty hard. It was under $20 a day to Uber to the park and take a taxi back, but the bus line does pickup right outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to visit our TripAdvisor page!  We were happy to serve you in your trip.

Summary: My son LOVED our Cars room (husband saw the next room was star wars) LOL. Loved how easy it was to get to Disneyland with the ART stop right upfront. Breakfast was awesome and loved the outside courtyard. We had trouble with our hot water but they fixed it right away. Will definitely be staying again!
Manager Response: Thank you, Leslie!  We love to hear reviews like this! So glad that your son enjoyed your room!  Thank you for allowing us to be a part of the memories! :)

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay - Good Food and Close to the Convention Center
Summary: Honestly, It was a rocky start however it ended up being an amazing hotel. They have really friendly staff that cater to international tourists (we were a group of 4 Aussies on our first US Trip). They helped us with Tipping advice and local places to visit.  The room was clean and tidy, the beds were comfortable and there was plenty of space in the fridge and the TV Worked fine.  The Breakfast bar had awesome options. Waffles, Cerial, Eggs, Sausage, Fruit, Bagels, Juice, Tea, Coffee and more.  They also had electric charging facility for electric cars, A pool a small gym and a laundry.  All in all it was amazing.  Its also very close to the convention centre (we travelled for Blizzcon) and close enough to Disney to make it a good way to get around.   The best part of all if you
Manager Response: Dear Reticence,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review we greatly appreciate it and your business!!! We are overjoyed to hear how amazing your stay went with us and that our staff was able to cater to your needs. We are sorry to hear it started off rocky but are happy to know that it was turned around. Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel during your first trip to the US we hope to see you again in the future!!!!  Thank you

Summary: This was our 2nd time staying here (1st was 3 years ago). The rooms were in the process of being updated during our previous stay. They just finished updating other parts of the property (breakfast room/patio, pool, etc.) a few weeks prior to this stay.  The value for what we paid for a Family Suite exceeded our expectations. The breakfast isn't anything fancy, but meets the needs of our family perfectly. The staff/employees were all professional and nice.  I am sure we will be back again on a future trip.
Manager Response: Dear R0ute101   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a five star review and choosing to stay with us once again, We appreciate your business. We are ecstatic to hear our family suite has exceeded your expectations an that our breakfast met the needs of your family. Thank you again for choosing our hotel for your family's stay in Anaheim we hope to see you again in the future.  Thank you

Summary: This Motel is located just under a 10 minute drive of the Disneyland Parks.  Good:  - Price - Quality of the beds - Large TV and movie channels - Good WIFI - Looks well maintained - Friendly Staff  Cons: - Charges 7 USD for parking per night - Far to small Breakfast room
Manager Response: Dear Thijs82   We are grateful for your feedback and your business. We are happy to hear you had a good stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: “So sorry for hidden fees, we have new ownership”
Summary: $7 per day per car for parking, & you will also pay for a local shuttle company to get to the park. The water pressure is terrible & hot water gone by 8:30am. Best to shower at night! Our toilet had to be fumbled with in order to flush.  The beds were so old they have the slump in the middle which makes a great nights sleep lol... Only positive is the rooms were clean & they have a refrigerator & microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Ischinauer,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. Your feedback is important to us so we can ensure we are doing our job to keep our guests happy. We are dismayed to hear that you did not have a superb experience during your stay at our hotel, please accept my sincerest apologies for the issues you encountered. We will absolutely address each of your concerns on our end to ensure they do not occur again, we have also purchased a new set of beds in regards to  the issue you encountered with the bed. Thank you again for your feedback and your patronage, if you are ever back in Anaheim, please contact me directly so I can personally take care of you and guarantee you a perfect stay, I promise we won't let you down.   Sincerely,

Summary: Girls at the check in desk were extremely helpful and friendly, especially the girl in training (sorry I forgot your name!). Room was nice and clean, good size. My room was next to the parking lot of the restaurant next door so could be loud at times. Not too bad though and it didn't stop me from having a good night rest. Bed is nice and comfortable, lots of pillow. Bathroom clean, shower pressure good, temperature good and stable most of the time. Easy walking distance to Disneyland, Target, restaurants etc.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica V  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a positive review!!! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we are happy to hear our front desk agents were able to do that. We loved that your stay with us went well and we hope to see you again soon!  Thank you

Summary Heading: A good place if going to Disney
Summary: Overall we had a good stay here.  The rooms were nice but the carpets need to bed deep cleaned.  Our feet got a little black.  Not bad but enough to notice.  The beds were comfortable and the room overall was nice.  It is close enough to Disney Land to be convenient.
Manager Response: Dear mikewJ9940WF  Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear your stay with us was overall good. We are working hard to keep the carpets clean in all of our rooms and we will definitely work harder to avoid this issue going forward. Again thank for your feedback we hope to see you again soon.   Thank you

Summary: It wasn't a bad hotel, but the walking distance from there to Disneyland was a long walk to get to & from & when I googled it, it said they have a free shuttle which is one of the reasons why I booked, it only came every 20 min to every half hour, so we had to use Uber instead which we don't mind using, but not worth the distance. They don't have refrigerators in the room & the bathroom was very small & cramped, but the beds were comfortable & the room was very clean, so overall it was a good stay, but next time we're gonna plan on booking the Doubletree instead becaus it is much closer to Disneyland distance wise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback bethanyr730! We appreciate all the feedback good or bad that our guests leave us so we can improve our amenities and services. We're so glad you enjoyed all our amenities, and we work hard everyday to offer our guests the best possible experience but unfortunately we did not achieve our goal of giving you a 5 star experience. Apologies for the miscommunication in regards to the shuttle however we make every effort to communicate to all our guests that the shuttle service does have a nominal fee. We will review any advertising online that specifies otherwise to avoid this issue in the future. Thank you again for choosing us and we hope to see you back in Anaheim soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Great room selection will stay here again very clean good service all together. Great area to stay if visiting Disneyland. Breakfast was really good great variety of foods to pick from will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear vanessalopez766 Thank you for your positive feedback. We are so happy to hear you had a great experience during your stay. We will continue to do our best to provide this experience to you every time you come to stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room was nice and the beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was ok. The hotel was located as walking distance from Disneyland. There was also a bus shuttle to Disneyland available. There were restaurants and grocery stores in the near.
Manager Response: Hi ansuorsa,  We are thankful for your feedback and your business. With your comments we can continue to improve our hotel In order to keep all of our guests happy! We are glad the beds were comfortable enough for you to enjoy a good night's rest. Our hotel is definitely within a reasonable walking distance to Disneyland so good thing you took advantage of the proximity. Thank you again for sharing your review and please come back soon, it's our honor to serve you!  Sincerely,

Summary: Called to make a last minute reservation because we needed a place that had late check in the staff member I talked to on the phone was great and set everything up for me. TheRoom was good staff was friendly price was right only thing wrong was you could here the cars on the street going by when you were trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Piratetraviler,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your review and sharing your experience with us. Your feedback is just as important as your business and we truly appreciate you! We are very content to hear that your experience booking with us went smooth and that you found value in our hotel. We accomplished our goal of satisfying our customer! We are sorry to hear the noise on the street was too loud, however we do have rooms on the backside of the hotel away from the street, we will gladly put you in a more quite room on your next stay with us. Thank you again for your honest feedback and your patronage, we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Excellent modest older hotel. Close enough to Disneyland to daily Uber back and forth for less than it costs to park. Did not have any issues but interaction with staff was pleasant. Enjoyed basic daily breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear GlobeTrotting590031,  Thank for taking the time to leave us a great review! We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Art bus line at hotel, fridge and microwave and coffee machine in room, if king size bed, you get a sofa to sit on, good location, felt safe, big filling breakfast with lots of options to eat, friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear BlueHawaiiMagic,  Thank you so much for being our guest and for giving us positive feedback! It is our number one priority to provide perfect experiences to our guests and we are excited to see we achieved our goal with your stay. We will continue to do our best to provide this experience to you and every other guest that walks through our doors. Please come back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Stanford Inn & Suites a great place to stay.
Summary: We have stayed at the Stanford for 4 vacations and have enjoyed each stay.  Breakfast is very good, handy and staff are very nice.  Rooms are nice and beds very good.  Noise from rooms above can at times be noisy but expected.  Thanks for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless71658,  Thank you very much for your fantastic review and most of all for being our loyal customer. We are incredibly grateful for your business and we strive to provide an exceptional experience for every one of our guests. We will celebrate your review with our team and continue our efforts to keep you happy. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay all around
Summary: The Front desk staff and the breakfast staff were wonderful. The rooms were clean and a perfect size for me, my 2 boys and my parents. The breakfast was a perfect start to long day at DL. What  more could you ask for on a trip to DL.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: It was a great stay for me and my family the rooms were really clean and I loved the suite for the kids made it alot easier on our family trip staff was great will definitely stay here again can't wait .
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our family suite! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay, even as EV charging!
Summary: Overall stay was nice(was in town to use remaining two days of Disneyland Park Hopper tickets. Check-in was a breeze though it took a reminder to the staff to activate Electric vehicle charging spot. Room was mostly satisfactory. Would suggest doing a thorough cleaning of carpet as son had black marks on feet and hands.   Location is conveniently located along ART route to Disneyland (though shuttle was consistently late despite assurances that it arrives every 30 minutes from top of the hour on; was more like every 45 minutes).   Also suggest replacing old/worn out remotes as they have definitely seen some use(could hear rattles when picking up remote).   Ability to charge vehicle (Tesla) at no addl cost is a huge perk and applaud the property for future proofing it while also
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We will look into the issues with our rooms, thank you. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: After being Gina all day both days we came back to dirty rooms. Housekeeping still hadn’t made it to our room. Maybe more help for the house keepers will help. But then again it wasn’t that busy cause the parking lot was empty. No waffles during the week sucks especially for the kids.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're sorry to hear that your stay wasn't up to our usual standards, we will look into why your room wasn't cleaned. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: They staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. The room had an odd smell and it's a good thing we were there during cooler months because the in room cooler didn't work at all! It was warm in the room both nights we stayed, he had the fan set to high and the temp as cold as we could but it didn't really do anything. It's just a good thing we were there during colder months of the year or I don't know what we would have done. We would have asked to move rooms but since everything was sold out everywhere we were just happy to have a clean place to sleep. Other than those two things the room was just fine.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're sorry to hear that your stay wasn't up to our usual standards. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: This was our second time staying here. Everything went great from check in to check out. The bus to Disneyland is right infront and takes about 10 minutes to get there. We will definitely be coming back.  Thank you
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you again soon! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Great for the price! Initially when planing our trip the hotel I wanted was sold out and I happened upon this place and choose it based on the overall star rating it had from reviews. It’s a little further from Disney than I planned but it has a stop for the ART bus right out front so that was very convenient! It was clean and the staff was friendly! The breakfast was good and had plenty of options. The beds weren’t lavish but they were comfy and did the job. The A/C was a lifesaver as I don’t sleep well in the heat and it kept our room cool, while not being too loud as to keep us up.  They were under some construction while we were there and when we checked in they had a sign saying that the pool was out of use till the 16th, which was fine but then they finished early and
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are sorry we weren't able to let you know of the pool opening. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Son in the SCSC Marching Band Competition
Summary: Awesome hotel if your wanting to be close to Disneyland! Good price, quick service both times we asked for them to assist us with the children's suite TV and the in room safe. The curtain on the children's suite was very sheer so not much privacy.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Hotel staff was very helpful. Check in and check out was very easy. Unfortunately hotel was going through a renovation during our recent vacation and we were unable to use pool or hot tub. Looks great! Laundry facilities were very accessible and clean. New machines were great. Continental breakfast was great with lots of options- having a ingredients list would be helpful for people with allergies.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We will look into having an ingredients list for our breakfast area. Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: The staff was super helpful with a mistake in our reservation and accommodated us with fixing it. The location is close to Disneyland and restaurants. The shuttle worked out great and pick us up in front of the hotel and dropped us off.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We're happy to hear that our staff was able to make your stay better! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Great location with excellent value for money
Summary: We have just completed our 6 day stay here. Staff very helpful breakfast was great busy some mornings but always ample food. Today’s breakfast was in the new room and it’s very spacious and make your own waffles are back! This is within walking distance of Disney we walked for our 6 visits about $11 for an Uber for our family of six. Pool reopened our last day here which was much appreciated as it was 30* after an early morning at Disney it’s just what the doctor ordered! We were in room 131 which was well placed for quiet. Very happy with our stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're happy to hear that you had a great stay with us! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: A great place for family. A great place for friends. The family suite is spacious and has two bathrooms?! How could you go wrong with that! It’s a short walk to Disney and lots of great food in the area. This was my second year staying here in a row and I plan on always coming back to this hotel!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you again soon! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: Decent Hotel for the Price & Location
Summary: No frills or fancy stuff but it's reasonably close to the Disney parks and had a free continental breakfast each morning, which was nice. It would have been nice if the shuttle was free that comes to the hotel. Overall though, it is a clean hotel, with nice staff and comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!
