Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant and comfortable stay and we are proud to know that you did. We hope to have gained your trust and look forward to your next stay with us. We thank you again for your review, for it is essential to our teams success. Have a wonderful week!

Summary: So clean, comfy beds, friendly staff and good breakfast! The only complaint I have which really doesn’t even constitute as a complaint, the remote for the tv didn’t work very well. We enjoyed our stay and loved the two rooms so that our daughter could sleep separately
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We apologize for the issues regarding the TV control. We are happy to know that you were able to overlook that and still enjoy your visit. We thank you again for your time and hope to have you back in the near future.

Summary: We have now stayed her for 3 Disney trips and its so good, we stay in the room with the kids suite with 2 bathrooms. The rooms are big, updated and decorated for the kids nicely. Beds are ok nothing to brag about but decent enough. Breakfast is what it is, but t least you get a few different options and the waffles are always a hit. The shuttle runs right out front of this hotel however it can tend to take a while to show up so we just use Uber which was $6 each way. Internet is good, pool and hot tub are usable and they have washer and dryer onsite as well. All in all if you are going with kids this place is great, 2 bathrooms is key!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value your review for it is essential to our teams success. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant stay. It makes us proud to know you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to your future one. Thank you again and have a wonderful rest of the week!

Summary Heading: Don’t let the outside fool you
Summary: Everything was perfect. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great. Room clean and spacious and the beds super comfortable. Throw in the free parking and WiFi and it’s a great deal. The ART shuttle picks you up right in front and drops you off the closest spot near the front of Disneyland, so it saves a lot of walking. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant stay. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your visit! We look forward to your future visits. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: The room is clean. Breakfast is tasty. Rome is not noisy at night. The only problem is the heater could not set the temperature.  20 minutes  walk to Disney land. So if you have some little kids not want to walk long maybe it is better for bus.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay. We sincerely apologize for the issue with the heater and will have that worked on. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: Wonderful place to stay.  Pleasant and helpful staff.  We have traveled extensively throughout the US.  They serve a great breakfast.  They keep the place very clean.  Right on the bus line to Disneyland.  Good price point.  Nice pool area.  The hot tub was out of service but they were working on it.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It is exciting to know that you have traveled a lot throughout the US and that you chose to stay with us. Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to provide you with exceptional service. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant stay. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: You do not get what you pay for at this hotel. You get so much more! The free breakfast was wonderful and kid friendly. Our kids loved making waffles. The room was clean, beds were comfortable. My only complaint would be all the pillows were overstuffed. It would have been nice to have different options on the pillows. Overall, wonderful hotel for Disneyland. We ended up just taking an Uber to and from the park which was about $6 one way.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant stay. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience with the pillows but are happy to know that the rest of your visit was enjoyable. We look forward to your next stay in hopes of giving you a more comfortable stay. Thank you again and have a wonderful rest of the week!

Summary: This hotel has free parking, free full breakfast, microwave & fridge in the room.  The shower was awesome, the room was Disney themed and had hardwood floors. The staff was so nice in the breakfast room & in the lobby.  Everyone was helpful.  They did Disney pin trading in the office which was really cool.  You cannot beat this hotel for the price.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we consider it rewarding when our guests let us know. We look forward to your future visits in hopes of maintaining the same status with you. Thank you again and have a wonderful rest of the week!

Summary: Best hotel we’ve ever stayed at. We’ve been staying in this hotel since 2013 every time we go to Disneyland. The rooms are clean. Their breakfast is good too. A lot of food selection. Free parking and WiFi.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! It is exciting to know that we have loyal guests as wonderful as you. Thank you for your loyalty. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant experience. We look forward to your future visits! Have a wonderful week!

Summary: We really enjoyed staying atStanford Inn & Suites. The rooms were clean and nice.  The carpets were also clean. It was nice and quiet and the beds were comfy.  We really enjoyed the Breakfast buffet.  The food was delicious.  It had a great variety with waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage, bacon, cereal, pastries, juice, yogurt, fruit, etc. We also enjoyed the shuttle bus which stopped right in front of the motel to take us to Disneyland.  This was such a nice convenience.  The parking was also free.  We really enjoyed our visit and will stay there again when we come back to vacation.   We highly recommend this place!!!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value your reviews for they are essential in our teams success. Our team works hard to ensure that every guest has a wonderful experience and we are happy to know that you definitely enjoyed your stay! We thank you once again and look forward to you future visits. Have a wonderful week!

Summary: Everything was SPECTACULAR! Been going to CALIFORNIA for 40 years and this experience was the best I ever had..especially for the money. Love Marriott  properties and this place was right up there for So much less. Disney within a mile..food everywhere..beach near by..the hotel breakfast was fantastic..beds were top notch (2 queens in one area...bunk beds in another room) Pool was perfect..employees were Top Notch including housekeeping.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your visit! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant and comfortable stay. We look forward to your next stay in hopes of giving you the same or an even better experience. Thank you again for your time and your wonderful review. Have a wonderful week!

Summary: Great staff, clean rooms, close to Disneyland. We love the adjoining room with two bathrooms for more kids, or our aide that comes with our disabled son.  We asked for a light bulb change and more pillows and they were there within 10 minutes!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that we were of great service to you and your family. Our team works hard to ensure that every guest has a comfortable and pleasant stay. We look forward to your next visit and thank you once again for your time and wonderful review. Have a great week!

Summary Heading: The only place we stay for Disneyland trips.
Summary: We've stayed at Stanford about 10 times now, the service is always great, rooms clean, breakfast is great, and the price is fantastic. There are less expensive hotels, but Stanford doesn't charge extra for parking, or anything else! We are a large family, 2 adults and 4 kids and the family suites are awesome for us! One block away from Joe's Italian ice, across the street is jack in the box and taco bell.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your reviews are essential to our success. Our team continuously works hard to ensure every visit is comfortable for every guest. We  Thank you for your loyalty, we look forward to your next visit. Have a wonderful week!

Summary: Very good for the price. Stayed 1 night and were satisfied with all  the services. Breakfast was good. It was close to Disneyland; a  brisk walk if you are so  inclined. The staff offered suggestions for dining in the area.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we truly value your review for it is essential to our success. We are happy to know you enjoyed your visit with us and we look forward to your next one. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: I had an event at the convention center in the winter of 2018.  Although it was about 3-4 blocks from the convention center, I was happy to take the walk every day.  The cost of this hotel, was much lower than the big brands nearer the convention center.  It was clean, the free breakfast was good and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we truly value your review for it is essential to our success. We are happy to know you enjoyed your visit with us and we look forward to your next one. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: When I got to my room, my first thought was what does a motel need to do to call itself an Inn.  The room felt dirty, the furnishings were old and the decor was from 30 years ago.  I was extremely disappointed and felt the room was overpriced.
Manager Response: Hello rmello677071,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback, I'm saddened that you feel you didn't get what you paid for at our Inn. We pride ourselves about service and room cleanliness even though our building isn't new. We do offer a full hot complimentary breakfast along with pastries, cold and hot cereals, fresh fruit and yogurt, a fitness center, pool and hot tub, complimentary high speed WiFi and free parking just to name a few. I hope this information helps change your mind about us and consider us for future stays in Anaheim, CA.

Summary: We would definitely stay here again. Free parking & close to Disneyland. Breakfast was good except for the scrambled eggs being dry but everything else was good. Staff was very helpful & one in particular was so sweet to us.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Your reviews are highly valued for they are essential to our success. I sincerely apologize for the issue with the eggs and will address this directly to our breakfast attendants. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant experience. We are glad to know that your needs were met and we hope to see you on your next stay in hopes of giving you an even better experience. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: We stayed in clean rooms which were updated.  I loved the firm, very comfortable beds, in fact I slept very well the night we stayed.  The staff employed there were very friendly and were very helpful when asked.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant and comfortable stay. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your visit and we look forward to your next one in hopes of giving you an even better experience. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: We have stayed here about four or five times. Our boys love that Mickey Mouse is on the wall! Great location a couple blocks from Disney parking lot. Free breakfast and free parking. We purchased the 3 day bus pass our first time staying before we bought Disney annual passes with parking.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share another experience. It's is exciting to know we have loyal guests like you staying with us. We are currently working on more of our themed rooms and cant wait for you to experience those! We look forward to your next stay in hopes of giving you an even better experience. Thank you again for your review, have a wonderful week!

Summary: Clean rooms! The floors could use a better mopping, our feet were black. But no big deal if you wear shoes. The lobby employees were nice enough but the wonderful employees that are in charge of breakfast were top notch! The breakfast was great! The pool was clean and fun! I will be staying here again!

I will let our breakfast attendants know the wonderful job they are doing. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stanford Inn is a simple hotel and an economical price that is close to Disney. The free breakfast makes for good start to the day. Pool was good. Only downside was the broken hot tub. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay. We value your review for it is essential to our success. I apologize for the broken hot tub, it is currently being worked on. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit. Have a great week!

Summary: Great value!  Loved the separate room for our boys with their own bathroom.  Laundry was convenient and affordable.  Room was clean and a great space.  Breakfast had something for everyone.  Only complaint would be that the beds felt very hard.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay. I apologize for the firmness of the mattress, but we thank you again and we look forward to your next visit. Have a great week!

Summary: We had a great time. Loved the family suite.  Kids enjoyed having their own bunk beds and we liked having our own queen beds so we all could have a good sleep after a long day at Disney. Buses were great for Disney. Totally worth taking instead of paying for parking.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay. Summary: This hotel is a really good value and close to Disneyland, within walking distance. The staff is the best thing about this hotel. They’re all really nice and do everything they can to make your stay enjoyable. The free breakfast ever morning is pretty good as well. I will say this hotel is best for families though.

We are proud to know that you enjoyed your visit and excited to have you stay with us again in the near future. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary: We’ve stayed here a couple of times now and have had good service and experiences. The room 2 room setup is good for families, allowing kids to get some extra rest at night while mom & dad wind down. The proximity to the park is great!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your room here at Stanford Inn. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay and we truly value your reviews for this reason. We look forward to your next stay in hopes of creating an even better experience for you. Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary Heading: Good value, good location for Disney
Summary: This hotel was right on the bus stop to Disney or about a half hour walk. We enjoyed the excellent breakfast and the pool. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The room was a bit dark and the Furnishings were a little worn. The bed was comfortable and firm. I would stay here again especially with a family group.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value your review for it is essential to our teams success. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and pleasant experience. We are proud to know you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you on your next visit to give you an even better experience! Thank you again and have a wonderful week!

Summary Heading: This room was an amazing family room that my boys and I LOVED!
Summary: My boys were thrilled to be going to Disneyland, but I was not ready for how much they would love this room. It was beautifully decorated with the Avengers and my kids were so proud of the fact that they were able to have their own TV that they were sometimes too happy to go back to the hotel. They LOVED the breakfast also... the waffles were delicious! The staff here were friendly and always helpful and smiling. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, and will be staying there again whenever I can.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a fun and memorable experience. It's exciting to know that your kids really enjoyed the room theme! Its always a pleasure providing the best possible service and we hope to see you in the near future to give you an even better experience. Thank you again!

Summary: Great room! Had the suite with 2 bathrooms this time and it was so spacious. My kids loved the Avenger theme. It was a perfect surprise for my 3 year olds birthday. Breakfast is good but there’s limited seating.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a fun and comfortable experience. Its exciting to know that the theme rooms were a wonderful surprise! We thank you again and we hope see you on your next visit. Happy Birthday to the 3 year old!

Summary: The pool had glass. I complained and they didn't fix it. My daughter got glass in her foot, and the fact that they did not fix the problem AND did not comp me a night or something is completely sad to me. I felt like I should walk around and warn all the other guests not to go to the pool. I was really upset initially that the hot tub was empty and I assumed it was because there had been glass and that was protocol. Clearly, it was not because of glass because even after I complained of glass, they did nothing about the glass issue.  besides that, the beds and pillows were way to hard. The pillows were HUGE and they did not have any flat ones (we asked 3 times). The rooms were really dark.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Black soot filled tubs with standing water, never fixed the whole trip, multiple calls
Summary: I booked two rooms for two nights, so that my party of 6 would have two showers to get ready in the morning and get out the door quicker for the park. We got in late, checked in and one room shower had 3 inches of standing water in it and black soot everywhere. GROSS. I called and she said 'oh no, that's not good'. She didn't offer to move us to a new room or fix the issue. I told her, it was okay, I'd use my friends shower next door, along with my three kids, for one night, if they could fix it in the morning. She said, no problem, that maintenance would be there at 11 AM. We get back from the park, late, and it's still not fixed. So again, we call and she says 'sorry'. I say that I'll just use the other shower again and I think we should get a discount on BOTH ROOMS for all
Manager Response: Hello thank you for taking the time to share your review with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and I sincerely apologize that we were unable to provide that experience. Rest assured, it is currently being worked on. We hope to give you an even better experience next time in hope of gaining your trust again. Thank again for your time and have a wonderful day.

Summary: I chose this hotel due to the great online reviews.  They were very accurate.  This hotel/motel is well located and very well priced for what you get.  We booked a one bathroom family suite so our boy could have his own room and the suite was a good size.  Breakfast was simple but adequate and the staff in the breakfast room are excellent - always smiling and ever helpful.  A 10 minute ride on the ART bus to Disney and walking distance to plenty of food options (make sure you try Joe's Italian Ices just down the road !!!).  Target also not far away.  Room was clean and their is a small laundry on site.  Pool area was also quite nice but was not warm enough for us to take a dip. We also popped down to the Outlets at Orange for a bit of a shop and to catch a movie.  Also close to
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable experience. We are proud to know you did and we are truly grateful for your review- it is essential to our success. Its exciting to know you experienced different areas during your stay. These cities have a lot to offer. Thank you again, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great value. Dated rooms, but clean and quiet. They have a decent breakfast - can't go hungry there. The staff was very nice and helpful. Lots of cameras around for security. The shuttle to Disneyland runs about every 15 minutes.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure that every guest has a comfortable and memorable experience. We strive to provide excellent service to you. Our rooms are currently being renovated and we sincerely apologize if you did not enjoy yours. We hope to give you an even better experience during your next visit. Thank you again for your review for it is essential to the success of our hotel. Have a great day!

Summary: The Hotel is good, very close to NAMM exibition. Unfortunately you pay for room not for single person, we book the room in november and we found only room for 4 people, we are two So our cost was double. During NAMM the hotel staff should consider business people, not only family needs who go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay. I apologize for the confusion regarding the cost; however, we do charge based on availability and not occupancy. Thank you again for your time.

Summary Heading: Not a good breakfast at all
Summary: The floor in the room was carpeted in layers wich felt unhealthy. There were only one chair in the room. Ni designated area to smoke, you had to stand in the middle of the parkinglot feeling silly. The breakfast was terrible, ni fresh vegetables and fruit. The hot meal was microwaved so the eggs were like rubber. It might be good if you like waffles. The bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure every guest enjoys their stay and we sincerely apologize that you did not. I will address these issues with our team in hopes of providing a better experience to our guests. Thank you again for your time, your review is essential to our success.

Summary: This is a clean decent hotel for a good price.  The wi-fi is horrible and sometimes would not work at all.  The walls are extremely thin and we could hear the people in the adjoining room as soon as they were awake.  The breakfast was good and had a lot of choices (waffles, bagles, toast, sausage, precooked scrambled eggs, potatoes) but it would be nice if they had different options on different days.  We stayed for 5 days and were ready to be done with the breakfast.  I would probably not stay here again and pay more for a nicer place.  But for the price it's a decent place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is essential to the success of our hotel and we truly appreciate your genuine thoughts. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and memorable experience. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience with the Wi-Fi and with our breakfast. I will address this issue with our team. I thank you again for your time and hope that in the future we can offer you a better experience.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, loved the room theme!
Summary: Our stay was at the Stanford Inn was awesome. It's a great location, close enough to Disneyland but far away enough that it's quiet and you can recover well. The breakfast they put on is great and the staff are very polite and helpful, we had no issues doing a bag drop before spending all day at Disneyland. Unknown to us prior to check in we had a star wars themed room which I particularly liked! Would recommend this hotel to anyone who is planning on spending a few days at the surrounding theme parks.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We value your review for it is essential to the success of our team. We work hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and memorable experience. We are proud to know that you enjoyed your stay and even more proud that you enjoyed the Star Wars themed room! Thank you again, we look forward to your future visits!

Summary: A nice place, we stayed there on our trip in January 2018.  Make sure to ask if they worked on the "heated pool and hot tub" it was ice cold and after a long day at the parks it would have been nice to soak in the hot tub and let the kids swim.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking your write a review. I apologize for the issues regarding our hot tub. The issue was addressed to  our maintenance team and is currently being worked on. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Clean quiet room. The area was really safe. Never had any issueas with parking. Breakfast was excellent. Eggs, sausage, ceral, waffles and yogurt. Never paid more than $7 for a lyft to disney. The staff was friendly. If i really had to nit pick on anything it would be the smell of the shampoo and body wash wasnt that great. But thats just being an over dramatic person lol over all worth the price
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable and memorable stay. I apologize for the choice in shampoo and body wash, but hope to have you back in the near future! Thank you again.

Summary: This place was super easy to find, being only about a block from the Toy Story Parking Lot, and just down the street from Disneyland. It’s also only a few buildings away from a gas station, in case you need to run out quick and grab something you forgot. The staff is super friendly, I didn’t have a problem with anyone the entire time. There is a large free parking lot attached  First and foremost, the included breakfast was great. Most places have a small continental breakfast with limited options. This hotel had a hot breakfast option with potatoes, eggs, sausage and bacon, waffle makers to make your own waffles, and the normal cereal options with toast and bagels. There were plenty of places to sit, and even a few tables outside. My kids accidentally spilled some OJ on the
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. As a team, we strive to provide excellent guest services and a comfortable place for you to stay. We are proud to know that you were satisfied and content. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to seeing you next month!

Summary: Overall good value for Disney folks but a few criticisms- bed very soft and killed my back, hot tub not hot at all so we didnt go in, and the room heater was either full blast thus creating a sauna or off thus too chilly.

Summary: Great location, clean and delicious breakfast! Wish there were more outlets so we could charge our electronics more easily. We had put some leftover food in the fridge and when we went to eat them the next day, they were frozen solid! It took a while to defrost in the microwave but other than that, we loved our stay there!

Summary: I was a little hesitant to stay here because the ratings weren't the best but I'm SOOO glad we stayed here.  It was super clean, the breakfast was delicious, my kids loved the "kids" room with the bunk beds and all the staff was super friendly and happy.  I've never been offered help so much in any place I've stayed before and they all did it with a smile on their face and I felt they truly wanted to help. We will definitely stay here again!

Summary: Clean and spacious rooms.  We loved the extra side room for the kids with Bunks.  That was a definite plus.  And it was very affordable.  Breakfast was great, but needed more options after a 6 day stay.  We would stay again for sure.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value each review for they are essential in our success as a team. Summary: Fantastic place to stay, handy to Disneyland and comfortable beds. Including free Breakfast every morning, would stay here again, friendly staff always willing to help, didn’t see laundry but could of had one, if not laundry mat is just up the road
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your review is highly valued for it is essential to our success. Summary: The staff is very friendly. The breakfast was great! Very close to Disneyland.  Parking is free and easy. Close to great restaurants and shopping places.  Great for family vacations. Recommend staying at this facility.

Summary Heading: Family of four stayed while visiting Disneyland
Summary: We wanted a reasonably priced place while we visited Disneyland. Honestly we spent very little time in the room and only used the pool once. The room was fine and having the kids in a separate room in bunk beds meant everyone got more sleep. The ART Bus (Specifically for Disneyland?) stopped right out side and the tickets were only a couple of dollars. It took between 15-20 mins to get to Disneyland depending on how many people got on/off the bus. I would definitely recommend this place for families who just need somewhere cheaper to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team strives to ensure that every guest has a comfortable and pleasant visit. We are happy to know that our hotel served its purpose for you and your family. Thank you again and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Clean, comfortable, friendly.  Towels could be a little softer, knives at breakfast could be a little sharper, and wifi could be a bit better - but if that's all I ask for, then it's a 5. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We are currently working on making improvements to our hotel and your review is essential to our success. We look forward to your next stay in hopes of giving you an even better experience. Thank you again!

Summary: Great location to Disneyland and the bus to Disneyland right out front. Good free hot breakfast. Staff very accommodating. The beds were comfortable and room very clean. The only drawback was  with the bus as it didn’t seem to follow the schedule it was suppose to but that certainly is not the fault of the motel.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your reviews are greatly appreciated, for they are essential to our teams success. We are glad to know that you had a comfortable stay with us and apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the transportation. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We didn't spend much time at our hotel so we didn't need, or pay for, anything fancy. It was clean and the free hot breakfast saved money and had a great variety. The bus to Disneyland stopped right in front which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you have pleasant stay and we are proud to know you did. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Nice, clean basic room . Good hot breakfast included. Have stayed here multiple times and only issue we have had was 1 room mix up where we reserved room with 2 needs but they tried to give us 1 king room. They fixed it though and we haven't had an issue since.
Manager Response: Hello, we are glad to have you back! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value your reviews, for they are essential to our teams success. We appreciate your loyalty. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and pleasant stay. I apologize for the issue regarding the room mix up but I am glad that it was fixed in a timely manner. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I rarely ever do reviews, and honestly I'm NOT a picky traveler. I travel a lot and I'm not above crashing at a Motel 6 for a night for $55. You get what you pay for, I'm all good with that.  However, at $160 per night I expected competence from the staff, better quality food at breakfast, some conditioner in the room (I know that sounds petty, but I didn't bring any because for $160 a night I expected it.) The first night we were trying to go to sleep and people in the hallway let their kids run all over screaming and yelling forever, to the point my kids got scared. We called the front desk twice and the lady said, she had called the maintenance guy and he wasn't responding. There were no kids channels on the TV that we could find, and when we asked the same lady at the front
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I sincerely apologize for the issues you came across at our property. Our team strives to ensure every guest leaves our property with a happy heart. We will use your experience and comments to improve our service and will address your concerns with our team. We hope that in the future you can give us the opportunity to give you a fives star experience that I know we can offer. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: You saved our 1st Family Disney Vacation , Thank You !
Summary: On our trip we had four kids come down with the 24 hour flu over s six day period, we called upon the staff several times a day to assist  with new bed linens and getting the room back to working order . They were there quick and had a smile each time they greeted us . Our vacation was salvaged due to our children’s ability to rest and get better so we could enjoy Disney together on our last day . Thank You To the staff at this Hotel. You truly saved our vacation , we wil undoubtedly be back !
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that our team went above and beyond for you. We are constantly working hard to ensure that our guests are comfortable and enjoying their stay. I'm glad you were able to recover quickly! I will extend your gratitude to our team. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great location, close to Disneyland parking lots and very friendly staff.  Very good hot breakfast as well. The cleaning lady even propped up my kids stuffed animals around the room and the kids loved it.  Will definitely be staying here again next time we are in town.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly value your review for they are essential to our teams success. We work really hard to ensure you have a comfortable and wonderful experience. It makes us proud to know we met your expectations and look forward to your next visit! Thank you again

Summary Heading: Family New Year's Day visit to Disneyland
Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff.  Nice room. Comfortable bed and pillows. Buffet breakfast was pretty good. Breakfast area was kind of small and crowded. My only complaint about the hotel was the distance from Disneyland. The hotel's website states it's 1 mile from Disneyland but it's actually about 2 1/2 miles away.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant stay and we are proud to know you did. I sincerely apologize for the confusion with the distance between the park and hotel. Our hotel is 1 mile away from the Disneyland pick-up/drop-off.  We look forward to your next visit. Thank you again and Happy New Year!

Summary: We had a great experience at Stanford Inn & Suites! My husband and my son and I stayed here on two different occasions over the course of 10 days. Once on our way from Phoenix to the CA Bay Area, and again on the way back.  The room that we stayed in was lovely!  It had been recently remodeled, and whoever is in charge of the improvements definitely has an eye for it!  The floors and fixtures were so nice and the bedding was AWESOME!  We all slept so so well! My interactions with the front desk staff were all very pleasant.  Everyone was friendly and knowledgeable and they made every transaction quite smooth.  This is a great place to stay.  Plain and simple.  The price is right, it's near everything you want to be close to, and the rooms and staff are great.  We will definitely
Manager Response: Hi Regina,  It's always a pleasure to see my team is doing an great job and our guests are getting a good nights rest. I appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Everything essential for a Disney visit at a very reasonable price. Large clean room with King bed and foldout sofa bed. Adequate buffet breakfast included which starts your day well but do get there early. Staff were excellent both office and housekeeping - hats off to them all.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We truly value our guests' reviews, for they are essential to our teams success. We are proud to know that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit. Happy New Year!

Summary: Good value hotel for our family. Nice comfortable rooms and nice breakfast every morning helped us get out Day started. Not far from the parks. We would not hesitate to stay here again on our next trip to the area.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant stay and it makes us proud to know you did. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you again and Happy New Year!

Summary: Great location, very friendly staff members. Breakfast was great as well. Highly recommend for a family trip, good for the price we paid. Definitely will stay here again for the next family Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable stay. We are happy to know we succeeded and look forward to your next visit. Thank you again and Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Clean and friendly motel located near Disney
Summary: Our four nights at the Stanford was a great experience. It is a great bargain for high quality rooms and friendly staff. Only disappointing factors: hot tub did not work, no hair conditioner provided.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable stay and we apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the hot tub. We are currently working on it. We hope to gain your trust back and give you a whole new experience on your next stay. Thank you again and Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Very nice, good breakfast, friendly staff!
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff was very friendly. Our large family fit nicely in the junior suite, there was enough open space to fit our cots, or they rent roll away beds. The breakfast was plentiful- potatoes, scrambled eggs, sausage, yogurt, waffles, apples, bagels,  Danish, cereal, juice, tea, coffee. Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Our team works hard to ensure you are comfortable and you enjoy your time here. We look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is a cute, great priced establishment. The rooms are clean and have all the necessities. The pool was cozy. The two nicest inclusions were a hot breakfast & not only 2 queen beds, but a bunk bed in a separate room. The kids have their space & so do the parents. Some rooms have two bathrooms. The only area that I could complain about is there are too few places to charge devices. I would highly recommend Stanford inn and Suites for your next trip to Disneyland. Another extra is a bus that stops right outside the property.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you are more than satisfied with your stay. We are happy to know that we succeeded in providing you with a comfortable and memorable experience! I apologize for the inconvenience with the outlets. We are currently renovating our rooms in efforts to best accommodate our guests with the issue. Thank you again and we look forward to your next stay. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Check in was quick and staff was great. Room was clean, no bugs or roaches which is always my main concern when staying somewhere new. Queen beds were comfy and the kids room with the bunk beds was actually a separate room not just some dividing door in between. TV was pretty big compared to other places. AC made some weird noise all night but who am I kidding I'm not picky like that, after a while we all go used to it. Parking is OK if you get there early but they do have additional parking with the restaurant next door if you can't find any and best of all it's free. The side of the hotel to the additional parking is fenced and they have but one door to access it, it just so happened we got the furthest room to that door so it was a bit of an annoyance but hey we lived.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We value your reviews for they are an essential part in our success. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant and comfortable stay. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience with the pool. I will address the issue directly with our engineering team. We are happy to know that you were able to overlook the issues and still enjoyed your stay. We will continue to work hard to ensure you have a better experience on your next visit. We hope to see you in the near future. Thank you again and happy holidays!

Summary: Staff was friendly and professional. Erica was acceptional, and was very nice at the front desk. Selena like-wise. The beds were comfy, Internet was good, shower was warm with a strong flow. The shuttle to Disneyland was nice. Good breakfast.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We value your reviews; our team works hard to ensure that you have a pleasant experience. We are happy to know that Erica and Selena were an essential part of that. We look forward to your next stay. Thank you again and happy holidays!

Summary: Came to Anaheim for a gaming tournament and decided to stay here from December 8-11. We arrived late afternoon (6:30-ish) and the two girls at the front were very friendly.  The one who checked us in was very energetic and sweet, which was a welcomed sight after such a long trip. The room itself was spacious and clean. The bed felt very comfortable, there were plenty of pillows, towels, and little toiletries. The internet wasn't working but my husband went down to the front desk to see if they could help us and the girl assured us that she would have it fixed. Twenty minutes later everything was working smoothly.   We only had breakfast on the last day but my husband, who was the one who went down to get it, said that he regretted going to Denny's for breakfast the last two days
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure you have a  comfortable stay and memorable experience. We are happy to know that we were successful in that and that the issues were take care of in a timely manner. Thank you again and we look forward to your next stay. Happy Holidays!

Summary: The room was very clean, the staff were friendly! The free breakfast every morning was amazing, we didn’t have to leave our hotel and decide what to eat every day! Will definitely stay again, and recommend to friends
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We value your review, for they are essential to our success. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable stay and we are proud to know we have succeeded in that aspect. We will continue our efforts and look forward to your next stay. Happy Holidays!

Summary: My stay was ok.. the parking was good.. it’s super close to Disneyland. We got in late evening so the street was busy with people returning from Disney. Our room was super cute and clean. The only thing that I couldn’t get over was the super strong smell...
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant experience. I apologize for the strong scent, I will address this issue directly to our maintenance team. Thank you again, and we look forward to your next stay with us. Happy Holidays!

Summary: A couple of years ago I wrote a review saying that it seemed impossible to find a good motel in the area that actually put in some effort. I was wrong, this place is great. Management really strives to be serving their guests well. The location is great, situated on harbor and close enough to Disney to wal, there. Although, when you're tired, they have a great shuttle service. They are doing renovations, which is good. We had one of the 'old' rooms, and the carpet flooring is a little dirty, as is in all motels after some years. They told us they plan to revamp all rooms with wooden flooring. Some rooms already were, and they looked great.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience with us; it is essential to our success. We appreciate your loyalty and are happy to know that our efforts have met your needs. We are currently working on renovations and are glad you got to see some of the rooms! Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: I found this property very nice and very clean. Convenient location to the Disneyland parks. Staff was friendly, and the complementary breakfast was delightful. The room was nice and thoroughly cleaned anytime we left for a day out. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, your review is essential to our teams success. We are happy to know you had a comfortable stay. Our team works hard to make you feel at home. We look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: we were extremely satisfied with this hotel in terms of price, quality, and proximity to disneyland. we thought we'd have to take a hit in one of those areas and were thrilled to find a place that met not only all of our needs but our wants as well. would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is essential to our success. We are happy to know that we met your needs and look forward to your next stay with us. Happy Holidays!

Summary: The hotel was very clean and staff pleasant when encountered.  The only minor issue we had during our stay was corrected immediately. Daily breakfast had ample choices and good hours of service if you are visiting the Disney Parks.  ART shuttle stops right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable stay and it makes us proud to know that we corrected the issues in a timely manner.  We look forward to your next stay with us. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Clean room, Friendly staff, good breakfast, comfortable beds. We have stayed at this facility multiple times and feel like for the money especially with the frequent stayer discount it certainly does  everything we need it to do
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to have you as loyal guests. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant visit. We look forward to your next stay. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Not the best location nor comfotable bed. Hard when you have kids and walk too far to get to Disneyland because by then you're already tired and exhuasted. I would definitely will find a closer hotel so less walking for the kids.
Manager Response: Hello thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant stay. We sincerely apologize for not meeting your needs. The city of Anaheim provides public transportation that is conveniently located in front of our hotel. We hope to see you in the future to give an even even better experience. Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is a hidden gem, I almost don't want to share it! Great value and size of the rooms. We are a family of 5 and there was plenty of space for everyone! Only wish there was 2 bathrooms!!! But free breakfast was great, and real food! Coffee was even good, not watered down! Best part was bus stop in front of the hotel! We will be back!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us!  Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and great experience during your visit. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: I joined TripAdvisor just to review this hotel
Summary: From the time we booked to the time we checked out the staff (every one of them) was amazing and accommodating. The room was cozy, clean and spacious. They helped us resolve an issue we had with ART. The food is ok, I can't complain for the price we paid for a family of 5. They really care about your needs and the feedback they recieve from you is important to them, which shows they care. The room was decorated with Disney, definitely a nice kick start to our Disney Vacay! We will definitely be back! Thanks for making our trip excellent!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and great experience during your visit. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Excellent hotel for the price. Location phenomenal. Beds extremely comfortable, wish I knew the pillow brand and type, best sleep ever for me! Room was very clean. Fridge and microwave were great and worked great.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and great experience during your visit. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: The stay was great and the staff was very friendly and polite, we will definitely be staying here again next time we go to Disneyland. My only complaint was that it took awhile to get some towels sent up to the room but everything else was fantastic.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and great experience during your visit. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and even happier to gain your trust and loyalty. We look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Great family hotel for the price!
Summary: Disneyland stay for family! Really friendly staff, nice queen beds, bunk beds were okay. Breakfast included (hot eggs and sausage okay, juice machine wasn't working properly, waffle machine), not bad for complimentary. Free parking!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and great experience during your visit. We hare happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Only complaint is there are no elevators. Will like variety for breakfast, but overall nice experience. Walkable to other places close by. Shuttle to Disney and other places was outside by main door.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! We truly value your feedback for it is essential to our teams success. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay, regardless of the inconvenience of having no elevator. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable and positive experience while staying with us. We look forward to your next visit.Thank you again and Happy Holidays!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised at how nice the room was. And it was Star Wars themed which made for a fun surprise. The free breakfast was actually pretty dang good. For the price, I’m not sure you can get much better.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience .. We are happy to know you enjoyed our renovated room with the Star Wars theme! Our team works hard to ensure you have a positive and memorable experience. We look forward to your next stay with us! Please don't hesitate to call us directly if you need anything. Happy Holidays!

Summary: The staff was great. Room was good and the kid's bedroom with the bunkbed was nice. Breakfast was good not great. Price was a little high. Found a cockroach in the bathroom. Only 1 but gross. Saw a big 3" bug in the breakfast service area and that was kinda gross. When I spoke to management at checkout they did say they were calling pest control. ART bus stop right in the front of the hotel was convenient. Only 1 mile from Disneyland. Not had but cannot give 5 stars due to cockroaches and sausage was not good on 2nd day. I expected a little better for $149/night.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I sincerely apologize for the bug situation, it was addressed and taken care of.  Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant stay and we hope to gain your trust and give you a more positive experience in the future. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Floors were disgusting and the kids bedding was torn and bed ladder was broken. Breakfast was good but service was poor, people could not come in late at all because food would run out and cooks would not cook more food if it was too close to closing time even if someone wanted a certain food item.
Manager Response: Hello. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant and comfortable stay; I sincerely apologize for what you went through, these issues will be addressed immediately. We hope to gain your trust in the future and give you a more positive experience. Happy Holidays

Summary: We booked last minute for our family trip to Disneyland, the price was great and it accommodated us, my daughter was even able to do some laundry in the 24hr laundromat, parking was easily accessible and free! Complimentary Continental Breakfast was great too 👍🏽 We were very happy with our room and the amenities!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Our team works hard to ensure you have a comfortable stay and a memorable experience. We look forward to your next visit.  Keep us in mind on your next last minute trip!  Happy holidays!

Summary: Nice hotel to stay, friendly staff, decent breakfast, close to everything you need, fast food, Target and shopping. I was hesitant at first to book this hotel due to mixed reviews but I was not disappointed when we checked in. We came an hour early and the front desk manage to check us in early. This is helpful considering we are really tired from our trip.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. Our team works hard and does the best possible to ensure you have a comfortable stay. It's great that our front desk manager was able to accommodate you; we understand how draining traveling can be at times! Thank you again for your review, we will use it to help us give you an even better experience on your next stay. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Our fridge didn’t work and some of our food spoiled because we didn’t know the fridge wasn’t working. The hot tub wasn’t hot at all. We used the hot tub at our friends hotel because the hot tub was cold. Overall our experience was a good one though. The breakfast was good and we liked how close it was to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered with the mini fridge and the hot tub. I will address this directly with our engineering team. We are happy that regardless of these issues, you enjoyed your experience. However, we will work hard to give you an even better experience on your next stay. Thank you again and happy holidays!

Summary: Everything was great, from the staff, the comfort of the room and the awesome morning breakfast! I’ve stayed there many times before and now my girlfriend can say she’s a regular now. Keep up the great work!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It makes us proud to know that we have you as loyal guests. Our team works hard to ensure your experience is comfortable and memorable. We look forward to seeing you and your girlfriend on your next stay  with us! Thank you again and happy holidays!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and fast food restaurants
Summary: Area seems clean. Rooms are small and look old. Hotel is close to Disneyland, so that is a plus. Bunk beds / Children room is okay. Mini fridge was not working. Air conditioner works fine. It was an average stay...
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We appreciate your reviews, for they are essential to our teams success. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience with the mini fridge. We are currently in the process of renovating our rooms. We hope to give you a fresh and more positive experience on your next stay. Thank you!

Summary: Free hot breakfasts, ART bus to Disneyland stops right in front, LUX bus to Universal stops a block away.  Clean rooms, comfy beds, free wi-fi, coffee, microwave & mini fridge in the room and very pleasant staff.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience; your feedback is essential to our teams success. We are happy to know that your stay was pleasant and that our location suited your needs. Our team works hard to ensure your experience is a positive one. Thank you, again and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Good hotel, comfortable and clean. The only problem was that we would have liked to use the safe in the room but it was never reset and when i asked them to reset it while we were gone they never did.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to know you had a comfortable stay. I sincerely apologize on behalf of our team for the safe issue and will address this to them. We appreciate your feedback, for it is essential to our teams success in providing you with an exceptional experience. We hope look forward to your next visit with us! Thank you.

Summary: My son and I visited during Halloween time at Disney. The art bus is very convenient to the park. My son is older and appreciated the spacious suite and his private room. The room was clean. I prefer the first floor. The rooms are affordable but need to be updated and more plugs to charge our phones. The Breakfast was hot and I like that it’s included in your fee. The sausage seemed a bit under cooked. Very friendly staff. I always stay here because it’s affordable , clean and spacious plus it’s convenient to the park.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking your time to share your experience; your review is essential to our success. I sincerely apologize for the breakfast issue and will address it with our team.   We are currently  in the process of renovating our rooms and will definitely be looking into the plug situations. We look forward to your next visit in hopes that we gain your trust and give you a memorable experience. Thank you again and happy holidays!

Summary: We will never stay at another Anaheim hotel. It was clean and roomy. The staff were amazing!!  The breakfast was great (same everyday but still plenty of selections to not get bored). The ART shuttle picks up right outside the office. The pool was clean and heated. Hot tub was great too. The pool area was furnished with comfy and nice outdoor furniture (not the typical plastic stuff). Laundry room was a great bonus. We never felt unsafe walking the property or in our room. The fridge was large enough to hold plenty of water bottles and snacks. We loved every bit of it!!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are excited to have gained your trust and look forward to your future stays with us. Our team works hard to ensure you have a safe  and comfortable visit. Thank you again. Have a great weekend!

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times when we go to DISNEYLAND. Every time the rooms are clean, staff is friendly and breakfast is always delicious. I would recommend this hotel to anyone with a family..
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for your taking the time to share your experience with us. Your reviews are essential to our teams success. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay and are excited to learn that you have become a loyal guest. It makes us proud and motivates us to continue to work hard for every guest. We look forward to your next stay with us. Thank you once again, and have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: We've been to Stanford Inn and suites multiple times. We've tried other hotels, but always find them to be lacking compared to Stanford inn. Love the size of the suites. Plenty of room to spread out with the kids. Very easy access to bus to Disneyland. Breakfast has everything my kids will eat. Breakfast ladies are friendly and amazing fly good about keeping things loaded up and ready for guests. Everyone very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with our service. Our team works hard to meet every need and ensure that our guests have a comfortable stay. Your reviews are essential to the success of our team. We look forward to your next stay with us in hopes that we will give you an even more memorable experience. Have a great day!

Summary: The room was very clean and neat. The staff was friendly and helpful. It is in a very safe area and good location with places to eat close by (Taco Bell, Roscoes, Carl’s Jr., etc). There is also a Target, Walgreens, and CVS within walking distance. It is reasonably priced and I would book here again. The rooms with the two queen beds is only enough space for 4 people. We brought a twin air mattress that fit in between the beds but was in the way if you needed to get up. We made it work but this wasn’t a deal breaker. The breakfast in the morning was good with a nice selection and served hot. Shuttles are available to bus you back and forth between this hotel and Disneyland if your there for Disney. You can buy daily bus tickets at be front desk.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay. Our standard rooms are only set up to fit 2 Queen beds to accommodate 4 people. We do offer Suite rooms at a reasonable rate that have 2 Queen beds and a separate room with bunk beds. If you have questions regarding rooms and rates, please contact us directly and we will be more than happy to work with whats best for you. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Fresh scrambled eggs great taste and fresh bread with butter. Great coffee and liquid creamer. Best real potatoes I have ever tasted. Had 2 plates and my 88 year old mother enjoyed it all very much.  I do have to add that the personnel at the front desk accommodated us at room close to the office which made it easier for my mother that is mobility impaired to reach it without much struggle walking too far.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our team focuses on providing a comfortable stay for everyone and it makes us proud that we met the needs of your mother and you. We look forward to your next stay with us. If you have any requests or suggestions please dont hesitate to contact us directly. Thank you, have a wonderful day!

Summary: For the price it was a good deal. Nice that the shuttle bus to Disneyland stopped right in front of the hotel. Was expecting a little better breakfast based on reviews I read. 2 of the 3 days the eggs were over cooked. They had one person serving the scrambled eggs and sausage, so if any items ran out it took a long to get replaced. Our last morning we gave up waiting for them to restock the bagels
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I apologize for the inconvenience with the breakfast. We are currently working on improving the breakfast system. We hope to show you a better experience on your next visit. Have a wonderful day.

Summary: We have stayed at Stanford many times with our family of adults and kids. The 2 bedroom , 2 bath with the bunks is a great value and allows the kids their own space. This is especially great on long Disneyland days when everyone needs a little down time in the middle of the day.  The staff at the hotel was friendly and helpful and quick to respond on a couple requests. This is one of our best experiences at Stanford. We already have reservations to stay again on our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and THANK YOU for your loyalty. Our team works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay and we are happy to know that we have been meeting your needs. We look forward to you next visit and we hope to make your future stays even more memorable. Thank you agian, have a wonderful weekend!

Summary Heading: Easy Access to Disneyland complex. Bus Shuttle stop right out front!
Summary: Bus shuttle nearby, Arco Gas station on corner. Taco bell across street.  Denny's nearby. Target and CVS down the street, Laundry on site pool and spa.Get park tickets at desk and bus tickets. Great places to eat up and down on Harbor blvd. Easy access from I-5 and Hwy 57 using Katella Ave. The traffic light on the corner makes it easier to get out of parking lot.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share experience with us. We are proud to be located in a convenient location that benefits our guests. We hope that you were satisfied with our service as well. We look forward to having you as our guests once again in the near future. Our team works hard to meet your expectations; if you have any suggestions that would help us improve, please don't hesitate to contact us directly. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: We will definitely stay here again!! They had the cutest little roll away crib for our 18 month old because he doesn’t like to sleep with anyone. We loved it and it wasn’t too far of a walk from the park.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that the roll away crib worked perfectly with your baby's needs. Our team works hard to provide a comfortable stay for every guest whether its children or adults. We look forward to seeing you in the near future again! Please don't hesitate to contact us directly with any requests before your next stay. Have a great day!

Summary: The bus stop for Disneyland was right in the front of the hotel. The breakfast room is pretty tight and gets full quickly.  It is full breakfast but the selection is pretty limited. The room was pretty spacious for the price.   The staff were friendly.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know that we were of great convenience to your stay. Our team works hard in efforts to make your stay comfortable and memorable. We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Great service, very helpful, refrigerator was a little unbalanced, could use a few more outlet options for charging devices. The breakfast is always great and plentiful.  A good place for families as the ART Buss picks up right outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for sharing your experience. We are happy to know that it was a pleasant stay. I apologize for the inconvenience with the outlets. We are currently working on some renovations and will definitely take this into consideration. We look forward to your next stay with us! - Ana

Summary: so so  room not clean but price is good.  distance to disney land far . i prefer hilton but all sold ,so i choose this hotel. i stay first day is tue $103 but second day $120. i don't understand why. but no next time.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I sincerely apologize for your inconvenience. Our team works hard to ensure you have comfortable stay. Please be aware that due to weekends and/or events in the area, the rates can and do fluctuate daily. For best rates please book directly to with the hotel.  I will address the cleanliness issue and we hope to gain your trust in the future. Thank you for staying with us. - Ana

Summary: The hotel was clean (except for the carpets). Beds were comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful. Definitely would stay here again for weekend trips to Disneyland. Parking is very limited. All in all, not a bad stay!
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to ensure your stay is comfortable. I sincerely apologize the for the issues you encountered regarding the carpets. I will address this with our engineering team. We will work harder to meet your expectations on your next stay. Thank you, again! - Ana

Summary: We were very pleased with our family suite. Especially liked the kids separate bunk bed/room. They had their own door, ac, window, tv, and even a little kid sized desk, chair and lamp. Enjoyed the beautiful pool and spa area. The breakfast was just what i was looking for. Eggs, sausage, waffles, cereals & more. Very filling and perfect to start the  busy day at Disneyland! Great location..centrally located from the park and plenty shopping/restaurants.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are pleased to know that the room layout worked well with you. Our team works hard to ensure your stay is comfortable and convenient. We will continue to work hard to make your next stay even more memorable!

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly, even though not english speaking. Very accomadating. Front desk was very informative. Room was very spacious and the ability to close door to the kids area gave a nice sense of privacy while being close by.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team members work hard to make everyone feel at home. We are happy to know that the room layout worked perfectly with you. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I am never disappointed with this hotel! The best free breakfast, free parking, great heated pool and laundry on site. Rooms are huge and totally cute and comfy. Staff is great and the price is usually very affordable! We come all the time and will keep recommending
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience and for being a loyal guest! Our team works hard to consistently make every guest feel like they have a home away from home. It makes us proud that you have found just that with us. Your compliments will be expressed to the team. We look forward to your next visit! Thank you again. - Ana

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland!
Summary: what a great location to get to and from the Disneyland parks.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  The themed bunk bed rooms were a hit as well as the hot breakfast in the morning.  I would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to have been of great convenience for you. Our team works hard to ensure you have a pleasant and comfortable stay. We look forward to your next stay with us! Stay tuned...we are renovating numerous rooms with a new theme. Until next time!

Summary: When to Disneyland for the weekend stayed here. Great customer service in front desk . Specious rooms very clean at all times. Delicious breakfast. My son enjoyed the swimming pool. The maintenance guy was very help full and very respectful at all times great Customer service . I highly recommend everyone to stay here at this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking your time to share your experience. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure that everyone is well taken care of and we are pleased that you were. We will continue in our efforts and we look forward to your next stay with us! Thank you.

Summary: The staff was very nice and helpful. The property was ok the building could use a new coat of paint. The rooms were fair clean with the exceptions of the curtains both sets need to look at replacing. This hotel is not really walking distance to Disneyland but withing close proximity. The hot breakfast was not good at all hotel should consider bacon instead of sausage other items were ok at best. More fresh fruit should be offered.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and observations with us. Our team works hard to meet your expectations. We are currently working on renovations to our hotel and will definitely take the paint job into consideration. We will also be making an adjustment to our breakfast. We hope to gain your trust in the near future and look forward to your next stay. Thank you.

Summary: it was good. 2 queen beds and a bunk bed. roomy with 2 bathrooms. and a fridge and microwave. made disneyland and visiting the beach a great stay.  the jacuzzi didn't work the 1 st night but the 2 nd it did. i loved how roomy the room was and how clean. i would've like a more comfortable bed though. the beds were hard. the service was great. and breakfast was really nice to have on location. great value.  we will stay there again if we get a chance.  it is usually hard to fit a family of 5 for this price anywhere else. walking distance to disney was 15-20 min. and the beach was a 15 min drive to newport.  we had a great vacation and we visited a friend in san diego.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. It makes us proud to know your stay was pleasant for the whole family. Our team works hard to ensure we meet your expectations. We look forward to your next visit and we will continue with our efforts so that your next stay with us is more comfortable. Until next time!

Summary: stanford inn & suites made our disneyland vacation even better by their attentiveness and friendliness! our family would definitely stay with stanford inn & suites again!  the staff was very accommodating and helpful!
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the  time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to make your experience a memorable and it makes us proud to know we met your needs. We look forward to your next visit and will continue to work hard to meet your expectations.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel for lower price in Disneyland area
Summary: This hotel is very nice and located in a great location for Disneyland Parks. We stayed in a suite where bunker beds are in a seperate room. Kids love bunker beds. Rooms are clean.  We stayed in 1st floor thus, there were some noise from upstairs but overall it is quiet and nice at night.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. It makes us proud to know your kids enjoyed the bunker beds. Our team works  hard to make your stay pleasant and comfortable. We hope your next stay with us is even better. Thank you again!

Summary: Pleasant, decent room, not super far from Disney complex.  Price made it work for me. Plan ahead if you need to have lots of devices charged, there aren't many plugs in room, but that is a minor issue, not worth getting in a tizzy over.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We apologize for the inconvenience with the outlets. We are currently working on renovations in the room and will definitely take this into  consideration. We hope the rest of your stay was comfortable and we look forward to your next visit. Thank You!

Summary Heading: Average motel room, good location but felt dirty.
Summary: We booked this hotel based on the reviews on here and location to Disney and for the family suite. The suite is basically 1 1/2 rooms modified to give you an extra bedroom. For this the price seemed a little on the high side. After an hour of being in the room our feet were black. There were hairs on the sink and in the bathroom and we noticed damp patches on the ceiling. The aircon also had a very damp smell so we switched it off. We complained about the floors and they were cleaned the next day but the room still felt grubby.   Breakfast was free but very rubbery eggs. Room was too small for the number of guests resulting in queues for the waffle machine and items running out.
