The pros are the staff who were all very friendly and helpful and also the free parking and
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to stay consistent with the cleaning and maintenance of every room and we sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered. We  will ensure this is not overlooked. We hope that in the future we can gain your trust and exceed your expectations. Thank you again.

Summary: The staff makes this place!  Everyone from the front desk to housekeeping/maintenance was wonderful.  The price, though median for the area, seems a bit high because the property is older, but everything was very clean.  They mentioned they are upgrading the rooms soon too.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure we meet your expectations. Our rooms will soon be upgraded. We look forward to your next stay so that you you can experience our renovated rooms. Thank you!

Summary: This hotel was truly a blessing. After a hellish experience at Great Wolf Lodge, we were weary about our choice of “economy friendly suite” (booked thru Gettaway Today)  We will return to Stanford Inn... its our new go to! The staff told me more in the first 5 minutes than we learned the entire time at our other hotel. You can tell they go above and beyond for their guests. Ammenities were new and nicely set up. I’ve already reccommended this to 5 different friends.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure you are taken care of as soon as you step into our hotel. It makes us proud to know that we were able to change your experience here at Stanford Inn. We look forward to having you stay with us again! Thank you, until next time!

Summary: Reserve early and stay often.  This is a well run Motel.  The staff was available and friendly.  The ground were spotless and rooms were clean.  The hot breakfast was well organized.  It was fun to get breakfast and either sit inside or on the patio.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works hard to gain our guests' trust by being available at all times. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and the breakfast setting! We hope to see you on our next visit and will continue our efforts to ensure that all your needs and expectations are met. Thank you

Summary Heading: Very good value for your money
Summary: We stayed in the hotel as our base for a LAX trip with a group of 4 (2 adults and 2 children, 5 and 8 years old). The option of the double-room suite was just perfect with children having their own space and TV. The simple pool was a good option for a later afternoon relax. Rooms were clean and staff all very polite and welcoming (great comment for Diana, who noticed our Portuguese language and interacted with our children in a very friendly manner). Breakfast was plentiful with the usual options you would expect given the cost of hotel. Internet worked perfectly throughout our stay with very decent speeds. Overall, a wonderful stay and one of the best cost-to-benefit ratios in the area around Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to ensure that every guest has a comfortable and memorable stay. We are proud to learn that Diana has taken extra steps in connecting with you through your Portuguese language. We will make sure to let her know. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We booked this hotel through Get Away Today so the price of our stay included the Disney tickets as well. Located about 1.5 miles from Disneyland so it makes an easy enough walk if you wish. Otherwise, the bus stop to/from Disneyland is right in front of the place. You can buy bus passes from rideart.org. As for the hotel, the beds (2 queens in our room) were comfortable, although the pillows are pretty soft (I used 2 pillows to try and reduce this). The rooms were fine, with a mini-fridge and small microwave. The breakfast (included in your hotel price) included scrambled eggs, sausage, potatoes (tips suggested), instant oatmeal, several cold cereals, bagels, bread, make your own waffles (regular size of minis) milk, juice, coffee, fruit, yogurt.  Free parking. The staff at the
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to meet your needs and expectations. I apologize for the pillow concerns and will have them looked at. We are happy to learn that you were satisfied with your stay and will strive to meet even higher expectations on your next stay. Thank you again, until next time!

Summary: Fabulous space for our family during this vacation, we had a suite including a small side room with bunk beds for the younger kids. They were very excited and happy to have their own space. The fridge and microwave was also a fabulous addition and helpful for our stay, fun and budget. The staff was very helpful and friendly, also when we needed assistance with something, they were very responsive and showed up immediately. The breakfast included was very good, with a decent variety, including hot eggs and sausage, and something for everyone. The front desk was helpful with Disneyland travel tips regarding the bus schedules, and we were able to use these tips most of the days of our stay. When we return, we will definitely check out this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are proud to know that we met your needs and were able to provide assistance. Our team works hard to provide a comfortable and memorable stay for each one of our guests. We hope that we have gained your trust and look forward to your next stay with us. Thank You!

Summary: We had a delightful stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites. Our room & the amenities we awesome! A little bit farther than some of the motels from Disneyland but for the price & service this place was Well Worth It!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to meet your needs and expectations. If you have any suggestions on how to better cater to you, please don't hesitate you let us know. We hope that we have gained your trust and thank you, once again. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We stayed here for 8 days and I'd like to say that it was just a place to sleep, but it definitely was so much more than that! Staff are very friendly and helpful when we asked for suggestions to eat, shop and just to check out the sights. I'm not one to have my room cleaned everyday when we're at hotels, so we put out the "do not disturb" sign, but they still left us a note saying that they knew we didn't want services, but we could always call them for anything. Breakfast was very crucial when we were out and about every day, especially waking up early to visit theme parks and I loved that Stanford offered breakfast. It made the day a lot less hectic trying to squeeze in an early meal somewhere before getting to Disneyland before it opens. Extra pats on the back for that!
Manager Response: Aloha! Thank you for sharing your special experience with us. Our team works really hard to ensure that your stay is comfortable, convenient and memorable. We are happy to know that we have met your expectations. Our efforts and focus will continue. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: Great breakfast and great staff!!! Highly recommended!!! Close to Disneyland!!! Fantastic vacation!!!! Would highly recommend this hotel. Best stay ever!!! Everything was clean and pleasurable. The pool was awesome.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our team works hard to meet your expectations and we are happy to know we did. We will continue with the same efforts in hopes of giving you the same or an even better experience on your next visit. Thank you again, until next time!

Summary Heading: Value with da best Guest Service
Summary: We got here last night. This is our Second stay here and STILL AWESOME. Checking in was easy, room really nice ,parking great and this morning same great ONO Breakfast.  We were here with our Grand Kids in 10-2015 and had the family suites with two rooms. Loved it and they loved it more..   This is our go to hotel whenever we here...  We will tell our family about Stanford Inn & Suites.  p and s
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It excites us to learn that this is your second visit and we hope there are many more after this one. Our team works hard in efforts to meet your expectations and are happy we did. We will strive to make your next stay a memorable one as well. Thank you again!

Summary: Great rooms, good breakfast and location was great! The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were large enough to be comfortable, and they were clean! The busses pick you up right in front of the hotel! I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Our team works hard to make your stay with us comfortable and it makes us proud to know we have met your expectations. We will continue to work hard in order to meet your expectations on your next visit. Thank you again, until next time!

Summary: Our needs were listened to and accommodated. We needed a room that required very walking to and from and were checked into a room we could park in front of. Perfect. We stayed four nights and checked out, then found we needed a room again that night. We were given the same perfect room with a few minutes notice. Wow!
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We work hard to accommodate every single guest and are happy to know we met your expectations. Our efforts will continue in hopes that you receive the same or even better experience on your next stay. Thank you again, until next time!

Summary: Awesome staff, nice and Pleasant. Clean room, on site security. Breakfast available every morning. Clean pool, onsite laundry available. Close to shopping,gas stations and dining. I would stay at Stanford again for sure.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know we have met your expectations and will continue to work hard. Thank you again, and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The people there are awesome!  Friendly, and kind.  Can't say enough good about them.  Front desk people were also awesome!   Room was clean and up to date.  Employee's always had smiles on their faces.  Will stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. As a team, we strive to make your stay comfortable and your experience a memorable one. We are proud to know we met those expectations and will continue to work hard to keep it that way. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Staff are wonderful, easy to work with and very nice.  Left my kindle there at checkout and they were so quick to work with and get it shipped to me quickly.  Generally comfortable and calm place to stay.  The pool was a bit small and fun.  Worth the price.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for taking your time to share your experience. Our team works hard to make sure your stay is a comfortable and happy one. It makes us proud to know that we met those expectations. We look forward to your next stay in hopes of creating an even better experience! Thank you again, until next time.

Summary: Thank you for everything! We enjoyed our stay, and we'll definitely stay again. We stayed for a week. One ice machine was down and the jacuzzi was broken but other than that is was a great experience.
Manager Response: Hi! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are proud to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I apologize for the inconvenience with the jacuzzi and ice machine. I will have our engineering team take action. Thank you again and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: its a great place just had some problems with the room. that nobody decided to fix. that was like the only downfall to this place that i had to go without light in one of the bathrooms and the toilet wasnt working right in the other bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking your time to share your experience with us. I apologize for the inconvenience regarding the bathroom lights and toilet. I will address this with our engineering team. We hope to gain your trust again and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: We were definitely surprised by the decor in the room. Full star wars theme from top to bottom. King bed was super comfortable and the sofa was nice to sit on. The food in the area was also really good. Will continue to stay here for future visits.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know that we met your expectations and will continue to work hard. We look forward to your future visits with us!

Summary Heading: All you need for a Disney trip
Summary: Stanford has everything you need. Decent size rooms ( we love the rooms with the bunk beds since we have three kids ) large counter to get ready in the morning. Two tvs with cable for some downtime. Microwave and fridge are standard ( buy water and keep cold for Disney ) the breakfast is a full meal with fresh made scrambled eggs, sausage, and these really yummy potatoes. In addition to the standard waffles and assorted breads and cereal. You can walk to Disney from the hotel but there is a bus stop directly in front of the hotel for even more convenient travel. Plenty of food options in walking distance also. I can't complain about anything with this place. Yes it's a touch dated and not pristine but for the price and amenities it far outweighs those details. I'm not a fancy
Manager Response: Hello, I would like to thank you for taking the time to write about your experience. We are glad to know you had a wonderful time and enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The huge variety of breakfast items offered was amazing! We were so thankful to start everyday with such a fulfilling continental breakfast! The Disney themed rooms fit our vacation perfectly. The heated pool was open late so we were able to enjoy that as well!
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Our team works really hard to meet your expectations and it makes us proud to know that we have reached them. We appreciate your visit and look forward to your next one!

Summary: Quiet, comfortable, clean, room. Very helpful friendly staff. Was a typical continental breakfast with hot and cold food but Nice. Nice grounds felt safe A+ will stay again next time we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know that you enjoyed a peaceful stay and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We spent a week in the hotel. We loved the plants and flowers. The pool was beautiful. The carpets in the room could have been cleaner but the beds were comfortable and the hotel staff was accommodating. The breakfast offered many wonderful options including fresh made waffles. Close enough to Disneyland to be convenient but not so close to overcrowded. Quiet in the evenings. Very little disturbances.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay. I apologize for the carpet inconvenience and will address this with our engineering team. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Disappointed  For the amount I paid for the room.... I expected more. From the nosiness of the outside and the neighbors, $1 store room decor and the cleanliness of the room, I really expected more. Over priced in my opinion
Manager Response: Hello, I am sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We apologize for the inconvenience and taste in decor. We will strive to make improvements in hopes of gaining your trust again. In the meantime, we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Hotel room was basic, but clean.  Had more floor space than most rooms.  Bathroom is a bit small.  Friendly staff and helpful.  Breakfast included.  Basic but fine.  Hot tub was not hot.  It is located on the main street for Disneyland.  It takes a good 20 minutes (longer if a slow walker) to walk to the entrance of Disneyland, but an easy walk.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We will strive to make improvements so that we meet your expectations on your next visit.

Summary: A comfortable hotel in a good location close to decent restaurants. Complimentary coffee and tea offererd in reception which is a nice touch. Staff very friendly and helpful. My only criticism is that breakfast ended at 9.30 which felt a little early.
Manager Response: Hello, I would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to know that your stay was comfortable. We will strive to make improvements in order to meet higher expectations on your next visit.

Summary: We stayed in the 2 bedroom 2 bathroom suite with our semi adult children(22,20&17) One room has 2 queen beds and the other a bunk bed with its own bathroom. Everyone at the hotel was kind with a warm smile. We didn't have any issues so we didn't interact too much. They offer a warm and cold breakfast eggs,sausage,waffles and cold cereal many other small choices. I only ate the cold cereal and coffee so I can't comment on the taste of anything but keep in mind this is free I read of people complaining about the food at many hotels but hello its FREE so go easy on these people :)
Manager Response: Hello monica s, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to learn that your experience was a pleasant one. Our team works hard to keep every guest happy. We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The floors were filthy they turned my kids feet black. The tried to close the pool early every night and I had to argue. Called front desk because hair dryer was smoking and they never sent anyone !!!
Manager Response: Hello tdd3325, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We apologize for the inconvenience you came across and will address these issues with our team. We hope to gain your trust back in the near future and we will work hard to exceed your expectations.

Summary: If you're going to Disneyland this is a pretty decent place to stay for a fair price. Great food options around you and shuttle available to Disneyland. Friendly staff. Breakfast was the same thing every day but it was pretty good (and complimentary). The only complaint I have is the carpets could be cleaner but the rest of the room was very clean including the beds and bathroom.
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know your stay was decent but we will strive to to make improvements in order to exceed your expectations on your next visit. I apologize for the carpet situation and will personally address this to our engineering team. Thank you, once again, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: After a full day at Disneyland all we wanted was a comfortable bed to crash in. We felt every spring in the mattress and the pillows felt like a bag of rolled up socks. So uncomfortable was the pillow I had to go to Target (thankfully less than a mile away) and BUY pillows. The night manager (it was about 8pm when I talked to her about the pillows) said they are all like that!
Manager Response: Hello, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I apologize for the inconvenience regarding the bed/pillows. I will address this with our team. We hope to gain your trust back in the near future. In the meantime, we will work hard to make improvements in order to exceed your expectations. Thank you again. - Ana.

Summary: We had a great stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites!  The breakfast was good, beds were comfortable, & the value for these rooms is unbeatable!  We took our 4 kids and had plenty of room for everyone!  There were several large families staying there because it is such a great value!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good hotel for Disney, friendly staff and good free breakfast.
Summary: The hotel was very clean, friendly staff, good free breakfast and good value for money. In the room there was a microwave oven and a refrigerator. There was a bus stop just outside the hotel for going to the Disney Parks. We found walking not a problem and it took about 15 minutes to reach the Parks. The hotel also has a pool and laundry facilities.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Took a mini vacation with my son like we always do. This hotel is in a great location for everything. Very nice and helpful employees. Rooms are very nice and clean. I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed 4 nights for our family Disneyland trip. This hotel could not be a better value. Included breakfast, large well maintained rooms, mini fridge and microwave and only 1 mile from the park. You can walk or take the shuttle that stops right at the hotel and it has 2 busses that run about every 15 mins. You can book all you tickets for Disney right from the hotel. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay, clean and quiet. Comfortable  and great  beds. The staff was very friendly and very helpful when we were looking for a good hamburger place. Couldn't  have asked for a better time. Breakfast was hot and good selection.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Short overnight visit en route to Disneyland
Summary: Arrived late & departed early so we just needed a place to sleep before our day at Disney. Average motel like accommodations. Small pool & hot tub for the kids pre-sleep. Breakfast included warm box eggs & sausage. I would stick to the waffle & coffee.   I checked out rate on hotels.com vs calling hotel & getting aaa rate... made no difference so book with a web based one... at least you can earn a free night.  If staying more than 1 night I would recommend looking further.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great place to stay we have stayed here our last 4 trips to California/Disney Land ! The rooms are clean and comfortable. The breakfast is very good. Housekeeping does a great job. Close to Disney Land and a bus stop in front of the hotel. The staff was very helpful and accommodating our room for a wheelchair due to an injury after booking.
Manager Response: Dear amykJ215NJ,  Thank you so very much for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disney! We are grateful for your patronage and your feedback is equally valued. We are honored to have your loyalty when it comes to staying in Anaheim, and we will continue to improve so we can keep you coming back for more! Please be sure to call us directly for the best rate available as we have discount rates for our repeat guests! I am pleased to here our staff were extra helpful and accommodating to ensure you were taken care of during your circumstance. Thank you again for your fantastic review, we hope to see you soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: We wanted to stay at a hotel close to Disneyland. Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good and had variety. Staff was very friendly. Will be staying here again. Parking is also free which is a plus. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear jeannettehdez,  We are thankful for having you as our valued guest! Your feedback and kind words encourage us to continue to work hard and improve so we can retain your loyalty! We are happy to hear our efforts to keep a clean room, a well stocked breakfast and free amenities are paying off and keeping you happy! We can't wait until you come back and visit us, see you soon!  Yours truly,

Summary: Good hotel for the price and the location. Is close to Disney and there are several restraunts near by. I would recommend this hotel and if we go again will try to book it again. I also liked that there is a bus route that takes you all around town if needed. The 3 day bus pass worked out great for us.
Manager Response: Dear 794juan,  Thank you for sharing your 5 star review with us! Your feedback is the single most important tool to help us improve and keep you happy time and time again, we cannot stress this enough! Our location is indeed convenient as there are many restaurants and shops in close proximity, and the shuttle right outside our lobby is extremely convenient! Please call us directly so we can offer you a special discount for being a repeat guest on your future stay. We hope to see you again soon Juan!  Sincerely,

Summary: we did a two bedroom two bath suite our room was beautifully decorated super hero theamed and very clean  breakfast was awesome very polite and helpful staff we liked the suite had tile floors less likely for little ones to make messes
Manager Response: Dear W8845PNdeborahc,  Thank you very much for staying with us! We were honored to have you as our guest and we appreciate your patronage. We highly value your feedback so we can continue to improve so thank you for sharing your review. We are excited to hear you enjoyed one of our recently renovated themed family suite rooms, our efforts are paying off to keep you happy! Yes you are correct the tile flooring does help maintain the room nice and tidy! Thank you again for sharing your feedback, please come back soon!  At your service,

Summary: I loved it the pool was nice great customer service room included a small safe a hair dryer an oven a good size tv great channels hotel includes laundry room but you just pay for the use of it very clean good house keeping
Manager Response: Dear emmanuelmer,  Thank you kindly for your great review! Your compliments will be shared with the team and we will continue to work hard to keep you happy! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the amenities we have on site as we pride on selves on giving you value during your stay. We hope to see you again soon, please call us directly so we can offer you a special rate for being a repeat guest on your future stay!  Best regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay for a low cost
Summary: For the price I paid the hotel was great. It was better than I had expected. The rooms was clean, staff members was friendly and it was just a great and cheap location to stay while going to disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staying again with the Stanford Inn was great!  We had 3 rooms, one being a family suite.  The hotel was as we remembered and expected.  The breakfast was just what we needed before going to the Disneyland Resort.  Thanks for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Brent J,  Thank you for being our valued guest! Your feedback is highly appreciated and we are thrilled to hear you had one more great time with us! We are always hard at work maintaining and improving our quality so we can continue to meet and exceed your expectations. I am glad you are a fan of our breakfast as it definitely helps get the day started on the right foot and energizes you for Disney! Thank you Brent, for being our loyal guest, we cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,

Summary: Our family was at Stanford Inn for two nights, and we all enjoyed the stay. The rooms were clean and spacious - the Disney decorations is a plus. The front desk was polite, and you can easily purchase park tickets and tickets for the shuttle connecting you to the park. The shuttle stop is right in front of the hotel. The free breakfast is a big plus - it has the typical egg, sausage, waffles, and bagels.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: older Hotel, with Great customer service.
Summary: Pool & Hot tub above average for the price! Prepare to stand in line, to have your breakfast  dished up to you.& it's Not the Greatest, but they do offer  waffles & a nice juice choice. The beds were Awful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We give the Stanford Inn & Suites the top ratings for cleanliness, pool, comfort, breakfasts, location,friendliness - you name it, it was the best we have ever experienced while in Anaheim...all at an affordable price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I have visited Anaheim for Disneyland many many times. I discovered this hotel 2 years ago (two Disney trips ago) and decided to stay there again for a second year in a row. Why? Well let me tell you:  Cheap rates We couldn't find any hotels close to Disneyland for as cheap as Stanford. Now they are a little further distance from Disneyland, but the shuttle makes it all worth it. Don't have to worry about a walk there or back! Stanford Inn also does discounts and specials almost all the time lowering your stay bill even more.   Free breakfast They have a free breakfast every morning from 6:30 to 9:30. And this isn't your typical toast, muffins, and coffee. They always serve hot eggs, sausage, and potatoes. They obviously arent 5 star quality but my pregnant butt
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great option if you have kids.
Summary: It was nice to have another room with bunk beds.  Good outdoor pool, great breakfast every morning, convenient location.  Complex seemed a little older, but rooms have been updated.  A/C units worked ok, but prefer them to cool the room more at night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our go-to hotel for our Disneyland trips. Staff is friendly and rooms are clean. They are reasonably priced. We take advantage of the free breakfast before we head off to Disneyland. We stayed in the king bed room this time. It had lots of room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Each time I stay everything is wonderful. I have recommended the hotel to many friends. Each time I am going to book a Disneyland trip I book with this hotel. June of 2016 I booked a family suite, that was very roomy for six of us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had an amazing stay! My daughter and I enjoyed ourselves and loved our room and how comfortable we felt at the Stanford Inn & Suites. The pool was amazing and the customer service was great as well! They also provided a great breakfast every morning. Definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were very clean. There was no sloppy patch work on the walls or gobs of caulking around the tubs and sinks. The paint in the rooms was nice and clean. Nice tile shower and floor. The pool was very clean. It was really nice having a clean shower with instant hot water at the pool. Breakfast was really good and the staff was all very friendly. It was very convienant having the bus stop literally at the front office to take you to Disneyland. (Especially with kids)
Manager Response: Dear Rich M,   Thank you very much for the great review of our hotel. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members and cleanliness are greatly appreciated. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our optimal location as well as the many wonderful amenities we offer. I am thrilled to know that you enjoyed your experience and I look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Diana C

Summary: We stayed at the Stanford because it was close to Disneyland and had a separate sleeping area for our kids. We appreciated the accessibility of the ART bus and ease of access to local shopping. We were very impressed with how clean the hotel was and the friendliness of staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really liked the convenience of the location and the fact that the buss stopped in front of the hotel was wonderful... I will definitely recommend it and I will book on our next Disney Land vacation
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel an hour before checking in the Saturday of labor day weekend. We were incredibly impressed with our whole experience. The gal checking us in was beyond friendly and took the time to make us feel personally welcome vs just being just another guest in line. The room was very clean. We especially liked the use of an imitation wood floor vs carpet. The pool area is well maintained. We were surprised by how quiet it was in the midst of a busy weekend full of children headed to Disney. It is within walking distance to Disney, so it is perfect for families in town for a Disney trip. Another added benefit is that they sell Disney tickets on site. The breakfast offering was impressive and included a large variety of hot and cold foods.  We will definitely stay again
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was about 1 mile from the park so we walked both days and saved $ on parking. Try Roscose's Chicken and Waffles across the street. Staff was super friendly, room comfortable and clean. Breakfast was super also,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Satisfied and would stay here again
Summary: I would stay here again! Staff was extremely helpful and friendly easy to approach and willingness to assist with anything.Very informative& knowledgeable about the theme park, prices,shuttles,breakfast room service etc
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stay here every year.  It's the best. The only small issue I had was the breakfast was a little less than awesome.  But it's okay location is great the staff is great.  The beds are super comfy with light the right amount of pillows.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had everything we needed. We used ART for shuttle to Disneyland and worked well. Great breakfast but up early or you will be fighting the crowds! Try Joe's Shave ice next door.. very good! Reasonably priced laundry facility was a bonus for our wet towels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: the location was great and lots of restaurants in the area. However the rooms were not very nice. We were in a dark park of the hotel and no one came  to fix the outside light. the bathroom was small in the 2nd room we got, the TV was leaning and we could  not see the screen properly. The ice maker was broke on our side of the hotel. just really need some upgrade, but the price was reasonable so I guess you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: ENTIRELY SUITED FOR US DISNEYLAND GOERS
Summary: Location, accommodation, helpful staff, price and convenience for the Disneyland visitor ideal.  Facility nice, just what the doctor ordered for the (Disneyland) mission.  With everything to plan for in a family location and where to stay upon which to visit an attraction the likes of Disneyland, opting for Stanford Inn eliminates  concerns surrounding where to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear sbdesq,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I truly appreciate the great feedback you have provided. Thank you for your compliments regarding my attentive team members as well as the accommodations we offer. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Diana C

Summary Heading: AWESOME STAY, Breakfast was DELICIOUS! Nice staff
Summary: Everything was good! The rooms were clean, the bed was comfortable! Stayed in a two bedroom suite perfect for my family needs. The breakfast was delicious and helpful to our stay of over 5 days! Staff was nice, friendly, smiled at you. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean cozy... hot tub could have used a cleaning but with the high volume of guests that travel through I wasn't shocked to find grit on the seats as I was relaxing... breakfast was a added bonus.  Office staff very knowledgeable with Disney schedules and shuttles to and from the park, ART bus stops right at the driveway very convenient. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for two nights in July of 2017 when we planned a last minute trip to Disneyland. Loved having a separate room with bunk beds for the kids and the kids loved the huge Mickey Mouse decals on the walls. Service was great, front desk was helpful and kind. We had originally booked somewhere else but switched our booking to Stanford Inn and Suites to try something new. Really appreciate the front desk being so accommodating and answering all of our questions. It's an easy ART ride to Disneyland. If you want something fancy, this isn't the place for you but if you have a family that needs a clean, comfortable place to stay this is a great place.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable room in good location
Summary: We liked our room but it was dark due to a navy blue focal wall. It seemed like a dark cave, even with cheerful Mickey Mouse painted on a different wall. Better to paint wall a lighter color to match Mickey and drapes. Clean and comfortable otherwise. Needs much better lighting.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay 3 years in a row!
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for our past 3 trips to Disneyland. We always stay for 3 nights. I can always find a great deal for room prices. Parking is free, breakfast is free--and it has gotten better each visit. This year was the first year we used the swimming pool, which was great. There is a small refrigerator in the room and also a microwave. There is a Target right down the street and many restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This a great place to stay for a visit to Disney.  The rooms are a good size with comfy beds.  For any family whose kids have hit puberty, double beds are not an option. My son and husband are tall.  Queen-sized beds are a must, and, in this area, finding rooms with Queen-sized beds for a reasonable price is a challenge.  This place fits the bill.  TV is on the small size, but, if you're spending your days at Disney, who cares!  Breakfast was below average  - the usual hotel eggs and sausage, yogurt from a machine, but otherwise, all simple carbs and sugar.  The waffle makers are always a hit with my teenagers, but I need something with protein.  It's easy to overcome this problem, as there are good-sized refrigerators in the room and a microwave.  The Target down the street has
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good size room. Good breakfast but the kids got tired of the same food after the third day! The carpets are dirty but other than that everything was good. Three long blocks from Disney land but we enjoyed walking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was very impressed with the quality for the price that I got! I LOVED the Mickey on the wall and the opportunity to get a trading pin at the frount desk!!!!! The room was very large and the breakfast was delicious!!! My only complaint was that there were toenail clippings in the bathroom trash bin which I thought was strange. Overall this was a very pleasant stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful place to stay!  Very clean accommodations, excellent staff, excellent breakfast.  So nice to have a room joined to ours with bunk beds - really worked out great for our family of five (we had 2 queen beds in other room).  Very good prices too!  Also had a microwave, refrigerator, ironing board, iron and coffee pot.  AC worked excellent too!  What more could a family need?
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Super sketchy motel, not safe, staff don't care
Summary: To start off let me say that this place is super sketchy and if you talk to the staff about it they don't care. I arrived super late on a Friday night/Saturday morning and there were some guys in the parking lot looking in cars, I told the lady at the desk and she said there was nothing she could do and that they didn't have security. I come out to my car the next morning and, surprise surprise, my car was broken into. I tell the lady at the front desk and all she says is that the hotel is not liable. No I'm sorry, nothing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Stanford Inn and Suites in June for 8 nights. It was our 13th trip to Anaheim, but our first down this end of Harbour Blvd.  Wins- Price was very reasonable - Rooms were clean, private and safe - ART buses 1 and 2 arrive and drop off straight at your door every 10-15 mins (is a cost though)  - 5 min walk to Target, which was fantastic when had no car - Abundance of dining options close by   Challenges- Its a solid 20 minute walk to the parks. Didn't mind it during the day but late at night bit far and dark (despite being on Harbour Blvd) (ART bus available) - TV broke twice. Only took under 30 mins to fix, but just slightly annoying when nhl and nba playoffs on (haha)   In summary, if the Stanford Inn can maintain its advantages around price and your
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the perfect place if you have children.  The room has a microwave and a large mini fridge.  It has a really good breakfast with eggs, sausage, waffles, bagels and cream cheese, toast and fruits.  Close enough to uber to Disneyland.  Right by a target, Bucca and outback and love Joe's Italian ice right next door.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean rooms, delicious breakfast and very friendly/helpful staff. Pool was small, but still fun. Very close is Disneyland and the ART bus was so easy to get back and forth. We loved our stay here. Would definitely come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not bad, but many other stay options
Summary: Check your options, I came because it had vacancy andincluded breakfast, but breakfast was disappointing and eating area is sad.  Better to eat elsewhere unless you're desperate.  Room was clean. Janitors nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I wanted to give these guys a good review. Last minute reserve thinking we might as well drive last 150 miles of 750.  4.5 hrs later from traffic we got to Disneyland. Girls at check in were very nice.  Boys were thrilled to have their own bathroom and tv with bunk beds in their room. Pool for last open hr was good.  Very comfortable beds but very firm. A.C. fine too. BUT carpet looked ok but was filthy!  I didn't notice till wife said look at your feet next morning,  yuck. I wet a towel  and rubbed a bit. Will post pics. I just happened upon review from two months ago with a reply that carpet issue was being addressed.  Hmmmm.  This is old style construction and shows age but would otherwise have been a good stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Absolutely terrible! When I checked in around 9pm with my family the room had a mouldy smell which we then found out to be a leaking pipe around 10pm. My dad figured out that the tubes weren't connected properly and were leaking really fast. The next morning we woke up around half 8 in the morning just to get breakfast. What kind of hotel has breakfast between 6:30 and 9:00?!?! Next Me and my 3 brothers, mum and dad went to go get tickets for Disney land. When we get to Disney land we wanted to get max passes, But because of the tickets we ordered we were spending around 20 minutes stand img in the hot sun waiting for the man to figure out how to get the passes to work. The lady at the hotel counter said that the maxpass tickets were $10 but they were $20 and we spent around
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room is really nice an spacious we stay in two bedroom suite with free breakfast. The breakfast is good. The only thing we think needs some improvement is in the housekeeping of the room when it's a long staying other than tha I would recommended and come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was great the service was great also.The room we're always  kept clean. The service for the breakfast was  excellent and was always kept full of food.And the tables were always clean.The people from the office were super helpful and  kind.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is tucked in among the number of accommodations near Disneyland on Harbor Blvd. aka Hotel Row.  The exterior is dated, though clean and well maintained. As you turn into the driveway, you are thinking, "Oh no. How bad is this going to be?"  Trust me when I tell you the look from Harbor Blvd. is deceptive.  When you enter the parking lot, which is surrounded by the 2 stories of hotel rooms, you are greeted with an abundance of green bushes & trees, plenty of parking, and well-maintained buildings, landscaping and pool. At night, the area is well lit and safe.   The hotel staff was very helpful and accommodating to the needs of the various Disneyland-bound families.  The room staff kept my room spotless during my 2 week stay.    Management obviously takes great pride in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recommend the 2nd floor.  People/children jumping and running at 11:00 pm.  Could hear every move.  Felt like they were going to come through the ceiling and the windows were going to break.  I did call front desk and they called the room above us, but it was another 45 minutes before they stopped.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Me and my girl friend will most likely never stay at another Stanford inn again. The sheets we received and our bed were stained and dirty,our air conditioner was malfunctioning and we also had a bed that was extremely uncomfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Too much for the poor quality, and more downs then what actually stated online every morning there is water leaks, on the property, the sheets over washed in Clorox that gave multiple guest an itch  Ugggg worst experience
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything about this place was really nice... the only critic would be, the Mickey Mouse wall art made intimate moments a little awkward. There is also a Mickey Mouse head in the restroom, but I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best hotel not owned by Disney.
Summary: The best value and best free breakfast. Breakfast has hot and cold items to choose from and a variety of juices.  Shuttle to park is right next to the hotel. There's no fancy frills but if you are going to parks everyday then it is excellent for what you need.
Manager Response: Dear 538jeff,   Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating! We are glad you were able to enjoy our property and the amenities we have to offer!

Summary Heading: A great deal for our family of 6!
Summary: Clean rooms. Bunk beds. Free Breakfast. Friendly staff. They also had Disneyland tickets available, as well as bus passes. We will definitely stay there again.  The pool is small, but provided a refreshing rest time in the hot afternoon.
Manager Response: Dear smallekafka,   Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating! Every department in our hotel works together to make your stay a memorable and enjoyable one! We like to make our guests' vacation easier by providing you with all the necessities to be able to enjoy your stay with us here in Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you again soon and relaxing by our pool area!

Summary: We slept in one of the rooms next to one of the entrances in the back. This was very noisy at night, when guests tried to excess the hotel and the gate slammed close.  Other than that we had a lovely stay. Our room was decorated in a Star Wars theme, which my daughter loved. Very cool!
Manager Response: Dear Sabine R,   Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating! Our team is extremely satisfied that your family was able to enjoy the Star Wars themed bedroom, as it is relatively new to our property. It is a great way to keep the Disney spirit alive. Thank you for feedback, I will be addressing this with my team to improve our property!

Summary: Very nice hotel, friendly environment, rooms were kept very clean and organized. Only problem is that you have to double check your door if it is locked when you step outside. The pool was very relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear amarislove11,   Thank you for your review! Our team is happy that you were able to enjoy the property and the amenities we have to offer. The pool is a great way to unwind after a long hot summer day! Thank you for your feedback about the door, I will be addressing it with my team to improve the property.

Summary: I can't stand dirty, and my bathroom was really dirty, corners, floor, bathtub, toilet, curtain and towels with stains, suppose to be white but they look yellowish, luckily I always travel with my own.. I couldnt cancel because I have already paid and if i cancel I will get charge 150 dllrs for cancellation and I cant afford that. I don't understand why this was advertised as a 4☆ hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Stanford Inn for 3 nights in July 2017 and loved every minute of it! The staff was very nice and extremely helpful! The shuttle service was quick, cheap and made it so easy to get to Disneyland. Breakfast far exceeded expectations for a free breakfast! We will be staying here again next year for our next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating! We are truly pleased that you were able to enjoy your stay with us and all the amenities we have to offer. At Stanford Inn, our team tries to make your stay as simple as possible, along with the convenience of the ART shuttle stopping right outside the hotel is a big time saver. We look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: This was mine and my family's second stay at Stanford Inn and they don't fail to impress. They are the little Inn that Could. The rooms are always clean, the continental breakfast is top notch with very friendly service, and the front desk staff is very knowledgeable of all things Disneyland which was very helpful in planning our week. I will stay here again, and again, and again.
Manager Response: Dear nratcliffe,   WELCOME BACK! Thank you for the review and the 5 star rating! It truly means a lot when the guests can see how hard our team works ! Every department in our hotel work together to make your stay a memorable and enjoyable one! We are truly pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and continue to be a loyal guest for the years to come !

Summary: Nice friendly staff but the room needs some quick maintenance repairs. The carpets must be removed or cleaned as they were leaving black marks on my children that walked around the room barefoot. The smell of the room had a similar smell to mold/mildew that could've been from the air but that should be looked at to make sure there's no mold/mildew.
Manager Response: Dear tperez66,   Thank you for your feedback, it is truly appreciated! We apologize for the inconvenience and i can assure you that is something out of the ordinary as our maintenance department routinely runs a deep clean cycle on both the carpets and the AC units. We will be addressing this directly with the team.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel close to main Anaheim attractions
Summary: My family and I spent 3 nights at this hotel. We spent some time in the pool, which is heated. The room was spacious and cozy. The staff were really helpful and respectful. This was the second stay in two years and we're definitely going back here next year.
Manager Response: Dear Orlando A,   WELCOME BACK! Thank you for staying with us again and the 5 star rating. I am pleased to have a loyal guest satisfied with another wonderful stay. Our team works very hard to ensure that the property and amenities and full functioning for the enjoyment of our guests! We look forward to seeing you a third time! :)

Summary: Great location and great for families. Excellent service.  Good breakfast options.  Could improve in carpet & extra blanket cleanliness.  We found few bugs. Could use fumigation. But nothing that would prevent us from staying there again.  Overall a good experience, specially with big families.
Manager Response: Dear eepigalo,   Thank you for your review and sharing your concerns.We are glad you enjoyed our property and the amenities we have to offer. We take any and all pest situations seriously and will properly resolve the issue.

Summary: Close to Disneyland. Nice and friendly staff. Clean rooms daily. Approachable staff with any questions. Great and yummy breakfast every morning made by a lady name Maria which she was awesome cook. Definetly will be staying here again'
Manager Response: Dear Aide R,   Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating, it is truly appreciated! Our staff works very hard to meet and exceed the needs of our guests! Maria knows and exceeds our expectations with the breakfast as well does our Front Desk Team, as they are very knowledgeable with the area.  We will share the review with our staff and celebrate the success ! We look forward to seeing you again !

Summary: great hotel, great location, staff friendly. Wife had a business conference to attend this was right around the corner and close enough to the beach for me to go play while she worked. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone
Manager Response: Dear Greg V,   Thank you for your review and the 5 star rating, it is truly appreciated! We are pleased that you were able to enjoy the beach, being only 25 minutes away and that your wife was within walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to seeing y'all again soon!

Summary: The hotel is a little bit dated but it is clean and the rooms are very large. The location is good with an ART stop right in front of the hotel which will take you to Disneyland. The price of the room does come with a free breakfast but it can get very crowded at peak times with usually a short wait for a table. To me the biggest selling feature is the front desk. They couldn't do enough to help you out and answer all questions.
Manager Response: Dear Sportsman1056,   Thank you for your review and for noticing how hard our front desk team works. Our team is always ready to meet and exceed your needs at any time. We are pleased you were able to enjoy our property, location and the amenities we have to offer! We look forward to seeing you again soon!.

Summary Heading: More than I ever hoped for!
Summary: The staff at this hotel is absolutely amazing. When I complained about a moldy smell in our room, they immediately diagnosed it as a faulty AC unit and within the hour we had a NEW AC unit. The breakfast is huge and consistently kept up. There is indoor and outdoor seating available. The ARTS bus stops, literally, in front of the hotel; the pool is clean and is fully stocked with towels, a bathroom and a shower area. There is also a laundry room onsite for your convenience.   I felt as if this hotel was owned by a person (or persons) who truly wanted us to be there and who understood the needs of vacationing families. I most definitely recommend this hotel and will be staying here in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Q3397TKkathleenl,   Thank you very much for your review and also the 5 star rating! It truly means a lot when the guest is able to realize how hard everyone here at Stanford works to make your stay a memorable one. Our team tries to make things more pleasant for the guest, whilst being so far away from home. We are pleased you were truly able to enjoy our property, location, and all the amenities we have to offer! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The hotel was perfect for what we wanted. Clean and comfy. Bus stopped right outside for transport to Disneyland. Restaurants were nearby! We also enjoyed cooling off in the swimming pool. Staff were more than happy to look after our bags!
Manager Response: Dear twinkle181,   Thank you for your review and the 5 -star rating! We are so glad you were able to relax and enjoy our pool area and the convenience of the ART Shuttle stopping outside our hotel, making transportation easier to and from Disneyland. Our team is always ready and willing to help our guests with any requests. Thanks again , we look forward to seeing you again soon !

Summary: The room was flawless. The beds were very comfortable. The room was not expensive at all especially for how  de it looked. Bathroom was very clean. Had enough privacy. Room temperature also met our expectations which is a huge plus.
Manager Response: Dear andreafI824IR,   Thank you for your feedback, the 5 star review, and also recognizing the hard work our team does every day to make your stay as flawless as it was.  I am happy to hear that you were truly pleased with our property, room and amenities we have to offer.

Summary: Clean rooms, plenty of parking, friendly and helpful staff, good hot breakfast, 20 minute walk to Disneyland, beds and pillows were a bit too firm for our liking but everything else about the room was good.  The AC unit worked great.
Manager Response: Dear 217grego,   Thank you for your feedback! We are truly pleased you enjoyed our property and the amenities we have to offer. I am also very pleased to hear that the AC unit was to your liking, being that we are having a very warm summer this year. We look forward to seeing you again soon !

Summary: We enjoyed a 5 days stay. The rooms very very Clean, the pool was clean, good breakfast, great location to Disney park, movie theatres, great food options, target was close by. We took an Uber to a Anaheim Angels game!
Manager Response: Dear mrskgibbons,   Thank you for your review! We are truly pleased that you enjoyed our property and took advantage of the amenities we have to offer. We are also happy to hear that our location being within close proximity to many attractions made your stay a more memorable one.

Summary: We paid for the deluxe room because what was advertised online. Disney characters on the walls of the room. My 2 year old would of loved it. But we didn't have any Disney in our room. disappointing. The pictures online were very misleading as well. They also ran out of breakfast food before it was even over. This hotel was not worth the price.
Manager Response: Dear melanierose10,   Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for not meeting your expectations. Our team is only one call away to go above and beyond for the needs of our guests.  We hope that you will reconsider us for another stay, as we know we can provide you with a perfect and more memorable stay.

Summary: Loved the full breakfast & the staff. We stayed at another motel for a new got at the other side of California only to be extremely disappointed,so we changed our plans and returned here for another 2 night gets before leaving the state.  I would gladly recommend a stay here to any friends or family.
Manager Response: Dear fetispal,   Thank you for your feedback and for the 5 star rating! I am very pleased that you truly enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff treated you kindly. Here at Stanford Inn, we strive to make every stay a memorable one, as we hope yours will be !

Summary Heading: It was ok, nothing like the Annabelle the property was a comfort inn and rooms gloomy, older fixtures. Needs an update.
Summary: Nothing to rave about. The guest service was the only thing above a 3 check in and check out staff were nice. Curtains need an update. My other issue is it's 95 degrees outside, the room was reserved they didn't even turn it on before we arrived, room was extremely warm, and took all night to cool off room
Manager Response: Dear Kelly B,  Thank you for your review. We apologize for not exceeding your expectations, but we will take your feedback into consideration to improve our property.

Summary: I booked this hotel for our 3 day family trip to Disney. Nice location only a short 30min walk to the parks. Room was good size to accommodate 4 people, and was clean. Friendly staff and quick check-in. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lars L,   Thank you for your review! I am happy that you and your family enjoyed our property and the amenities it has to offer. When booking your next reservation, contact the hotel directly to hear about our Loyalty Guest Discount!

Summary: This property is well located, a short drive or shuttle bus ride from Disneyland. The customer service was friendly and helpful. The rooms were basic motel rooms, a little dated but otherwise ok. The rooms had a refrigerator and microwave which we found useful. We enjoyed a dip in the swimming pool which was well kept and clean
Manager Response: Dear nimswami,   Thank you for your review! I am pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy our pool during your stay as it is a nice way to cool off from this California heat! I am also glad to hear that our staff was helpful and that the distance and shuttle to and from Disneyland is convenient from our property.

Summary: We stayed for one night, but had a good experience. We utilized the pool, which had great hours. There's also free parking, free wifi, and free breakfast! Staff was great. We enjoyed our stay. No complaints!
Manager Response: Dear Jackie B,   Thank you for your feedback and your 5 star review. It is greatly appreciated! We look forward to seeing you again to enjoy our property and our amenities. Contact our hotel directly to hear about our Loyalty Guest Discount.

Summary: Good clean hotel with comfortable beds and a good hot breakfast! Nice pool and hot tub free parking would stay here again! Only thing this hotel could work on is keeping there breakfast stocked better!
Manager Response: Dear scottaH3044AN,  Thank you for your review! I am pleased you were able to enjoy our property and the amenities. Thank you as well for choosing to stay with us again, please contact our hotel directly to hear about our Loyalty Guest Discount.  We will take your feedback into consideration and address it directly with our breakfast staff.

Summary: We booked three nights at the Stanford Inn for our Disney Trip, 2 adults and 2 young kids. This review comes from the perspective of going to Disneyland with small kids. We had a room that had a separate room with bunk beds for the kids. It is a good hotel if you are looking to stretch your dollar for a Disney trip.  Pluses:  Clean, very comfy beds Free Parking Free Breakfast, hot and cold options Disney themed rooms Nice staff Free wifi  The free breakfast and parking alone will save you a significant amount of money compared to other hotels in the area that charge for parking and don't have breakfast. The trade off is that the hotel is older and is more tired than the others.   Cons Worn furniture/building No elevator Further from Disneyland  The ART bus stops right in front
Manager Response: Dear samstuller,   Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback and are pleased you enjoyed the property and its amenities. Hopefully, some time in the near future when you are in town again, you will re-think about staying with us as we have a lot of surprises happening here at our property.

Summary: It was very convienient, the price was reasonable for the quality of the hotel, and the free breakfast has lots of options and well prepared. The breakfast was open for convienient hours giving us a reasonable amount of time to go and eat breakfast or just grab coffee all morning before our adventures for the day.
Manager Response: Dear kristinadiaz10,   Thank you for your feedback and the 5 star review! We our team is pleased you were able to enjoy our property and the amenities we have to offer. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: First time at Stanford inn and we will be back
Summary: I found Stanford inn and suites through Hotel.com. it only had 2.5 stars but when I read the reviews I was surprised to see 4 and 5 stars and now I know why. We stayed for 3 days and we were satisfied. Our room was immaculate. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear RBlackett,    Thank you for your feedback ! Also, thank you for giving our hotel a try. We are extremely satisfied that our property and amenities exceed your exceptions. We truly hope to see you again. When booking your next reservation, give us a call directly to the hotel so we can offer our Loyalty Guest Discount.

Summary: It is a good place to stay. A good place to sleep and shower. Good size room. Close to Disneyland (walking distance) and close to restaurants and commerce. However the place is dated and not very appealing. Furniture is old and overused. Half of the bathroom (washing basin and mirror) is in the room. Lacks electrical outlets in essential places like night table and desk for charging devices.. Remodeling is badly needed.
Manager Response: Dear hfried_435967,   Thank you for your feedback!I am pleased to hear that our property was able to give you the comfort needed to recharge for another day of Disney.  We appreciate the suggestions on the remodeling of the rooms and we will  pass the ideas down to our design team.

Summary: Our late check-in was not problem. Night staff was very helpful. Room was perfect size for our family. Second bathroom was a bonus. Location near Disneyland was helpful. Hot breakfast was a  money saver.
Manager Response: Dear Craig H,   Thank you for your feedback! I am glad you enjoyed your stay and was able to take advantage of our free breakfast. The family suite is one of our most favorable rooms, it adds privacy between the adults and children along with the second bathroom making mornings easier! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very reasonably priced.  We stayed in the 2bdrm Disney bunk rooms and it was perfect size for our family of 6.  Hotel felt run down and just not the nicest but in this situation you get what you pay for.  Felt like the sheets were over bleached and pool over chlorinated.  Our main room air conditioning wall unit was noisy and leaked a lot.  Overall ok experience but we would spend a bit more and stay somewhere a little nicer.  I
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very convenient location.  Beds were so comfy
Summary: We were very pleased with the room and location.  Enjoyed the pool and hottub.  Close walk to Disneyland and shuttle was very convenient and on time.  Within 35 minutes to beaches and LA.  We had a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Dear Dianna V,   Thank you for your review ! Here at Stanford Inn we aspire to give every guest a memorable and enjoyable experience. I am truly pleased we were able to give you a wonderful experience and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Cosy hotel with big room (we were  a family of 5 in a suite with 2 bathrooms). Breakfast was just ok.  Did not like the poolarea. Too small and too noisy. Great location if you want to visit Disneyland parks, they also have a shuttle to Disney (cost extra). Very cosy neighborhood. Location is also ok for a daytrip to Los Angeles. Would absolutely stay here again. Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Hegechristine,   Thank you for your feedback ! I do apologize that you were not able to enjoy the pool area, but i hope the rest of our property and amenities were up to your standards. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great value for families visiting Disneyland.  Rooms are spacious and clean.  Staff is very friendly.  Free parking and hot breakfast included!  Two  bedroom/two bathroom kid suite was very cute and convenient for a family.  Easy 1 mile walk to the parks.   Taxi ride was $7 if you don't want to walk.
Manager Response: Dear R9404KVlaurar,   Thank you for your feedback ! I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our Kid's suite as it is one of our guests favorites since both the adults and the kids can get their own privacy. Here at Stanford Inn, we strive on working together to give our guests a pleasurable stay. We are glad you took advantage of the amenities we have to offer and we look forward to seeing you again soon !

Summary: The staff was very helpful. The rooms were very clean, as well as the pool. The laundry, microwave and fridge was accommodating. The breakfast could use some work and different food could be mixed up.
Manager Response: Dear Olin82,   Thank you for your feedback ! As a team, it is our pleasure to help you with making your stay a little bit easier. We are also glad you enjoyed our property and the amenities it has to offer! We will take your comments about the breakfast selection into consideration and hopefully make some changes. We hope to see you again soon !

Summary Heading: It could use some upgrades and new furnitures
Summary: I won't be coming back unfortunately. I skipped the complimentary breakfast, they need more variety. I must say the space was decent, and the set up was pretty comfy. The noise level was pretty bad.  We were able to hear The people upstairs from our room; every step and their TV.
Manager Response: Dear Michellewestry80,   Thank you for your feedback. I apologize for the inconvenience you encountered on our property. I appreciate the comments about the aspects of the room that need updating. It is our pleasure to say that our hotel will inquiring some changes in the near future. We hope you will come and stay with us again one day soon to make your stay a more memorable one.

Summary: Important for us is clean bed and clean bathroom. All in all cleanliness. Good serve breakfast . The place is safe to stay and  close to Disneyland park. The bunk beds was awesome my kids love it. It was a good place to stay for a short vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Maleficent2017,   Thank you for your feedback ! It is our pleasure to be able to provide you and your family with a nice and clean room during your vacation. The bunk beds in the kid's suite is a great way to relax and replenish for another fun filled day. I am glad your family enjoyed our property and the amenities it has to offer. We look forward to seeing you and the family again!

Summary: This is the second time me and my family have stayed in this hotel we love it. Great rooms, staff, and breakfest. The breakfest saves is a lot of money because we are such a big family. Really appreciate a clean room and coutious staff.
Manager Response: Dear Rtdodson,   Thank you for staying with us once again ! I am truly pleased to hear that you and your family enjoy our property and the amenities it has to offer. We strive in making your stay as convenient as possible and our staff as attentive as they could be! We look forward to seeing you and your family soon.

Summary: i have been coming to this hotel for four times i really like the rooms and the hotel price  my kids like the breakfast .the pool.the staff  taking my kids one week evry year to disneylan very short trip from the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Ibrahim A,   Thank you for being such a loyal guest to us ! We truly appreciate your continuous visits  and allowing us to partake in your family fun.  We look forward to seeing you again next year !

Summary: We are from Az and ended up staying one night longer than we had planned so we did a quick search on Hotels.com and found this hotel....far exceeded our expectations. from the moment we checked in we were made to feel welcomed and the customer service was amazing. thank you all for making our unexpected stay better than the 5 planned at the previous hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear KathygY9853PI,    Thank you for your feedback, as it is truly appreciated ! I am extremely satisfied that our hotel and staff were able meet and exceed your needs of a hotel, as that is what we strive for with each and every stay. We hope you stay with us again the next time you are in town.  Please contact us directly to hear about our Loyalty Guest Discount !

Summary: We had a really nice room. My husband, myself and our teenage daughter stayed in the hotel. It was a long walk to Disneyland, especially after spending the day walking around at the parks. We did not mind too much, but next time would probably take a bus back after the day was over. The room was great. The bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent. They had hot and cold food. The breakfast room was crowded anytime after 8:15. Free wifi is nice, but it was very difficult to access it. The wifi kept throwing us off. Very frustrating! I would not count on the free wifi. We would stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Sheilae2017,    Thank you for your feedback, we truly appreciate it ! I am very pleased to hear that you had such a wonderful time on your family trip and that we were able to make your nights more comfortable and your mornings more convenient with the free breakfast. I apologize for the trouble the Wifi was giving you, I can assure you we will direct the issue with our team and have it fixed!

Summary Heading: ART stops right in front of this hotel
Summary: Laundry was only $1 for the machines. Breakfast area always crowded but had lots of choices. Front desk will sell you ART tickets and any Disney package you would want. TV setup was hard to navigate but being right by Disneyland, we weren't there to watch TV
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for family trip to Disney
Summary: This is a good hotel if you are going to Disneyland. It is a little far to walk, especially with kids and lunches, but the ART bus picks up right outside the hotel.  ART was not that timely in the morning so we took UBER the 2nd day and that was great! The beds are SO comfortable, we all fell right to sleep every night. Hubby and I loved the extra room for the kids -  it has bunk beds, a small desk/dresser and TV. My kids also really loved it (ages 7&9).  Breakfast is served daily and it is very good - waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage plus fruits, cereal, coffee... I was super happy to get our family nice and full before a 14 hour day at Disney! The ladies at breakfast and housekeeping were very kind and helpful! Front desk staff was mediocre... they need to work on being more
Manager Response: Dear Tracy497,       I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and amenities,I sincerely apologize for your experience with our front desk staff. I assure you that is not our standard and we will address it directly with our front desk team. we appreciate the 4 star rating and look forward to seeing you again. Please contact us directly to hear about our loyalty guest discount !

Summary Heading: Good stay. Great kids rooms. Just a bit of a walk from Disneyland if you have little ones..
Summary: My only complaints would be price of the room per night ($259) and the distance from Disneyland (.7 miles). Other than that the staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean and comfy. Wish they had more variety for their continental breakfast too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here before. Perfect room size for our family of 6. Free breakfast was good and location to Disney was good for the price. Only complaint I have was the carpet although looked clean left our bare feet black withinn15 minutes of walking around. After the second time we just made sure to wear socks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Remember it's not a hotel it's an Inn. The price is reasonable for being located near Disney Land. Breakfast is included, that's a big help when your traveling with family. Shuttle is available to and from Disney Land.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly staff, clean comfortable rooms, and close to Disneyland. The breakfast offered is better than most offering both hot and cold foods. The shuttle to the park is pretty direct and has a short wait time. I've stayed here before and I'll stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in room 232 a very quiet location and convenient to the pool area.  This room has a separate room (bunk beds & TV) separated by French doors for the 2 grandkids.  The free breakfast was good with hot items like eggs, sausage, and potatoes.  There is an ART shuttle that stops in front of the hotel every 20 minutes that travels to Disneyland.  It starts at 7:00 am and the last trip leaves Disneyland at 12:30 am.  The overall services at this hotel is good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great option given the price and proximity to Disneyland. The shuttle is readily available and the parking to the park is within walking distance. The staff was nice, the breakfast was decent. I will consider staying there in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Karla R,  Thank you for your feedback! I'm glad to hear that your stay with us was pleasant, and yes the shuttle is one of the most preferred method of transportation to and from Disneyland with our guests since the pick up and drop off is right outside our hotel although if you like walking you can also walk there its only a little bit over a mile away. we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!  Yours truly,

Summary: Place was great! Close to everything we needed, Vid con convention, food and Disney!  Rooms were super clean and the staff were extremely friendly. Didn't get a chance to swim in the pool but it looked pretty amazing, Recommend 100%
Manager Response: Dear designbyknight,  Thank you so much for sharing your review with us! We are delighted to hear you had a great experience with us, like you said we are surrounded with great places to visit from food to entertainment, our number one priority is to have our guest feel at home by providing them with great customer service. We can't wait to have you back as our valued customer and maybe next time you can take a dip in the pool!  Yours truly,

Summary: Staff where great and place had everything we needed. The place was clean and tidy and was great value for the money. Very close to the convention centre and a walking distance to Disney land if that is your reason for visiting
Manager Response: Dear Sammy W,  Thank you so much for your great review! we are pleased to hear you had a great experience with us. We try our best to keep our guests happy by providing them with the best rates possible and always having a nice and clean room for them to stay at. You are definitely correct the convention center and Disneyland are at a walking distance of just a little over a mile there's also other great places you can visit that are around the area. Thank you again for sharing your feedback with us again,  we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!  Yours truly,

Summary: I love staying here, it's a step above the other hotels in this price range, and the breakfast is excellent. They have eggs, potatoes, sausage, bagels, pastries, toast, coffee, juices, oatmeal etc. Francibel was very helpful and always had a smile on her face. #REEZYVERIFIED
Manager Response: none

Summary: Place was clean service was fast, bunk beds were made for kids under 8 or 9, not for bigger kids; however they worked.  Had tv in each of the rooms, air conditioner worked good.  Fridge was not working but they got to it and fixed it.  Breakfast was well put together
Manager Response: Dear Z8551PLcarolm,   Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your experience with us, We try to keep all of our rooms Disney themed, I'm glad to hear we were able to get the fridge working for you. once again thank you for your feedback we hope to see you and your family back again.  Your truly,

Summary: 4 stars hotel, nice staff. Close to fast food chains. To far to walk to Disneyland so park at the Disneyland parking lot or take the city bus.  Breakfast is hot and pretty good eggs potatoes pork sausage and waffles plus cold and hot cereal with juice and coffee bar.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We traveled from AZ  from a 6 day trip and was treated horribley at a different Hotel we had previously booked. We needed to hurry and find somewhere else and thank God Stanford Inn took us in with bright smiles!! They made sure we all were comfortable and the baby was happy.
