The pool was clean, rooms were clean and cheery with Disney. Breakfast was yummy. Will come here over and over again. Thank you Stanford Inn for making my family feel so happy after such a long trip!!
Manager Response: Dear Mermaidkisses,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! We are so sorry to hear you had a terrible experience somewhere else but glad we were able to help and turn your experience down here back around! Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!  Yours Truly,

Summary: My husband and I try to have a ones and a while getaway from work family and daily routines. So I'm always looking for Hotels with morning  breakfast and not to far from home. Enjoy our stay. It was really relaxing. Also many places to eat around and not too far from Disneyland or Convention center
Manager Response: Dear 35karinaf,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! Glad to hear you had a good time, there are many places for you to visit around here from food to entertainment this place is the perfect place for a getaway! Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!  Yours Truly,

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located near theme parks, restaurants and shops. I was disappointed at the cost of the family suite for the 2 nights. The room was neat but was dirty in some areas. The carpet was burned in two places and needs to be replaced. The bedding on the bunk beds is really thin and outdated. The bunk bed rails were all scratched up and drawn on. The breakfast was so so. There really should be more options for people with dietary issues. The breakfast area was way to small and crowded. There should be more than one person serving the food or maybe do a buffet with more options and space. The pool area didn't have enough seating or shade. The towels in the pool are are way too small for adults. The area of the hotel is sketchy. We witnessed a fight between two
Manager Response: none

Summary: I prefer rooms connected to an inside corridor.  However I adjusted to entering from the outside.The room was clean, I appreciated having both a microwave and fridge in the room. We stayed six days. Based upon the costs of rooms in California, I would consider this place again. It is convenient to sights and it is centrally located.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 1st time staying in this motel, it is older, no elevator, but property was clean and maintained. Room had microwave and medium fridge, that was nice, most hotels charge for that, most motels don't offer that. Breakfast was not your typical free motel meal.
Manager Response: Dear amayzum,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! We try our best to always keep our guest happy and always have a clean place for them to stay at, like you said we provide all of our guest with a fridge and microwave in their room and free Wi-Fi as well as complementary breakfast. Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!  Yours Truly,

Summary: Overall an average experience. Carpets were very dirty, but they were in the process of changing out the flooring to laminate. It might be better soon. Pillows were a little too firm for our tastes. Hot breakfast had no variety.
Manager Response: Dear the1tonyevans,   Thank you so much for your review, we truly value your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you got a room with a bad carpet although we do wash the carpets daily and We are in the process of removing all of the carpet flooring, so hopefully if you do decide to stay with us again it'll be a much better experience,Thank you again for sharing your feedback and hopefully we get to see you again.  Yours truly,

Summary: We had a great experience here. I usually try to go with less expensive hotels which this was one of the least expensive I found. We often end up in some not so great places, but this place was awesome!  Clean, good smelling room. Great breakfast. Friendly, helpful staff. We will definitely go back!!
Manager Response: Dear Roland W,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! I'm pleased to hear your stay with us was great, we do our best to keep our guests happy by providing them with the best possible service, Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest!

Summary: The hotel had very clean rooms and the front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. Loved the free breakfast every morning and the jacuzzi and swimming pool were nice. Very nice staff. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear  jolly552017,  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel, and for taking the time to write a review! we are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our hotel aims to provide you a truly unique experience, thank you again for sharing your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.   Yours truly,

Summary: Awesome pricing. AMAZING staff! Convenient location with shuttle services right in front of the hotel. This is my go to place whenever I plan our Disney trips! I have stayed here the last 2 years we have taken our trips and it's just a pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear  iamstinababy,  Thank you so much for choosing our hotel, and for taking the time to write a review! we are honored to hear that we are your go to hotel, we will do our best to have it stay that way, you are correct the Anaheim Resort Transit is the preferred method of transportation to and from Disneyland with our guests, and rightfully so as the shuttle picks up directly outside of our lobby! Thank you again for sharing your feedback, we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.   Yours truly,

Summary: Will be booking my next trip here also. The rooms are large and the beds are very comfortable. Nice to have a hotel that has a full free breakfast and free parking. The shuttle picks you up right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey P,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, it is greatly appreciated. I am glad to hear you had a 5 star experience while lodging with us, our goal is to make you feel at home by providing you with the best service possible, also complimentary breakfast, parking and Wi-Fi is provided to all of our guests. Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we can't wait to have you back as our valued hotel guest.   Yours truly

Summary: Perfect for a family bigger than 4 and right by Disney. It's not brand new but the beds were comfy and really clean. The bunk bed room was great for my kids, they loved that they had their own room. (So did the adults) The staff was polite and very helpful.  We will return!
Manager Response: Dear Candice H,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us, I am glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, we are also working on remodeling our rooms so maybe next time you decide to stay with us again you'll see new changes, thank you again for taking the time to write a review and we can't wait to have you back as our valued guest.  Yours truly,

Summary: Everything and everyone was fabulous.  Very helpful!  Breakfast good with lots of choices. Art bus was great to go back and forth to Disneyland.  My only complaint was the bunk bed mattresses were very hard
Manager Response: Dear  Tami G,   Let me just start off by saying thank you for taking the time to write a review, we apologize for the inconvenience regarding the mattresses, we are always looking for ways to improve our quality of the rooms, we will make sure we address this issue by replacing the mattresses if we need to, I am glad everything else worked out great for you once again thank you for taking the time to write a review we greatly appreciate it, and hopefully we will be welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Good for families with kids. Bad pillows. Ample parking space. Not much for breakfast. Stayed to go to Disneyland​. Market and coffee shops are nearby. Couldn't sleep till late next day as there was pathway construction going on just outside our room.
Manager Response: Dear Megha G,  Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your experience, it is greatly appreciated. We are so sorry for the inconvenience with your room, that's not something that happens on a daily basis that is something that it is out of our control, since it the city is doing work, next time just let us know and we'll try our best to accommodate you. Once again I apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for sharing your feedback we hope to have you stay with us again, we promise a better experience.   Yours truly,

Summary Heading: Very convenient great location for the price!
Summary: Perfect location. Everything is very close. Lots of restaurants. Stores are very assailable. parking was good.The room was great for us. The pool was clean, It was great to have access to be able to do laundry.
Manager Response: Dear M1486PDceciliam,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us! We're glad to hear you had 5 star experience while lodging with us! You are right we are at a perfect location, we are located in a great area where there's lots of options for food and/or entertainment close by there is always something fun to do for everyone, and thank you so much we're glad to hear our laundry room was helpful for you. Once again thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us it is greatly appreciated.  Yours truly

Summary Heading: Spring Break 2017 family trip to Disney
Summary: Our family had great stay at Stanford. Our room looked just like the pics.  Beds were comfortable.  Air Con worked well.  Room was clean. Enjoyed the complimentary breakfast - and the hostesses were very polite and helpful.  They were very busy but always had a smile.  Front desk staff was knowledgeable and very helpful with all our questions. Friendly.  Liked being able to purchase ART tickets at desk.  Bus stop right out the door takes you to Disney!  Pool area was great.  Kids swam every single day.  We even used the laundry facilities.  YES - we would definitely stay here again.  Thank you Stanford.   My kids have already asked when we can go back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff would take the ac off when we were not there. When we would return to the room it was stuffy and smelled like mildew near the sink area.the room was spacious and Disney themed with wall stickers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great customer service from Hatel.Very nice place,clean room and good breakfast.Close to disneyland and restaurents.Also sell ticket's for Disneyland and bus tickets to go to Disneyland.Two gas stations are next door.Very convienent to fill the gas.Great place to stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was great no issues with anything. Nice and friendly staff definitely recommend for people who are looking for a nice place for Disneyland. Great breakfast and very close to Disney. Definitely will stay here every time we some up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay here and highly recommend! The location is great and extremely close to Disneyland. There's also a Target nearby for last minute emergencies. This hotel offered a clean room, great breakfast & friendly employees! I needed extra bath towels and received them within a minute.   We'll be back soon! I won't be staying anywhere else.   We traveled to Disneyland with two kids, a 3 year old boy and 9 year old girl. Our kids were extremely excited about their Avengers themed room! The room we stayed in will freak your kid out if he's into superheroes. Room 128 (highly recommend!) look into the family suite Avengers themed room!! It was recently remodeled too so it's in great shape.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: What you would expect for the price
Summary: I got what you would expect for the price. Things were a bit dirty and run down. The same gum wrapper was on the bathroom floor all week. I left it there to see if they cleaned the floors.  Breakfast was good, kitchen staff really helpful and nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We needed a room large enough for our whole family of 6 people. It was perfect for our family. The kids loved the super hero decorations and enjoyed their stay. Having 2 bathrooms made it easier to get ready quickly in the morning so we could spend more time at Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Place for a Disney Visit
Summary: We spent 5 nites at this hotel and it worked out great for what we used it for...I had two room that joined with 2 adults and 2 college and 1 high school so we didn't have any real young ones with us...we had one car...at first when we checked in the parking lot was pretty full but they have a second lot next door and a gate that you need your room key to open...this second lot worked great for us as our rooms were facing the lot...the Woody/Buzz Lightyear parking lot was about 5 min away and I feel it's a better parking lot because they use big buses to move people and not those trams...anyway back to the hotel the room is a room we basically used to sleep and shower...the shower was nice and strong not like at some of those other hotels where they use shower heads that
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our 2nd time staying here and it seems to be our go to for our family trips. I like the fact that it's not to far from Disney and that we can get two adjoining rooms with 2 bathrooms, that is key especially when you are traveling with a family. They also have breakfast which is great so that you and the kiddos can fill up before going on your adventures.  It's nothing fancy, but when you're not going to be in the room to much, who cares. There is a pool on site which is nice for the family to use later after the parks.

Summary: I was in town for a 1 night trip and looking for an inexpensive accommodation. The price was right, but it is just too far from Disneyland for me. The breakfast is okay with no complaints at all, except for the lack of dining space. This property is too far to walk but an ART shuttle will take care of you for DL.  No sneaky add-on charges for resort, parking, or internet. I recommend this for a stay.

Summary: So usually I hate motels, and was pretty upset that is what my friends booked. But honestly we checked in and it was a very nice room. They remodeled everything so it looks modern, there was free breakfast and the pool was alright. Super close to Disneyland so that's nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here as a home base for our CA adventure. We especially appreciated the hot breakfast each morning. The rooms were comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful. Close to Disneyland. We will stay again.

Summary Heading: Good inn to stay prior or after Disneyland
Summary: We stayed a night prior check in to paradise pier hotel. It was clean good breakfast. As I did some research prior going to Disneyland, most recommend to stay really close to Disneyland because you are so tired that you won't be able to walk back. Unless drive back. One of the staff I was nice enough to change our room from out street corner to inside near the parking room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked the room with the separate kids bunk room, which had its own bathroom too. Perfect after a long day at Disneyland. The staff were courteous and helpful. The breakfast provided was adequate and generous. The kids bunk room meant we could put the kids to bed, but stay up ourselves.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone we worked with or talked to were very nice and kind. The rooms were clean and comfortable. We stayed for four nights and always had a clean room when we came back from being out. The Breakfast was great and plentiful. The kids had some down time and had fun in the outdoors heated pool. When we go back to Disneyland we are going to stay with them. If you have any problems at all they are taken care of right away. Costumer service was excellent. The only reason I did not rate them that was because of chipped paint and dated bathrooms.

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For!
Summary: The hot tub was non-functioning the entire week we were there. They claim to have discounted Disneyland tickets but there were none available AND they are the same price that you pay for at Disney's main gate!

Summary: Great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. My son and I enjoyed the pool, comfortable room, breakfast with lots of options, friendly staff, and atmosphere. We would definitely stay here again.

Summary: This place is the BEST! The rooms are updated and clean, they offer a full, hot breakfast that keeps getting better every time we stay, the room rates or very fair and parking is FREE!!! This place is a hidden gem.

Summary: This was a great hotel to stay at clean nice staff and a good hot breakfast. Will stay here again when we come back to Disneyland able to walk to everything except disneyland that would have been a 30min walk but ART stop was right out in front of hotel

Summary: Rooms were great to crash in and we were lucky to have 2 bathrooms for 6 people. Pool was small but nice and clean and heated! Bus to Disneyland picks up and drops off right at the front of the Hotel. Staff are all really nice and willing to help.

Summary: The front desk had excellent customer service, the host were polite. Great breakfast- good selection to choose from. Beds were very comfortable. Rooms were clean. Great location from Disneyland. I would recomend

Summary Heading: Overall Good Value for Price Paid
Summary: Overall this is a good hotel. It's not 5-star accomodations, but good value for the (California) price. Being a Disney World (Florida) veteran, all hotels near Disneyland seem high-priced, but comparatively this one is reasonable.   Breakfast is included daily. Hot scrambled eggs, potatoes and sausage. Cereals , breads, bagels and waffles finish she out the assortment.  While nothing to write home about, it gives you a good start to your day.  It would be nice if they mixed it up a bit, however.  The best part about the hotel is the location. It is about 10-15 minutes to Disneyland on public transportation - which is cheap, runs every 20 minutes, is handicap ready and stops right in front of the hotel.  It also runs 30 minutes after park close - so no time for late shopping but
Manager Response: none

Summary: While the rooms are neat and tidy, the bed was hard. The place needs a new coat of paint, new asphalt, and cleaner closer cropped landscaping to give the place what the inside has, a clean look. Do this and you'll have a first class property.

Summary: I highly recommend this place if you're looking for something more affordable near Disneyland but that is also still very nice. The front desk staff is just so wonderful especially Celina, I had a problem with being charged twice and she resolved the issue very quickly, and was genuinely kind. I had a kind size bed and it was so comfortable, the room itself was spacious and clean, and the bathroom was also nice and clean. All in all a pleasant surprise.

Summary: Everything was good..customer service..room size..only down breakfast ran out of eggs and other few things 1 hour before time..other than that check in was great..friendly staffing..totally recommended

Summary: We stayed at the Stanford Inn and Suites for 4 nights on our recent Spring Break to Disneyland.  This is a smaller place motel style and we booked a room with 2 queen beds and a side room with kids bunk beds with 2 bathrooms.  The queen beds and pillows were very comfortable and the room was clean.  I was hoping there would have been a living room area but the kids room was separated by a single set of French doors and there was a mini refrigerator in the room.  The air conditioner worked great (and didn't rattle all night which is a huge plus) and they served a hot breakfast every morning.  My only complaint would be to make more variety for the breakfast.  It was the same thing every morning: scrambled eggs, sausage, and potatoes, waffle makers, cereal, bagels, pastries, milk
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff was very nice and professional upon check-in and checkout. Our room was very spacious we have the two bathroom kid sweet and  it was beyond our expectations. We will stay here every time we come to the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It's a Gem Not to Pass Up!
Summary: We had a two day positive experience with this hotel. If we visit Anaheim again, my family will stay here again.  The hotel is a hop and a skip from Disneyland by Anaheim Resorts Transportation (ART). The current ridership fee is $5.50 for Adults which means you can travel on their bus routes for one fee for the whole day. I can't tell you about the price of children. The bus stops right out in front of the hotel office and there are two benches for hotel guest to sit on. The trip to and from Disneyland is around 10 plus minutes--it depends on the ridership.  The check in was quick and simple with friendly staff. The parking for vehicles is free. That's one of the reasons why we stayed here. Our room was away from the main road. The room was clean and inviting. The beds were
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our go-to hotel during our Disneyland trips. The rooms are clean, the staff are friendly, free breakfast, and free parking included. This hotel is a couple blocks from the Toy Story parking lot. We love the 2 bedrooms/2 bathrooms suites.

Summary: I would highly recommend this motel to anyone that plans on staying in the area. The staff is very friendly and helpful, cheap rates and within walking distance to Disneyland! Restaurants and businesses near so you can get groceries or late night snack after Disneyland.

Summary: Location is great. It is right down the street from the toy story parking lot. Clean room and plenty of parking. The breakfast was ok, it provided what we needed. Also, the bunk beds were a hit with our children.

Summary: Every thing else looks good ,parking was close to your room.hotel is close to disnayland,breakfast was ok and on time,bus station is next to your hotel,no pets is another reason why I choose this hotel.

Summary: We had a difficult start to our trip which included a terrible experience at another location.  We found Stanford Inn & Suites through an online service (Hotels.com) and were immediately impressed with the professionalism of the staff.  They worked through a small booking snafu and were able to get my family situated and settled quickly.  The accommodations are very nice- the bunk beds for the kids are really fun and an unexpected surprise- and everyone on the staff is pleasant & professional.  The time you save buying Disney Tickets at the Hotel rather than the lines at the park is a major plus as well.  We would definitely look to stay here first on our next trip!

Summary: Is you are looking for a room for business trip, it is fine.  If it is a family vacation, forget about this option. The breakfast is included and is good. Bring your own bottle of wáter, otherwise you will be have to pay $2,50 for a single one.

Summary Heading: Clean, sufficient rooms.  Great value, close to Disney.
Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff, clean rooms.  Nothing fancy, just the basics, but  how much time do you really spend in your room when at Disneyland?  Felt safe and quiet.  Love that the ART shuttle stop is right out front.  Good variety at the free breakfast.  Great value for the location.  I would definitely stay here again were I to return to Anaheim.  No complaints!
Manager Response: Dear bergnel,  Thank you for your great 5 star review! Thank you for your fantastic review! Summary Heading: If I had it to do all over, I would go somewhere else.
Summary: I would stay closer to Disneyland if I were to go again—it was a long walk that would have been worth it if the hotel were nicer/better. The pool had garbage, leaves, and long hairs in it that stuck to our skin. Shower curtain rod was rusty. The beds were uncomfortable and made us sweat profusely. The great thing about this hotel is the breakfast. They had a ton of items to choose from and it was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear abg375,  Thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us! We are sad to hear you did not have a perfect experience with us. We apologize that the walk is not the fastest from here to Disneyland but the shuttle ti Disneyland is conveniently located in front of our lobby at a nominal fee, that is incredibly valuable after a long day at Disney! We also apologize for the pool not being in tip top shape, we will address this immediately. We are also sorry to hear about the room not being comfortable enough for your needs, we always have fresh linen available if necessary. We are glad to hear the breakfast was a positive experience for you as we have upgraded the quality and increased the options so our guests do not leave our hotel hungry! If you would consider giving us another chance, please contact me directly on your future stay, I will ensure you have the most perfect experience guaranteed!  Your truly,

Summary: We have been staying here for the past 5 years and absolutely love it. The rooms are so cleaning and roomy. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We will not stay anywhere else!! Thank you for making our memories the best
Manager Response: Dear 572natashaw,  Thank you very much for your valuable feedback! We are excited to hear you loved our property, we feel the same exact way about you!! Summary: The staff was very curteous and responded immediately to my concerns.  Free breakfast included waffles, eggs, potatoes, sausage, danishes, yogurt, juices, coffee, and more.  I'd stay there again.  Internet was faster than I expected for a hotel.

Summary: I am hotel fussy but we were so impressed with this hotel.  Staff, excellent, especially the ladies in the breakfast area. Clean, 2nd floor very quiet, great bed. Not one complaint. Thanks for Wall St Journal.

Summary: We used TripAdvisor to find a room in Anaheim - and this hotel seemed to meet our needs.  We had a mini-kitchen (microwave, mini-fridge) and a separate bedroom for the kids. The extra room made sure that we all had a great sleep and the breakfasts were perfect before a day exploring.  The staff were helpful and warm and the location was extremely convenient.  We would definitely recommend this hotel for a family with children!
Manager Response: Dear GJAlberta,  Thank you very much for your feedback! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and our hotel room suited your needs perfectly! We sincerely appreciate the recommendation and hope to have you and your family back at our hotel soon!   At your service,

Summary: I chose this hotel because the price and ratings.  I knew it was an older hotel.  You could see the upgrades in the  bathroom. It was quiet.  We needed help with the TV a man was there in minutes.  They held our bags, help with a cab.
Manager Response: Dear scots384,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We are so happy that you noticed our efforts to receive the best reviews,. Summary: Great hotel. Great price. Right on resort bus route. Clean. Great staff. Couldn't ask for more. It's a bit farther away but why pay $50-100 more just to be in walking distance when the bus system can stop right at your hotels door.

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Who needs to be right next door to Walt's place when the busses get you there and you can stay cheaper?
Summary: Great hotel. Who needs to be right next door to Walt's place when the busses get you there and you can stay cheaper? A nice hotel. Clean and right on the ART bus route. Just parked the car and onto the bus for days at Disney. What more do you need?

Summary: The hot breakfast is excellent as always.  We like coming back to this location every year, because of the price, location, free parking, and the delicious breakfast.  Your staff is very pleasant and nice to deal with.

Summary Heading: Good value but some short comics.

Unable to connect to power at the desk in the main room and had to disconnect clock to power items at the bedside table.  Suite has a bunk bed for kids which is find for children but a bit small for adults.  Easy to get power at the kids table.  Separate TVs for main and kids room.
Manager Response: Dear mussatto,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience at our hotel with us. We are also looking into equipping all of our rooms with new lamps that have multiple electrical and usb charging sockets to ensure we have ample power connections! We hope to create another positive and enjoyable experience on your future stay, please call us directly for a repeat guest 15% discount!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Clean Rooms, Family Friendly!
Summary: We had a great stay! We checked in late and the staff was very friendly. We were even able to buy Disneyland tickets for my Mom who came with us last minute. The separate room for the kiddos was AMAZING! I wish all hotels did that! The rooms were clean and it's super close to Disneyland and the ART Shuttle picks up and drops off right outside of the main office! I highly recommend he Stanford! Especially if you're traveling with kids!!!
Manager Response: Dear Amy V,  We are incredibly grateful for your 5 star review! Thank you so much! We absolutely pride ourselves on providing warm welcome check in! See you soon,

Summary: This hotel is AWESOME! The beds are so comfy and the comforter, I'm missing it already. Everything was very clean and it never got too loud even though we were right next to a stairwell. Did I mention the amazing breakfast they had? Waffles, sausage, scrambled eggs, 4 types of cereal, potatoes o'brien, yogurt, bagels, toast, juice, coffee, and tea. I am very excited to stay at the Sanford Inn again soon!
Manager Response: Dear heresthesunrise,  Thank you for your awesome review! We are delighted to hear you found our beds and bedding extremely comfortable! The breakfast is definitely one of the biggest hits at our hotel, who doesn't like an upgraded free hot breakfast?! We cannot wait to have you back so please call us directly for a repeat guest discount!!   See you soon,

Summary: This is the third time my family has stayed here. We love it. It's the perfect distance away from Disney, the staff is always friendly and welcoming, the breakfast is a great value, and the facilities are beautiful.

I highly recommend the Stanford Inn for families who need that extra room and bathroom. Summary Heading: Overall great stay, especially off season
Summary: I wrote a nice long review before it got lost when I had to reset my password.  So, here is the condensed version.   Beds, very comfortable with good pillows and nice comforters. I'd like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the cleanliness of the room and not having sufficient towels at the pool. We strive to provide a most perfect experience to each of our guests and we were unable to provide this to you, please forgive us. We will ensure these areas of concern are thoroughly addressed by our management team to ensure they do not happen again. We hope you give us another opportunity when staying in Anaheim, and rest assured we promise you a perfect stay with us!  Best regards,

Summary: If you're going to Disney and want a great room at a great price, stay HERE! Snatched-up the room for $117 down from $185 regular price. Summary Heading: Great way to wind down after a day in the parks!
Summary: We got a great deal from Get Away Today but we were nervous about the distance from the park before arriving. Took all of 2 minutes to check in and get settled. The room we stayed in was a 2 Queen and it was spacious for 2 adults and a toddler. We rented our stroller from One Stop Mobility and there was still plenty of walking and moving room inside. The beds are definitely more on the firm side and feel more like a "full" size bed rather than a "queen". The pool and hot tub are open late which is great to relieve sore legs and feet! The daily breakfast is very good, (waffles, pancakes, toast, bagels, eggs, sausage, potatoes, oatmeal, yogurt, cereal, fruit, juice, milk, coffee) but the dining areas are pretty small. The ART shuttles (route 1 and route 2) pick up/drop off

Summary: This hotel was very close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. We enjoyed using the shuttle service to Disney. Our room was clean and the front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and will definitely return. The location was ideal for us. We walked to Disneyland several times, we went to Target and got food for lunches while we were there. There are a variety of food places near by and an ice cream parlour next door. Ample parking was provided which was great. The rooms are lovely, clean and spacious. The TV had many channels available which was nice after a long day. The breakfast was exceptional. The Kitchen staff did an amazing job, they provided eggs, sausage and potatoes and then we could make our own pancakes and waffles. There was also bagels, yogurt and cereal available, it all made a great start to the day. The best thing was that we when checked in we could help ourselves to a hot cup of tea, a rare find in the USA.

Summary Heading: Very nice and economical place to stay

The dining room is small and so therefore a bit crowded but there is a nice little patio right outside the dining room which is very nice and comfortable. Shuttle picks you up right at front of the hotel - passes can be purchased at hotel and charged to your room if need be. Will definitely stay here again.

But when we returned we found that they had reused at least one of our previously used towels (it had a very specific stain on it), and while we had placed it on the floor as dirty, they folded it and put it back on the rack as clean. We were pretty grossed out. In the hotels defense, we didn't complain to the front desk so they had no opportunity to fix it. I'm a pretty flexible and laid back person and I was on vacation so I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt.... Plus I went on vacation to go to Disneyland, not to sleep in a hotel the

Summary: We visited Disney for my son's 25th Birthday. Disney's literally down the street. At most, 15 minute walk. if you don't want to walk, ART stops right in front of hotel. During our stay of 6 days, 5 nights, he was doing tons of laundry, as well as maintenance. I Informed FD after 9 at night, that our TV wouldn't work, but it could wait until following day, maintenance was there in less than 5 minutes. Front desk was very helpful, as well. I Would stay again & recommend. Thank you Stanford staff!!

We checked in that evening at 10:30 pm after getting back from the park. Our feet were so sore we decided to buy 2 ART transit
Manager Response: Dear sandracC2789FB,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review and for choosing Stanford Inn. We're glad you were able to enjoy every part of our hotel. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, especially if your planning a day out in Disneyland. It brings us joy our staff was able to provide excellent service. It's always recommended to ride on the shuttle for that reason. Please don't hesitate to call the front desk, were here to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Our staff will look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warms Regards

Summary: Room was very clean and nicely updated. The bed was ok. The pillows were aweful, so small my head would roll off the side when I moved. Breakfast was ok, could use a few healthier choices. Close to Disneyland. The front desk staff was very nice. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Krystal M,  Thank you for the honest feedback about your stay here at Stanford Inn. We apologize about the pillows, we will keep that in consideration. Our team in every department cares about each guest. Hopefully we will have another chance to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely

Summary: Great customer service, very helpful and knowledgeable, clean comfy rooms, quiet area so we got great sleep and rested well, tasty free breakfast, beautiful calm garden area w/ a water fountain: kids enjoyed it
Manager Response: Dear Yuliya S.  We are absolutely delighted to read about you stay at Stanford Inn. We are so pleased that you enjoyed the guest services and the free breakfast. We all hope that you will come and stay with us again in the near future.   Sincerely

Summary Heading: Great room great location and great complimentary breakfast!!!
Summary: The Jr suite we stayed in was great!! Very spacious with a couch that turns into a bed! Free parking and complementary breakfast was great !! I would definitely stay here again! The room was very clean and beds were comfortable
Manager Response: Dear orozcomar83,  We appreciate the kind review on Tripadvisor regarding your stay here at Stanford Inn. Our jr suite is great and very spacious, perfect for families. We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon to our property.  Best Regards

Summary: We loved this place. The staff are really friendly and helpful. The rooms are nice and comfortable and breakfast is yummy. The bus that goes to Disneyland stops right outside of the hotel and if you need groceries there is a target within walking distance. If we are lucky enough to visit disney land again we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca B,  Thank you for your review and compliments! We are honored and delighted to be your choice when visiting Anaheim. We're glad you were able to enjoy what our property has to offer, the ART Shuttle is a great way to transport to and from the Disneyland Parks! Our team certainly looks forward to welcome you back, hopefully soon!  Sincerely

Summary: Excellent service and accommodations.  The free breakfast, wifi and parking make it especially worth it, as well as the excellent room prices.  I would recommend Stanford Inn and Suites to anyone who asks where to stay near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review on Tripadvisor! We like to encourage our team to reach higher in our service in order to provide every guest with a memorable experience. we hope we were able to grant that with your stay. Next time you're in the area please give us a call directly and we can offer you a Repeat Guest Discount!  Sincerely

Summary: Stayed at the Stanford Inn for a weekend getaway to Disney.  It's a motel that has been nicely refurbished.  It is conveniently located on Harbor Dr.   The ART bus stop is right in front of the motel,  it's $5/person for an all day pass and it takes about 15 minutes to get to Disney.  There is also a Target less than half a mile down the road if you need to make a quick trip to the store.    The rooms are clean and well maintained.  Only small complaint is the room was very dark with only two small lamps that provide little lighting at night. Best part about the room is definitely the shower head!  That thing was amazing!    They offer a free hot breakfast in the mornings.  Get there early!!! Our first morning we were up and down there by 7 am.  Got in and out no problem.  The
Manager Response: Dear CaribDiegan,  Thank you for your awesome review, we really appreciate any feedback. We're glad you enjoyed the stores that are walking distance, that's always a plus to have! We really recommend guest to get to breakfast early to avoid the rush later. We hope to have you back soon.  Best Regards

Summary: We stay here a month ago Loved it we had easy access to restaurants and shopping. And transportation the Staff was very friendly and helpful they made our stay feel like home. The complimentary breakfast was great just enough to get your day started. Thank You
Manager Response: Dear Susan R,  Thank you for taking the time to update us about your recent stay here at Stanford Inn. We're glad you enjoy the wonderful restaurants near-by, but most important that our staff was able to provided that warm home feeling. We hope to be your first choice when visiting Anaheim.  Thanks again

Summary: Good location to visit Disney and LA. The hotel has an ART stop right next to it, if one wants to avoid the hassle of parking at disney. The room is spacious, and has a sofa cum bed, so one ends up with a king sized bed and a queen sized bed in the same room - grat value for money !
Manager Response: Dear mehtakartik,  Thank you for the review, we truly appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your opinion about your recent stay. We are glad you enjoyed your room! If you're in the area please give us a call directly and we can offer you a repeat guest discount.  Thank you

Summary: We stayed there for Disneyland and Loved having bunk beds for the kids! Totally worth it! Having the separate rooms and bathrooms were so nice for adults and the kids. The breakfast was very good as well. And the swimming pool
Manager Response: Dear CandiceJackman,  Thank you for your review and compliments. Here at the Stanford Inn and Suites we strive to be the best to please our guest. We are glad to have made your stay memorable.  Sincerely

Summary: Couldn't be happier! So glad we chose this hotel, clean as could be, great breakfast and pool.  Great location, friendly staff. Live the room set up ! We will stay here agin.  Much cleaner than some of the other "good neighbor hotels".
Manager Response: Dear 895natalie,  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay here at Stanford Inn, your feedback will encourage our team to reach higher in our service to provide every guest with the best guest experience possible. Next time you decide to book with us, call us directly and we can offer you the Repeat Guest Discount.  Best Regards

Summary: This is my third time staying here. The 2 bed 2 bath suite is awesome, clean and roomy. The price is great. My kids love the bunk beds and their own private space. The bus picks you up in front of the hotel for the park. The staff is great and are always willing to do whatever they can to make your stay amazing. The breakfast buffet is good and they have done a great job of adding more space to make sure all guests are accommodated. I'll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear alf2929,  Thank you kindly for your honest review and for your loyalty to Stanford Inn! We are thrilled that your stay exceeded your expectations. Your kind words regarding our staff will be mentioned to our team, I'm sure they will be pleased to know the hard work they are doing is making all the difference. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!  Sincerely

Summary: The amenities i requested were excellent. The room was very well equipped with everything i needed.   Very clean and comfortable.  The breakfast was excellent, they had a variety of breakfast items. All was fresh and they even had servers assisting if needed. Very well organized.
Manager Response: Dear rto2016,  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your recent stay. Here at Stanford Inn we do our best to make each and everyone of our guest feel at home. We hope that you will choose us again anytime you are in the area!  Best Regards

Summary Heading: Clean and well-located hotel in Anaheim
Summary: The rooms are clean and neat, and the beds are pretty comfortable.  I upgraded to the suite with bunk beds and the kids loved having their own space.  The front desk staff are very helpful, as I asked for assistance with a few small things.  Onsite guest laundry is convenient.  Pool area is in the sun - which we loved. This is a very convenient site if participating in an event at the convention center or headed to the location attractions to play.
Manager Response: Dear MTHOTELS,  I am delighted to read that we have made you stay as comfortable and memorable as possible! We thank you kindly for your feedback and for choosing Stanford Inn. The word will be passed down about the friendly service you received, comments like yours motivate out team to keep up the great work. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely

Summary: We traveled with a sports team and had no choice about our hotel.  This was more expensive than comparable hotels closer to Disney and the convention center during the same time period. Overall the staff was friendly and accommodating, but I had to ask and retrieve toiletries that normally are in the room at check-in. Breakfast was disorganized but tasty.
Manager Response: Dear Leahivan,  Thank you for your honest review on our hotel! We are grateful for your patronage and we are glad to hear you had a clean and comfortable experience. We apologize for the lack of toiletries in the room we will improve on this and ensure we eliminate the issue. Since you are a repeat guest, please call us directly next time and book your reservation with us and receive a 15% discount to ensure you get maximum value for your money. We hope you choose us as your hotel of choice during your next Disneyland adventure!  Best regards,

Summary Heading: Loved my stay at Stanford Inn & Suites
Summary: I love that the room's are clean and comfortable. And the breakfast is awesome,  I tell  all my family member's about this hotel. Between the price and the breakfast, this is the best place to stay with your family. I took 7 family member's, and we all were very comfortable in there biggest suite. I have stayed here at least 4 times now. And always have a great stay. I will be back next year for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Sally B,  Thank you for sharing your review with us! We are thankful for the valuable feedback you have provided us. We are glad to hear we could make another loyal customer happy once again, this is the goal with every guest walking through our doors whether it be the first or 5th time they have visited us. Please call us as soon as you can to book your reservation in advance and receive a 15% repeat guest discount. Thank you again for sharing your experience and until next time!  Sincerely,

Summary: Excellent choice. Great location, plentiful breakfast, friendly staff, great rate for location of hotel. I appreciated utilizing the shuttle to access Disneyland and the nearby Convention Center for our group. The pool area was small, but clean and useful.
Manager Response: Dear HLAY,  Thank you so much for your amazing review! We are ecstatic to receive such a short but great review none the less. You have described our hotel in a nutshell, great rooms, great location, great price, friendly staff and free breakfast to boot! We hope you come back next year and stay with us to have another great experience, we are always looking for ways to improve our hotel and service. Until next time!   Best regards,

Summary: I feel a little sad at giving them the 5 stars they deserve because this little known gem on the same street as Disneyland is sure to get more attention and be harder for us to book going forward because it is so popular! We have stayed here multiple times over the past 4 years because it has been such a great experience. it's just the right amount of clean, comfort, accessibility, and friendly staff that a family can enjoy.  We have loved staying at the Stanford and plan to come back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear jtheo2016,  Thank you for telling us about your great stay with us! There is nothing better than receiving a review like this to assure us that we are doing what we are passionate about the right way! We love providing value for your buck in the form of a clean comfortable room, friendly service at an affordable price. Please call us directly next time and let us know you are a repeat guest to receive a 15% discount. We can't wait to see you again.  Yours truly,

Summary: This is a great room for the price. Rooms  are exactly as they appear on the internet. Cute decor, friendly staff. A little further from Disneyland than I expected, however bus service is available for a fee.
Manager Response: Dear sarrahd2016,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay with us! We are excited to hear you enjoyed your room and our friendly service. Thank you for choosing our property, we hope to be able to accommodate you on your next trip to the most magical place on earth!  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed in a nice family suite with bunk bed for kids and two queen beds in an adjoining room and two bathrooms. The rooms were very basic, but comfortable and great for the price. Breakfast was great with scrambled eggs, sausage, waffle makers, pancake makers, bagels, cereal, yogurt, and more. It is in a good location and the shuttle comes every 20 minutes to go to Disneyland. Tickets can be purchased there too, which was very convenient. The pool is nice but small. There is also a laundry room. Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear John A,  Thank you for your wonderful review! You definitely enjoyed the simple perks of staying at our hotel which is a comfortable room, all the free amenities you require, for a great price with a good breakfast to start your day at Disneyland!  We appreciate your comments and your feedback is what helps us improve and continue to provide great guest experiences consistently. We hope to see you back soon!  With warm regards,

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel! Friendly, helpful staff. Good breakfast. Good location and the shuttle picks up right in front of the hotel. When we first arrived we had to switch rooms from the 2nd floor to the 1st floor and we left a bag in the first room that contained all of our reservation and Disneyland ticket information. We searched for the paperwork and came up empty handed, I went to the front desk the clerk said housekeeping found our bag and they were on their way to our room to return it. We were so thankful. We had a wonderful visit and will return!
Manager Response: Dear zacklisa1999,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor about your stay here at Stanford Inn. We train our staff to be honest and respectful. We are pleased to hear everything got back on track and you enjoyed Disneyland. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future and wish you a very nice week!  Best Regards

Summary: We stayed in the two bathroom family suite for 2 nights.  I would stay here again at the discounted rate.  The rooms were clean and plenty of space for our family of 5.  At breakfast they serve eggs, waffles, pancakes, sausage and a variety of breads and cereals. It was good to have a hot breakfast to start our day before Disneyland.  I will say it is not walking distance from Disneyland but it is a short 2 mile drive.  They do have the bus that arrives every 20 minutes at all the hotels but it stops transporting people 30 minutes after the park closes. The front desk was helpful and pleasant every time we talked with them.  There is also plenty of parking unlike some of the hotels closer to Disneyland.  I think this hotel was a great value for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel S,  Thank you for your wonderful review. It's a pleasure you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. Breakfast is most important, especially when spending a magical day at Disneyland. It's a mile distances, it's doable but for the little ones we do recommend taking the shuttle, which we do sell tickets at the front desk or driving down. We would like to thank you on behalf of the whole team for you kindness and we hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you at Stanford Inn soon!  Sincerely

Summary: Clean room and great friendly and helpful staff...good location within walking distance to many restaurants of all kinds. It is a 15 minute walk to Disneyland or a little bit shorter to the convention center
Manager Response: Dear Bks777,  I am very pleased to read that we provided you a great stay. If there was anything we could have done to make your stay better please let us know. I hope we will be able to host you on your next trip to the Anaheim area.  Best Regards

Summary Heading: Great for those planning to drive into Disneyland
Summary: The room was great, free parking and breakfast are a major bonus only downside is the location isn't close enough to walk to disneyland. Kids enjoyed their room and our beds were comfortable. Mini fridge and microwave were a plus.
Manager Response: Dear L9422ERjennifera,  Thank you for sharing your review with the world! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our property. We value your comments and use them to continually improve our hotel to better suit our guests. We are glad you enjoyed the free amenities and the comfortable beds we offer, it sure is nice to be able to relax comfortably after a long day at Disneyland! While you can definitely walk to Disneyland, you are right we are not the closest hotel but the ART shuttle that takes you to Disneyland is conveniently located right in front of our lobby! Please come back soon and mention you are a repeat guest for a 15% discount!   Best regards,

Summary: Very good hotel, excellent, friendly staff, good breakfast options. Although we were just two oldtimers, looked great for families as well. About a half hour walk to Disneyland. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear jbrown20,  Thank you so much for your kind review. I was very pleased to read that we provided you a memorable stay when visiting the happiest place on earth! Here at Stanford Inn our staff strive to service our guest to the maximum. I hope we will have the honor to host you on your next trip.  Sincerely

Summary: It's convenient to Disney. And the park and breakfast are all free. Unfortunately the tickets of Disney they sold is no any discount. Tickets sold by the hotel is the same with the ones sold by disney wedsite.   It is too expensive.
Manager Response: Dear shan759033,  Thank you for your honest feedback. We're delighted you enjoyed the free breakfast! Unfortunately about the Disneyland tickets, for the one day park tickets they are sold same as the park. For the two day, three day, and four day tickets we do offer a discount. Also the benefit of purchasing the tickets at the front desk you don't spend all the magic waiting in the long ticket line. We hope to have you visit us soon.  Sincerely

Summary: Service by front desk was on point.  The room was average. I would stay again but only at a discounted rate.  Location to park worked for it being last minute.  Best part was free parking and bus to park was awesome.
Manager Response: Dear shierrap,  Thank you for choosing Stanford Inn as your last minute rest stop. I am pleased that you found our staff to be attentive and friendly. Next time you're planning a trip to Disneyland, or just to the area give us a call directly so we can offer you a Repeat Guest Discount. I sincerely thank you for your thoughtfulness.  Thank you

Summary: Enjoyed my stay while visiting Disneyland. Rooms are clean. Staff was always helpful. Breakfast is simple, but substantial. Helps when you travel with a family on a budget. The Anaheim Resort Transit bus stops right in front of the hotel and takes you directly to the Disneyland gates. A pass can be ordered in advance through ART online. It is a big savings doing it that way and can be delivered to the hotel without charge. Parking and Wi-Fi is included in your room charge. Several eating establishments within walking distance. Also a Target three blocks away. I really appreciated the in-room microwave and refrigerator. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear epresley142,  What a wonderful review. We appreciate you for taking the time to share your fantastic experience here at the Stanford Inn. We hope we made your stay as memorable as possible. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you back soon.  Best Regards

Summary: Fantastic family hotel. Beds are a bit hard and I wish there were more chairs so my kids could eat in the room . We stayed in room 114, which was very quiet and away from traffic. Top floor is frustrating for people with strollers, so request a bottom floor room if you have a stroller.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica B,  Thank you for sharing your honest review with us! We are very happy to hear you enjoyed our family room as it is always our goal to provide a great stay with every one of our guests. We will look into adding additional chairs in the room as well as looking into the bed to ensure it is more than adequate. Thank you for your tips to our potential guests, we hope to see you soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: The room had a weird smell. The bathroom light only worked part of the time. My son had an allergic reaction to the super cheap hotel shampoo. And the worst part was breakfast started at 7:00. What kind of Disneyland hotel doesn't serve breakfast early enough to get you there by opening, let alone our magic morning.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good value and decent/clean accommodations. Rooms are very simple, but the bed was quite comfortable and we liked this. Fitness center is basically non-existent and this frustrated me a bit as it's one of the reasons I booked the hotel (No weights and 2 terrible treadmills). If you have kids and a budget I'd highly recommend this for the value as one the hotels to pick. The free continental breakfast was good and saved us tons of $$$ for the park. You will need a bus pass though, but it's worth it!
Manager Response: Dear scottbT2205HL,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel The Stanford Inn and Suites. We definitely are family friendly and our family suites are one of the guests' favorite. We do apologize for the inconvenience, but we are looking into improving our offered amenities, such as the fitness room, for our valued guests. We take every review serious and we do our best to work through the problems for a better and more excellent stay. We hope you could give us another opportunity. See you soon.  Best regards.

Summary: The Stanford is a good quality yet affordable hotel within walking distance to Disneyland Resorts. The room & amenities are clean & presentable. The staff were pleasant & helpful. Breakfast options & quality were just okay & could be improved. Overall a positive experience.
Manager Response: Dear campdw73,  We appreciate your kind words about your recent stay here at Stanford Inn. Every one of our staffs tries his or her best to meet and exceed guests expectations. We look forward to see you again in the near future! Next time your interested in booking a room give us a call directly so we can offer a repeat guest discount!  Thank you

Summary: There was hair in towels. The sinks were clogged and smelled so bad from whatever was clogged in them.  The roll-away bed was basically thinly covered springs, not to mention we had to pay extra for it.  And the bathroom smelled like urine.
Manager Response: Dear 807paigel,  We appreciate your honest review about your recent stay. We apologize for the room not being in its proper fashion. We will direct this issue to the housekeeping manager. This kind of action on our part is unacceptable. We hope you give our hotel another chance.  Thank you and again we apologize.

Summary Heading: perfect location for a great price
Summary: I was looking for a last minute (and super-affordable) room near Disneyland and this location was perfect. The staff was friendly, parking was convenient, the room was spacious and clean, my picky 5-year old enjoyed the breakfast selections, and checking in/out was very easy.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awsome! Great service and perfect for family get a way.
Summary: I wish breakfast was ealier in the morning so you could get to the parks earlier on early ticket days. other than that no complaints. Everything was awsome! Service was great and pool was relaxing. I would stay in this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear foxracejones,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay with the Stanford Inn & Suites. We are happy to hear you had an awesome stay, as this is what we strive to achieve with every guest that visits our hotel. We are currently adjusting the breakfast hours to better suit our guests thanks to your feedback. We take pride in providing excellent service with a room that has value for your buck. We hope to see you back at our hotel on your next Disneyland trip!  With warm regards,

Summary: The Stanford in was close to Disneyland and convenient. The ride to Disneyland on the art was short and easy. The hotel has free breakfast free Wi-Fi and free parking. Discounted Disneyland tickets and our passes can be bought at the desk.  The room was clean and comfortable and it was a quiet hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for sharing your great experience with the world! We cannot be grateful enough for the feedback you gave us as it lets us know we are doing things right. We are glad you were able to enjoy our hotel's amenities and the convenience of selling discounted tickets here on property without having to wait in line! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.   Yours truly,

Summary: Always clean,great breakfast and the people are really nice. Fees are as they are no extra charge unless room revices used. I highly recomend this Inn to any one who is looking for a  family friendly hotel
Manager Response: Dear Tebaguti,  Thank you for your awesome review! We are beyond happy to hear we made a great impression with you as our guest. We definitely are family friendly and our family suites are one of the guests' favorite. Please call us directly next time and receive a repeat guest discount when staying with us! We hope to see you back soon.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: A place to sleep of your going to Disneyland
Summary: The breakfast doesn't vary at all. It is sausage and eggs every day no variety. The pool was not heated. Or first room smelled very strong either of cleaning agent or perfume that had been spilled. We asked to move and they were very good at accommodating us. Second room was an average room. They kept the room clean could have changed the bag on the ice bucket every day. It has a nice fridge and microwave. Would stay here in a pinch but would pinch but would prefer some where a little nicer.
Manager Response: Dear Josh B,  Thank you for your honest feedback about your recent stay here at the Stanford Inn. We apologize for the breakfast, we recently added the sausage and egg just to see how it goes.  You comments do help us to better out services. We hope you do give our hotel another chance. Once again we are sorry about any inconveniences you have encountered.  Best Regards.

Summary Heading: A must stay for families on a budget
Summary: We stayed for 7 nights in the family room which had 2 queens and a set of bunks. This was a welcome relief for the kids (13 & 11) to have their own room and own beds. Naturally great for us too to shut the door and watch some TV. Whilst the room was clean and well serviced daily, it had an odour in the kids room, perhaps a mishap from a previous visitor. It didn't bother us, just being picky, turn the A/c on and the odour went.  The location is excellent and only a 15-20 minute walk to Disney too. Whilst the bus stop is right out the front, and that worked a treat when it worked, we found the ART bus lacking in sticking to a timetable - which can be frustrating! That said it was more reliable going than returning. We walked a couple of times and it's easy, safe and enjoyable to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Satisfied. Room is clean and comfortable and there is ample parking. Staff is friendly. Location is great. But breakfast can be improve by serving more hot foods and fresh fruits. Also WiFi can't be access.
Manager Response: Dear jcastro1103,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at Stanford Inn. Your comments have been shared with our team. We apologize about the complications with the WiFi, our staff right away took care of that. We hope to have you and your family here on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best Regards

Summary: As always we stayed in the children's suite. As always we enjoyed our selves. Rooms are always clean and covered in Disney decor. The kids love the bunk beds and having their own room. The staff at the front desk are always so nice, especially my dear friend Hatel. He always has a smilie! The kitchen staff for the breakfast is always so nice in giving exactly what you asked for. Lots of bagels, bread and cereal but my favorite is always the waffles, pancake machine was a nice addition. Get there early to avoid a line for the waffles, even though they have two machines it can get busy. I have stayed in other hotels on or near Disneyland but I always return here. The parking is easy, the nice are to wait for the busy is nice and the coffee is always delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Joy932772002,  Thank you so much for your positive review. Your words will be passed down to Hetal. Each and every one of our staff are dedicated to make the most out of your stay. We are glad you enjoyed the breakfast, we do suggest waking up early to avoid the rush. I do hope that we will have the opportunity to host you on your next Disneyland trip.  I do hope we will host you here again.

Summary: Great hotel.  Lovely staff and ver helpful.  Breakfast was good but alittle unhealthy!! Hot showers were rare but the rooms were great. Very close to Disney, you can walk in 15 minutes. Lots of restaurants nearby. Good bus service too.
Manager Response: Dear Sara M,  Thank you for a great review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel as we take pride in reaching our goals of providing the best for our guests. We do apologize for the inconvenience, but we are looking into expanding a variety of healthier foods for our guests in the breakfast room. We are very lucky to be located in a well known area where we are not only close to Disneyland, but also many food establishments as to what you and your family may enjoy. We hope you allow us to host your next visit to Disneyland, but don’t forget to give us a call as we will be more than welcome to offer you our Repeat guest discount.  Best regards.

Summary: This is our 2nd stay at the Stanford Inn. Our family loves this hotel and everything it has to offer. Check in was simple and fast. We were in our room by 230pm. Beds are very comfortable. Continental breakfast was good and got the job done. Convenient location and ten minute walk from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear moniqueramirez27,   We appreciate your feedback regarding your past visit. It is important to us that you have a great experience when you stay with us. We are glad it is a convenient location and does offer a variety of activities. We invite you back again so we can create a great stay.   Best Regards.

Summary: The place was clean, nice and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was also good. Good place to stay at! When in the Disney area I recomend you stay here. Also loved the fact of the no smoking rooms!
Manager Response: Dear pjsantanaramirez,  Thank you for your good review. We are happy to hear you had an overall great experience with us, we always aim to create happy customers with every guest that comes in and out of our hotel. Don’t hesitate to give us a call on your next visit as we will be more than welcome to offer our Repeat guest discount of 15%. Thank you again and hope to hear from you soon.  Best regards.

Summary: Breakfast is hard to work through due to over crowding and long lines interfere with seating. Pool area would run out of towels.   Liked the bunk beds for the kids on suit room, provides extra space to move in the room
Manager Response: Dear kimberlysa19,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as it is our biggest tool to improve our service and product to the needs of our guests. We agree the breakfast room is definitely cozy and we are looking into ways to improve the flow of the traffic during the peak breakfast hours. We hope you give us another opportunity, we promise you will enjoy our hotel as we will make sure you have a perfect stay.  Best regards.

Summary: People there are nice and helpful, the swimming pool and jacuzzi were clean, the breakfast was amazing, the laundry was open for 24 hours, and The shuttle to Disneyland stops right in front of the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear yuki_m_sd,  Thank you for a great review. We are so delighted to hear that you found our hotel pleasurable. We take pride in giving our guests value for their money spent and we are glad you appreciate this. Give us a call on your next time around the Anaheim area and we will be more than happy to offer our Repeat Guest discount of 15%. We hope to hear from you very soon.  Best regards.

Summary: Close to Disneyland but we still drove. Shuttle $20 for family or 4   vs $18 to park with 5 min tram to entrance.   Double bed room small but if only sleeping it works. Beds are firm and pillows very hard.   Staff was nice.   We were lucky to not be in a room near breakfast area. That area is very loud with families in morning. Breakfast is crowfded elbow to elbow chaos (Monday) visit.
Manager Response: Dear Joe T,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel. We are happy to hear our staff could provide you with friendly and professional service, as we aim to provide a great experience with each guest our staff comes in contact with. We apologize for only being average, we strive to provide an exceptional experience for each of our guests. We hope you will consider us with your future adventures in Disneyland, we promise we won't let you down.  Best regards.

Summary: Perfect area, had excellent service, excellent breakfast, staff was wonderful,  pool was perfect, hot tub was relaxing,  walked to and from Disneyland. Price was reasonable. I would highly recommend staying at Stanford and Inn. And would book again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Jena H,  Thank you for your great review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and as well as enjoyed all the amenities we have to offer such as our complimentary breakfast, our warmed up pool and hot Jacuzzi. We thank you for giving us an opportunity to host you and your families stay and we hope you allow us to host your next visit around the Disneyland area.  Best regards

Summary: It was great! We loved how close it was to Disneyland. The breakfast was great. Our room was clean. The staff was very helpful and friendly. We loved that it was close to food and shops. We'd stay again on our next trip for sure.
Manager Response: Dear shareka_ben,  Thank you for informing us on your recent experience at our property. We are excited to hear you loved the hotel and it's proximity to the Disneyland parks and nearby restaurants, this is certainly a huge attraction for many of our guests. We are glad you also enjoyed the amenities our hotel has to offer! Thank you again for choosing us and please call us directly on your next trip as we offer a 15% repeat guest discount!   With warm regards,

Summary Heading: health risk if you have allergies
Summary: Do not recommend this hotel. I had an allergic reaction from the musty and moldy smell in the room. I notified the front desk and they don't care.  I paid $180 for one night and waked up with stuffy nose, swollen eyes and throat pain from the moldy room. The carpet felt squishi and dirty, maybe they had some kind of flooding.Take your money somewhere else!
Manager Response: Dear crazyhome,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We are deeply concerned with the issue you mentioned and we are looking into the matter as we speak. Your comments help us improve and ensure our guests receive the highest quality of our rooms when staying with us and we apologize for not being able to provide you with this. We hope you would consider staying with us next time, we promise we will ensure you have a perfect stay with us.   Sincerely,

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 6 nights while we visited Disneyland and other Southern Californian attractions. We didn't notice any other couple without kids, but that didn't bother us. We chose Stanford Inn and Suites because it had a great low price, but weren't sure what to expect based on some review we had read before and after booking.  When we arrived at the hotel we were greeted with friendly and helpful staff members. All other staff that we dealt with during our stay were equally pleasant.  The rooms were nice and clean, and he everything you would need. There was also a continental breakfast that includes pancakes, waffles, and sausage and eggs to make breakfast sandwiches with. Some days we were in the breakfast area early and it wasn't too crowded, but by about
Manager Response: Dear Bekki B.  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay with us. Your insight is extremely valuable to us and we rely on your comments to continue to improve our product and service. We are happy you chose to give us an opportunity despite your concerns and we definitely took care of you and left you a happy customer, as is the goal with each and every guest. Our staff is dedicated on ensuring you have a pleasant stay and we are passionate about providing you with any assistance you may require during your stay. We hope to see you on your upcoming visit to Anaheim, please be sure to call us directly to receive a 15% repeat guest discount!  Best regards,

Summary: The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5, was due to the Jacuzzi was not warm and the distance to Disney land was not correct. We had to use the shuttles, which was fine but we had planned on walking. Everything else was GREAT!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at The Stanford. Our room was clean, quiet and the beds super comfortable. Perfect after long days in the park. All the staff were so kind and helpful. The breakfast had a good selection and the staff were quick to restock and super accommodating. A great pool and comfy chaise lounges to soak up some sun. The ART bus stopped right outside the hotel which made park access easy at any hour.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for families close to disneyland
Summary: We arrived after midnight and front desk greeted us quickly and we were in our suite in no time at all. We had a two bedroom, two bathroom suite for a family of 5. The room was clean and tidy and in the morning had a breakfast provided. The breakfast room did become quite busy but if you there early can grab waffles, pancakes, toast and cereals and sit inside or outs you cook your own waffles and pancakes but it easy to do. Yoghurts, juices and tea/coffee also provided.  We had a quick breakfast as heading out to disneyland and California adventure. The bus to the theme parks were right out the front. Was $5 per adult per day for all day pass. Saves the walk or finding your own parking. I had ordered online some things from the disneyland website and arranged for it to be
Manager Response: Dear Tracey O,  We are delighted to hear that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us at Stanford Inn and Suites. It was nice to hear that you and your family enjoyed the breakfast and the facilities. Our staff work exceptionally hard to make sure every guest feels special. Thank you so much for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Have a wonderful day!

Summary: From Las Vegas. Took my 5yr old nephew on vacation. 1st time away from his parents.  He felt comfortable at the hotel. Also a picky eater, loved everything and ate everything we had for breakfast. Very satisfied ! Home away from home
Manager Response: Dear valuable guest,  Thank you for a great review! We are pleased to hear that you and your nephew enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We as a team try to reach our goals of having a "Feel like home," family friendly environment. We hope you can bring the whole family around on your next vacation to Disneyland. Don't forget to give us a call and let us know you are a Repeat guest and we will be more than happy to provide you with 15% discount.  Best regards

Summary: Nest and Carla were very helpful and friendly, overall it was a good stay although the beds were not very comfortable but convenient location and a good price was good the free parking is awesome most of the other hotels charge you for parking.
Manager Response: Dear grisserrano,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. We are happy to hear that our staff could accommodate to your needs, we will pass on the word to our staff that we are doing the job as we are suppose to. We do apologize for the inconvenience with our beds, we will take your comment into consideration. Thank you again for your business and we hope you allow us to host your next stay around the Anaheim area.  Best regards

Summary: Very comfortable.  Loved the mickey mouse sheets.  A little loud.  Guests were noisy in the parking lot. Could have some healthier choices for breakfast.  Pool and hot tub are nice. Staff is very friendly
Manager Response: Dear Margie M,  Thank you for a good review. We do our best to focus on little details that makes for a wonderful experience for our guests. We took your review in consideration and we will do our best for the noise and looking into improving our breakfast room choices. We hope you allow us to host your next time around the area. Don't forget to give us a call that you are a repeat guest and we will be more than welcome to offer a 15% discount.  Best regards

Summary: I enjoyed my stay and the size of the room. I really enjoyed the extra kids room with extra bathroom. I was satisfied with the pool and laundry room. I only wished the breakfast room was bigger since it was constantly busy from the 6-9am time it was open. No one could hardly move around to get what they need.
Manager Response: Dear naenae4,  Thank you for your great review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel and the amenities we have to offer our guests such as the heated pool, the laundry room and the complimentary breakfast. We do apologize about the breakfast room, we take our guests feedback very serious and we have been looking into making changes. We hope we are the first choice on your next visit around the Disneyland area!  Best regards

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay for Disney Trip
Summary: A very decent place to stay that was quiet and clean.  The front desk staff were super friendly and helpful.  Loved the complimentary breakfast. Plus, the ART shuttle stops right in front of the hotel. We had a great experience.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear michaelph2016,  Thank you for your great review! We are pleased to hear you had a great experience staying here with us. We take pride in providing the best for our valued guests. We are lucky to have the ART bus stop right in front of the hotel and we are glad to hear you and your family did take advantage of it. Hopefully on your next visit to Disneyland you will allow us to host your stay. Don't forget to give us a call and we will be more than happy to offer a 15% discount as a Repeat guest.  Best regards

Summary: Overall the place was not bad, however for 20 dollars more a night we could have stayed directly across from the park. The pillows were small, I almost went to target and bought my own pillow. Breakfast was decent, they even offer sausage and eggs.
