But breakfast doesn't start until 7 , some people like to get started early so maybe starting breakfast at 6 would be nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Highly recommend clean nice little pool and hot tub great breakfast with room,if you needed extra towels they came right away if there was something wrong they fixed it right know if possible for the money good value
Manager Response: Dear geraldh803,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on the Stanford Inn. It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the free amenities we have to offer to our guests such as the pool and our complimentary breakfast. We look after our guests and provide the best customer service so you and your family can enjoy a calm, relaxed vacation. We hope you come back to the Stanford Inn on your next visit around the area!  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Great rooms available for large families
Summary: Loved the nice, comfortable, appealing rooms that can accommodate families of more than 4. Pool opened until 11 which allows us more time to soak after walking all day at theme parks. Great customer service! Just to arrived to discover our future neighbors complaining of us passing her room as we loaded our belonging into our room. Front desk moved us asap! Saved us from a nerve racking vacation!! Thank you !!!
Manager Response: Dear christina757,  Thank you for your great review on the Stanford Inn. We are glad to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Our team takes great pride in providing wonderful guest service and we will pass on the word that we are getting the job done. Thank you again for taking the time to write a review and we hope to hear from you and your family soon on your next visit around the area!  Best regards

Summary: The one star goes to the pleasant staff.  I don't know what I wasn't seeing that everyone else was.  On entering our room it was dark and smelt badly and the carpets were filthy and there were flies in our room and the drains smelt when we ran the tap.  5 Minutes after arriving at our room the Reception desk called to ask how we liked our room.  We explained that we didn't like it at all and it wasn't what we were expecting considering it was rated 13th on tripadvisor but were told that they didn't have another room to move us to.  We couldn't open our safe so decided to go to Reception to ask how it worked but at the same time I said how disappointed I was with it and could we please check out after one night as we'd paid for two in advance but were told this wasn't possible
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place was clean, the people were friendly, the room was up to date and overall everything was nice including  the free breakfast. It is not far from Disney but I would recommend taking the bus because you are going to do a lot of walking at Disney.
Manager Response: Dear picky328,  Thank you for your good review. We are more than happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and as well as the amenities we have to offer, such as our complimentary breakfast. We hope to have you return and allow us to host your next visit to Disneyland. Don't forget to give us a call and let us know you're a returning guest and we will be more than welcome to offer a 15% Repeat guest discount.  Best regards

Summary: Couldn't beat the price of the room for how big it was. Especially being in close proximity to Disneyland. I'd recommend it to anyone & I'd definitely would stay there again. Breakfast was also a win! One less meal I had to pay for. Lol 5 star in my book.
Manager Response: Dear chasitys07,  I am thrilled you enjoyed your stay here at Stanford Inn. We are glad that our location was a great suit for the Disneyland Parks. We look forward to having you join us again. Next time your in Anaheim area be sure to call us so we can offer a Repeat Guest Discount.  Thank you!

Summary: The staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was very adequate for the price. The close proximity to Disneyland was very convenient. The breakfast was included in the hotel price and that was definitely a plus. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Place - Great Location - Great Price !!
Summary: This was a real find.  We had 6 of us in the 2-room suite.  Great 'cuz we could all be together and still have 2 bathrooms!!..,And way cheaper than booking 2 separate rooms anywhere around.  Comfy, clean, close to Disney - with shuttle right out front.  Breakfast was good too!! Next time I go to Disneyland - I'm calling Stanford Inn & Suites!
Manager Response: Dear Eileen M,  Thank you for your honest review on TripAdvisor, we appreciate your kind words. I am glad to hear that our staff made your trip magical while visiting Disneyland! Here at the Stanford Inn &Suites, we strive to make each of our guest and their families feel welcomed. We look forward to having you stay with us in the future.  Thank you again

Summary Heading: Great room, great price, great service
Summary: This was the best deal in Anaheim - the room was huge, clean, and reasonably priced.  Breakfast was outstanding and the service was the best from every employee on the property, especially Ness Cua.  If we make back this will definitely be the first place I check for a vacancy.
Manager Response: Dear Barnumvisitor,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay here at Stanford Inn. Our team takes great pride in providing wonderful guest service. We will definitely pass on the word to Ness! Thanks again, for staying with us and we look forward to giving you another wonder experience on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The breakfast offers many choices including pancakes, waffles, cereals and bagels. The breakfast room is a good size. Staff is friendly and helpful. Free self parking is a huge plus! Rooms are spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Dear cadillacandchevy,  Thank you so much for sharing your review with us! We are excited to hear our breakfast suited your needs and you enjoyed it. We are also glad to hear you enjoyed our friendly customer service on top of our free parking which is not too common in the Disneyland area! Thank you for your great review, please come back soon our spacious clean rooms will be awaiting your return!  Best regards,

Summary: Good bang for your buck.   The staff was so friendly and helpful. Close to Disneyland.  The complimentary breakfast was very good although a little more variety in the entrée choices would be nice.  After staying for three or four days, the menu needs a change.
Manager Response: Dear Allen,  Thank you for sharing your review with us! We are beyond happy with your first statement, which embodies the Stanford Inn Hotel Philosophy, and that is receiving bang for your buck! We will look into infusing our menu with variety as it can certainly get repetitive for our long term guests. Your feedback is essential to allowing us to continue to provide value for your money spent and we will take action based on your feedback. Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Like the Mickey decor on the wall
Summary: This hotel is great location to the Toy Story parking area. It only took 3 minutes to drive there. It too far to walk to Disneyland. Staff was nice. The breakfast was good with apples, yogurt, cereal, eggs, sausage, bagels, toast, oatmeal and make your own waffles. The room was cute with Mickey Mouse decor on the wall. You could tell they updated the rooms and they looked nice. Room had a lot space and was clean. Beds were ok, pillows were small. The room smelled musty, which carried into our clothes and when we got home and opened our bags that's all we could smell.  The parking was bad for us because we come back late from the parks. The first night I had to park behind the hotel at 1am and some guy try to approach me. Thank goodness they have the gate to lock people out. I
Manager Response: Dear Amanda9814.  Thank you so much for your detailed review. We are pleased to hear your thoughts as it provides insight on the items we can improve on to continue to create positive experiences for our guests. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and we will look into the issue and take the necessary action to rectify the issue. Thank you again for sharing your experience, please do not hesitate to call us again we assure you a positive experience at a value.   Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel is a good value but I  would suggest getting a room on the second floor. The service carts start moving around at 7am and they are very loud. Breakfast is good with a good sized dining area. Coffee not the best but the orange juice was tasty. The bread for toast was good and not dried out like most hotels bread. Its a good deal just get a room away from housekeeping.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Clean rooms, excellent service, my family Loved the breakfast bar, lots of choices, every family member found what they like. I recommend this hotel! it exceeded my expectations!
Manager Response: Dear Lina L,  Thank you for your excellent review on the Stanford Inn! We are more then happy to hear that we have exceeded you and your families expectations. We strive to provide an exceptional stay for guests to fully relax and enjoy while in Disneyland.We hope to host your stay next time around the Anaheim area. Don't forget to give us a call and let us know you're a returning guest and we will be more than welcome to offer a 15% discount. See you soon.  Best regards.

Summary: Free parking, breakfast and Wi-Fi.  Avg accommodations for the price.  Front desk staff were very helpful, friendly & professional.  We were in a room that was just off of Harbor Ave so it was noisy when AC wasn't running.
Manager Response: Dear Paca-coin,  Thank you so for telling us about your recent stay at the Stanford Inn Anaheim! We are happy to hear our staff could provide you with friendly and professional service, as we aim to provide a great experience with each guest our staff comes in contact with. We apologize for only being average, we strive to provide an exceptional experience for each of our guests. We hope you will consider us with your future adventures in Disneyland, we promise we won't let you down!   Yours Truly,

Summary: Very friendly and clean. Room was very spacious.  Nice to have two separate rooms and bathrooms. Staff was great.  Plenty of free parking and short drive to Disneyland. No complaints and can't wait to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon L,  Thank you so much for your awesome review! We are glad you had a pleasant experience with us at a bang for your buck! We pride ourselves in offering value for your money's worth with the free breakfast and amenities such as free wifi and free parking as well so you can fully enjoy your stay in Anaheim. We cannot wait to have you back as a repeat guest, please give us a call and we will offer you a 15% discount, just mention you are a repeat guest!  Sincerely,

Summary: everything was great, helpful staff and very clean rooms.  Loved it!  we spent two days at Disneyland, and it was easy to get to and from the park, the buss picked us up right in front of the hotel.  we will come back soon.
Manager Response: Dear tonydragavon,  Thank you for sharing your great experience with the world! We are beyond happy to hear your family thoroughly enjoyed their vacation and accommodations while visiting Disneyland. Please call us directly next time you are in town and receive a 15% repeat guest discount, just mention you have stayed with us before! Thank you again for your patronage and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,

Summary: Very good value. We had a combo room for three nights - one 2/queen room with a second bedroom with bunk beds. Little guys will love the bunks. Both rooms have a full bathroom. VERY important for those early 'get readies'   Kids loved the Micky decorations and Dad loved the Lightning McQueen decorations.  Clean room. Housekeeping and counter staff very nice and professional. There is a shuttle (cheaper than parking in Disney - we did the math) bus that picks up right out front about every 20 minutes. It drops off right at the Disney transportation center which puts you in easy walking distance to entrance to both parks or downtown Disney. A decent breakfast is included - the normal Cereal, toast, bagel, yogurt etc with hot eggs and sausage. And the important waffle maker. Could
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for the first time.  Stayed 3 days and 3 nights.  It was a mile walk to Disney land.  However we took the city bus.  Ticket were sold in lobby.  Overall very good and spacious, the extra bedroom with bunk beds and the extra full bathroom was even better for my family of 6.  The only funny thing was that there were 2 queen bed and the bunk beds but they always only gave us 2towels for each bathroom.  Overall it was a great stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 2 nights down 1 to go and I have had 0 problems. For the price and the location it definitely an excellent hotel. The breakfast is pancakes/waffles with sausage and eggs. Complimentary breakfast of any kind that is filling is great in my kind because it saves you at least 35-40 a day for a family of 4 anywhere else. The only "problem" my wife noticed was the lighting in the room. Kind of dark but to me it was all good because during the day open the window and at night you should be ready to sleep anyway. Room has been very clean , staff has been extremely nice and check in was so easy. We also walk to DL from this hotel which is a 25 minute walk but beats the $18 parking per day at DL and the ART transportation which is $12 a day I think. Walking is free and it's only another
Manager Response: Dear David A,   Thank you for a great review on our hotel. We are more than happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We take pride in providing our guests with excellent service and as well as reaching our goal of giving you the "Feel like home" experience. We thank you for giving us an opportunity to host your stay and we hope to hear from you and your family on your next visit to Disneyland. Don't forget to give us a call and let us know you're a repeat guest!  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Helpful staff that takes pride in hotel
Summary: We traveled to Anaheim to visit Disneyland and unfortunately went during a busy convention weekend.  This was one of the last hotels available.  I was nervous to book at first, but found that the hotel is recently renovated and the staff took great care of the facility and its guests.  It had free breakfast which was great, and the front desk was really helpful to us in learning our way around.  It is about 1-2 miles from Disneyland and too far to walk after or before a day at Disney.  The conference made the ART (public transportation) really unreliable and was 40 minutes late for us both times.  Because of that I'd look for a hotel closer to Disney or with its own shuttle if that is the purpose of your trip.
Manager Response: Dear Jen G,  Thank you for sharing your experience with the world! We are glad you enjoyed the recently renovated hotel and our free amenities on top of friendly service! Our knowledgeable staff is always willing to go out of their way to ensure our guests are able to fully enjoy the city. We apologize for the ART shuttle being late, it is definitely something we will forward to the city of Anaheim so they can make adjustments and ensure the guests of Disneyland are being accommodated. Thank you for your recommendation, we hope to have you back as a guest soon!  Warm regards,

Summary: Everything was very good.  I have no complaints.  I will recommend this hotel to friends and stay here agin myself.   the beds were very comfortable, the room was clean and the convenience of having a microwave, mini refrigerator and coffee pot was extremely appreciated as we used all of them.
Manager Response: Dear calroz617,  Thank you very much for your great review! We are pleased to hear we were able to make you a happy customer, as this is the goal with each and every guest who stays at our hotel. We are also happy to hear our amenities were used and appreciated by you as we aim to provide a value for your money's worth when staying with us. We hope you were also able to enjoy the free wifi, parking and safe for your valuables at the hotel. Thank you again for staying with us and we cannot wait to have you back at our hotel!  Best regards,

Summary: I had fun and the worker in the desk were very helpful his name is ness helped us a lot. I will recommend this venue to my coworkers,family members and so forth i have a couple of pointers though: fheres a trick to lock the bathroomm door if u can figure that out youre good
Manager Response: Dear kimmyy103,  Thank you for a great review. We are glad you were a very satisfied guest, your feedback is what motivates us to continue to provide each guests with a great experience over and over again. We are also more than happy to hear our staff were very helpful during your stay. Please, with no hesitation, give us a call on your next visit and we will be more than welcome to offer you our repeat guest discount!  Best regards.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for a Disneyland vacation
Summary: The hotel staff is great, they are friendly and accommodating.  The rooms have everything you need; they are clean and have been recently updated.  My kids loved having a separate room with bunk beds.  It is within walking distance to the main Disney parking lot where the park shuttle bus is if you don’t mind crossing a main road.  Overall, we had a great vacation and this hotel was a big part of the experience we had.
Manager Response: Dear georgehK6746CH,  Thank you for writing such a thoughtful and comprehensive review about your stay. I am pleased that you found the staff to be attentive and friendly. It brings us such joy your children enjoyed the bunk beds! We try our best to please each and every family that stays at our hotel. We hope to be your first choice when planning your next trip out to Anaheim!  Thank you

Summary Heading: Great Hotel near all Disneyland hotspots !
Summary: If you need to carry heavy luggage upstairs, request ground floor room.  The full Breakfast is great for park goers or business people heading out for the day!  The rooms have plenty of charge ports for phones and computers and the staff couldn't be more helpful! Highly recommend this gem amongst the giant chains!
Manager Response: Dear downeysusa,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review on our hotel! We are more than happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and as well as taking advantage of the complimentary breakfast we offer which includes quite a variety. We do strongly apologize for the inconvenience of not having an elevator but we do take our guests thoughts, such as yourself, into consideration and we are looking into fixing things to reach our guests expectations. We hope you come visit us again soon!  Best regards.

Summary: We had a great experience! Everyone was friendly and easy to communicate with, in addition my kiddos loved the bunk beds with the Mickey Mouse sheets!  We will definitely be back to enjoy another stay.
Manager Response: Dear kmgilbert27,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our lovely property with us! We are ecstatic to hear you had a great positive experience! We are also glad to hear you enjoyed the Mickey Mouse decor in the rooms as it definitely adds the hint of Disneyland feel to your room experience. Call us directly next time you are in town and we will definitely offer you a 15% discount! Thank you for staying with us and we can't wait to see you on your next Disney adventures!  Best regards,

Summary: We had a great stay! The staff and room were fantastic! We will definitely stay here again on our next trip. We came to Disneyland for our anniversary and first family trip, from Tennessee, and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves!
Manager Response: Dear brookiebaby1028,  Thank you kindly for your excellent review! It makes us jump with joy every time we are able to create a perfect experience for our guests, as we work hard and take pride in the work we do. We can't wait to have you back as our guest, please be sure to give us a call so we can offer you a repeat guest discount of 15%! Thank you again for your candid review, please come back soon!  Yours Truly,

Summary: The staff was so amazing and very friendly! The room was clean and the kids loved having their own room with bunk beds. We will definitely be back for our next Disney trip and recommend Standord Inn and Suites to all our friends!
Manager Response: Dear christinacramer,  Thank you so much for your amazing review! We cannot thank you enough for the feedback you have given us as it is important for us so we can constantly improve our hotel and service. We are glad you enjoyed the comfort of our family suite, it is definitely one of the favorite rooms from our guests. We will continue to work hard to provide 5 star experiences to guests like you. Thank you again for your honest review, we hope to see you and your family back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: My family and i loved it, we got the kids suite and boy was it worth it!!!!!  Free breakfast was nice too, you get to make ur own pancakes, waffles, and or begals wit a pretty fun machine 😆 deffenitly comming back👍
Manager Response: Dear benitez1228cesar,  Thank you very much for your spectacular review! There is nothing better than reading a great review from a satisfied guest thanks to our efforts here on property. We are glad we could make you a happy customer and you received bang for your buck as this is basically our motto. The pancake machine and the waffle machine are certainly our favorite breakfast item as well as they are fun and delicious! Thank you again for choosing our small but great hotel, we cannot wait to have you visit us again soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Perfect for families with kids going to Disney.  Nothing spectacular but solid hotel with clean rooms, good breakfast and all the accommodations you need including free wifi.  No negatives to mention whatsoever.
Manager Response: Dear shadbford  Thank you for a great review. We are so delighted you found our hotel pleasurable and took advantage of what we have to offer such as free breakfast, free parking and also the free wifi. We hope to be able to host you and your families stay on your next time around the Anaheim area, and thank you again!  Best regards.

Summary: We loved staying at this hotel. We stayed in the 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom suite. It was clean and spacious for our family of 6. The kids loved having their own room with bunk beds and a play table. We'd definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear 212adelem,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel. We are glad to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay and more than happy to hear the children enjoyed having their own room. We hope to hear from you and your family on your next visit around the area very soon!  Best regards.

Summary: We have stayed here twice since December. Will again.  The entire staff is friendly and happy from the front desk to custodial to breakfast crew.  The rooms and property are always so clean and fresh and well maintained.  Its a relief to walk into the fresh room after a long drive. Beds are comfy. AC units are newer, quiet and efficient.  Bathrooms are spacious.  Linens are fresh and clean.  Breakfast is delicious and free!  Parking is free!  Art shuttle stops right in front of hotel.  This property is inviting in every aspect.
Manager Response: Dear moodeebloo,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on our hotel! We pride ourselves on ensuring you receive value for what you pay for and we certainly hit the mark with guests such as yourself. We are glad to hear you continue to enjoy all we have to offer for our guests and as well for taking advantage of all the upgrades we made in the hotels rooms. Thank you for the positive feedback and thank you for being a loyal customer, but don't forget to let us know you're a repeat guest as we offer 15% discount to our returning guests! Hope to hear from you very soon!  Best regards.

Summary: The room was clean and had everything we needed! The breakfast was amazing and so many choices! We were very pleased!! The parking was easy to get to! The pool and Jacuzzi were clean and beautiful!! Coming back!
Manager Response: Dear jimskou0117,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are ecstatic to hear you had an all around great stay with us! We absolutely have something for everyone in our breakfast room, we love to provide value to our guests. On your next time around don't forget to give us a call as we are more than welcome to offer you our Repeat Guest discount of 15%.   Hope to hear from you soon!  Best regards.

Summary: 2 queens to fit me my son and 2 younger siblings. Has it all... outside Washer, dryer, pool, free parking. Inside fridge, wi-fi, microwave, shower was one of the nicest I've had compared to some of my other hotel stays including good water pressure. It was clean and housekeeping did great, just on my last day didn't get enough towels for everyone, but it's a minor error.
Manager Response: Dear mjp422,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are ecstatic to hear our room was perfect for your small family, our goal is to provide the perfect experience for families who visit us. We are also glad you enjoyed our free amenities on site, our goal is to provide a value for the price paid at our hotel and we are glad you appreciated it. Thank you for the comment on our fine housekeeping staff, they certainly work hard and your comments will be forwarded to them to celebrate their success in providing you with a consistently clean room!  Best regards,

Summary: Came to this hotel because my boyfriend and I were going to Disneyland. For the location and the price I can't say anything bad. Was walking distance to the park and the room was clean and presentable. Also, I felt safe through my stay.
Manager Response: Dear hbarragan23,  Thank you for giving us a good review! We are glad to hear you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay at the Stanford Inn. Also, knowing that you felt safe through your stay means we are doing our job, thank you! We hope you two come back soon and stay with us again!  Best regards.

Summary: Front desk was friendly and helpful.  Room was clean and spacious. Fridge and microwave. Got the double queen beds.  Free breakfast was great.  Various of items to choose from. Fresh coffee in the breakfast area and by front desk. Free parking. 10 minutes away from Disneyland using the shuttle. Will stay again
Manager Response: Dear ruben928,  Thank you for an excellent review on the Stanford Inn. We are so delighted our rooms and our service were just a perfect fit for you. We are doing everything possible to ensure excellent customer service and to provide comfortable rooms for our all of our guest. We are more than happy to hear you enjoyed and took advantage of our complimentary breakfast and useful amenities we have to offer. Give us a call on your next trip around and we will be more than welcome to offer you a 15% discount on your stay for being a Repeat Guest! We hope to hear from you soon and thank you again.  Best regards.

Summary: The loved my stay here. Staff was super nice and even gave me a call within 10mins to make sure I had everything I needed. Love the mickey decor on the wall. Water pressure was excellent, I'm very picky on water pressure lol
Manager Response: Dear npto0902,  Thank you very much for sharing your positive review with us! We are content to hear you had a most enjoyable experience and loved the hotel! It is our goal to ensure our guests are content and we always give courtesy calls after check in, just in case you need anything at all. Thank you again for your great review, we cannot wait to have you back as our guest. Please mention you are a repeat guest when calling us directly to receive a great discount!

Summary: Our kids loved the bunk beds.  The sheets were Mickey Mouse and the walls had disney characters on them that added to the excitement of going to Disneyland.  The breakfast was great.  They had sausage and eggs that we needed to request behind the counter.  But someone was always there and was willing to get them for us.  The ART bus was a great option on somedays and and on other days when there was a convention, we waited for the bus for 45 min.  That was frustrating.  But the hotel itself was great.
Manager Response: Dear happy82016,  Thank you for a great review! Your feedback helps reinforce our efforts and passion to give each guest a great experience. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the free breakfast which has many options available as well as the spacious room which all of our guests can certainly relate to! We would love to have you and your family back again on your next trip to Disneyland!  Sincerely.

Summary: The Standford Inn & Suites is a reasonable place to stay that is close to Disney Land and the Convention Center. I stay in the upstairs rooms as the down stairs rooms can get noisy.  Celina went out of her way to make room for us and gave us excellent service. Crystal was also very helpful during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear HappyBusinessMan,  Thank you for your great review on the Stanford Inn. We take pride in providing the best service for our valued guests such as yourself. We will inform our staff about this review to encourage them to continue working hard to ensure excellent service and a great stay for our guests. Thank you and we hope to host your next stay when you're in the Anaheim area!  Best regards.

Summary: I would recommend this hotel to anyone.  My family and I had such a great experience at this hotel. It was clean and everyone was so friendly. The free breakfast was also awesome. Not having to pay for parking was very nice too.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda C,  Thank you very much for informing us about your stay at our hotel. We will share your great comment with our staff to ensure they stay motivated to giving our guests a great hotel room with friendly service because our guests love it! We agree free breakfast and free parking is very nice! We love to give our guests a sense of value when staying with us and you definitely witnessed it. Thank you again for choosing our hotel, we hope to see you and your family back soon! Please let us know you are a repeat guest so we can give you a discount!  Sincerely,

Summary: Have stayed here before in the past and we were very satisfied. Close to the parks and everything else that you may need to make a fantastic time while in the Anaheim area. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Socalvaca,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay with us. We are very happy to hear you had a positive experience and we have your seal of approval. We work hard to deliver a great guest experience for each and every one of our guests and we are happy to hear our efforts paid off. Thank you again for choosing us and we can't wait until you return!  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed here three days and two nights during our time in SoCal. We had the upstairs end suite, so little noise in the main room, but in the smaller room with the bunk bed, you could hear neighboring children when they awake and jumped off the beds and such. Our room had two queens and a bunk bed in a separate room, which was really great! The bathroom sink area was large and the microwave and refrigerator was convenient.  Breakfast was good and had enough of everything. Others had written that they took away the eggs and sausage, but looks like they brought them back. It did ft a bit crowded in the mornings bc the breakfast area is a bit small. There is seating outside, but it was cold. The plates and cups are styrofoam, so I felt a bit environment unfriendly, but it was
Manager Response: Dear nkme,  Thank you for your kind words and your positive review! Your feedback helps us improve our overall quality and allows us to target areas where our guests see opportunities for improvement, and we cannot thank you enough for this! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the room and it's large space which is more than suitable for family of up to six people especially if you get the family suite with two bathrooms instead of just one. We apologize for the lack of seating in the breakfast room, unfortunately we can only work with our limited space that is available but luckily California is rarely cold so outdoor seating is usually not a problem. We definitely offer the discount tickets which is a huge bonus because you don't have to wait in line at the park to purchase tickets, you can simply walk right on in! Please contact us as soon as you can to book your next reservation, call us directly and let us know you are a repeat guest for a 15% discount! See you soon!  Best regards,

Summary: Room was clean and well maintained, although a little old. Staff was very friendly and  helpful. Bit of a hike to Disneyland (about 25 minutes) but not too bad and the bus is close and easy. Breakfast was as expected, waffles, yogurt, fruit, toast, eggs, sausage.
Manager Response: Dear kenr426,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay at our property. We are delighted to hear your stay was excellent! Your feedback about your experience at the hotel is critical in our everlasting goal of improving our hotel! We are also glad you enjoyed the breakfast and our clean rooms as we pride ourselves in offering this consistently to all of our patrons. Thank you again for your wonderful review, we cannot wait until your next adventure here in Anaheim!  With warm regards,

Summary: I had a very good experience at this hotel. The room was big and clean and the staff was very nice and helpful. They helped with all questions and requests that we had. I would recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear n_short08,  Thank you very much for your "Great" review! We are ecstatic you had a great experience with us! Our goal is to provide 5 star experiences with a great room and professional and friendly attitude from our employees to ensure you are left with a good impression! Our staff is very knowledgeable about the surrounding area and we are always looking for opportunities to assist guests with planning their activities during their time with us. Thank you for your recommendation we cannot wait to have you back in Anaheim and give you another 5 star experience!  Sincerely,

Summary: Hotel itself was average, however the service was above and beyond what we could ask for. They stored out luggage while we were out after we had checked out.   Only bit of negative feedback I had was the beds and pillows were very hard and made it difficult to sleep
Manager Response: Dear Jack R,  Thank you very much for your feedback about your stay with us. We are pleased to hear the service provided to you by our staff exceeded your expectations! We strive to make a lasting impression on each and every guest so they don't hesitate when booking with us in the future! That being said we are dismayed to hear you had a negative experience in the room, our goal is to provide an exceptional room on top of the great service and we did not accomplish this goal with you. We are in the middle of replacing all of our pillows so I assure you in the future you will have no problem sleeping on our brand new blow out pillows. We will also look into the room you stayed in and replace the mattress to ensure it is up to our guest's standards. Thank you again for your honest feedback, we hope you give us the opportunity to have you as our guest in the near future.   Best regards,

Summary: We stayed in the 2 bathroom option and it was great for accomodating 4 adults and 2 teens for 6 nights.  Couldn't find a better price for a room with these amenities. Maid service was a little inconsistent a couple of the days. I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear erink592,  Thank you for your candid review! We are so pleased to hear you had a pleasant stay and at a great price! We always aim to provide an exceptional room at a great value so our guests can have a most enjoyable stay in Anaheim. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you and your family back soon!

Summary: We stayed in a Kids Suite, kids love the bunk beds and separate room. One of the few hotels that offers a free continental breakfast (at least that listed it as a feature). Friendly staff. Convenient location.
Manager Response: Dear Bobby K,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are incredibly thankful for your review and will be sure to continue to provide our future guests with positive experiences like yours. We are more than happy to provide all of our guests with free breakfast to be sure they start off their day right as is needed for a fun and energetic day at Disneyland! Thank you again for your great review, please come back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel was clean, comfortable beds free hot breakfast every morning free parking and freight location is in the Anaheim resort transportation just a five minute ride to Disneyland. For Travellers looking for value
Manager Response: Dear shanes742,  We are glade that you liked your stay with us. Hope to see u soon staying with us once again.   Yours,  Stanford Inn and suites.

Summary: Very convenient location to freeways and especially to Disney.. Bed very comfortable, Wi-Fi worked fine and breakfast had a nice assortment. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Great for families on a budget as well as a stopover while traveling. A ton of Restaurants in walking distance. If you are looking for High class, this may not be the place for you, but for the money....more than Satisfied!!
Manager Response: Dear teamaz08,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay here at Stanford Inn. We appreciate the input that u gave us and we will do our best to make your stay even more enjoyable the next time u stay with us.

Summary: Great, nice, clean place for families on a budget. They don't rob you for your money. Complimentary breakfast was awesome. With three growing boys we got our monies worth. Thank you for a great establishment
Manager Response: Dear Antbug625,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so happy to hear your think so highly of us! Our goal is to create a lasting impression on each and every guest and your comments reinforce our efforts to continue to work towards this goal. We are happy to hear your received a value for your money spent, this is one of our mottos and we are glad you were able to benefit from it. Thank you again for telling us about your stay, we hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: They staff are so helpful and they let us check in early without extra charged as soon as there is an available room and the room is very decent and clean pool is nice with the spa and they have a free parking and breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear 137leal,  Thank you for sharing your 5 star experience with us! We are appreciative of your kind words about our hotel and we are more than happy to accommodate early check ins whenever possible, it is our pleasure! We are happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary amenities, we like to provide value for your hard earned money and what better way than free breakfast, parking and a great hotel room with great service to boot! We can't wait until you come back to Anaheim and we hope you choose our hotel again!  Sincerely,

Summary: Overall, we had a great stay there. Hotel staffs were friendly. Our queen beds were very comfortable-we slept like dead for two nights we stayed there. Only few minutes away from Disneyland Park. The only thing that we were not satisfied was wifi because wifi signal wobbled.
Manager Response: Dear Yvonee H,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable beds after a long day at Disneyland, there is not a better feeling in the world! We apologize for the wi-fi not performing to your satisfaction, we aim to give every guest a perfect experience and we were unable to do that with you. We have already looked into the wifi issue and have increased our connectivity through an upgrade so you future stay with us will have a perfect wifi experience! Thank you again for your review, we hope to see you soon!  Best regards,

Summary: Was a bit nervous to stay at this hotel, but was very pleasantly surprised. The location was great, we uber'd to and from DL, less than $5 each way. The staff very friendly and helpful,  rooms were clean, beds comfortable, and fairly spacious(there was 4 female adults sharing the room). Cant beat the price of under $100/night, including free parking(lots of spots) and free breakfast. The breakfast was decent. Heavy on the carbs and not a lot of healthy options.  Would for sure stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay K,  Thank you for your fantastic review! We are incredibly thankful for your comments and glad we were able to perfectly suit your needs during your stay. Your feedback and happiness is our motivation to strive to be the best hotel possible. It seems as though you thoroughly enjoyed our hotel and it's amenities and we are very excited about this. We take pride in giving our guests value for their money spent and we are glad you appreciate this. Thank you again for staying with us, we hope to see you back soon!  Best regards,

Summary: The room was very clean and the beds were comfy! It was a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and the hotel also offers a shuttle pick up right in front for $5/person. I love that the room was equipped with a mini fridge and microwave. Breakfast was yummy (make yourself waffles and pancakes) they also had eggs, sausage, cereal, bagels, fruit, juice, milk, etc. Theu even provided us with a nice crib for our baby so we didmt habe to bring tge pack n play. We will definitely stay here again :)
Manager Response: Dear jkcall_87,  Thank you for your awesome review on the Stanford Inn! We are more than happy to hear you enjoyed and took advantage of our complimentary breakfast and useful amenities we have to offer. We take pride in providing the best for our guests such as yourself. We hope to host your next Disneyland trip and don't forget to give us a call as our Repeat Guests get an excellent 15% off your next stay!  Best regards.

Summary: The room was supposed to be non smoking, but smelled like smoke. There was hair on the sink. I had to wipe up water in the bathroom from my kids, and the towel was black when I picked it up. I could hear the people upstairs walking back and forth for half the night and in the early morning. It was hard to sleep with all the noise.
Manager Response: Dear Annalee D,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us, it is very much appreciated. We strive to please our guests, and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Our rooms are non-smoking, if you could of addressed the issue with the front desk, we would gladly accommodated you to a different room. Again thank you for your feedback. Hope to see you on your next family trip!

Summary: We took the chance on booking a place on line that we had never been to before.  It was a perfect fit for our family with the two room suite with two bathrooms!  The staff was so friendly and professional.  The all you can eat breakfast was outstanding!
Manager Response: Dear LLJJ2013,  We are ecstatic that you had a positive stay here at Stanford Inn. Thank you for giving our hotel a chance when visiting Anaheim. Our staff here at Stanford Inn hold high standards and want to assure that each guest that visits is satisfied. We are pleased to hear that we were able to make that impression. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for Disneyland and California Adventure
Summary: Taking the city bus from here was perfect. Stay was great. The suites are amazing and it gave my wife and I a private space for the evenings. Great stay. Only complaint was that the internet was very weak and spotty at best. Was disappointed in the fact that I could not use the internet.
Manager Response: Dear Don C,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so delighted you found our hotel pleasurable. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the weak internet signal. We do take feedback from our guests very serious and we will look into the problem and fix it as soon as possible. We hope you choose us again on your next visit around the Anaheim area!  Best regards

Summary Heading: Very nice comfortable hotel for your stay at Disneyland Resort!
Summary: The staff was very accommodating! When we reserved our room we asked for adjoining rooms and that is what we got. They checked on us after we arrived. I don't think any hotel has ever done that for me before. The rooms are very clean and large with plenty of fluffy towels. Hotel is very secure and a key card is required to enter all gates and pool areas. Pool is nice and spa is large. Lots of lounge chairs for the size of the hotel. About a 15 min walk to Disneyland. Blocks are long but if walking is not a problem go for it. There is an ART bus stop in front of the hotel so that is very convenient.They have hot breakfast and cold selections available but something they don't have is decaf coffee. This was the only disappointing thing for me. Next time I got to Disneyland I will
Manager Response: Dear pamcrosby,  Thank you for a great review on the Stanford Inn! We are so delighted you found our hotel pleasurable. You described our mission to each and every guest to a tee, which is a clean, comfortable room with friendly and personable service. We really appreciate the outstanding comments, unfortunately we do apologize about the coffee we offer. Your feedback is key in helping us improve and focus on the little details that play a big role on our guests stay. Thank you again and we hope you choose us next time when looking for a great quality hotel in Anaheim!  Best Regrads

Summary: We stayed in the 2 room suite with 2 bathrooms and kids bunkbed.With 4 adults and 2 kids, having that 2nd bathroom was great.The staff were friendly and helpful.We all enjoyed the breakfast every morning.Overall a great place to stay.  Thanks !
Manager Response: Dear kenbT3677DX,  Thank you for a great review! Your feedback and happiness are the most important things for us and our mission to provide an exceptional hotel experience for each and every guest. We are appreciative of you enjoying our hotel rooms and it's amenities and we are glad we suited you and your group's needs. We hope to hear from you soon on your next time around the area!  Best regards

Summary: Thank you for your kindness we have very high expectations and this hotel meet evry last one. Clean breakfast area and the rooms are very clean we thank you for all the hard work .. Breakfast was great
Manager Response: Dear vic2984_vh,  Thank you for an amazing review on our hotel! We are more than thrilled to know we have reached your expectations and every single one of them. We work as a team to complete our goal of giving our guests, such as yourself, a wonderful experience from check-in to check-out. We hope to host you and your family's stay on your next trip!  Best Regards

Summary: The hotel was in great shape and very clean which is a huge thing for me. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was good. Our overall stay was a success. I don't think I've liked a hotel this much in a long time!
Manager Response: Dear valeria_hdez2006,  Thank you for an excellent review on our hotel! We pride ourselves in offering the best for our guests such as yourself. We really hope to have you visit us soon on your next trip to Anaheim. Give us a call and let us know you've stayed with us before and we will be more than welcome to offer our Repeat Guest discount! Thank you again for staying at the Stanford Inn.  Best Regards

Summary: This is the third time we have stayed here. It's a good value. The walk to Disneyland is a little far but doable, or you can pay to ride the ART bus. We always stay in a room with two queens and bath and an adjoining room with bunk beds and bathroom. My kids love having their "own" room. The breakfast is included and is pretty good. We stay in a lot of hotels, and this one is cleaner and better maintained than most.
Manager Response: Dear Laura C,  Thank you for your kind review, and for continuing to choose Stanford Inn as your go to. It always brings us such joy to have returning guests! I hope your stay felt like home. We are pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy one of our many suites on property here at Stanford Inn, they are perfect for families! We are looking forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a trip to Disneyland!
Summary: Stayed here recently and very much enjoyed it.  When we first arrived there was a small problem with our booking but it was very rapidly fixed with no hassle whatsoever for which I was very grateful.  ROOM  We had a room on the top floor and it was lovely, nice and easy to get to (though if you had extremely heavy luggage I would suggest the ground floor instead as the stairs aren't the best for luggage).  The room itself was quite spacious and the layout is handy. Particularly the sink located outside the bathroom as it meant one person could be showering while the other is using the sink, very handy for early mornings at Disney!  BEDS  The beds were extremely comfortable, however the pillows could use a little work. They were quite small and lumpy, but they were more than made
Manager Response: Dear SG1Lincoln40,  Thank you so much for your detailed review! We are happy to hear your had an overall great experience with us, we always aim to create happy customers with every guest that comes in and out of our hotel. It seems like we hit the nail on the head in regards to our beds, breakfast and cleanliness and we will be sure to share your great comments with our staff. We can't wait until your next visit to Disneyland, please give us a call to book your room in advance and mention you are a repeat guest for a discount!

Summary: Wonderful amenities! Hot breakfast provided every morning was perfect way to start the day when you plan to be at Disneyland all day long. Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. My only complaint was that breakfast was only available after 7, early risers with kids we needed something a little bit earlier.
Manager Response: Dear M6553EPamyf,  I'm glad you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Stanford inn. We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the amenities our property has to offer! We apologize for the breakfast hours. We hope to be your first choice on your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Kids loved the bunk beds, our bed were comfortable. Can't beat the price. Clean and functional. Breakfast was a little slow. Bus to Disney land stops at the front door. Bus was crowded and rough late at night but otherwise nice and easy
Manager Response: Dear Sarah R,  It brings our staff such joy you and your family had a great stay! We apologize for the slow breakfast, any feedback we receive is much appreciated. We hope to be your first choice for any future Disney trip!

Summary: Pool is pleasant and close to laundry room. Hotel is close to restaurants and stores. Staff was friendly and accommodating   The breakfast was good and had something for just about everyone  the ART stops right out front   Very convenient
Manager Response: Dear momma8,  Thank you for sharing your story with us! We are happy to hear you had a perfect stay and you enjoyed our location and service! We absolutely have something for everyone in our breakfast room, we love to provide value to our guests. We hope you come back soon, Disneyland and our comfortable rooms will be waiting for you!

Summary: The room was everything we needed to be able to enjoy time at Disneyland. The staff was very accommodating. Clean room. Wish there had been fresh fruit offered as part of the breakfast. We would stay there again on a return trip.
Manager Response: Dear Karen R,  We are so happy you enjoyed your room during your trip to Disneyland! We apologize for the lack of fruit during your breakfast meal, we are looking into adding variety into our breakfast menu and your comments go a long way into making changes. Please call us as soon as you find out when you are returning and receive a 15% repeat guest discount. We look forward to hosting your next visit!  Thank you,

Summary: Hotel served it's purpose.  We booked a last minute hotel for a quick Disney visit.  Check in was quick and easy.  Staff was friendly and very accommodating.  Breakfast was great! Hotel was a bit outdated and bed were not comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear 3910momma,  Thank you for telling us about your stay with us! We appreciate your feedback and give your comments and concerns the utmost importance and will look into replacing any beds that are not deemed comfortable enough. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the quick check in as well as our friendly and personable service. We hope you come visit us again soon!  Thank you,

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel when I came here for Vidcon 2015. I came alone but I thought it was pretty safe to walk to the convention center from the hotel and back. Also they provide free breakfast until 10, and there is outdoor seating, which is nice considering the California weather.
Manager Response: Dear jason645,  Thank you very much for your good review! We are happy you enjoyed our hotel and our proximity to the nearby restaurants and of course Disneyland! Your review is important to us hope to see you again!

Summary: Offered make your own waffles and pancakes! with hot syrup. Also had scrambled eggs and sausage, assorted toast with jellies, peanut butter and cream cheese, dry cereal, oatmeal, yoghurt, fresh fruit, milk and juices, coffee and tea.  Very friendly and helpful staff. Very spacious room with two queen beds.  Two blocks away from Anaheim Convention Center. Liked the hot jacuzzi after long day of conference. Wished they had a shuttle service.
Manager Response: Dear knotsinLA,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are ecstatic to hear you had an all around great stay with us! Your feedback helps reinforce our efforts and passion to give each guest a great experience. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the free breakfast which has many options available as well as the spacious room which all of our guests can certainly relate to! We apologize for the lack of our own shuttle service but no need to worry Disneyland offers their own shuttle service at a nominal fee and it picks up every 20 minutes right in front of our hotel.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Stanford Inn & Suites Review from LA Congress 2016
Summary: Staff was extremely helpful and courteous Rooms were clean (except for ants in two of our group's upstairs rooms) What happened to the pillows? Did they cut them in half or thirds? Beds a little hard Rooms very small Hot breakfast was good
Manager Response: Dear marysQ9197TW,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are grateful for your comments and will use your feedback as a tool to improve our service and quality of our rooms. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced in regards to the pillows and hardness of the beds, it is our goal to ensure our guests are 100% comfortable in their rooms each and every time. We are working on replacing all of our pillows as we speak and the beds get continually replaced as needed. I have sent you a message so we can look further into your comments. Thank you again for your comments, we hope you give us an opportunity to give you a perfect stay next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Super affordable, great value for the money, great for families!!!
Summary: Stayed here recently on a family trip to Disneyland. This was our second time staying here in the last couple of years, and it was another positive experience! Got a super deal on a 3 night stay, and our kids absolutely love the family suite (the big draw for us, along with affordability)! Our room was nice and clean, bed's were comfy, and we had everything we needed! The staff was professional, and attentive! Such a great value for the money! We will definitely be back again!!!
Manager Response: Dear bucshot6,  Thank you for sharing your firsthand experience with us! We are happy to hear your had another positive experience with us and it was very affordable for you! We love to provide a great product for a great value! Yes the family suite is the family favorite from our guests and you can see the privacy and space of the room is adequate for 4 to 6 people! Please visit us again and mention you are a repeat guest for a 15% discount off the best rate!

Summary: I am very satisfied with everything from the staff to the room. Nice breakfast area very friendly. The roo m was very clean and comfortable. Was even offered free shuttle service to our location we were going to.
Manager Response: Dear mariamota85,  Thank you for telling us about your recent stay! We are glad you were a very satisfied guest, your feedback is what motivates us to continue to provide each guests with a great experience over and over again. We cannot thank you enough for providing us with feedback as it is essential to helping us improve! Please come visit us again soon for another excellent experience!

Summary: We stayed in two rooms for 4 nights and found this hotel to be more than adequate. Our two adult daughters shared one room, and myself, my husband and our 13 year old shared the other. The rooms are clean and well equipped. We were on the main floor, and the only downside was that we could hear the families going by for breakfast. Little ones can be pretty excited heading to Disney early in the am, so parents should be aware that people in the lower level rooms can hear them :)   The downside to our visit was the breakfast. The room is way too small and there is no sense to the layout. Why have a toaster with no bread nearby? Forks are provided at one counter, but no knives. This forces you to constantly try to get through the crazy waffle lineup to find items that should be at
Manager Response: Dear lorna_u73,  Thank you so much for sharing you great experience with us! We are happy to hear your stay was more than adequate as this is our main objective when guests stay with us, exceed their expectations! We apologize for the inconvenience experienced in the breakfast room we will use your feedback to improve the layout and the process of ordering egg and sausages. Thank you again for your great review we hope yo have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice Place.  Just Watch Out for the Bugs
Summary: Nice room with two queen beds and a separate smaller room with bunk bed for kids. Room was in good shape and seemed relatively clean with one exception. We did have a large cockroach crawling in and out of the light fixture over the bathroom sink one night. The free breakfast was decent. Cereal, yogurt, bread, bagels, milk, juice, coffee, pancakes, waffles, eggs, and sausage. The only fruit was apples. Free WiFi could have been a little faster. Plenty of free parking. Did find it a little disappointing that the pool was not heated as advertised. Would have been a five star review except for the roach.
Manager Response: Dear ARinSR,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to review our hotel. Your direct experience and the subsequent feedback helps us improve our service and quality by addressing your concerns. It is unfortunate and we apologize about the issue in your room with the pest, we will work vigorously with our engineering and housekeeping department to ensure this does not occur again. We also work with an exterminator company who does regular inspections and preventative care  to address this. I have sent you a direct message, please respond at your earliest convenience so we can discuss this further. Thank you again for your honest review, we hope you come back next time you quest in Disneyland!

Summary: Good overall, though there was quite a bit of noise because the room was right across from the storage area. The room was clean and kept well, and service was great during breakfast. The one thing that could improve from breakfast was having the egg and sausage outside like before, rather than having to ask for it every time.
Manager Response: Dear jcovarrubias,  Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear you had a pleasant overall stay at our hotel. We will look into other alternatives for the egg and sausage patty, thank you for sharing your feedback it helps us make our guests happy time and time again. Please don't hesitate to call us next time you are in town, we want to ensure you have another great stay!

Summary: This isn't a chain, but it is surrounded by chains along Harbor Blvd. in Anaheim. They were very accommodating, changing my room when I asked. Within walking distance of Anaheim Convention Center, free parking and breakfast, great staff.
Manager Response: Dear N4648IQgregp,  Thank you so much for your feedback, it is extremely valuable to helping us in our efforts to be one of the best hotels in Anaheim. We are glad you enjoyed the hotel, the amenities we offer and our friendly and personal service, these are definitely areas of strength for our hotel and your feedback shows it! We hope you stay with us again in your future visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Stanford Inn stay during RE Congress
Summary: This hotel was not our first choice but ok considering I booked very close to the start of the event. We had to take a suite with a cute room for children that had a set of bunk beds and a little table with two chairs. Would have been lovely for a family but there were just us two adults. The amenities were skimpy especially after visiting our church's hospitality room at the Hilton and seeing what they got. We heard footsteps overhead and the normal noise of the family next door so more soundproofing would be nice. The room also had a musty odor smelling much like some of the areas in the convention center parking section. Parking is free all day and the ART bus stops right in front of the hotel. That's worth a lot in the land of scarce and pricey parking Anaheim around the
Manager Response: Dear Margaret M,  We are excited to hear you enjoyed your accommodations with our hotel while in Anaheim for the congress. We apologize for not meeting your expectations but we assure you we are doing our best to maintain the rooms and keep them updated as frequently as possible. We are also glad you enjoyed our proximity to the local attractions as we are right in the heart of all the key points of interest and many restaurants and the convention center are within walking distance. We hope you give us another opportunity to give you a better experience when visiting Anaheim again, we are sure a second floor room away from any noise would suit your needs perfectly!

Summary: The hotel is very close to getting to Disney however, the beds are horribly hard! But you can look past that I guess as long as you're ok with your room door not locking!! We walked out the door and thank god have a habit of always checking to make sure it locks and the door would not lock!! It took us 10mins of opening and closing before it locked! UNACCEPTABLE! & the guy working overnight front desk is anything but interested in customer service!
Manager Response: Dear mmel818,  Thank you very much for your review. We are very sorry for your experience here at our hotel, your safety and comfortability is of the utmost importance to us and we take your review extremely seriously. We are looking into the issue and will ensure every single door is in proper working order to prevent this from occurring again. We apologize for the lack of excellent customer service, we will also speak with all of our staff members and review the way we interact and help our guests. Thank you again for sharing your comments we will use your experience as a tool to improve our service and quality, please give us another chance we promise you will enjoy our hotel as we will make sure you have a perfect stay.  Best regards,

Summary: We were very pleased with the hotel except the staff could have been better. The individuals at the front desk were not the most friendly and the staff working breakfast would not refill the food and would close the doors to the breakfast area early.
Manager Response: Dear wolfe_718,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so delighted you found our hotel pleasurable. We really appreciate it, unfortunately we do apologize for the inconvenience about the breakfast room. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next vacation!

Summary: Overall this place is good and I would recommend it for the average traveller.  It was a 20 minute walk to the Convention Center, lots of restaurants in walking distance; Disneyland and Downtown Disney just another 15-20 minutes away, though there is a shuttle we didn't use.
Manager Response: Dear jason645,  Thank you very much for your good review! We are happy you enjoyed our hotel and our proximity to the nearby restaurants and of course Disneyland! Your review is important to us hope to see you again!

Summary: If you are going to Disneyland and want a reasonable hotel, this is your place. It's just a short shuttle ride to Disney, the stop is in front of the hotel. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  The breakfast was nothing to write home about, but fine.   Don't expect anything lavish, you aren't paying for it.  It is a clean, hotel, has air cinditioning, free parking,  a pool, and great customer service (including the maids).
Manager Response: Dear Crazymotherof2  We want to sincerely thank you for sharing your review with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our accommodations and our service. We intend to provide all of our guests with a positive experience and your feedback is key to helping us do so. We hope you were able to visit our spa and enjoy the great weather we are having at the moment! Come visit us again soon as we would love to have you back as our guest!

Summary: Loved loved loved it!! Overall satisfied from minute we reserved till the minute we had to leave. Great price, great location, great staff. We will be staying again and send friends as well as family  to stay.
Manager Response: Dear melemo951,  Thank you for your short and sweet review! Words cannot express how much joy we get from hearing feedback like yours because it shows that we are doing things the right way! Please visit us again soon with your family and friends and don't forget to mention you are a repeat guest to receive a 15% discount!

Summary: Awesome hotel!  And the Rooms actually look like the pictures you see online! Very clean rooms, nice pool area, good breakfast, friendly staff and great location. The Disney bus stops is right out front. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear brandibrown3,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are appreciative of your feedback and your positive experience and your reviews help us create this type of experience for everyone of our guests. We definitely have the most convenient Disneyland shuttle stop as it is literally 10 feed from our entrance and we are happy you appreciated this. We can't wait until you stay with us again, please call us directly and receive a 15% repeat guest discount just mention it at the time of booking.

Summary: The room is a great value. Staff is polite and friendly. The walls are thin and if you don't get noisy people next door then it is a great stay. The first night we had loud, abnoxious neighbors. We had to call the front desk to complain and it was taken care of immediately. The next 3 nights were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Chelsey M,  Thank you very much for your great review! We are happy to hear you received a great value on our great rooms! We are also happy to hear your noisy neighbor issue was remedied quickly as a comfortable and enjoyable stay is our goal witch each guest. We hope you choose us as your future hotel of choice while in Anaheim!

Summary: We booked at the very last minute based on other reviews and were pleased to find that the Stanford Inn was exactly what we were hoping for; a safe, clean, comfortable place at a reasonable price.  We only spent enough time there to sleep and shower for two nights but appreciated the nice room, nice front desk staff, plenty of free parking, good (crowded) breakfast, and the convenience of the Art bus stop right in front of the hotel. the beds were comfy too and I'm pretty picky about that. We all slept soundly and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear HappeeCamper2016,  Thank you so much for your excellent review and looking at your name we are glad we had a happy camper stay at our property! We are also pleased to hear your enjoyed all of the complimentary amenities, the service and cleanliness of our rooms, we take pride in providing this to all of our guests. Your feedback is the force behind our mission to be one of the best hotel values in Anaheim. We cannot wait to have you back as our guest and please mention you are a repeat guest so we can offer you a 15% discount!  Thank you,

Summary: This was a great value for the money. Clean property with a friendly staff. Easy access to Disneyland and California Aventure via the shuttle. I would recommend this location to anyone looking for a nice affordable stay.
Manager Response: Dear brucep323,  Thank you for sharing your comments with us. We are immensely satisfied to hear you saw the value in our hotel and service, we take pride in providing this to all of our guests. Your feedback is key to helping us improve and ensure our guests receive only the best time and time again. Thank you again for your review and we hope you stay with us again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 days. I didn't go to the park but was going to a conference at the convention centre.  Its about a 15min walk from the convention centre and probably 30 or so from the park - depending on how fast you walk.  Check in was smooth, staff courteous. Room itself was more than big enough, two queen beds. The room was clean and had a mini fridge.  Free parking, wifi and breakfast (hot and cold, bagels, toast, eggs, sausage, porridge, yoghurt, waffles, pancakes and cereal!) were a real plus. Great value. Noise from the road and breakfast area can be a little much at times. But still a great place to stay
Manager Response: Dear mrmark,  We are very grateful for your great review, thank you for sharing! We are definitely a hotel that is convenient in proximity to the convention center and we appreciate your business. As a guest your feedback is our direct eyes and ears for us to improve our hotel's service and quality so thank you for your important comment. We are also glad you enjoyed our room and all of our free amenities as we always intend to provide a value for your money's worth. We hope you stay with us next time you are in Anaheim even if it's not for business, our pool is always sparkling and warm!

Summary Heading: Great Value and close to everything!
Summary: I booked this hotel through travelocity at the last minute and got an awesome rate. It was easily worth the regular rate, though. Close to food and bus line to Disney, super friendly staff, and complimentary breakfast was great. Not just stale muffins and cereal here! Eggs, sausage and waffles - yum! The rooms also have cute Mickey and Disney decals for your Mickey lovers. Nice touch. Would absolutely stay here again.  The bed was so comfy!
Manager Response: Dear 66booyah,  Thank you for your great review! We will pass your compliments along to our staff as they are motivated by your responses and the happiness of our guests! We are passionate about the service and quality our guests receive so your feedback is essential for us to ensure we are maintaining that high level of quality. We are glad you enjoyed the breakfast and the affordable prices we set. Please come back and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For, Overall Great!
Summary: I was hesitant in booking a family vacation with the Cdn dollar trading at $0.71, but was delighted to find a price of $200 CAD per night at the Stanford Inn & Suites for a family suite; this price was unbeatable for the area. Our room had two double beds and a whole separate bedroom with bunk beds, a TV and a bathroom suite for our two boys, it was fantastic! The beds were comfortable enough, not incredibly comfortable, but not uncomfortable either and leaving us sore and achy, the boys were thrilled with their own room and bunk beds and it allowed us to put them to bed and be able to watch some TV and do our own thing in the evening. Our room (151) was situated on the south-facing side of the building so it stayed cool and we couldn't hear our neighbours next door, but the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great experience with us. We are very pleased to hear your experience was a positive one while staying with us, we hope to accomplish this type of response with each of our guests. Your firsthand experience is what sets the tone for us to address any concerns and continually provide the best possible stay for all to enjoy. We are truly sorry to hear about the several concerns in your review, we will be sure to work with our employees to prevent this from happening again. Thank you again and we hope you choose us next time when looking for an affordable and great quality hotel in Anaheim!

Summary: This was a awesome hotel! We traveled with a large group and this hotel met all our needs. The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  The beds were very comfortable! We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer B,  Thank you for your awesome review! Your feedback and happiness are the most important things for us and our mission to provide an exceptional hotel experience for each and every guest. We are appreciative of you enjoying our hotel rooms and it's amenities and we are glad we suited your your group's needs. We can't wait until you come back!

Summary: One of the best Hotel i've been. For the price is cheap. The breakfast is great, can't wait for the next one!!! The staff are friendly specially the G. Manager...the rooms are clean with fridge and microwave, the bed sheets and comforter are all cotton and white that is awesome. Bed is very comfortable with enough fluffy nice firm pillows. Swimming pools are heated. Overall 5 star for me.
Manager Response: Dear raul_favis,  Thank you very much for your amazing review. Your feedback is what drives us to continue to do our best and create memorable experiences for each and every guest like yourself, we honestly appreciate you taking the time to write this review. I'd like to personally thank you for your compliment on my friendliness, as I enjoy ensuring each and every guest walks out with a smile from our hotel. Thank you again and we can't wait until your return!

Summary: The room itself was great!  My girls loved having their own room.  I had some small concerns about the electrical, but other than that it was great!  Great breakfast.  It saved us a lot of headache.  One of the better hotels I've stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear kdwoodru,  Thank you so much for your great review! We are so happy to hear you and your family loved our family suite room which is definitely the favorite room of all our guests! Thank you for your compliments and feedback as it helps us grow stronger and improve our quality. We can't wait to have you back as our guest!

Summary: Very pleased with this hotel over all rooms were very spacious! The complimentary breakfast buffett was great my kids loved it! Room always kept nice and clean. Housekeeping staff very friendly overall great experience will continue to stay here in my future disney trips.
Manager Response: Dear Eren R,  Thank you for your amazing review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay here with us at the Stanford Inn. We do try our best in making our guests experience the " Feel at Home" feel. We're more than excited to host your next Disney trip. Give us a call and let us know you are a repeat guest and you may receive a 15% off your next stay! We hope to hear from you soon.  Best regards.

Summary: Overall I was very pleased with this hotel.  The cleanliness was great the staff were friendly and the value was great.  I would recommend this hotel to my friends. My kids loved their own bunk room.  The breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Dear laujp,  Thank you so much for your good review on our hotel. We are truly grateful to have had the opportunity to hear your voice and know that we are taking care of your needs when staying in Anaheim. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the delicious breakfast as well as the bunk beds which is the favorite room for our families. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Very pleasant stay.  Disliked the fact that I requested a crib and because we had a late check in after visiting the park.  There weren't any left.  I plan a head and to not have to struggle and like things to run smooth. Since I didn't have a crib to sleep my toddler, he ended up having to sleep with me on the bed.  Which was ok because we had enough room but that meant that I didn't get a good nights sleep since I was up most of the night making sure he didn't roll of the bed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We are happy to hear you had an overall pleasant stay despite the inconveniences. We apologize for our mistake of not having a crib available for you at check in, we will review our policies and ensure requests like this are of the utmost importance and accommodated to the best of our ability. We thank you for your feedback as it is what allows us to continue our quest to be one of the best hotels in Anaheim by pinpointing the areas of opportunity for our hotel. We hope you choose us as your future hotel of choice next time you are in Anaheim!   Thank you,

Summary: This is our second time statime at this hotel.bunk beds and 2 queen beds, lots of space to unpack for a family of 5.never used the pool before but it looks like a decent size.  Morning breakfast is very good too.
Manager Response: Dear Yvette F,  Thank you for your kind words on our hotel! We are more then pleased to hear you are a repeat guest and we are still continuing to reach your expectations. As a repeat guest, we are more the glad to inform you and we do encourage you to give us a call on your next visit and we offer 15% off our repeat guests. We hope to hear from you very soon!  Best regards.

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.   We got a deal where you stayed 3 nights and got the 4th night free, so it was a great value and very close to Disneyland.
