Combined with the ART shuttle service very easy to get to the disneyland parks.  Would recommend the hotel
Manager Response: Dear toddn710,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are lucky to be located in a great area where a lot is to be offered. The beauty of our location is in fact the ART bus stops right in front of our hotel. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we hope to host your next visit to Disneyland!  Best regards.

Summary: I loved this place especially for the price not bad at all. My family stayed here for our Disneyland trip and the staff was so helpful and sweet upon our super late arrival. We had a family suite and it was really nice would definitely stay here again. My only concerns were the kids beds were a bit firm but we were still able to sleep just fine. And the tv in the main room was glitchy but we weren't in the room long enough for that to really be a problem.
Manager Response: Dear lesleye852,  Thank you for your great review. We pride ourselves in offering our guests the highest level of service from check-in to check-out. Your happiness is our goal and your feedback helps us reach our goal. Certainly we will look into your concerns of our suite bunk beds. We wish to have you visit our hotel on your next trip around this area!  Best regards.

Summary: This hotel is great, minus the small leak in the bathroom. We loved the cleanliness of the room, friendliness of the staff. They're breakfast options where great! My son had fun making his own waffles. I'd definitely stay here again, I'd give it 5 stars if the leak in the bathroom wasn't there.
Manager Response: Dear Luis H,   Thank you for your good review! We are more then delighted to hear your son had fun making waffles in our complimentary breakfast room. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the small leak in your room. Please be advised we do have maintenance staff that are more then willing to help fix the problem to make your stay at the Stanford Inn a great experience. We hope to host your stay on your next visit to Anaheim!  Best regards.

Summary: Pros: Friendly staff, free breakfast, convenient pick up for shuttle, clean hotel, parking right next to room, good location, great price.  Cons: Walls thin which led to loud hotel and being able to hear neighbors talking, not enough outlets in the room.  Overall a great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear hill_katey,  Thank you for your review. We continue to strive for consistency in all we do by providing our guest with a comfortable room, warm breakfast and friendly service. We are disappointed you weren't able to enjoy your room as our duty is to ensure you have an excellent experience. We hope you come back and stay with us and have a quiet and enjoyable stay.  Best regards

Summary: We booked our room at the last minute and received a very good rate. We were prepared to stay in a sub par motel due to the excellent rate. We found it above average for any motel offering the rate available. All of the staff was very friendly & helpful. Everyone we saw greeted us and willing assisted us with all our needs. Room was very clean and we had all the amenities we needed and then some. Coffee in the rooms plus carafes in the lobby prior to the breakfast served. I was surprised by the selection for the complimentary breakfast. 2 dual toasters, 2 waffle makers and 2 pancake makers made it possible for multiple customers to be preparing their breakfast at the same time to reduce waiting.
Manager Response: Dear falpal2016,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are more then pleased to hear we reached your expectations. The hotels amenities play a big roll in accomplishing our duty of having that "Feel At Home" perception. We pride ourselves in assuring you receive great value for what you pay for and certainly we are happy to have hit that mark with guests such as yourself! We hope to have you around on your next trip!  Best Regards.

Summary: Great customer service and clean rooms! They provided you with great information. There were two choices for delivery services. We used the pizza place and were incredibly satisfied. Comfy beds and pillows. Came with a fridge and microwave. Perfect setup!
Manager Response: Dear vbravo13,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you had a perfect stay at ur lovely hotel and your feedback will encourage us to continue to give great information to our guests and continue to recommend Marri's Pizza, definitely one of Anaheim's local favorites! We hope you choose us next time you are nearby!

Summary: Great hotel! Love the rooms with the connecting bunk bed room and second bathroom. Great for families. Breakfast is ok but it's free so :) location is not great but you can take the ART to the park. Coming back from Disneyland the ART can be packed.
Manager Response: Dear gabreezymonster,  Thank you for your nice review! We appreciate your feedback as it is necessary to continually improve our service and quality of our rooms to meet and exceed our guests expectations. We are happy to hear you had a most enjoyable stay and we hope you stay with us in the near future!

Summary: I like the family suite with separate bathroom.  Breakfast is great with cereals, eggs, sausages, pancakes, fruits, etc.  Staff is very friendly and accommodating; able to check in one hour early. Disneyland is within walking distance. Shuttle (ART) stop is in front of hotel.  Fast food and restaurants are close by.  If no family member has disability, request a family suite without ADA accessibility because the main bathroom has level shower floor (no bath tub) and floor may get really wet. The other bathroom is fine.  Definitely, I will stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear John E,  Thank you for your fantastic review! Your feedback is what feeds our appetite to keep our guests happy and we accomplished our goal in obtaining another loyal guest. We always look for opportunities to accommodate our guests and an early check in is a good place to start. Thank you again for choosing us and when you return please call us directly for a repeat guest discount!

Summary: We arrived late in the evening and our planned and booked hotel had let us down.  I won't get into that now but........ we arrived at the reception of this hotel to be greeted warming and eagerly.  We explained our issue and the staff couldn't have been more helpful by sympathizing with us and offering us encouragement and to not to let what happened ruin our stay in Anaheim.  They had a room available at a very reasonable price and we signed in and were able to be in a safe, clean and well ventilated room within 10 minutes.  PHEW!!    The bed was so comfortable and it was close to Disney either by walking or shuttle.  Breakfast was good and we ate quickly to start our day in the parks.  It was so comforting to know we had a great room to come home to after a busy day there,  I
Manager Response: Dear Squeaks86,  Thank you for sharing your heart warming experience with us! We are grateful to have been given the opportunity to turn your negative experience around and be "life savers", this is our mission with each and every guest. Your feedback will be shared with the front desk team in order to encourage the personable and caring service we love to provide. We hope you choose us again next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary: We had a large group, they were able to meet our needs. The rooms were clean and had the space that we needed. The breakfast area is small but the staff is fast and we were in and out quickly. We had plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Dear Scrapy555,  Thank you for your great review! We take pride in meeting the needs of our guests whether small or large groups or even individuals, we give best efforts to give first class service. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the small breakfast room, still we are looking into improving such matter. Wondrous to hear the staff assisted a fast and great experience for your large group. Hope to have you visit soon on your next trip!  Best Regards.

Summary: The rooms were clean and fairly up to date.  Management was very responsive to the one maintenance call we made.  The breakfast was a good value, but the breakfast room was way too crowded.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear rick_hellstrom,  Thank you for your great review. We are more then content to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We do apologize, the breakfast room does get a bit crowded, however, we are looking into making changes to help the morning rush flow smoothly. We hope to host your stay on your next visit to Disneyland!  Best regards.

Summary: Great price for 2 queens and bunk beds.  We were 3 adults and one child and it was perfect for our needs.  Very friendly staff and clean room for a reasonable price.  It was about 2 miles walk to Disneyland so we drove and paid Disney parking across from the convention center at $18 per day.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin B,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We sincerely value your comment and use your feedback as platform to continually improve based on your comments. We are happy to hear our hotel was perfect and suited your family's needs, we are definitely a family friendly hotel and your happiness is the proof! Good call on parking across Disneyland as that offers the least amount of walking distance to and from the park. We hope to have you as our future guest on your upcoming Anaheim adventures!  Sincerely,

Summary: Would definitely recommend this hotel. Beds were super comfortable. Typical breakfast but did the job nicely. Very clean rooms. You can tell they take pride in this place. Pool area is nice but hot tub could have been hotter and maybe a few hooks in the room to hang towels and swimsuits would have been nice.
Manager Response: Dear careless7646,  Thank you for your great review. We do take pride in giving our guests the best experience they could possibly get. Your review is greatly appreciated as it is a tool to help us improve and focus on small details that could make a huge change. We hope you and your family come visit us soon!  Best regards.

Summary Heading: The Best Value In The Disneyland Area!
Summary: What an amazing find this was!  The value is amazing.  We had a nice sized clean comfortable room.  My daughter's best friend came along with us this time, and the two girls LOVED having their own private room with the bunk beds.....and the Mickey Mouse painted on their wall!  Having two bathrooms when the two 10 year old girls are traveling with us is a HUGE plus!  The breakfast was amazing!  LOVED the waffles and the hot sausage!   But most of all, I was impressed by the friendly staff who went out of their way to make sure we felt welcome and that every one of our needs was tended to.  Dominic was especially friendly when he was checking us in.  They were ALL friendly actually.  We have found our "home away from home" and as Disney Annual Pass Holders, we have found our "go
Manager Response: Dear JEFF_K_1963,  We would like to sincerely thank you for your positive review about our hotel. Your feedback is truly appreciated and we are glad you speak highly of us as it reinforces our efforts to give each guest the best possible experience. We are so excited to have another customer discover the hidden gem that is the Stanford Inn & Suites and we look forward to being your hotel of choice for your future Disneyland adventures. Our staff will be encouraged to continue to provide excellent customer service after hearing your story. Thank you again Jeff and don't forget to call us directly so we can give you a repeat guest discount on your future stay!

Summary Heading: Short walk to Toy Story Disneyland parking lot.
Summary: Good breakfast, friendly staff, comfortable rooms, 40 min walk to Disneyland or 10 min to Toy Story parking lot where you can take a shuttle to the parks for free.  We stayed on the ground level which was nice since there is no elevators in the hotel but we could hear our neighbors above and the street noise was a bit annoying at times (car alarms and such).  For the price I would stay here again since the earplugs can cancel the noise out.
Manager Response: Dear miro666,  Thank you for sharing your experience here with us. We pride ourselves in providing the highest level of service for our guests. We are disappointed you were unable to enjoy your room with us as it is our duty to ensure each guest has a memorable stay. We do apologize for the inconvenience of not having an elevator, however, if you are in need of any help, our staff are more then welcome to provide assistance to our guests. We hope you allow us to host your stay again and enjoy a quiet and excellent guest experience.  Best regards.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel, the rooms are updated and clean (expect for the carpet it was very dirty but I assume thats because of high traffic) the staff was helpful and very nice especially the ladies working in the breakfast room they are so sweet. We are already planning our next trip to Disneyland and will most likely stay at Stanford Inn & Suits again. ART bus stops right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear  sue12016,  Thank you for your great review about our hotel! We are so excited to hear we exceeded your expectations and our breakfast staff gave you excellent service. Your words are our instructions when it comes to feedback and we will be sure to look into the issue regarding your carpet right away. We highly encourage you to return with us as we offer a 15% discount to repeat customers, mention that next time you call us! We cannot wait to have you back as our guest during your upcoming Disneyland trip!  Your truly,

Summary: My wife and 3 grown sons stayed here on our final Disneyland vacation.  Overall experience was good.  Room was clean and worked out well getting the suite with extra room and bathroom.  Price was very reasonable , good value.    In response to some other reviews I've seen here, people had concerns about walking to and from Disneyland.  In my opinion it's just not realistic to walk back and forth when you will likely be walking all day at the park.   My wife found a good deal for a 3 day shuttle pass through ART, I thinks stands for Anaheim Resort Transportation.  Not worth it to me to save money walking, it was probably $3 or $4 a day per adult.  As for the breakfast there, my complaint would be with the other people staying there not the hotel staff. People nowadays just seem
Manager Response: Dear Loel50,  Thank you for your good review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed all of our complimentary amenities and the service our staff gave you. Your feedback is essential to the growth and consistency of our hotel and the product we have available for guests such as yourself. We hope to have you back as our most valued guest in the near future!  Thank you,

Summary: room was clean, cheap, very close to disneyland, breakfast was good. My kids loved the mickey bunk beds and wall decorations, loved having their own room. Hotel was easy to find and there was a target and lots of restaurants just down the street. Only problem while there was the wifi often didn't work, but that could have been my device. Overall very satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear kcjrscec,  Thank you so much for your very good review. We are please to hear your family enjoyed our popular family suite which has the perks of privacy and comfort ability all in one. Your feedback is extremely beneficial to our goal of being giving guests like yourself the utmost quality and are able to enjoy our rooms peacefully. We apologize for the wi-fi issue but please be assured we have an IT support team ready to assist with any internet issues at your request. We hope you choose the Stanford Inn & Suites on your next trip to Disneyland, until next time!  Sincerely,

Summary: The location, value, helpful staff, cleanliness and comfy beds were all very good.  A pleasant surprise.   It was not a big problem for us, but be aware there is no elevator for the second floor rooms. The only complaint I had was the VERY small breakfast area.  It was very crowded and cramped.  But, we did appreciate the covered, outdoor seating that was available.  The breakfast was acceptable.  We appreciated the option of the hot sausage and eggs in addition to the "make your own" waffles. We called the main desk for additional towels one morning, and were shocked at how quickly they arrived. Would definitely use this hotel again! We felt very safe walking down the street at night to get a late dinner.  Joe's Crab Shack, Red Robin and a burger/brewery were easy to walk to.
Manager Response: Dear 697dawnie,  Thank you for your excellent review! We are happy you were impressed with our hotel as this is our goal with every single guest that walks through our doors. We certainly have comfortable beds and the breakfast is always appreciated by our Disney adventurers. We are very central to Disneyland and the local attractions and restaurants and you certainly enjoyed that benefit. We hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: Week long stay for our Disneyland trip-just the two of us!  This is our third time staying at Stanford Inn.  The rooms are very clean.  The in room fridge and microwave are a plus!  Breakfast is great.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  Close to Disney parking but close enough to walk to the park as well.  We've enjoyed every visit.  In December our boys loved having their own room with the bunk beds!  We are planning our next trip and will stay at Stanford Inn!  Thank you for making our stay perfect!
Manager Response: Dear John & Brenda D,  Thank you very much for being loyal guests and for sharing your experience with us! We are glad our hotel and it's amenities were splendid for your family and we will certainly continue to provide the cleanest rooms so you can enjoy our facility time and time again. We are also pleased to hear your boys enjoyed the privacy of the family room and the bunk beds, this is exactly the goal in mind when creating these rooms. Thank you once again and we cannot wait to host you and your boys on your next trip here.   Regards,

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 4 times in the past year. We have not had any issues. The staff have always been friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean. We stay in the 2 bedroom/2 bathroom kids suite. It is very convenient to have a second bathroom. Also, helps to have breakfast there before heading to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle L.  Thank you for your great review! We are so grateful to have you as a returning guest and we are glad you have not had any issues on any of your stays. We value your feedback as it is helps us enhance and improve your experience. You hit the nail on the head as far as having the second bathroom inside the family suite and free breakfast before a long magical day at Disneyland is the best start there is. We can't wait to have you as our guest for the 5th time sometime soon!  Kindly,

Summary Heading: You will love or hate this place based on what you want out of a hotel.
Summary: To be honest I was kind of worried about the cleanliness of this hotel based on some of the past reviews.  The staff assured me that as of now, Feb 2016, all of the rooms have been updated though and the carpet is new (curing the old black socks issue).  We had a family room (two baths) with the bunk-beds and we all loved it!  We were there for 7 nights and it was really nice having all of that space for the kids.  As far as a room goes, I don't know if you can beat this for a non-Disney hotel, at least for the price.    I do wish they had bigger laundry facilities as there are only 2 washer and dryers so we ended up waiting in line a couple times to use them.  The breakfast facility was one of the bigger of our trip through 6 hotels but could still almost have been bigger
Manager Response: Dear Tylertraveler.  Thank you very much for your detailed review. Your feedback is the voice of our customers and we use it to address any areas we can improve on and continue to do the items that make our guests happy. We are pleased to hear your enjoyed the updated renovations and your spacious room because everything we do is done for our guest's happiness. The walk to Disney is definitely one to keep in mind but depending on the size of your family you can always take the shuttle bus or park at Disneyland for a nominal fee. Thank you again and we hope to see you back at our property soon, we want to ensure you receive another perfect stay with us!  Best regards,

Summary: This place is awesome.  It is comfortable, clean, the staff is friendly, the breakfast is terrific, and it is close to Disneyland.  There is a workout room, a pool, and nice outdoor seating for breakfast along with the indoor seating.
Manager Response: Dear Susan H,  Thank you very much for your lovely review. We are grateful you of your feedback and we are glad to hear you enjoyed the hotel and all of the free amenities it offers. You described our mission to each and every guest to a tee, which is a clean., comfortable room with friendly and personable service. We cannot wait to have you back as a guest, please call us directly, we offer a 15% discount to returning customers!  Best regards,

Summary: it was fairly quiet and clean. the only concern was the breakfast area was a little tight and the hours could have been extended to lighten the foot traffic in the morning. I would eliminate the waffle station completely as it seems to block the flow through the counter area. desperate the coffee area, perhaps having another machine in another area of the breakfast location would loosen the traffic as well.
Manager Response: Dear C9085KOjasonp,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as it is our biggest tool to improve our service and product to the needs of our guests. We agree the breakfast room is definitely cozy and we are looking into ways to improve the flow of the traffic during the peak breakfast hours. We are glad you enjoyed the room and noticed the cleanliness of the property which we are very proud of. We hope to see you soon on your future Disneyland trips!  Best regards,

Summary: Family friendly hotel....had a nice stay! Staff was extremely helpful and nice...housekeeping never forget to clean our room...I would recommend to friends and would stay again at this hotel...also very close to disneyland😃 Overall very satisfy with week stay
Manager Response: Dear chrislW2787IE,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so very happy to hear our staff was helpful and we left your satisfied. We are always grateful for your feedback as it is essential to our goal of continually improving based on the needs of our patrons. We hope you come back soon and choose us as your hotel of choice, we will be sure to exceed your expectations with our personable customer service and our spotless rooms!  Best regards,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids
Summary: Clean, quiet, and convenient. Breakfast was good and substantial. Kids loved Mikey Mouse on the walls. Close to Disneyland parking lot. You can buy tickets in the lobby less expensive than at the window.
Manager Response: Dear mlongodietz,  Thank you so much for your short but great review! We are highly encouraged by your feedback to continue to do what we are doing so we can please all of our guests and receive the best feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our famous family room as it definitely suits the need of a small to medium sized family of up to 6, providing enough privacy and comfort-ability for each guest. You definitely enjoyed one of the perks of being a Good Neighbor hotel with Disneyland which means we sell discounted tickets at the front desk! We hope you come back soon and enjoy our hotel on your future Disneyland adventures!  Best regards,

Summary: The hotel is super close to Disneyland and the ART shuttle picks you up right in front of the hotel.  The room was clean and the furniture was updated.  There was a great free breakfast and the staff was very helpful and friendly. I think my only complaint would be it would be nice if the breakfast area was bigger; it got a bit crowded.  I would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer S,  Thank you for your sharing your 5 star hotel stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the many perks of staying at our property such as the free breakfast and the 5 star service and cleanliness of the rooms. We aim to provide this quality experience to every one of our guests and your feedback is what helps us maintain our goal. We agree the breakfast area is definitely our busiest area at the hotel so we always recommend to arrive early in order to avoid any delays. We certainly hope you return to another perfect stay with us here at the Stanford Inn & Suites, until next time!  Best regards,

Summary: Great Place for families. Very clean and the hoyel staff was super nice. The only quelms I had were the spa was not hot at all and there is no elevator. The continental breakfast was ok, but there is a Denny's conveniently located right doen the street. Other than those fee things the stay was amazing!
Manager Response: Dear mommyof3as2013,  Thank you so much for telling us about your stay with us. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the cleanliness level of our property and our service. We strive to make sure every guest that walks through our doors leaves happier when they walk out. We apologize for the spa not being hot and for our lack of elevator, we will look into your issues and find a resolution right away. We hope to see you soon!   Best regards,

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 days and 3 nights. It may not be the most luxurious hotel but it's service and rooms are amazing. The room was clean and modern. I love the Mickey Mouse sticker on the wall. The beds were comfortable, the staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast is ok. This place is great and affordable. I would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear jvillagrana1,  Thank you for sharing your experience at our beloved hotel with us! We pride ourselves in providing the highest level of service and the most pristine rooms to set us apart from other hotels. Your happiness is our goal and your feedback helps us reach our goal. We certainly encourage you to come back soon and we offer a discounted rate for returning customers so mention that on your next trip!  Best regards,

Summary: We had a great stay, we got a room with the bunk beds  and it really made my son happy to have his own space and he loved all the Disney characters on the walls. We will definitely stay again. The complementary breakfast was good loved the waffles and pancakes. The breakfast gets busy so go early.
Manager Response: Dear lynette_lively,  Thank you for your great review. Your feedback is critical to our success and provides insight to what we did right and what we can improve on. We are happy to hear your son loved his own space in the large family room that is definitely a huge perk for the kids. We are glad you enjoyed the new pancake machine as it has definitely been a huge hit since we recently implemented them. We will see you and your family soon!  Best regards,

Summary: We stayed for 6 nights and it was fantastic. We had a great time. Was a 15 min walk to disneyland. Breakfast was good the bed were comfy and it had a laundry on site. We stayed in a family room with 2 adults and 3 kids so we all had plenty of room.
Manager Response: Dear Tracey H,  Thank you for posting your review regarding your 5 star experience at our property. We are grateful for your patronage and we are glad you had a great experience with us because your feedback is what we require to ensure we are making our guests happy which is not only our job, but our passion! You are absolutely right that the family suite is more than spacious enough for 5 people and we are pleased to hear you enjoyed the breakfast and comfort-ability of our beds. Please come visit us again soon, it would be our pleasure to accommodate you and your family again!  Best regards,

Summary: The staff from the front desk to the kitchen employees were very friendly and courteous! Our room was clean and the area was quiet and comfortable. My family loved the breakfast, it was a full menu with eggs, sausage, pancakes, waffles, and it was very good. We were very impressed with our stay at Stanford Inn & Suites. We would definitely recommend staying here to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Ymor76,  Thank you for your great review! Words cannot express how valuable your feedback is to our success and we are glad we met and exceeded your expectations with our accommodations. We have to admit the breakfast is definitely the favorite thing about our hotel to most of our guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest rooms and our breakfast area and your voice and reviews are our best tool to finding this information. We hope you guys come back soon to have some Disneyland fun!  Best regards,

Summary: The room is spacious as we had three adults and one grandchild of seven years. The extra room with the bunk beds was great for him and he had his own place and own time where he could do what he wanted when he wanted without having to bother everyone. He had his own tv to watch and play area for his games. The check in was seamless and the staff was very helpful all week when we needed something. They are very familiar with the surrounding area, the bus services to Disney and Knotts Berry and they also gave us coupons to the restaurants. I would recommend this to anyone who has kids. The Breakfast was superb with eggs, sausage, cereals etc. All you could ask for including fresh fruit.
Manager Response: Dear JimandHeather,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are beyond happy you enjoyed all of the hotel's free amenities and we will be sure to continue to provide excellent and speedy customer service with a quality hotel room to boot. You are correct that our complimentary breakfast is one of our key attractions for our guests and everyone always leaves happy and full, which is certainly a must when preparing for a long day at Disneyland. Please come visit us again soon, we are eager to be your hotel of choice!  Best regards,

Summary: We read positive reviews on this place on Trip Advisor ahead of time and we were not disappointed! The front desk was super friendly and got us a crib when we asked immediately. We loved the refrigerator and microwave in the room, and the separate room for kids with bunkbeds and TV. It was a very reasonable price for what we got. It was nice to have breakfast before we headed out to the theme parks. We also enjoyed the convenience of the ART shuttle stop right outside the lobby. Thank you for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tessa S,  Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us. We are pleased to hear you were not disappointed as your happiness and feedback is of the most importance to us! We are also glad you were able to enjoy the free amenities we offer to make the most of your stay at our hotel! We are within walking distance of Disneyland but when there is the ART shuttle that picks up every 20 minutes right in front of our hotel, that is always a safe bet as well! We hope you come visit us again soon Tessa!  Best regards,

Summary: Room was clean and easy to get to Disney land staff was friendly and let us check in a little early no extra charge restaurants were are close by easy to get to my kids were having s blast with the bunk beds
Manager Response: Dear amberw491,  Thank you for providing us with your valuable feedback. Your feedback is essential to improving our hotel and ensuring our guests receive the best stay possible. We are happy we were able to accommodate your early check in, it is our priority to accommodate each and every guest in any way we can. The bunk beds are definitely the popular choice among our families and we are glad your children loved it! We hope you come back soon, until next time.  Best regards,

Summary: Our family of 6 (Mom, Dad, Thing 1, Thing 2, Grandma and Grandpa) stayed in a 1 bath family suite for 4 nights for the first part of our California vacation. We booked quite a bit in advance and got a very good deal on the rate, however even at normal prices, the room rates are very reasonable and good value.   The weather was somewhat chilly while we were there, so we didn't use the pool. The pool is heated, however, so we could have if we wanted to. Other families were using it. Room was clean and appointed as you would expect for a hotel of this class. Breakfast was fantastic with a very good selection of hot and cold items, including eggs, sausage, cereal, muffins and make your own waffles and pancakes. The inside eating area was fairly small, so getting a table would be
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We are pleased to hear your large family was accommodated and you enjoyed our room and amenities. Your feedback is the most important thing to us so we can continually improve and ensure we are always giving the best service and cleanest room we can offer. You will be happy to hear that there is no such thing as a parking problem at our hotel as we have a parking lot right next door where there is ample parking for all of our guests in case the one within the property gets full which is rare. We apologize for the credit card issue at check in, we will revise our procedures and ensure this doesn't happen in the future. We hope to see you and your family back in Disneyland soon!  Best regards,

Summary: Stayed at Stanford for two nights. We were pleased with cleanliness, breakfast, wifi, free parking. A little far from Disneyland but there are shuttles at a small free available. We stayed at carousel inn and suites for 8 nights because it was right across the street from and we wish we would have just stayed here entire time instead. Definitely a great value with clean and renovated rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie,  Dear fishblow,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are pleased to know that you found our location to be good and you enjoyed our free amenities! We hope you stay with us in the future as we are continually looking for ways to improve our service and rooms for our guest's benefit.    Best regards,

Summary: As stated, this hotel is walking distance to the Convention Center and Disney; rooms are standard rooms - no frills and strange Euro pillows, some with second bedroom with bunk beds for the kids. My issue was that I had a family emergency and had to depart one day early from a 3 night reservation, and although I told them I had to leave a day early well before the 6 PM cutoff 'THE DAY BEFORE'; they still charged me for the night that I was not in the room...AND I do know they rented the room for that night. (Had friends staying there that told me this...) So; decent place to stay...as long as you don't have to leave early...
Manager Response: Dear fishblow,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel. However, we would like to apologize for falling short of your expectations regarding our cancellation policies and procedures. We also regret the issues you had with the pillows. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve and continually provide the best guest experience possible. We hope you stay with us in the future we are sure we will meet your expectations next time around, we have credited your account for the early departure due to your emergency.   Best regards,

Summary: This hotel is great value for money, I would highly recommend it. Breakfast was included and was plentiful and varied. The beds were comfortable and the room was clean. The Wifi worked well and the parking was free.
Manager Response: Dear Steph M,  We want to sincerely thank you for sharing your perfect experience with us! We are glad you enjoyed the free amenities our hotel has to offer such as the breakfast, free parking and the wifi! We pride ourselves on ensuring you receive value for what you pay for and we certainly hit the mark with guests such as yourself! Please come visit us again soon, we look forward to it!  Best regards,

Summary: I would not recommend this hotel has a terrible odor in the rooms, the cleanliness is in question, and the pillows are tiny little squares not even a full pillow .  I just have to say that my luggage and my hair stinks so bad that even a shower couldn't remove the odor
Manager Response: Dear 945mistyp,  Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are extremely disheartened to hear that you were not satisfied with your stay at our hotel and we will absolutely use your experience to enhance our hotel to ensure maximum quality. We apologize for your unsatisfactory experience and we will certainly be making changes immediately to prevent this from occurring again. We are in the process of ordering brand new pillows for the entire hotel so please come visit us again soon, we guarantee you will be thrilled with our updated rooms and pillows. We hope you give us another chance next time you come to Disneyland!  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed in the hotel for 4 nights and were pleasantly surprised. The room was updated and clean. We appreciated the fridge and microwave. The staff was great, especially the breakfast ladies. Breakfast was good, too...waffles, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, breads, eggs and sausage (needed to request), etc. We took the ART bus to Disney, which stopped conveniently in front of the hotel. Just be sure to know the schedule (usually every 20 minutes).  The room was mostly quiet (better than some fancier places we've stayed). There was a bit of traffic noise, and we could hear when the water was running in the other guest room, and we opted for earplugs. We got a great deal, and we really enjoyed the stay.
Manager Response: Dear happy1002016,  Thank you for sharing your story about us! This review will be shared with the team to let them know we are doing everything right and making lasting impressions on our guests. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our simple but effective breakfast that is sure to start everyone's day off right for Disneyland! Please come visit us again the weather is amazing!  Best regards,

Summary: We stayed here on 2 occasions. I highly recommend them to any family going to be in Anaheim, CA. Staff was great and rooms were amazing for a family. There is a second room for the kids with bunkbeds available. First time we stayed there were chairs for the children at the childrens table. Second time there was no chairs and the front desk said they removed them safety. Other than that this is an amazing
Manager Response: Dear stellaisfree,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we are so excited to hear that you enjoyed our hotel! The family suite is definitely one of the most popular room types and you said it your self, it's simply amazing for a family. We will look into an alternative for the chairs at the children's table for maximum comfortability. Please mention you are a returning customer when making your next reservation as we offer a discount! See you soon!  Best regards,

Summary: continental breakfast could be better but overall I would recommend. I drove in from northern California and got in very late but the hotel was very accomidating and I had nice sleep. The shower and bathroom was excellent
Manager Response: Dear nicemany78,  Thank you for sharing your 5 star experience with us! We are so happy to hear that you were accommodated with your late arrival. We are proud to boast that our shower heads are quite powerful and we get many compliments on them so we are happy to add you to that list! We hope you also enjoyed our complimentary breakfast in the morning to start your day off just right! We hope to see you and your family back soon!  Best regards,

Summary: This is a great hotel for familys who has 1-3 children, the rooms are confortable, each one has a bathroom, just make sure the bed and mattress is in good condition, cause sometimes it's not, I've been twice in this hotel and the second time, the mattress was old and I could not sleep very well. The water in thr swiming pool is warm.
Manager Response: Dear aghr79,  Thank you and your family for staying with us and sharing your experience. Our goal is to exceed the expectation of everyone staying with us and we are happy to know we are keeping our word! We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced, our staff is only a moment's notice from making things right so please do not let that keep you from coming back. It would be our pleasure to have your family come visit us again soon, the weather is perfect for late night swimming in our heated pool!   Best regards,

Summary: I couldn't be happier with my experience at Stanford Inn and Suites.  The staff was extremely friendly and acommodating and the rooms were great too.  All and all, just a great value, wonderful staff, and rooms are nice and clean.
Manager Response: Dear 521joelk,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are beaming with joy because our service and immaculate rooms left you with a smile on your face! We hope to have you back soon so you can have another perfect stay with us.  Best regards,

Summary: Save your money worst room over derty stanky customer service bad all around worst trip ever to disneyland i ever had overpriced room rats and roaches my family and kids were disappointed and upset please shut down
Manager Response: Dear donettrad,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are completely shocked and very sorry for your negative experience at our hotel. The Stanford Inn & Suites takes pride in ensuring there are no intruders that go into any room with our monthly inspections from our local exterminator company and your experience has taken our team by surprise. Please contact us at your earliest convenience to discuss your experience we would like to know more and make things right with you.   Best regards,

Summary: We love this hotel, friendly service, great continental breakfast. The rooms are always clean, whenever we need something they're on top of it, if there's a delay of any kind they call and let us know.
Manager Response: Dear shanons272,  Wow! Thank you for your review, we are grateful for your feedback and it is good to see our staff is on top of it! We will use your review as a tool to encourage our staff and continue to provide excellent customer service and follow up! Please come back and enjoy our free breakfast which includes eggs and sausage to start your Disney adventures off right!  Best regards,

Summary: Was expecting more of an upscale room for what they were charging. This hotel is like one step away from Motel 6 quality. Not a $300 room. Not 3 stars. It would be fine for about 75-85 per night. I would give it 2.3 stars. Breakfast was ok. Eggs and sauage. Waffle machine were cool and waffle tasted good.
Manager Response: Dear namm301,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. It is unfortunate you did not think highly of our property as we strive to ensure each guest leaves with a great impression of our hotel, and for that we are dismayed and hope you can forgive us and give us another chance in the future. Our room rates are not typically so high but during the biggest convention of the year NAMM, every hotel in the area including us is priced higher than normal. We are glad you enjoyed our waffle machine at our complimentary breakfast as it is definitely a hit among our guests! We hope you come back next year, we will be making many improvements to the hotel!  Best regards,

Summary Heading: My CHA stay at Stanford Inn
Summary: Great place at a good price.  Nice staff, breakfast and room amenities.  I'm a regular customer there and l highly recommend staying at this hotel, as it is located within a walking distance (15 minutes walk) from Disney Land.
Manager Response: Dear  geotgettej,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us! We cannot be any happier that you are a regular customer as our main objective is to provide quality service and experience that will keep our guests coming back! We are certainly within walking distance from Disneyland and you can always take the Disneyland shuttle after a long day of adventures. We hope to see you soon!  Best regards,

Summary: staffs are very professional and friendly near disneyland and a lot of restaurants. beds are clean and comfortable. bathrooms are clean and nice. highly recommended to friends and family who want to go to disneyland or just for pleasure trip around the area.
Manager Response: Dear raymundturita,  We appreciate you staying with us and are glad to hear about your positive experience while at the Stanford Inn & Suites! We will share your review with the staff and ensure we maintain our quality of service because it is being noticed! We are most certainly accessible to all of the areas of interest in Orange County, thank you for sharing! We hope you come back soon.  Best regards,

Summary: Those beds were very uncomfortable and we could hear people walking above us and slamming doors next to us what seemed like an all night long    For a few dollars more we could have had a kitchenette next-door at residence
Manager Response: Dear jasonsA9355ME,  Thank you for your patron-ship, we value your feedback and use it as a tool to improve our quality and service. We are disappointed you were unable to enjoy your room with us as it is our duty to ensure each guest has a most memorable stay. We apologize for the inconvenience and please be assured that our staff prides themselves on being only one call away from resolving any guest issues. We hope you can come back and stay with us to enjoy our rooms and have a quiet and enjoyable guest experience, please reach out to me if and when you return to Disneyland!   Best regards,

Summary: We usually rent a house but decided to try a hotel this time. It was a fraction of the price but very roomy and clean. We had a child suite room and loved it. It fit our family of 6 great. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear morril2,  Thank you for staying at our beloved Stanford Inn & Suites! We are beyond happy that you chose to stay at a hotel this time and we exceeded your expectations. Please be sure to book your upcoming reservation for the suite room right away as those rooms are in high demand and sell out quickly! We hope you enjoyed the privacy and second bathroom this particular room type offers as it has the luxuries of privacy and coziness all in one at an affordable price! See you back soon!  Best regards,

Summary: We recently stayed at Stanford Suites with our 4 grandkids for a Disneyland visit.  On the positive side, the family suite was affordable and had bunkbeds in a separate little room and 2 queen beds plus a frig and microwave.  The breakfast was adequate with good variety and parking was free.  The ice machine was handy. We found a dirty sock behind the door when we arrived and that did give a negative impression.  The tissues and toilet paper ran out quickly but were replaced. The air conditioning is one of those big under-window units that blow the curtains around, so a nuisance.  But for what we paid, we were close to Disneyland and had a place to sleep and breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear oogramm,  Thank you so much for choosing the Stanford Inn & Suites as your hotel of choice while visiting Disneyland! We are extremely happy that you enjoyed the property and it's many amenities such as free parking, microwave and complimentary breakfast. I apologize for leaving you with a negative impression upon arrival, we will take your feedback and share it with our housekeeping staff and ensure the proper cleaning procedures are being followed. We will also take your A/C incident into consideration and find a solution to your negative experience. Please allow us to host your future visit to Anaheim as I know we will leave a great experience upon your return!  Best regards,

Summary Heading: We got a great deal on this hotel
Summary: We got a room here very cheap because it's low season and you really felt that it was a nice hotel that usually costs more. Great big bedroom with everything we needed . A great pool area that we also used with a hot pool and a cold one. Pretty close to a lot of food places and overall it was a very nice stay!
Manager Response: Dear Hillihappo,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We greatly value your honest feedback as it helps us become the best hotel we can be. We are ecstatic that you enjoyed staying with us and most of all you enjoyed the amenities such as the pool after a long day at Disneyland! We hope you also enjoyed our complimentary breakfast to fuel you and your family up for your Disneyland adventures! Please consider us next time you visit Anaheim as it would be our pleasure to have you back soon!  Best regards,

Summary: We stayed with our 18 month old over a long weekend. The service at the front desk was excellent. The staff were efficient, polite, and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable with plenty of space even once we had a crib added in. Breakfast was basic but had make your own waffles which was a nice touch. The walk to Disneyland takes about 20-25 minutes. Parking is plentiful and free.  One downside is not within control of the hotel and that is that we found many of our fellow guests were very rude and were extremely noisy up to 1am.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments! It's good to hear you received excellent service and we're glad you found the Stanford Inn and Suites to be  a good base for your Disney experience. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Older, clean but not credit card secure.
Summary: Older hotel, booked on travel website.  Price was good, hotel was clean but requested a receipt upon checkout and the hotel clerk refused.  Said the hotel did not do that and that he could not give me a copy of a bill.  Very strange and came home to call credit card company and ask for fraud protection.  Felt a little off to me.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience at the Stanford Inn and Suites. I am glad that you found the hotel to be clean and the price to good. I apologize that you did not receive a receipt upon checkout and will address this with the front desk. Our goal is to provide excellent service at a fair price and as a guest you deserve that experience.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Stayed with family in three rooms over three nights. Rooms are large but are dated.  Excellent pool and spa area and very good laundry facilities Disappointed to see sausages and eggs removed from breakfast menu.  The big bugbear was the beeping of horns of rental cars as the came and went from dawn till past midnight
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us... Your comments regarding your stay with us is very helpful and will be shared with the hotel staff...Glad you found the pool and laundry facilities to be exceptional. Sorry about the beeping horns...

Summary: We stayed in a double room with two bathrooms before Christmas break. The hotel is located very close to Disneyland. The rooms are decorated in Disney theme. I was impressed with the size of the room but the room wasnt that clean or updated. To sum it up, I have stayed in alot better and also have stayed in alot worse!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay with us. It is great to hear that you found the hotel to be convenient to Disneyland and the rooms to be spacious. We pride ourselves in providing clean rooms and will share your comments with the housekeeping staff. Hope to see you again the next time you come to Disneyland!

Summary: Booked here for our Disneyland stay and was very good to get around. The shuttle leaves right outside the hotel and drops you back there. Good clean rooms. Breakfast wasn't much, just toast and waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments...It's always good to hear that the Stanford Inn and Suites is a convenient hotel for Disneyland guests. It's also good to hear that you found your room to be clean...We hope that you and your family will find yourself back in Anaheim very soon!

Summary: I found this hotel on expedia and i booked it at the last minute for a really great price.I asked to check in early and i was told there wasnt any rooms available until 3 so we went and killed some time and came back about two and tried to check in again and while they were able to acommodate us the front desk clerk was very rude and made it a point to let us know that they were doing us a favor he was an older asian man.the room itself was really nice the beds were uncomfortable but that might just be my bad back.the shower was incredible.the best one of any hotel i have ever stayed at.the hot tub was nice also a little on the cool side but nice.the breakfast was great.overall i would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding  your stay at the Stanford Inn and Suites. Please accept our apologies for your room not being available at the time you checked in. The hotel's regularly scheduled check-in time is 3:00 pm so we can properly clean the room from the prior guest. I will share your comments with the staff in order to better accommodate you in the future.   Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Be sure to confirm your reservation!
Summary: We booked 6 rooms at this hotel for an extended family trip. We booked the rooms in November 2014 for our Nov/Dec 2015 trip. A couple months prior to arrival I called and confirmed our reservations and all was well. Upon arrival date, one room in our party was told that someone had called 8 days earlier and cancelled their reservation. There was absolutely no manager available to speak to about the problem, and to make it even better, they had no rooms of that type available. Talk about an awful way to start your week at the happiest place on earth!!! The clerk was rude and extremely condescending. He told us that no one would be available to speak to us about the problem until after 10 AM the next day. After the rest of our party finally was able to check in, in rooms scattered
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your issues regarding the mix up during your check-in. Please accept our apologies on how it was handled. It is important for us to have a courteous staff and I will be sure to address your concerns.I am glad the remainder of your stay was much better and hope that you will plan on staying with us again.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We arrived early (noon-ish) and wanted to check in so we could spend the remainder of the day at Disneyland. They were very accommodating and said if we came back in an hour we could check in early. We went just down the street and killed some time at Target (very convenient to have so close) and then checked in. The room was set up great for families if parents would like some privacy-kids had a separate room and bathroom. It's down the road a ways from the parks and the area in general looks sort of run down but it felt safe enough and the bus to and from the park stopped right at the hotel and was frequent and on time. It was great to have a small fridge and microwave. On site breakfast was crowded at peak times and a little stressful but if you get there early it is
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Stanford Inn and Suites. It is great to hear we could accommodate your early arrival. I am glad to hear to you enjoyed the breakfast and took advantage of the family friendly rooms. We are definitely looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Everything that had to do with the hotel was awesome we had a great stay but one thing I would change would be to keep house of pizza off the room keys and not advertise them. They sucked and it just made us mad at the hotel for even recomending it
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Stanford Inn and Suites. Your comments regarding the pizza is much appreciated and we will make sure we address this with the pizza owner. I hope you will try us again.

Summary: Very clean the staff very friendly only drawback had to park in overflow where I could not see my vehicle never made it to breakfast for it was very early will  definitely say again and did recommend to family and friends
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments regarding the cleanliness of the hotel and friendliness of our staff. We pride ourselves in giving 1st class service...We really appreciate you recommending us to your family and friends and look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: I am happy to be a customer at standford inn hotel
Summary: I live in Los Angeles ,and l have been staying at this place every time l go down there, mostly every month or twice. Selena is great person  she works at the front desk ,l know most of the people that work there all of them are so helpful. Rooms are spacious, cleaned, include frige , micro and coffee maker and also all rooms have a flat screen TV.  Free breakfast, and pool . I have stayed at other hotels near by to mention the Double Tree hotel but still l love this place better.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback and thank you for being a loyal customer! It's especially good to hear good comments regarding the staff. We look forward to your next visit.  See you soon!

Summary: Stayed at the Stanford Inn  for 3 nights for our Disney vacation. We got the two bath family suite and my kids loved it.   While in a convenient location and a good price. The rooms were good, clean and quiet. Breakfast  was good  we stopped right before going to Disneyland.  The Art stops everyday at the same time which made to easy to get around with a to  two year old and a 6year old. Customer Service was great very helpful and friendly I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive comments! We pride ourselves in providing family friendly service and I am glad we met your expectations. Hope to to see you back at The Stanford Inn and Suites very soon!

Summary: Stayed for three days. My priorities are location, then budget. The rooms itself are not to much of a worry to me as long as they are clean as we spend no time at all in our room. This place got a 3 out of 3 for the above. Laudromat was there so were able to catch up on washing in the middle of our month trip. Shuttles to Disneyland out the front. Free brekky included but it was so overcrowded and 2 pop up toasters insufficient for the crowds. Rooms clean but at $199AU for 4 people for 2 nights it was unbeatable.
Manager Response: Jo M,  Thank you for your review of the Stanford Inn and Suites.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you next time that you visit the area.

Summary: While in a convenient location and a good price, you get what you pay for.  The rooms were very musty and not in very good shape.  We felt unclean the entire stay.  The breakfast was not the best compared with other places we stayed.  Lucky we only slept here while we visited the theme parks.
Manager Response: SSmith2016,  Thank you for your review of the hotel.  I apologize that the hotel, and the recently renovated rooms, did not meet your expectations.  Please rest assured that cleanliness is at the top of our list so we will review your issue with our staff.

Summary: We had 3 adjacent rooms for your extended family.  The rooms were good, clean and quiet. The morning breakfast was adequate as we rushed off to visit Disneyland. The kids liked the waffles. Pool and hot tub were slightly on the cool side considering it was December and the temperature was in the low 60s..
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay...I appreciate your comments regarding  the pool and hot tub and will be sure the staff addresses the water temperature with the weather is cool.  Thanks again!

Summary: This was a great place to stay. The house keepers did a wonderful job.the front desk was very helpful. Shuttles to Disneyland stopped in front of the hotel every 20 minutes which was a great convenience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel and we love it. Rooms are great. Clean and comfortable. The free breakfast is excellent as well. Definitely recommend and will continue to stay there. Just needed bigger pillows
Manager Response: none

Summary: Got the room last min n didnt expect much since it was still available. Room was nice, looks like they remodeled not to long ago. The little couch that the room came with had a weird stain on it but whatevers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is very convinient which is very close to Disney.  Family Room is great and spacious with Disney Characters in wall. Parking is sufficient. Breakfast is decent. All staff are superbly friendly
Manager Response: none

Summary: Bunk bed matresses need to be cleaned  they smell like urine or the sheets need to be thouroully washed or new matress pads put on the beds . The room size for the price was accurate and the location was perfect !
Manager Response: Thank you for your response...We understand the importance of a clean room, especially when traveling with children. We are addressing your concerns.  Thanks again!

Summary: Very good front desk customer service excellent house keeping. Everything near by. Everyone very nice. I will always stay at this hotel. No complaints at all for this hotel. Washer and dryer very cheap to wash and fast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second trip to Stanford inn and Suites and it was just as enjoyable as the first time. The first time we stayed in the summer of 2014 and our room stayed nice and cool. This time around we traveled at end of November into December 2015 and our room stayed nice and warm. The kids room even had its own unit to keep the room warm. Check in has always been a very quick easy process. They kept the room very clean and well stocked with towels, soaps etc and our continental breakfast was very good. Perfect variety between hot and cold items to eat before we hit Disneyland parks each day! We will definitely be staying here again next time we are visiting Anaheim as both times they have provided us with excellent service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind and warm review. Keeping our guest rooms at the right temperature makes for a comfortable stay. That is why between guest checkouts our maintenance staff make sure that our ac units are working at peak performance. I'm glad that the consistency in a great product and friendly service has exceeded expectation and that we will be seeing you again.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: My family of 5 had a great experience in November.  We got the two bath family suite and my kids loved it.  When we got into the room it smelled and looked clean.  Wifi, beds and showers were perfect. Front office staff was friendly and helpful!!!   Only con- for the last two days the room had a strong smell like urine. When we talked to the front desk, they came and checked out.  Cleaned the AC vents and it smelled so much better.   We would love to go back!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay. It is always great to welcome our repeat guest. I am glad to read that you and your family enjoyed our spacious family suite including the many amenities we offer. I will make sure to pass on your comments about the room to my housekeeping staff. We look forward to your next visit with us.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: This "Inn" is in reality a motel, it has changed hands over the years since I stayed in 2002 and while the actual accommodation has been upgraded and the rooms very comfortable, there is no lift to the second floor and the exterior is very dated.  Our room had the distinct odour of stale air and the carpet left my feet black.  Breakfast was in line for the cost of the room but eggs had been removed from the menu.  Very close to most amenities in the Disney district but it needs work.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I can assure you that your comments have been addressed with the appropriate departments involved for immediate corrective action. It is always a pleasure to welcome back our repeat guest. We hope you will continue to stay with us as we look forward to your return.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: My husband booked this hotel on his own without even telling me so we have a place to nap during our Disneyland visit.   I liked the idea but we ended up going there after a full day visit at D-land.   Because it was a no-namer to me, I was expecting basic basic accommodation.  I read one review and that reviewer complained about the thin windows and noisy area.  I was turned off already, but what could I do.  It's done. But I was wrong. We were lucky to get a room closest to a quiet street, so it wasn't too noisy.  We slept good.   Room was updated without the stinky old bathroom smell.  The sink area had a huge gold fancy mirror with granite tops.  The tub was clean. Actually the whole place was clean...meaning they have a pretty good housekeeping staff. Pillows were fluffy,
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and thank your husband for choosing our hotel. I am glad to read that we exceeded expectations. I have passed on your comments to my entire staff and we hope this is not the last visit.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM.

Summary Heading: Great and value for money! But made to switch rooms middle of stay.
Summary: We booked a kid suite with 1 bathroom. No issues arriving close to midnight and check in was quick. We also bought our SoCal passes there at the front desk, very convenient! Our room was on the ground floor, no problem bringing out luggages from the car park, and the furthest building away from Harbor boulevard. We had no issues with noise. The room was tidy, beds comfortable and the kid's room gave the children (1 & 4 yr olds) plenty of space to play. However, the room we got doesn't look like a newly refurbished one. Also, the carpets were not so clean. Our feet/socks turned a bit gray after walking around the room. These aren't big issues for us so we unpacked and settled down for our 9 nights stay. It was on the 4th night returning from a long day, we were informed by the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay. I am truly sorry that you had pack in the middle of your stay and move rooms. I can assure you that it was never our intention to cause such an inconvenience. I am glad to know that you were given an upgraded suite with 2 baths and that the staff was there when you called. We are constantly striving to improve our product and services. Your comments have been shared with the entire Stanford Inn & Suites team and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to our hotel.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Stanford Inn And Suites.  The price was perfect for our budget.  Housekeeping cleaned our room daily. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  We used the ART transportation bus to Disneyland which worked out well. A super target is located close by so we could stock up on snacks and water. The location of this hotel was perfect for us, close to Disneyland and the freeways.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Met our need for the most part
Summary: When looking for a hotel, having a separate room for the kids at a price that was reasonable was most important. Stanford Inn & Suites had a family suite and was the most inexpensive option. It was our second stay at this hotel. We basically needed a place to sleep and get some food before heading off to Disneyland for the day. The beds were pretty comfortable and the front desk staff was friendly. The complimentary breakfast was a bit disappointing since it advertised eggs and sausage, but said they no longer provided those items when we got there. It was a bigger deal for us since my wife has so many food allergies she really couldn't eat anything there. Aside from that, it seemed to meet our needs and worked well for us.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Over priced for what you get
Summary: I really wish I would have done a bit more research before booking here. At first everything seemed fine but then realized the safe was locked and when the guy came to fix it he said hed be back in 15 and never came back. The outlets wouldnt hold the plugs when you plugged something in.....it was very loose. We were woken up by construction at 630am. The walls and ceiling are paper thin. our room was right by the stairs and whenever anyone would go on them it sounded like an elephant stampede. We booked the hotel thru expedia and i made the mistake of not booking enough nights so i had to add one night on at reguar price and it was absolutely appalling to find out that the regular price was almost $200/night (it was 98/night thru expedia) I will never recommend this hotel or
Manager Response: Thank for sharing your experience. I can assure you that your comments have been addressed with appropriate departments for immediate corrective action. The construction work that was done during the time of your visit was an isolated incident for that time only. It was never our intention to inconvenience you or any of our valued guest. I hope you will give us another opportunity to show you that we do care and listen to our guest feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We don't go on extravagant trips, but have stayed in hotels before.  This one is by far the cleanest place we have stayed.  The breakfast is self-serve, wonderful items to choose from.  The front desk workers are so quick to help when asked questions, even directions!  I would highly recommend Stanford Inn & Suites to anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing about your stay. I am very happy that we were able to meet expectations. I have addressed your comments with my entire staff and I thank you for your recommendations. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Over all nice hotel to stay at. I like the fact that is was really close to the park, so that after spending all day, I didn't have travel far to get back, or traffic. I like that there was a spare room to where the kids could have there own space.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy to access and  very helpful front desk staff. More than happy to find us a room for early checkin. Huge rooms and with very comfortable beds. Not enough space in the breakfast area....and lots of families heading to the parks I guess!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Stanford. Everyone was very friendly, super efficient and helpful. It is located on the ART route and close to restaurants and some shopping. The rooms were a great size, we had a family suite and it was great having a separate space for the children, they were very clean and well maintained. Thanks for a great stay, we would certainly come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great budget hotel, close to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay here again
Summary: I've stayed here twice and both times I had no issues.  I was a little skeptical at first as it was a bit further down from the park and unsure how the rooms would be.  But, I was pleasantly surprised that my stay here was great and really good value for the price paid per night.    It can be a bit loud depending on the side of the property you're on.  It's to be expected as 99% of people travelling here are families with small children.    All the things that make this place great for me:  - free parking - free wifi - free breakfast - sell ART shuttle tickets - sell Disneyland tickets - ART shuttle stop is in front of the hotel next door - Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles is across the street - rooms are decent enough from what you'd expect from a budget/2-2.5 star hotel that I can't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. We do look forward to your next visit at the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We have used this place before, and it always provides good service, comfortable rooms, and a reasonable price. If you have little ones, make use of the Anaheim Resort Transit service, otherwise, it's about a 20 minute walk to the main gates of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again. We continue to strive for consistency in all we do by providing our guest with a comfortable room, warm breakfast and friendly service. We look forward to welcoming you as our guest on your next visit.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Stayed here twice in July 2014 by myself and returned with my family choosing this hotel primarily because of the very reasonable price of the accommodation.  We stayed in a 'COMFORT KID’S SUITES, TWO BATH' room which had two queen beds in one room and bunk beds for our children in the other.  The separate bathrooms were great and the overall size of the room gave us all space.  The only downside was noise from the people in the room above.  I highly recommend asking for a room on the second floor.  The only downside there is that there are no elevators. It's roughly a 25 minute walk to Disneyland from the Hotel.  The WiFi signal has improved.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were clean and spacious kids loved having separate room from us.  Breakfast was a nice added bonus. We were in Disneyland for Thanksgiving no complaints room was clean every day we will be staying again and May. See you soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Disneyland, shops and transport
Summary: I recently spent 4 nights at this hotel with my 17 year old daughter and her friend as a school graduation trip and we really enjoyed our time at this hotel.  The staff were very friendly and let us check in early after just having got off the long flight from Australia.  The rooms are quite spacious with the basin outside the bathroom which helps when everyone is getting ready at the same time for a big day at Disneyland!  The Anaheim Resort Transportation bus stops right outside the hotel and we purchased a 3 day pass from the staff at the hotel to go to Disneyland for just $12 each (has to be used on consecutive days.  The bus goes past about every 20 - 30 minutes. The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland but a fair walk, so I would recommend getting the bus to save your
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were very clean.  With 6 adults traveling 2 bathrooms were an added plus.  Would love to stay here again.  Proximity to Disney is another plus.  Breakfast was OK.  Only complain I have is that you could hear the people from the 2nd floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good quality budget hotel - the rooms were very clean and tidy, breakfast is  included with the room rate and the location is great for places like Disneyland (which can be easily reached via a shuttle bus (paid) that operates from outside the hotel).  There is also an outdoor pool, and spa facility, that was great to use after a day's travels to Disneyland.  All-in-all a family-friendly hotel, at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect for a large family or group
Summary: My whole family was really happy staying here. Our room had two queens and a bunk bed and fit my husband, son, both of our moms and myself in the room perfectly. We really liked the breakfast and that the ART stops right in front of the hotel, and is just a short ride to Disneyland! The only thing that was off-putting about this hotel was that our room had a weird smell to it, like it had not been occupied for a long time. The staff is very friendly and helpful too! My husband was on crutched at the time and they were able to give me information about renting a wheel chair at the park as well as a near by company that would rent and deliver a wheel chair if we couldn't get one at the park. We plan on staying here again. The price and location are just right and the rooms are
Manager Response: Thank for your review. I am glad to hear that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us. I have addressed the room condition with my staff for immediate improvement. Our spacious rooms, bountiful continental breakfast and closeness to Disneyland makes for a great time. We look forward to welcoming you and your family when you return.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM.

Summary: Stayed here 6 nights in Dec. with family of 5.  Everything was good except the excessive road noise that can be heard even when all windows and doors are completely shut.  The windows also rattle when people are walking around in the room above.  I used earplugs throughout the night, which helped but did not eliminate all the road noise.  Maybe the doors need weather stripping?  Stayed in room #104.  Rooms were clean, maid service was excellent, breakfast is good, pool was good too.  The ART bus was often overcrowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. I am sorry to read that you had a noise issue with your room. I have shared your comments with my team and plans are in the works to better soundproof our guest rooms. I am happy that you enjoyed our warm and hearty breakfast, clean comfortable guest rooms and other amenities our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to our hotel.   Regards, Bismark Leasau

Summary: Staying at the Stanford currently. Two adults and two sons aged in their late teens in one room. Staff have been very helpful and the rooms very clean and tidy. Excellent value for money. Booked well in advance and got a great rate. Good free wifi and breakfast included in room rate.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  I am happy to read that you are enjoying your stay with us.  Please reach out to us at anytime if we can be of service to you and the family. Our clean and comfortable room, warm and hearty breakfast along with our friendly staff as you mentioned in your comments makes for a perfect start to any day. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful however I would not consider this place to be called a hotel but rather a motel. Not a family place. Room smelled. Breakfast area very small but food was decent for the price paid.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback. I know it could be quite misleading but I can assure you whether a hotel or motel our product will stand up to most hotels /motel in our neighborhood. I have addressed the room issues with my staff for immediate correction. I hope you will one day give us another opportunity to show you that we do care and listen to our guest comments. I look forward to welcoming you back to the Stanford Inn & Suites.   Regards, Bismark Leasau

Summary Heading: Good enough if economy is what you're after
