Summary: Everything was clean.  The people behind the front desk were friendly and efficient.  Decor is average but in good shape.  Plenty safe.  There were too few outlets for the 21st century traveler.  Basic but a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as we will continue to make the necessary improvements needed so that we become the hotel of choice for all who visit Anaheim. Thank you again for staying with. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: For the price we paid, Stanford Inn and Suites was above and beyond our expectations. While only a mile from Disneyland park, it might be a little far to walk at the end of a long day in the park. The breakfast was good. We will be back...
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us and to hear you'll be back is extra special with that said, Thank you for your kind review. We look forward to welcoming your entire family back to the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Stanford inn and suites, hotel was really clean and comfortable , staff were so accomodating. Hotel was only a 15 minute walk if that and just down the road , hotel also offers theme park tickets and shuttle (ART) tickets which is a shuttle that takes you to and from Disney as many times as you like for only $5 and stops right out front of hotel. There are restaurants and take away all along street of hotel. We will definitely be staying here again.. Hotel also does a breakfast that is complimentey and very good . Fantastic hotel so glad we stayed here , THANKYOU Stanford you made our stay wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for that awesome review. I am so happy to read that you and your family  had a Wonderful stay with us. It makes us proud to know that you and your family will be staying with us on your next visit Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Great customer service , from check- in to room service. Convenient to have breakfast on site with a nice variety . The property was well kept,rooms clean.Only issue was a musty smell in room. I could overlook that due to the great price with free parking I look forward to staying here again in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. I am happy to read that you had a wonderful stay with us. I can assure you that your comments have also been addressed with my housekeeping staff for immediate improvement.  I'm glad you enjoyed the breakfast and that the room was clean throughout your stay. Me and my friendly staff look forward to your return.  Regards, Bismark Leasau

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites. Our room was clean and comfy. We had 2 queens, microwave, fridge, large TV, coffee maker. We made our reservations early and got a great rate. The hotel was on the bus route and convenient to Disney.  The staff was very good.  I would recommend this hotel and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the many amenities we offer along with our clean, comfortable rooms and great rate. Our staff is amazing and putting our guest needs first is our most highest priority. Your recommendation is greatly appreciated. We look forward to your return on your annual visit to Disneyland.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Whenever we go to Disneyland or the surrounding area, we ALWAYS stay here!  The rooms are always clean and the continental breakfast has a large selection.  Best of all, the price is usually lower than the surrounding hotels.
Manager Response: Welcome back as Always! You know that we will always have a consistently clean and comfortable guest room. Continental breakfast like no other and the most friendliest staff you will ever meet. We are here for you. We look forward to your return.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: I stayed here with my kids in November. Our room was refurbished and clean. Like your basic best western but completely good for the price. My only complaint is the week day breakfast didn't start until 7am! Wait too late to make it to Disneyland by 8am opening. Also the breakfast room is small. But overall great value for the $$
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  One of our most popular times is breakfast and knowing that we needed additional space we recently added our breakfast patio complete with table umbrella. I am very happy to read that your room was clean and comfortable for the whole family. We look forward to welcoming the entire family on your next visit to the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary Heading: MOTEL.. FILTHY, GROSS STENCH.... DONT GO
Summary: We saw this place had generally great reviews so we went ahead and booked it.  BAD IDEA. Upon arrival in the middle of the day, although the gentleman checking us in was quite nice, the manager or supervisor in the background did not appear so. She continually rolled her eyes at the explanations the Front desk member was giving us and started talking to another colleague in spanish (Even though the front desk employee helping me was of a different culture)  I find it tremendously rude of managers or supervisors to intimidate staff members that way.   Secondly, in the middle of the night they were CLEANING the room beside us which of course is annoying with a vaccuum running while you are trying to sleep.   Thirdly, our sheets were FILTHY. Yellow Brown stains on the duvet covers
Manager Response: Please accept my sincerest apology for failing to meet the expectation you have come to expect from our hotel. I can assure you that every guest room is thoroughly cleaned and inspected before it's released for assignment. I have addressed your comments with my entire staff and immediately started to retrain and refocus on our commitment to the quality and service Stanford Inn & Suites is highly known for. Thank you for the positive comments regarding my guest service associate upon check-in.  I hope you will one day give us another opportunity to show you that we do care and listen to our guest feedback. Please contact me personally if you have any further comments or concerns and I will be happy to speak with you.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM Stanford Inn & Suites 714-703-1220

Summary: Wasn't expecting much from this hotel (due to to the low price to stay there) but was blown away with the staff, breakfast, service and amenities. All of the staff are very friendly and helpful and helped to make our stay easier. There's a ART bus that stops right outside this hotel and you can go anywhere from Disneyland to Orange County shopping centre, Knottsberry farm etc for the low price of $5 per person per day. $12 for 3 day pass, Tickets are sold in reception at Stanford.The $20 5 day pass is sold elsewhere at ART kiosks. These passes can be used repeatedly on that 1 day. DIY laundry is $1 per wash and $1 per dry. Breakfast is plentiful and a good variety. House keeping and maintenance staff are friendly and always helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Providing service that goes beyond expectations is our way of appreciating our guest every time all the time. We look forward to your next visit when in Anaheim.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary Heading: Will return for a third trip
Summary: It's a bit loud on the back side of the hotel due to traffic but very survivable. Great breakfast options, clean rooms close enough to walk to Disneyland if needed but it does have a ART bus stop next to the office. I have also stayed in a family suite that was perfect for 6 with two bathrooms. Close to lots of dining, shopping centers and next door to the best Italian ice shop ever, Joe's.
Manager Response: I'm excited to hear you will be back. I'm also happy to hear the room was comfortable and that you and the family enjoyed the breakfast along with the many other amenities we have to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Clean and friendly helpful staff. we were very happy during our 9 day stay!  The room was clean, breakfast was nice and the beds were amazing.  We will definitely stay here again next time we are in Anehiem.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We will continue to keep our rooms clean and comfortable while providing every guest with a warm hearty breakfast. The friendly staff of Stanford Inn & Suites awaits your return.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Staff was very friendly. Place was clean and nice. Breakfast, although the same everyday, was good to tide over for Disneyland. They even let us park there even though we checked out. Great experience! Recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are a great place with all the comforts of being away from home. Our friendly staff, hearty breakfast and clean comfortable rooms make us the ideal place to stay while in Anaheim.  We look forward to your next visit.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: The hotel was well taken care of and clean.  It was nice to be able to get breakfast before heading to the parks, plus it was even nicer not to have to pay more money for breakfast!  All of the employees were very friendly, and it was nice to have a separate room for the kids.
Manager Response: I agree that we are a great place to stay. All the amenities you look for in a hotel are here. No need to stay anywhere else. The friendly staff of Anaheim Inn & Suites will make sure that you get a clean and comfortable room, warm and hearty breakfast each and everyday of your stay. We can't wait for your return.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Very happy with the quality for the price!  Included breakfast, spacious with plenty of room for the family.  CLEAN!  We've stayed here three or four times now and have never been disappointed.  Will be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review. We aim to please.We will always be here for you providing the clean  comfortable room and friendly service you have come to expect with our hotel. We can't wait for your return we'll be waiting.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary Heading: Very Nice staff and very convenient,
Summary: We had a very nice stay at the Stanford Inn there is a washer/Dryer on premises as well as a pool and hot tub Although the Hot tub was not working properly during our visit There was a nice selection at breakfast that came with the room and ample room space
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I'm glad to hear that you had a great time with the exception of our hot tub not being warm enough. I can assure that after some minor adjustments we have it operating better than before. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Stanford Inn & Suites.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: The hotel was ok. They had a room ready 1 hour before check in for us, which was nice. The room was clean. Breakfast was make your own waffles, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, eggs and sausage patties, bananas, orange juice or apple juice. They do have a pool and spa our family didn't use it. The gym had 2 treadmills and a bike. On the website the picture has a weight machine that is not in there, my husband was upset about that. Other then that it's a place to stay on a budget. Nothing fancy but was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm glad to hear that we were able to provide you and your family with an early check-in. Our goal is to offer our valued guest like you quick check-in, a clean comfortable room, a nice hearty breakfast to start your day and some extra amenities to  relax. I apologize that our fitness room did not meet your expectations. We are planning on making some needed improvement in 2016. I do hope you will give us another opportunity to show you that we do care and listen to our guest comments.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: I have no complaints at all about my stay. It has free parking, breakfast, and a pool. It's about an 11 minute walk to Dianeyland. The lady at the front desk was very helpful about telling us what places were good to eat in waking distance. Definitly would stay here again!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you as our guest. I am happy to read that you had an Excellent stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Regards,  Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Overall The Stanford Inn was a wonderful experience we had a family suite with 2 bathrooms and it was more that enough room for our family of 5. The breakfast choices were great for the kids including being able to make your own waffles! The Staff was very friendly and helpful and coming back to a nice clean room everyday after visiting the parks was a huge bonus! Not having to pay for parking like other properties in the area was also very nice and catching the bus right in front of the hotel to go to the parks was really cool as well. We will be booking at Stanford again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. The entire team of Stanford Inn & Suites look forward to your return.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: A special thank you to Wendy and Esther for their knowledge, friendliness and organized our activities. Clean room and great breakfast . We couldn't have done without you. We stayed 3 nights and we would stay there next time and Julia
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments. Wendy and Esther are part of  an awesome team that have the "Do what it take" attitude to make sure our guest are well taken care of, combine that with a Clean room and a great Breakfast and your off to a great start . We look forward to your next stay with us.   Regards,  Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: I found this gem of a hotel on getawaytoday.com and I'm sure glad I did!!  We booked the Family suite with 2 queens  in one room and bunk beds in the other...loved the 2 full baths. ..made it easier  to  get  all 5 adults  ready for Disney early in the morning.  We stayed nov 6-9.  Our total price including  the ART shuttle was $403. Great price for such an awesome hotel. Hotel was great and so was the staff!!!  The bunk beds were roomy and able to accommodate adults. Our room was clean and just like the hotel website  pictures. Breakfast consisted of regular  and blueberry waffles you make yourself, eggs, sausage patties, bread/toast, bagels/cream cheese, orange juice, apple juice, coffee, yogurt, cereal and bananas. We used the ART To get to Disneyland, which picks up right
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I couldn't agree more it is a Gem of a hotel. Sounds like you had a great time with the family. We are all about making our guest feel at home. King beds, queens beds, bunk beds, breakfast, ART shuttle, extra amenities and the friendly staff... why choose any other hotel. Again, thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return.  Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We stayed at the Stanford Inn And Suites for 16 nights in a Kids Suite With Two Baths there is 6 of us and the room accommodated us well. Kids enjoyed the breakfast and room was clean, staff were friendly and helpful and any issues were dealt with.  For us everything was in close proximity we did not use the local transport as we had hired a car. There are plenty of restaurants in walking distance and also a Target close by Would definitely choose to stay here again when we return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I was happy to hear that the suite accommodated you and your family well. With the variety of breakfast selection and close proximity to Disneyland and shopping we are please that you chose our hotel. We look forward to providing the same exceptional service on your next visit with us.   Regards,  Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: We stayed there for 9 nights. It was a good stay. Hotel was clean & not noisy. Air conditioning unit same as in most hotels in America quite noisy. Breakfast was the same as a lot of American hotels, waffles, bagels, egg & sausage but adequate. Good washing facilities & a nice pool. Staff always very friendly. Good place to stay.
Manager Response: We are glad to be your hotel of choice while visiting from afar. Your kind review is greatly appreciated. It's nice to know that our clean room, daily breakfast and friendly staff made for a good stay. Thank you for having the Stanford Inn & Suites as part of your Disneyland experience. We look forward to welcoming you back.   Regards, Bismark Leasau, GM

Summary: Will definitely stay again! Breakfast was good and plenty. Grounds were clean and staff friendly. Kids loved their bunk beds and we loved our space. Shuttle to Disney was conveniently located in front of hotel and ran every half hour. Made our trip at the end of the day to go back to a clean and cool room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nothing super fancy but good location and clean.  Free breakfast and free parking. Very nice staff. I enjoyed my stay and would stay again. The front desk was very helpful. Good customer service. Good place
Manager Response: none

Summary: Price was good for the area. The room was ok, had a strange smell, bathroom outdated. Breakfast was fine (it was free), had the usual: waffles, bagels, eggs, sausage, oj, fruit, toast, coffee tasted like it was instant coffee.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hotel if you have a car
Summary: Great value for the price. Includes free internet and free parking. The free breakfast includes cold and hot selection which is limited to eggs, sausages, waffles and toast with juices.  A bit of a walk to Disney but the ART stops at the door to transport you to Disney. They are very strict about NO SMOKING which I like.  Good selection of food around and a TARGET store nearby. Joe's Crab Shack was the pick of restaurant a block south.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've stayed 3 separate times now for a total of 8 nights.  Never have we stayed anywhere with better more comfortable beds and pillows.  Breakfast is better than most resort hotels.  We will always stay here when we go to Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family had a blast and loved the breakfast and felt mostly home away from home. My children ended up sleeping on the floor due to the bunk beds being so uncomfortable. They could feel the plastic mattress cover through the very thin sheet. They service was very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An Excellent Hotel with all the Ammenites
Summary: My family and I stayed there for a week in October. This hotel suited all of our needs and we got a pretty good rate online (hotel website). We stayed in a family suite. It was perfect. It had two double beds in the main room and a adjoining on-suite, it also had a kids suite with bunkbeds and a separate bathroom. This was the perfect setup.  Positives: 1. Outdoor pool was nice, kept clean. 2. Free Parking (most places in the area charge $10 per vehicle per night) 3. 10 minute drive to Downtown Disney and Disneyland Parking area 4. Close Proximity to shopping and dining options 5. Very accommodating/friendly hotel staff 6. Free WIFI  Negatives: 1. Bit too far to walk to Disneyland (apx. 20-25min).  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone with children looking to stay in
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great hotel if you want to stay away from the parks. They have great family suites and Disney themed rooms. ART picks up right outside the hotel. One of my favorite places to stay when I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel room and property was pretty clean and well kept for a family of 4, with one 9 year old and one 4 year old. Since we only needed the room to sleep at night and a little breakfast in the morning before we headed out to Disneyland it was perfect. I really have no complainants. The hotel was clean, close to Disney (12 minute drive), cheap, and had a good breakfast selection for a family on the go.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a family room with one bathroom.  We thought it was an excellent place to stay and very good value for the price.  We would definitely stay here again.  Staff were friendly and helpful. It was about a 2.3km walk (1.4 miles) to Disneyland, which we discovered was a fairly good walk, we would walk this distance a lot at home but did find after a long day at the parks that it is worth considering the ART bus at least for on the way back.  It was a fantastic location in terms of places to eat (like Jack in the Box, Roscoes Chicken and Waffles, Taco Bell, Joe's Crab Shack, Denny's, Carls Jr).  The kids utilised the pool which was excellent.  We also made use of the laundry to do washing which is just off the pool area.  With three teenagers, the quality of wifi was important
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the Stanford for 7 days. The room had a musty smell but other than that and no creamer or sugar for the coffee it was a nice little place. Bring your own conditioner because they only provide shampoo. And if you are looking for a place with the best water pressure in their showers of any hotel I have ever stayed this is the place for you!  The beds are comfortable and their strange square pillows were nice. Free HBO :) Maid service was always good and believe me my teenager made it hard with all her stuff everywhere. Breakfast was good. Same thing every day but hey at least they had sausage and waffles. Waffles seem to be a rarity at breakfasts these days.. blueberry and regular. The only thing I would change is add more fruit. Bananas are your only choice and no one
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is convenient to the Disney Park.  I have taken the ART bus ($5.00 for an adult all-day pass).  This bus picks you up right in front of hotel and drops you off in the bus area right outside the entrance to the Park.  Rooms are clean roomy.  Has a in-room safe.  Family suites are great for a large family or someone wanting their private area.   Beds are comfortable.  Hot breakfast is just OK, but it is enough to start your day before heading to the Park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 3 days after traveling back to LA from Las Vages,, The Stanford Inn is easy to find, and is in a good location, to visit most places in Anaheim and LA, the breakfast is good, and the rooms are a good size and nice and clean, it is good value for money, compare this to other motels and hotels, and then you will see how good this is.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Second time visit and still amazing!
Summary: Customer service  was great, rooms were always cleaned awesome, pool and hot tub were perfect for fall evening hours. Love the proximity  to restaurants, Joe's Italian ice and not close to park so for me that is a perk. We had the two Queens this time and not the suite but enjoyed our stay just as much. Mickey and company wall decals are a great touch!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We love Standford Inn. This has become the hotel we stay with our family. The kid suite is perfect for us. We were pleasantly suprised the morning breakfast had more waffle irons. Although the kids were a little sad no doughnuts.  We also liked that the bus stop moved to right in front of the hotel vs having to walk over the the hotel next door. The bus did take a longer period of time to arrive.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Standfor Inn and Suites is a great value and we will surely being staying again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here from 19th till 22nd october 2015. Had no problems at all, room was clean and comfortable. Decent size and fairly close to Disneyland. We bought Disneyland tickets at lobby for a few dollars cheaper then the park itself. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay here was very nice! The complimentary breakfast was delicious! The shuttle picked you up right in front of the hotel and the workers are very sweet and nice! the only down thing is they do not have elevators. So my boyfriend and I had to carry a full stroller up the stairs, a bit of a hassle but not too much of a concern. Overall, my stay here was very nice and i definitely would recommend it to everyone!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Once again we stayed in a kid's suite with 2 bathrooms at the Stanford Inn & Suites. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are always very clean. The kids enjoy having their own room. It is very helpful to have the 2 bathrooms with a large family. This time we stayed in a room that was on the backside of the hotel. It meant that it was a little noisier than our past stays because there is a road that runs right behind the hotel. I suggest asking for a room facing the parking lot instead. We were too tired to notice much at night anyway after spending all day at Disneyland. Already have our next trip booked with Stanford Inn & Suites and can't wait.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at Stanford Inn last week for five nights.  This is our third stay at this hotel.  We choose to stay here during our Disneyland vacations because it's very clean, the beds and pillows are comfortable, and the price is right.  The employees are polite.  The breakfast is light but filling enough until lunchtime.  The ART stops right out front.  This hotel is basic and there's nothing fancy about it but it's absolutely perfect for families like mine who just need a clean and affordable place to sleep and shower after a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had been looking forward to this trip & we're excited for this hotel. Our expectations were not let down. The family suite with two bedrooms & two baths was spectacular! All the staff we interacted with were always so nice, cheerful & willing to help. Housekeeping did a great job. The pool & hot tub were great. The property was clean & maintained. Landscaping was also nice. The breakfast was nice with more options than the other hotels we stayed at on the way to & from. There were a couple of things that could have been better. One of the two washing machines was broken half of our stay, which made getting laundry done with a booked hotel difficult. It also stinks that you can only wash clothes with cold water. It was nice to see the second washer fixed & operational during
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were at a conference in Long Beach for the week. Once it was over, we decided to go to Disneyland for a day before heading home to Texas! I am a very budgeted person, ok, I'm cheap! However, I want bang for my buck, cleanliness, and no bugs! I am an avid trip advisor junkie! I travel a lot on business, then usually have a night or two on my own for pleasure! With the pleasure comes cost....out of my pocket! I have very high expectations for hotels. I don't care if a place is a 5 star foofoolala hotel that costs $500 a night, if there is mention of filth, bugs, or bad customer service, IM NOT STAYING THERE! I really appreciated the reviews of this place and the cost. My coworker wanted the Roscoes chicken and waffle place, which this hotel is right across the street from.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The two-room suite was perfect for our family of 6.  The kids had their own room and were very excited.  The accommodations were great and breakfast was a bonus by saving us the added expense.  Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was very nice, one of the best I've been in.  One thing was missing was the coffee and creamers in the breakfast room, otherwise it was great.  It was close to Disneyland and if I don't walk the bus was there to take us.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Other than having a slight issue with a toilet everything was great. Rooms were clean and enjoyable with disney  characters on the walls and the complientary breakfast was awesome. Thank you so much. :-)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for a quick overnight before heading on cruise. This was my 4 stay and will always go back. Clean with friendly staff. Have also stayed here for our trips to Disneyland. Free breakfast is oerfect and staff keeps it clean and replenished. Will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay. Beds were comfortable, room was clean, staff was very nice and helpful.  ART bus stop to Disneyland is a few steps from the main desk. Very convenient. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Near Disneyland park, I was able to walk to and from the park with no trouble. It's about a mile up the road. The staff was friendly and helpful. There is food, and shopping close by and the hot tub felt nice after walking in the park all day.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Great and Very Affordable Option
Summary: We stayed at the Stanford Inn on a Monday through Friday in the end of September.  Our room was a family suite that was on the top floor on the back side of the building.  I did extensive searching for a family suite close to Disneyland, and this one was by far the most affordable.  We previously stayed at the HoJo that is across the street from Disney, but this trip we really had to stay on a tighter budget.  I really wish this site had categories of hotels/motels, as I based my rating on my impression of other similarly priced hotels/motels in the area.  So, while there are places that are more luxurious, have water playgrounds, and are closer to the park, the Stanford Inn is a great option for those on a budget.  Our room was very clean and the beds comfortable.  The shower
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, decent breakfast, not walking distance
Summary: We stayed at Stanford Inn 2 weeks ago with my little family.  I was impressed with the room and how nice it was inside.  And i loved how they cleaned it during the day while we were out to the park.  They would use whatever Disney toys we had lying around the floor and decorate the bed with it. It was cute.    We had the waffles breakfast 2 days in a row and it was pretty good.  They also had cereal, oatmeals and some fruits.  Sucks though that they end at 9:30am so we totally missed it on our 3rd day because we hella slept in after doing a 2 day Disneyland trip w/ a 1 yr old and a 5 year old.    The only thing I didn't like was the proximity to the park.  We took the shuttle (ART) and I didnt like the wait time to/from the park.  It's not the hotel's fault but it is what it is.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located close to Disneyland, shuttle stop to Disney right in front of hotel.  Lots of restaurants in the area.  Ample parking and no extra fee.  Very nice and accommodating  staff.   Beds were very comfortable. Decor was very modern and updated.  Room smelled a bit musty, not sure if  it was the AC or what, but that really was my only complaint.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disney if you plan on visiting. Breakfast is basic, eggs, sausage, waffles, begals, cereal ect. Would be awesome if they offered fruit too. I stayed in room 101 and it's so noisy in the morning from the people having breakfast. I would have asked to switch rooms but by the next morning when I realized I was unpacked and did not feel like going through the hassel. I recommend you ask future customers if they plan on sleeping in because if they do then the rooms by breakfast area would not be good.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect hotels for the Disney family vacation
Summary: Best location! Been here a few times and plan to return!! Wish they would get elevators...but breakfast is hot and fresh. More fruit would be great, but you can make your own waffles and they hand out egg and sausages!
Manager Response: none

Summary: No complaints. Room is great. Very Clean and comfortable. we have a suite with 2 Bathrooms which is fantastic for families.  Close to shops and restaurants Ect Free wifi is a bonus and is good reception.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was very good, nice continental breackfast, very good service, a lot of places around to eat, even there was a lot of people in the hotel we could rest, hope the check out time will be later than 11:00 am
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I booked this hotel for our Disneyland trip and we had a great time overall. The room was clean and the bed was super comfortable. It was only a mile from Disneyland so we just walked there and back but there is a shuttle that can take you as well. Overall we had a great time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was not sure what to expect when this hotel package was one of the lower priced being offered by Get Away Today.  But we were pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness and upgraded decor.  Would definitely consider staying here again.  We are a family who tries to make frequent trips to Disneyland so we had many hotels to compare this stay with and still felt we had done well selecting Stanford Inn & Suites.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Does the job nicely. Located close enough to walk to Disneyland. Clean and neat. Friendly and knowledgable staff. Provides for some minimal self catering. Good value. All you need to a family visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was perfect for my little families Disney trip,  all we needed was a place to sleep, shower and swim and this was it.  The breakfast was very nice the pool was kept up and the room was super cute, my daughter really enjoyed the bunk beds.  I will say however, and this has nothing to do with the hotel the ART shuttle is not worth the money, we paid for a 4 day pass and never used it, the shuttle was always full and always late we opted to just drive and pay to park which was very nice actually.  Thank you to the staff and hotel for such a pleasant, clean, and friendly stay :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked our room through Getawaytoday.com as a vacation package. We were very pleased with our stay at the Stanford Inn! Our kids loved the mickey decals on the walls! The rooms are well appointed with all of the usual amenities you would expect, but the thing that really stands out are the beds! The mattresses have to be the MOST comfortable I have slept on, that was not at a 5 star las vegas resort!    The staff is amazingly freindly, and always there if you have any questions. I never ran into a staff member that didn't have a smile on their face. Great job to the management team!    All in all, I wI'll most definitely be staying at this hotel for all of our disneyland trips that we will be planning for the future, and I will be recommending this property to all of my
Manager Response: none

Summary: consider longer pool times on weekends, since park closes late.  Room was very clean. Also was very happy to see you have put the coffee back in the rooms! Thank you for bringing that back, maybe some sugar and creamer. Breakfast service was excellent, the lady there opened on time , everyday and was very pleasant and happy each morning.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Arrived at the Stanford and was impressed by the size of the rooms. 2 queen beds and a separate room with bunks. The kids had there own tv and bathroom too. Decor was a little dated but you don't come to Anaheim to sit in a hotel. Bus to Disneyland stops right outside the entrance for the hotel and breakfast was simple but good. Fresh made waffles were awesome. I would stay here again only downside was a bit too much chlorine was used in the pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was close by Disney. The kids loved the bunk  beds in a separate room with their own tv. It had a fridge and microwave. Parking was free and the breakfast was decent. We stay very late till closing at Disney so hate to waste a lot of money for 6 to 8 hours to shower and sleep. This place hit the spot
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoyed this hotel - nothing fancy - but very clean and well maintained property - the front desk employees were very nice.  The breakfast in the morning was a great added bonus - again nothing fancy but food was good and the benefit of not having to get breakfast is a big plus. If we come back to Anaheim we will definitely will stay here again!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were extremely pleased with our room. It was clean and comfortable. We were very pleased with the extra bedroom for our grandson, it had bunk beds with Disney decor on the walls and bedding. Our grandson LOVED it and did not want to leave his room!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our suite was so comfortable for our 5-member family. The kids enjoyed the kids room with bunk beds and Disney-themed walls. We celebrated my daughter's 5th birthday at Disneyland and was grateful for the  convenience of being one of the stops of the ART shuttle to Disneyland - so easy to come back to if we needed a break. Staff was friendly and very helpful. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We are so glad to hear you had a wonderful visit and found our staff helpful. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible and we hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I love this hotel we have stay several  times over the years.. Beds very clean and comfortable pillows too. Rooms spacious, always great to have a fridge and microwave,  pool always clean and the breakfast really nice, eggs, sausage, waffles, cereals, juice, yogurt, toast, bagels.. prices very good.. thanks for the memories. ...Nancy
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had another great stay. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we do appreciate your loyalty to our hotel. We will see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The hotel is convient and close to attractions. The 2 bdr 2 bath suite is nice. I really enjoyed my stay. The breakfast is excellent. We had an enjoyable stay. Will definitly return for anotherr stay..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and the family suite. We can't wait to see you back next time at the Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: great place for a family to stay
Summary: Just a quick drive to Disneyland parking structure, friendly staff, decent breakfast choices (waffles, cereal, plain bagels, bread, eggs, sausage, yogurt) great for a family of 4 or more in their suites, decent amount of parking, tram to Disney picked up in front of hotel, stay here over 6 times and as a family of 5 we love it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so delighted to  hear you had another great visit to our hotel. We really do value our return guests and we can't wait to see you again on your  next trip. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Excellent base for our Disneyland trip. Great value. Definitely recommended. Stayed for 7 nights at the end of September. 2 adults and 2 teens in the 2 bedroom 2 bathroom family suite. The second bathroom was worth the bit extra.  Bed was comfortable - size was equivalent to a standard queen in Australia (cannot be said for some hotels when they claim queen beds).  The bunk beds where fine in size and comfort for our teens (5' 10").   Breakfast wasn't flashy, but quite ok to get you going at the start of the day. Eating area was smallish, but no issues with taking food back to your room.  Staff were great and helped out whenever needed.  Wi Fi worked really well.  ART bus stop right outside the front of the hotel.  Realistic walk time to Disneyland entry gate is 20 - 25 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I know I always say this but I love staying here. As usual the staff was so friendly, rooms were clean. I love how kid oriented everything is. The pool was great to take a break after a long day and the little sitting area garden was very welcoming. Hatal is the gentlemen that greeted us upon arriving. He was very nice and helpful. Breakfast was delicious, I loved that they brought back the waffle machine and fresh fruit. In the rooms I loved the coffee machine was easy to use not the kurig ones. Can't not stop saying how nice this place is and how wonderful their staff is. I will be a customer for as long as we travel to disney area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a wonderful stay (again.) We truly appreciate our return guest's business. I will be sure to pass on your nice comment to our front desk team member Hetal. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we'll see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This was a fantastic place to stay. My family and I really enjoyed the room. The staff was friendly, helpful and went above and beyond expectations! I would recommend this hotel to anyone. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had a wonderful stay and our staff was so accommodating to you. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We were there for 2 days 2 nights, we were really surprised how nice the hotel was, we did not expect it for the price (compared to how expensive some hotels near by same star category where) check in and check out super fast, no troubles, we stayed in the suite (for up to 6 people) very big, nice and clean. Good location, we would definitely stay again. Breakfast was also decent. It did get a bit noisy with children and crying babies,  but it is a family place, wouldnt complain about that since we also have children.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you were pleasantly surprised by our hotel. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible (especially for families) and we hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Cheap, clean place to stay with free parking and continental breakfast. Great value all around - no frills but it gets the job done. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for an inexpensive place for a short stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback. Glad to hear you had a good stay. Hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This is a well located hotel near Disney attraction, it also has a large parking lot so you would never have any problem finding a place for your car. Rooms are nice and clean, a refreshing shower and a good night sleep are guaranteed.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thanks for reviewing your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you had a pleasant trip. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room was just average. Clean with new carpet and a nice shower, but a rather stiff mattress.  The staff, however, was very accommodating not only of my requests, but also of the requests of others I overheard while in the lobby. I ended up staying here due to the reasonable rate I got through hotwire, and at one of the cheapest rates in the area I would not hesitate to stay here again. It does include free parking and continental breakfast, unlike many other nearby alternatives, but it is not exactly fancy or high class. At just over a mile from Disneyland, I recommend taking the ART bus to and from the park to save your feet for walking within the park. They sell bus tickets in the motel lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear that your stay went well and you had such a positive experience with our wonderful staff. It makes us feel great to know our hard work is paying off and we can't wait to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: good place for family trip to disney
Summary: stayed here before, always enjoy this motel, good breakfast to start the day, the bunk room and 2 bathroom room work out well. the staff was friendly, enjoyed the pool, close to other restaurants, would stay here again....
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review and for choosing our hotel again. We really do appreciate the business of our repeat guest's and we can't wait to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Excellent hotel with a great price. Clean and well maintained. Located in a good area for walking to stores, restaurants, and entertainment. Check in time is a bit late in the afternoon. But management did what they could to accommodate.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for review on your recent stay. We are happy to hear you had a pleasant business trip. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights 12th to 14th September 2015 with a friend.  The room was at the back of the hotel on the ground floor. There were  2 queen beds, quite spacious but could have done with more lighting.  We found the room quite dark.  Disney character on the wall which is a nice touch especially if you have children.  Very quiet where we were but wouldn't like to be at the front of the hotel by the road which is quite busy.  Breakfast was ok, bagels, toast, cereal, bananas, yoghurts available. You could also make your own waffles.  You can also have egg and sausage but this is not advertised and you have to ask for it at the counter.  We did use the pool which is quite small but they do supply towels for you to use.   I would stay here again as it was very near to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for the review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are pleased to hear you had such a great stay. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The rooms were very nice, new carpet and paint. The free breakfast was a great way to start the day! Staff were friendly and helpful. The shuttle was a convenient way to get to Disneyland! Great trip!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you had such a positive stay and we can't wait to see you back next time.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: There is nothing that makes the Stanford Inn and Suites really stand out. It's a two-story hotel a bit more than half a mile south of Disneyland.   The rooms are clean, and come with a desk, flat-screen TV, sofa, hair dryer, and iron and ironing board.  The thing that makes the place special is the breakfast. They actually have a pretty decent spread, with cereals, bagels, juices, and a waffle maker. The attendant can even take special orders.  You can sit inside or outside in a patio area.   There is a pool and jacuzzi, but I didn't use those.   Try to get a room away from Harbour Boulevard or it will be noisy.   It's a nice place to stay, and it's not far from the Convention Center.    ththan half a mile south of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you had such a positive stay and we can't wait to see you back next time.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Ok so the worst thing i can cay about this hotel is it is not walking to Disneyland. Our rooms were great large enough and CLEAN no black feet here. people were great we even had an odd reservation so and they were helpful and nice nice nice. i cant think of a bad thing to say i cant wait tell our next visit we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you had such a positive stay and we can't wait to see you back next time.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: It's the perfect place to stay if you are going  to Disneyland on a budget, the hotel is very clean, and really close to the park, perfect if you are traveling with children. Breakfast is good to, as well as the service.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are glad you had a great stay. Hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I booked our trip using GetAwayToday.com and I was really happy that we chose Stanford Inn & Suites. At first I was a little skeptical because from what I looked up online, I thought it was going to be a little too far from Disney but actually it was the perfect distance. We were still within walking distance even though you can buy a bus pass for $5 for the day, but you are far enough away from all the chaos of the park. If you have a 2nd floor room, you can see the fireworks from Disney which is an added bonus! The rooms were great size and well maintained. Each day when we returned from the park our room was made up which was nice so that we could comfortably relax before heading back for the evening. Each morning breakfast is served so you're taken care of before you head
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you were pleasantly surprised when you arrived and that your room was comfortable and inviting every night when you came home from the park. Our housekeeping staff really does a wonderful job and I will be sure to pass on your kind comment. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: After a little research and a great price we decided on the Stanford Inn.  We got the room for $100 on Amoma.  We have stayed in over 15 hotels in the area and this one was great.  It fit my criteria of free parking, free breakfast, and free wi-fi. There is plenty of parking, the beds were extremely comfortable, and it was very clean.  The breakfast was better than average and fit our needs.  The only negative was the person that checked us in later in the evening was not helpful, just gave us the key and sent us on our way.  However, the staff the next morning was very friendly.  There is not an elevator so if you have a lot of luggage make sure you request a room on the ground floor.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our free amenities as well as our room and housekeeping service. I do apologize for the front desk agent that wasn't helpful but am glad to hear our morning staff was able to help you out. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Meets my expectations. Strategic to my seminar location. Nice staff...always willing to assist. If I do have cause to visit Anaheim in the near future, will definitely repeat my stay there. Well done!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The rooms were clean, The staff was great. Quick to respond with positive attitudes. The breakfast room is very nice even has outdoor seating. No problems with stay at all. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Friendly staff, prompt fix to the room with no questions asked. Great free hot breakfast! Bus ride from hotel to Disneyland bout 10 mins. Would stay again! Loved the 2 bedrooms, plenty of room for a family with twins and triplets!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear enjoyed your stay as well as our staff. We really do want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great accomodations for a family of 5. The bunk beds were great! Only two snafus... our room was right next to a supply closet where some knocking and banging could be heard (room 243), and the breakfast would be so much better for no sugar/flour diets if it included eggs bacon/sausage (mostly cereals and waffles served). Had I known, I would have brought my own breakfast. Very reasonable rate, didn't feel crammed in the room, great find of a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you were satisfied with your room as well as our rate. We do apologize for your issue with the noise and not having breakfast options to fit your diet. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we do hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Visiting southern California for the first time, we decided on the Stanford Inn for six days of our stay. We booked several months in advance and got an incredible rate thru the hotel website. The lobby was very clean, inviting, and the staff extremely friendly.  The parking and wifi is free and our king room was modern, spacious and very comfortable. The hotel was convenient for our day trips to L.A., the surrounding beaches and was a five minute drive to Disneyland. The ART buses pick up in front of the hotel, but we carpooled with other family members we met up with for the 3 days we spent at Disney, as it turned out to be cheaper to split the parking than pay for the bus. Just a few downsides however.... There are no elevators, so hauling large luggage up and down the stairs
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the room with the king bed. We do apologize for the parking being so full. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great place to stay! Very clean and service wonderful.  We stayed in the family suite, with bunks which was great with two boys aged 10&12.  The only negative is that the air conditioner is very loud..and breakfast is mediocre - but it didn't impact on our stay at all
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We researched for several weeks where to stay and get the best value for our money for our 3 day trip to Disneyland.  We tend to do a lot of research before spending money and we are thrilled with our stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites.  We stayed at the super budget Quality Inn & Suites several years ago, but now with 2 more kids and very sore backs, this stay was definitely worth the money and was still easy on the budget.    Our kids are 9, 4, and 10 months and the big kids loved the spacious separate family suite with the bunk beds.  It was a huge space for them and we all felt like we had significantly more room than a single hotel room with all of us crammed in.  We also had a pack n play for our infant which we had to put in the bathroom.  Looking back, I should have asked
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, kids suite, breakfast, and the ART. It makes us feel great when we have returning guests and we have started a repeat guest program. Next time you visit call our front desk to book and we will work out a great rate for you.Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Good points: good customer service, quick responses to requests, full breakfast including sausage and egg, good location. Bad points: room phone never did work, a/c couldn't cool the room down ever. It was hot every night which made it harder to sleep. They tried to fix it, but it was still inadequate. Rooms are tightly packed.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the breakfast. I deeply apologize for your issue with the phone and air conditioner. If you stay with us again always let our staff know your issue and we will do our best to fix it right away. Obviously its been very hot and our ACs are running on overtime but we still do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: While this is an older building from the outside it is kept up nicely and is kept quite clean. In addition, the staff were extremely friendly and even allowed me to check in at 9am in the morning when our check in wasn't until 3pm. It is also extremely convenient to the bus and Disneyland; keep in mind that it is a value hotel so it's not perfect but it worked perfectly for our Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our property and our staff was able to accommodate your early check in. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We arrived at 4:30am. Bhupat, who showed up after i used the bell just once, was quick, and helpful. He gave us a second floor, but after i said we have bikes, he changed without hustle to the first floor. We had a good access to our parking spot. The bed!!!!!!! Very comfortable, and feeks luke a brand new, and good quality. Pillows are good too. (They are not terribly big, like some pkaces, and can bot be used at all). Blankets new, and we feel special.  Every thing is clean, carpet is looks new. Have microwave, coffee maker, fridge, hair drier, nice tv....Breakfast has a lot of choices: yogurt, bananas, waffles, bagels, coffee, milk, cereals, oatmeal, juices: orange, and apple.... I love this place. Will definitely come back here. Speacial thank you to Bhupat.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay and our staff was able to accommodate your needs. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed at the stanford inn. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. Included  in the reasonably priced stay was wifi, continental breakfast, pool/hot tub, and a small fitness room. Located about a mile from the disney parks, it is an easy walk or for a small fee they have shuttles that come by every 20 minutes. They also sell discounted disney tickets. When I come back to Anaheim, I will most definitely stay here again! P.s. they have a roscoes chicken and waffles right across the street! Lol
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so glad to hear you had a great time. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great, clean hotel at a good price. They served a good full breakfast. Bus stopped if using the ART buses for Disneyland. The front desk was friendly. The rooms were clean. It was nice having a fridge and microwave in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay. We hope to see you back very soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great stay in a nice hotel!
Summary: The rooms were big and very clean. The staff was very kind and friendly. There is a shuttle to Disneyland for 5 $.It's near by Denny's and an ice-cream parlor. The pool is small. We started our trips to L.A., Huntington Beach, Malibu from Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: best part of annhiem for a family
Summary: our family came to Anaheim for the first time, this hotel was clean, comfortable with an awesome breakfast and nice clean and inviting pool area. Close to attractions, staff very knowledgeable and helpful, well lit parking lots with security nearby.  A very safe place to take your family.  If, going to Anaheim stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed in room w kids bunkbeds.  Lots of space for family.  Property was clean, well priced.  Nice pool.  Mediocre breakfast but standard fare and kids ate.  ART bus stops right at driveway.  Only downside is there is no elevator.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The only reason it is not rated a 5 is it is 1.5 miles away from the Disneyland and there are not enough shuttles to accompany the large numbers of travelers particularly when leaving the park at night.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. I do apologize for the ART transit not being as accessible as you'd hoped. I will be sure to pass on your comment to that company so they can sort out this issue. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The layout of the two bedroom suite was perfect for a family with children. The hot breakfast in the morning was a bonus and a good way to save money! The only downside is you have to take the ART to get to disneyland and it seemed like they were always running behind schedule.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Family of four, We stayed for for 4 nights. Very comfortable, clean rooms and the staff were very helpful, I had a problem with a card and had to make a phone call back to Australia, the phones in rooms don't make international calls but the man at the front desk was so helpful showing me where I can purchase pre-paid international credit that I could use on their phones back in my room I had no idea I could do that, he was very helpful . Breakfast was a basic setup but saved the expense of a whole extra meal every day because it was an inclusion with our stay so no complaints from us. The pool area is very spacious and the kids thoroughly enjoyed it at the end of the day, I never had a problem finding a car park for our hire car in the off street secure parking provided even
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed our staff as well as our amenities. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great spot we like this because if going to disneyland you catch a bus at the frount brekfast was great room were clean the pool was nice try the pub next door great meals very helpful verry good verryy
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Our family recently stayed for 6 nights at the Stanford Inn and Suites.  Our stay was fabulous from the second we checked in.  As we checked in the clerk was adorable, very helpful, and professional.  I appreciated her advice, and helpful, cheerful attitude.  Check-in was quick and painless.  Maid service was fabulous.  They did a really great job on our room each day.  Breakfast was a typical continental motel breakfast.  Sausage, egg, waffles, bagels, toast, juice, cereal, oatmeal... A perfect start to our mornings.  We had a family suite and it was great.  Beds and pillows were comfy.  I am picky about beds, and not once for the 6 nights there did I wish for my bed at home.  We couldn't hear anyone else in our room.  The mom next door said her child fell out of bed 3 times
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay . We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay and that you enjoyed our staff and everything our hotel has to offer.   We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim.    Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great customer service, very friendly and Ac was great and have never slept better in a hotel room and i usually hate sleeping anywhere but my own bed so thats says it all really. Great location very close to shops and disney with lots of parking spaces if you have a rental car like we did but we actually chose to take the shuttle bus to disney as it was convenient and way cheaper than paying for parking at disney so would advuse doing that. Breakfast was continental so basic but thats standard so was fine would hundred percent stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My family of 4 Loved staying here. The breakfast seating should be bigger but that was the only negative of the trip. Also would be nice if the hotel offered a shuttle to Disney. Thank you Stanford Inn.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so glad to hear you had a good visit and enjoyed your family suite! We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room was tidy & modern but not spacious. The breakfast was great but crowded.  The pool & spa were heated & clean They didn't skimp on the towels.  Parking was easy.  Wifi was crappy.  The main bright spot to me was the great customer service.  The staff was friendly & quick, didn't waste my time.  Disney tix were a few bucks cheaper there, very convenient, reliable shuttle, lots of restaurants within walking distance.  Overall, worth the $.  Quiet stay. Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I cannot say enough about this "budget" hotel...it is so much more than you would expect for such a great price!  The grounds are lovely...lots of plants and palm trees that gives it a nice tropical vibe.  The rooms are simple but super clean and updated, and the housekeeping staff were great. We were on the 1st floor and found it so easy to get to the breakfast room and the pool area - we loved the cozy feeling of this place!  The pool was on the smaller side, but all you really need for a nice dip and space enough for the kids to play.  The hot tub was awesome and put to great use after long, tiring days walking at Disney!  And it was open late so we always had a chance to use it.  The pool towels are replenished constantly and there are tons of tables, chairs and loungers
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your detailed review on your recent stay. We are so delighted to hear everything went so well. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our their hardwork is paying off. I'll be sure to let the Front Desk Agents mentioned know how happy you were with their customer service. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Amazing value, great service, super close to Disneyland, great amenities. We stayed with our 11 & 7 year old and loved it! We enjoyed the pool, used the laundry facilities, super clean and good breakfast too!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room smelled awful, it was the only room available and we were not able to change rooms. we were stuck with that smelly room. sincerely I did not like the smell. overpriced for the value. We had to go to target to buy air freshener. We will definitely never stay here again. And I keep t on getting emails asking me to review the hotel. Didn't want to say but they kept asking.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We deeply apologize for your issue with the room smell. This is surprising to hear the Front Desk didn't let you change rooms or offer to clean the carpets or at least spray some deodorizer. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and this is obviously unacceptable. I do apologize again if you need to speak with me you can always shoot me an e-mail or give me a call. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel was great. The room was clean. Housekeeping was amazing. The breakfast was delicious. There were waffles, sausage, eggs, yogurt, bagels, cereal, juices, coffee, milk. The front desk people were really friendly and very helpful. The city transit picks you up right in front of the hotel for Disneyland too.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our housekeeping service, staff, and breakfast.  We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I stayed here with my partner and small son for 7 nights recently and really enjoyed it! We stayed here as we wanted to visit Disneyland as a family and read the reviews and they are all correct.  I agree that the breakfast does get a little boring eating it everyday especially for us Aussies! Most of the food is sweet kind of food. I really missed my Vegemite!  I can not remember the names of two of the staff there but there was a girl with long thick brown hair and a middle aged bald man who were both particularly helpful and I can not thank them both enough. I felt they went above and beyond in helping us. We were those annoying tourists that needed help with everything and were constantly asking them for help, but they seemed to enjoy helping us. It made us feel especially
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear your stay went so well and our staff was so accommodating to you. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again as soon on your next Disney vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Would definitely stay again, here's why:  - affordable (they had deal if staying over 4 nights) and includes decent hot/cold breakfast, free wifi, free parking.  We used to stay within walking distance to Disneyland but those hotels are 50-100% more than Stanford which we couldn't justify  -they sell art  1 and 3 day only, 5 day you can get free ride to Disney kiosk quick easy ride (10mins) on ART to disneyland, stop is right beside motel (on same side of street) and they basically take u right to Disney ticket booths (less walking than staying in $$ hotel across street)  Always felt safe, there's also an in-room safe!  Left minivan sliding door (driver side) open all night, no problems and nothing stolen!  Pool and hottub were decent, not may ppl using during our stay (which is
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are pleased to hear you have a nice stay. We apologize for your issues with the noise, mini fridge, and carpets. Unfortunately we can't do much about our guest's being noisy, however, we would have gladly helped adjust the temp in your mini fridge or washed the carpets while you were out at the park. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My daughters loved the bunkbeds complete with Mickey bedding. Staff was informative and attentive. Breakfast wasn't that great, but the breakfast staff was super friendly and helpful (in spite of the breakfast room being super busy). My blow dryer blew a fuse late one night and they had a repairman checking it out within 5 minutes. Great service!! The hotel is getting old, but they are keeping it clean and as nice as possible.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear enjoyed your stay as well as our staff. We really do want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Good stay at a good location
Summary: Check in is easy and room was clean and spacious. The hotel has a very good breakfast until 9:30.  I wouldn't  recommend walking to Disneyland from here as you'll do plenty of walking at the parks themselves.   You can buy ART passes at the front desk.  The bus stop is right in front and passes roughly every 20 mins.  There is also one of the cheaper gas stations in the area right up the block.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This is really a good place to stay in Anaheim, very close to all main attractions.  Rooms are clean and with a pretty good breakfast. Also friendly staff and a nice Pool with towels. I would sure stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I'm 22 years old and I went on a Family Vacation with my parents, brother and his girlfriend. We met up with my aunt too and she stayed a night with us here! Very roomy rooms, great breakfasts, great location, very homey and nice! This place made my trip amazing even though I was not in the room most of the time! Coming back here after a long day at the Convention Center or Disney Land was a great way to end! Comfortable beds, clean rooms. Perfect for my family trip!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay. I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our rooms so much as well as our amenities. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and I hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We got the family suite with 2 bathrooms and bunk beds. Beds we decent and had plenty of pillows. Room was clean and area was quiet. They did have a nice continental breakfast nice way to start the day. Even extended our stay and didn't have to move rooms. My only complaint would be with the AC. Felt like it never got cold and the second bedroom with the bunk beds didn't have AC just a vent to pull the air into the room. Overall a great stay. Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and plan to return. We do apologize for your issue with the AC. Our ACs have been running pretty much all summer with this heat, regardless we want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and for them to of course stay cool in their room. We do hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, great location
Summary: Very happy with the place. Only compliant might be the mattresses on the bunk beds being pretty thin and hard to sleep on for our older children. Younger ones didn't seem to have as big a deal with it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed the end of Aug for 6 Days in a family suite with 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms. It was so nice to have the extra space and the shower in the morning to get ready quickly.  We found the stanford to be clean, and had helpful, nice staff.  The pool area was private and sufficient.  We used the laundry too which was behind the pool  There are many fast food and other restaurants nearby and traffic is light.  We enjoyed our stay and will return.  We had stayed there when it was a comfort inn years ago and felt safe and comfortable there. We always found parking which is free.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We loved this hotel and will definitely stay here again! It was clean, staff was friendly, and good location. We had 2 kids with us and loved the kid's suite.   We loved that we could ride ART to disneyland and it picked us up right outside the hotel. Only wish they had more breakfast selection.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay (especially the kids suite.) We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Nice and Helpful staff, always keen to do their best. Breakfast is good and very adequate for adults and children. Rooms are fairly basic and but clean, nice powerful fridge. Location very nice and easy to get to Disney. Pool is small but has deep 8 feet.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our room, staff, and free amenities. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great location and value for money!
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights whilst visiting Disneyland. The hotel was very clean and had all the amenities that we needed. Breakfast was good and fresh!
