From the outside you could be mistaken for it being an average motel (days inn, super8) but I would say it was more upmarket then those and better kept. Free parking is also great.  We did come back one night and there was a letter on our bed from management telling us they had been trying to contact us as one of the maids had an accident and smashed a bottle of my wife's perfume. They wanted us to contact them to arrange a replacement bottle or a credit for hotel. We contacted them in the morning and requested a replacement bottle. I wasn't sure if they would be able to get it in time due to us leaving a couple days later but
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as our property. I do apologize again about the perfume incident but am so glad we were able to sort it so easily with you. We really do want all our guest's to be taken care of and to have the best stay possible. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel is perfection! Super clean rooms, awesome breakfast, guest laundry, and friendly staff. I was blown away by how clean the staff gets your room during your stay. We had sand from the beach everywhere. Yet every night when we returned, our room was clean, cool, and relaxing. I will recommend this hotel to everyone I know. And we will never stay anywhere else while in Anaheim! We've stayed at Disneys Grand Californian hotel for 3x the price. This hotel has the same service and cleanliness. And I love that it only has two floors. The mega hotels are not for me.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off and I couldn't agree with your more about small scale hotels being better! We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: this hotel is great we stayed on 27/8/15 for 7 nights rooms clean staff helpful and free breckfast was  fantastic the choice was great .even served sausage and  scrambled eggs all free of charge.would defo stay there again no problems at all.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, housekeeping service, and our complimentary breakfast We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very impressed with this hotel.  The rooms and area was clean and comfortable.   The staff was very helpful and the breakfast was great. A little far to walk to Disneyland,  but the shuttle stops right in front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and our staff. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed in a family suite. Room was clean and the kids loved their own little space and bunkbed. Check-in/out was fast and efficient. Breakfast was good with both hot (waffles, eggs, sausages) and cold (bagels, yogurt) options. Wi-fi was surprisingly fast too! All in all, a great stay for a nice price.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay . We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay – especially our family suite. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Clean rooms with good breakfast. Family suite was nice for kids to have their own space and watch their shows so we can watch ours outside. Breakfast had hot sausage and eggs, bagels, toast, waffles, milk , cereal, juices, yogurts, apples and oatmeal.  Salt water pool, kids did not like.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: There are literally dozens of these motels all along Harbor Boulevard that all have the same layout, 2 storied motels, so it comes down to cleanliness and service, both of which I couldn't fault. The downside is it's a little further to walk to Disneyland than some others, but it does have a nice restaurant next door and Taco Bell across the road.But one thing I would like to mention was a staff member at reception called Hetal, who was the most welcoming and smiley man I have had ever had the pleasure to come across, he made our big walk back each day memorable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. It makes us feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. I do apologize for not having an elevator (we are an older property and we work with what we have.) I will be sure to let Hetal know how much you appreciate his excellent service and smile. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We booked this room through the hotel tonight app.  We had a pretty great experience.  Checked in about midnight, the man behind the counter was beyond friendly and so was the security guard walking around. Unfortunately there was absolutely no parking in front for us, so maybe keep in mind that if you arrive late you will have to park on the other side of the building.  My husband had to park on the "backside" which we weren't thrilled about, being our room was in the front, but everything was fine.  I really feel looks were deceiving.  I had wondered what we got ourselves into, but by the end of our stay I was thankful the app had suggested them to us.  We had a second floor room, which sucked carrying everything up, but it was doable.  The room itself seemed pretty clean.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you were pleasantly surprised and enjoyed your room, our amenities, and our awesome staff.  It pains me to hear that you anticipated us having dirty carpets. Our staff really does our best to make sure all our carpets are clean - we have obviously been in the busy season and had a high number of guest traffic so the carpets do get dirtier a lot faster. We hope to perfect our carpet cleaning routine by the next time you return though! Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: stayed three nights room comfortable and clean A/C a bit noisy to leave on all night. The pool was very nice to use with towels provided the cleanliness was good. The breakfast was generous with hot items as well as cereals and fruit. Coffee could have been hotter Though.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your room and our amenities. I do apologize for the AC noise and coffee. We are actually in the process of getting a new coffee vendor as well as new ACs for all our rooms. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This has obviously been refurbished the room was excellent. There were seven of us travelling and were given adjoining rooms. Breakfast was good and ample.Swimming pool was good especially as it was heated. Had a problem with the hire car seat belt and  went straight to the reception the handyman came and helped straight away with tools great service. All in all really excellent stay would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your room, our amenities, and our staff. It makes us feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. I’ll be sure to pass on your nice comments to all our staff. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Excellent value for the money! I rented 2 rooms for our extended family vacation to Disneyland.  We stayed 6 nights. Rooms were very clean, bedding fresh, a little dated but spotless!  Our TV had issues. I stopped in the office on the way back from the very nice Free breakfast to complain and the maintenance man beat us back to the room. A new tv was installed while we were gone! The pool area was clean, plenty of towels and a nice sized jacuzzi. The staff was extremely friendly and informative!  The shuttle to Mickeys house stops directly in front of the hotel which is very nice when everyone is exhausted after a full day at the park! The Pizza House on a flyer they give you had pretty good pizza, very tasty fried chicken and nice salads! Tickets for the park and shuttle are
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your room, our amenities, and our staff. It makes us feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. I’ll be sure to pass on your nice comments to all our staff. We do apologize about not having elevators. We are an older property and we work with what we have. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Booked a family suite with an extra room for the kids. Hotel was clean and nicely decorates with disney themes. Very quiet which was nice and the pool was never crowded. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was adequate though some of the other guests can be a little aggressive as everyone is trying to get to disney on time (someone actually stole the waffle my 4 year old was making ?!?!?) nothing the hotel can do about that but just be warned. People can go a bit crazy at disney! The ART bus picks you up right outside the hotel and there are restaurants and stores within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay (aside from the waffle theft.) It is true the breakfast room can get pretty busy, especially during peak season. However, it makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: This was our second visit, and it just got better!!
Summary: The hotel was under a different name last time we visited (Comfort Inn, I believe), but it was still as awesome as I remember and even better since the rooms were a little more updated. We stayed in the family suite with the bunk beds and 2 bathrooms, and it was totally worth it! My kids LOVE the beds and Disney decor! It's not close enough to Disneyland to walk, but still fairly close. Breakfast was the normal continental with a little bit of hot stuff added, but it did it's job. We love this place and will return any time we come back!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great second stay and that you enjoyed your suite and our Disney decor. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Amazing value, great service, super close to Disneyland, great ammenities. We stayed with our 2 year old and loved it! We enjoyed the pool, used the laundry facilities, super clean and good breakfast too. We will definetly be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed here in March and was great so I came back again. Its close to  Disneyland, takes 5 mins to drive to there parking lot. Shopping is close too. Some is even close enough to walk. The food is great
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you had a great time and loved the food in the area. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We had a very enjoyable stay with you. We had a room with 2 queen beds and a separate room with bunk beds. The kids enjoyed the stay, the pool, the breakfast. Everything was very enjoyable. Your front desk personnel was very helpful and courteous. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you loved your stay and the kids enjoyed their room in the family suite. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The rooms facing Harbor is very noise even with door and window closed.  Front desk is helpful to move to the back and the room is quieter.  Room quality is clean but the air conditioning cannot maintain a stable temperature.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear our front desk was able to accommodate your needs. I will be sure to pass on your comment about the aircon to management. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Exactly met expectations. Wonderful staff even with 2am arrival. Super easy access from freeway and then to Disneyland, which was very close by. Also very close to lots of other options for meals, desserts and groceries easily accessible. Will definitely stay again for our next trip to area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay and plan to visit us again soon. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we can't wait to see you next time. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: 5 minute drive to disneyland. Breakfast in the morning. Microwave and mini fridge in the room. We never worried about trying to find a parking spot. Our keys stopped working on the second day but the front desk was quick to get us new ones. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are happy to hear your stay went so well and that you will be returning again soon. Be sure to ask about our "Best Guest" program when you book next. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Perfect for a short stay and a trip to Disneyland. Comfortable rooms and the Disney shuttle stops outside the hotel and all for great value.  The reception staff are also very helpful and will assist with booking Disney tickets.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a great visit. We really do want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back soon at the Stanford Inn, Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Stanford Inn & Suites great place stay
Summary: Great place.  Great price.  Staff was awesome. Rooms were well stocked and clean.  Cute Disney decor in the rooms. Our daughter loved the pool and we loved the hot tub.  Not too close to the Disney, but in walking distance. Totally going to stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: 25minute walk to Disney, ample parking, adequate breakfast, good pool and large rooms. Staff were exceptionally helpful and made good recommendations about the local area. We weren't convinced that the ART bus, Disney transfers (via their own car park) were the best options for getting to the parks... I would suggest that if you're a fit/healthy family then book this hotel and walk it. Taxis are also available. The art bus goes in the wrong direction initially and (albeit only $5 per person) is unnecessary since the park is only a mile away. They also come only every twenty minutes. Anyway, have no hesitation recommending his hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: As a family of 5 our budget options are limited. When staying somewhere for 4 nights I need a little space and so do my kids. I was skeptical when my husband found this place but was pleasantly surprised. The room was huge, easily could sleep 6 with 2 bathrooms. Our room was cleaned and was cleaned well everyday while we were at Disneyland. (People TIP housekeeping daily, just a couple bucks goes a long way!!!!) free breakfast was free. Yogurts, bananas, cereals, breads, egg and sausage were enough to feed my crew before heading to DL. Again not fancy but for less than 95$ a night I was pleased. Seriously you can't go wrong with this place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. I couldn’t agree more that the second bathroom really does make all the difference (especially when everyone is trying to get ready in the morning for the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room service was terrible and on top of that the Manager was rude and blame us for a supposed damage on a toilet which we didn't do, I took my kids there thinking that it was going to be a great time for them but it wasn't, they never clean the room the right way and they stold 200 dollars from my bank account for something that we didn't do. If you want to stay in this hotel make sure you don't stay in room 236 because they are going to blame you for a damage in the bathroom I'm not the first person so please be careful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We do apologize for this issue. We have a strict policy if there is something broken in the room during a guest's stay that it is their responsibility. We would not charge a guest for something being broken unless we were positive. As far as your room not being cleaned I will be sure to address this issue with our housekeeping staff. We are sorry again for the inconvenience, however, our policy is made clear to all our guests when they check in.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This is a nice budget place for a family to stay without feeling like sardines. Has a decent breakfast included and with some Creativity you have limitless options. All of the staff we encountered was very friendly and helpful. I do advise you to bring a bottle of hair conditioner as the shampoo is a two in one and they do not offer bottles of Only conditioner. Parking was easy to access and the parking lot is well lit.  Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on  your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had such a wonderful stay at our hotel. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: No complaints. The hotel was clean, great price, near food, airport, disney land. 24hr laundry which yes i washed before coming back to reality lol. Pool was good my daughter enjoy, open till late. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are so happy to hear you had  a great visit to our hotel. We want all our guests to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back very soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms.  Very decent prices especially considering the location to convention center/Disneyland. Only hotel nearby that would accommodate our group of 5 (& could still sleep 1 more!) comfortably without having to get 2 hotel rooms. Also has a free breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your recent visit.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our hotel so much. We really do want all our guest's stay to to be the best one possible and we  hope to see you back soon at the Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Just stayed 12 nights at the Stanford Inn and Suites. After reading the reviews I was still a little skeptical. I was pleasantly surprised. It isn't luxury but if you are not planning to spend a lot of time in the room, I would highly recommend. We stayed in a family suite even though we were all adults. It was plenty of room. There were two separate a/c units which was great although there was a funny smell and the maid turned them off our second night. We then put a note on there to not turn off and we had no further issues. Fridge and microwave in the room was convenient. Internet wasn't super fast but was acceptable since it was free. They also offer free parking which is a bonus. It does get crpwded and we had to park on the other side a few times but when you are closing
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your detailed review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and see the value in staying with us. We will be sure to pass on your  comment about the AC and breakfast to management so we can make room for improvements. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Getaway weekend with my wife overall I would give this Hotel a 3 star rating rooms where clean beds comfy the free parking a big A+ free breakfast was good not great but for the rate we got it compared to what other hotels where charging excellent 108.00 including tax best price we have payed all year we visit Disneyland through out the year because we are annual pass holders would definitely stay again if the price is right.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on your recent stay. We hope to see you back soon at the Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed with my family for our annual vacation to Disneylad Other than the dirty carpet the hotel and room was great. Beds where comfortable. Swimming pool was clean and spacious. Some more parking would be good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on your recent stay. We do apologize for the carpet not being clean. We are in our busy season right now and it is definitely hard to keep up with all the people in and out. We are working on addressing the problem. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Nice Clean Spacious Rooms. Very Helpful & Friendly Staff. Breakfast was good with good options for the kids. Good beds. Can get Bus right outside hotel to Disneyland but we got a Taxi which cost $10 which worked out cheaper as there was 5 of us. Joes Ice Cream a few doors away was also great !!! Checkout is 11.00am, but our transport to the airport wasn't arriving until 12.00pm, but they extended our checkout for another hour until 12.00pm for both rooms which was very helpful.  Would definitely 100% Recommend these Suites and thank you for a great stay. Also a thanks to Hetal at the reception desk for his kind help.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay so much. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We truly appreciate your kind words and your business and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great room, comfy bed, but the breakfast room was tiny and hard to get any food from if the hotel is full.  Otherwise it was a great place to stay.  Staff was helpful and very friendly.  Also down the street from a target and that was nice.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your visit overall. We do apologize about the breakfast room being so cramped. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for all our guests and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Very Satisfied with Stanford Inn and Suites.
Summary: Our stay at Stanford inn was very enjoyable and comfortable. The Pizza delivery service was a God-sent because after long days at Disneyland, it was great to get our dinner delivered. We are very grateful for the Stanford Inn staff, who informed us of this service
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and that you enjoyed your pizza. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My family and I love staying here every time we visit Disney. Kids love the bunk beds and the suites are very spacious. The rooms are always clean and hotel staff are nice. Hot breakfast provided was good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Don't Let the Exterior Fool You
Summary: While the outside could use a good scrubbing...    The rooms are super clean, beds are comfy and the staff are just outstanding and the friendliest folks ever.  The breakfast works well for anyone without allergies and offered many choices ( waffles-sausage-eggs-toast-bagels-yogurt and various cereals ) The Wi-Fi worked fine and was included. A great deal right near the convention center and Disneyland.  It was quite noisy but after a long day of vacationing- sleep was not too much of an issue.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Was a decent stay and nice size room. We stayed in a family room that had a separate room with bunk beds and TV for the kids. We could hear the people upstairs stomping around a bit but it wasn't too bad.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We do apologize for the noise from upstairs - our front desk is always happy to take requests. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed here with sister in law and niece for Disneyland.  Got the 2 bathroom suite, one room had two beds and bathroom/shower other room had bunk bed bathroom/shower.  Great free breakfast in the morning, free parking, poo/hot tubl.  Easy shuttle to the entrance to Disneyland, hence no parking dilemma.  Would go back, nothing fancy, but clean and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. The second bathroom makes all the difference (especially when everyone is trying to get ready in the morning for the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Everything we needed for a fantastic price
Summary: My Husband and I stayed at the Stanford Inn and Suites for 4 nights during our tour of the west coast. Our travel agent advised us to stay in Anaheim as it would be cheaper than staying in LA.  We arrived late and were checked in very quickly by a friendly receptionist. Our room was enormous! We are not sure if this is because we were on honeymoon or we were just lucky. Huge bed, decent sized bathroom, fridge, safe, wardrobe, toiletries. We could not possibly ask for more for the price that we paid.   The pool is not particularly big but it didn't seem to get overly busy. There is a small jacuzzi and towels are provided which was nice. The fitness room is small but sufficient for the majority of people.   The breakfast was adequate. If they improved this then I would award 5
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your room as well as our amenities during your honeymoon. We do apologize for the breakfast not quite being up to par for you. I will be sure to pass on your comment to management so we can make some improvements. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Everything was great. I liked that they allowed our bags to stay there before being able to check in. They same happened after we checked out. This is ver convenient for people traveling that do not have a place to store their items. I would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great stay at Stanford inn & suites
Summary: Great service from all the staff. Room clean neat and had everything we needed. Laundry facilities were clean. Excellent location near Disneyland and food outlets. Breakfast great each morning. will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Hardly an Inn , more like a motel. But it was clean and comfortable and close to Disney. We stayed one night during a 2 day trip to Disney land, it was satisfactory. The guy at the front desk is rude though
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. I do apologize on behalf of our staff member. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed at the Stanford Inn as part of a package deal for a trip to Disneyland.  It was the most affordable option available, and having stayed in the "affordable" option before, I was prepared for a less than stellar experience.  We were surprised at the quality of the hotel.  The staff was extremely helpful with answers about Disneyland and other questions about our trip.  The room was as very clean, not too small, and with nothing out of place or looking run down.  The restroom was on the small side, but since we weren't there for the restroom, not a big deal.  The beds were comfortable and the pillows were heavenly.  The shuttle to Disneyland stops literally right outside the front door of the hotel, and so I'm not sure we could have found a better place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, we had a suite the kids area was totally separate with its own rest room, TV, ca and even a door. They had a free breakfast and was close to Disneyland ,stores, and restraints. Had a pool and laundry facilities.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. The second living area makes all difference (especially when everyone is winding down from a long day at the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Nice clean room. Kids suite with two bathrooms was great. Pool area looked nice but had no time to use. Decent breakfast but had to wait forever to make waffles. Friendly staff. A little too far to walk to Disneyland (especially at the end of the day) so use the bus.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Excellent stay and close to Disneyland
Summary: We spent 4 nights in this hotel and everything was perfect! The room was clean, new and had good space. The staff was helpful and friendly. The breakfast is good too. We bought the Disneyland tickets there and we got some discount. The Theme parks are 10 minutes away.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and we appreciate your business. Hope to see you back. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We recently stayed at the Stanford Inn on a family vacation there were 7 of us and  there was plenty of room  with the 2 family suites that we had.  The staff was awesome Sydney and Ashley were really helpful and made our stay very pleasant.  I would recommend this hotel to all of my friends and family.  We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great place! Free breakfast and free parking. The ART bus has a stop in front of the property also so it is super convenient. The hotel sells Disneyland and ART tickets on site so that saved us time not having to wait at the Disneyland ticket booth. Their shower is AWESOME. The best water pressure!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you had a great stay. I totally agree the water pressure here rules! We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I booked a suite last minute because we had four adults and two children and we were very pleasantly surprised by how clean and spacious our room was.  The kids squealed with delight when they saw their room which had a bunk bed that was decorated with Disney themed comforters. The main room was set up like a regular hotel room, long and narrow but it had enough space for all of us. The continental breakfast was okay but crowded because everyone else was trying to get food before heading over to Disneyland too.  It is just a few blocks from Disneyland so we liked the location. You really can't go wrong with this hotel...the price is right and the accommodations are better than the price reflects.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay . We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay – especially our family suite (and that your kids enjoyed their room so much.) We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We had such a great stay here. We drove in earlier than expected and we were able to check in at 130pm. The room was clean and had all the amenities we needed. We utilized the ART shuttle services the 3 days we went to Disneyland. The drop off was right in front of the hotel and we never had to wait longer than 15 minutes to catch the bus. Continental breakfast was great and there was plenty of variety. Our son's loved having options. The pool was great as well. We utilized the laundry services during our trip twice, which was great not having dirty laundry to do once we came back home. Our family highly recommends this hotel. It has everything needed for a stress free Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We can’t wait to see you back on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: could go by foot to Disney, good breakfast, you have to ask the ladies if you want the sausages and the scramble eggs, good real orange juice, cleanliness is ok (but there was an opened Coke can and no shampoo in the room), there was a fridge, employees were very kind and helpfull, take a room far from the street, pool and terrace were better than in the pics so we liked it, breakfast closes at 9h30
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a good stay. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: we found the standford inn and suites property great for our 12 night stay in anaheim. the room was clean and tidy and having two bathrooms was excellent with 5 adults staying. quiet at night and we all slept well. great to have the pool on the very very hot days (and nights). good to have convenient laundry facilities too. staff overall very friendly and helpful and knowledgeable about the things to do and places to go. breakfast was basic but ok ( a change from bananas being the only fruit offered would have been nice over 12 days), not a lot of room to prepare breakfast though, with many people using it. free usa today paper appreciated. we were able to walk to disneyland in about 25-30mins, even on the very hot days, but buses very convenient also. our party would be happy
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant visit and you plan to return to our hotel. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. I couldn’t agree more that the second bathroom really does make all the difference (especially when it is 5 adults.)  We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Be sure to ask about our "Return Guest" program next time you book with us. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland adventure
Summary: never been here so weren't sure what to expect. We usually stay at Best Western Plus or Holiday Inn Express type places but have done Days Inn type places occasionally. My overall experience was very good. We will make this our place to stay when want an overnight hotel for Disneyland!   Pros: flat screen TV with several HBO channels, we could actually connect our laptop with HDMI cable and watch netflix, refrig, microwave, coffee maker (but only give you 2 K-cups then you must buy for $1 each or get your coffee for free in lobby), big rooms, nice breakfast (egg, sausage, OJ, coffee, cereal,bananas, oatmeal,bagels, bread, yogurt), USA Today in lobby, pool, spa. Wifi was pretty good (we could do netflix and actually skyped our grandkids in Texas). less than 5 min drive to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant visit and you plan to return to our hotel. Since your stay we have made several changes that I think you would be pleased with; We took out old coffee makers- our new ones have complimentary coffee and cups that fit well. Our front desk offers complimentary packs of cream, sugar ect. if you ask. We also have new vendors taking care of our pool so the temperature should be perfect. I'd like to let you know our guests are always welcome to park their car in our lot the day of check out. We simply put 11:00 am on our passes since that is our check out time. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Be sure to ask about our "Return Guest" program next time you book with us. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: It was a great place for us to stay at for our Disney/universal vacation. Our family of five had plenty of room. Each child had their own bed. It was spotlessly clean. Plenty of towels blankets and pillows. Perfect for relaxing after long days at the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations. The room was very clean. Close to disneyland. You could walk if you wanted or the ART bus picks up right in front of the hotel to take you to Disney. Price was very affordable. Breakfast could have more fruit options. Overall we would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are glad to hear you see the value in staying with us. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We had a family suite with two bathrooms. We were very impressed with the quality of the rooms and the cleanness of the hotel. The staff was very nice and helpful. I recommend this hotel and we are defiantly coming back. The breakfast was ok. Not a lot of options but we ate waffles.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. I couldn’t agree more that the second living area really does make all difference (especially when everyone is winding down from a long day at the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We got a good price in summer season.  Friendly and helpful front desk staff.  Room is clean and spacious.  Good location.  Didn't try out the pool so have no comments.  Breakfast is good with basic selection..  Would stay again if we can get the good deal.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Hotel staff was excellent. Only bad thing was not having an elevator, but besides that location,price and breakfast was awsome. Will come here again in the future. Will recommend to all families. Great location
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay. We do apologize for not having elevators- we are unfortunately an older property. Next time you stay with us be sure to ask our Front Desk to help you with your bags. We want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great service, close to may amenities in Anaheim.  The rooms were clean and great size. The kids loved their suite! Loved the Disney Theme. the Pool was cozy, a little small. Loved onsite Laundry! Waffle Bar was the BEST! Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed our accommodations as well as your suite. I couldn’t agree more that the second living area really does make all difference (especially when everyone is winding down from a long day at the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We greatly enjoyed our stay in the kids suite. The room had two separate areas and the kids'room had bunk beds with Disney themed decor. The room was clean and the staff friendly.  This resort included free parking, Internet,  and breakfast.  It is down the street from Disneyland.  A great stay and a great value.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites – Anaheim. We are glad to hear you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your suite. I couldn’t agree more that the second living area really does make all difference (especially when everyone is winding down from a long day at the park.) We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I liked the location, the breakfast, the amenities in the room, employees attention. I would like to have in the breakfast pancakes. I would like to have shuttle service to disney. The employee service in the breakfast was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We want all our guest’s stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon at Stanford Inn & Suites, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great location, room was comfortable and clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. It was especially great because of the mini fridge and microwave.  We could store our food and drinks that we brought to go to the Anaheim Angels game and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are delighted to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our guest room fridges. We want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back again soon at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Hotel itself was very nice.  Staff, especially Megan on the Saturday night shift was very helpful and nice.    There was a problem with the hot water, but only temporary.  The internet was spotty at times.   What I did not like was the in room coffee, they did not replace it everyday.  Once you finished it, it was $1 for more.  Not real classy
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed most of your stay. I do apologize for your issue with the coffee machines- we are actually going to be replacing all of our machines this month and will be providing free coffee for our guests. The parking normally is not an issue for us but it is the busy season and we have been sold out for the last month straight. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This was our first stay at the Stanford Inn.  We asked for a quiet room and we received one.  Unlike some hotels, from the Super 8 to the Wyndom and Hyatt, we didn't hear any children running or screaming while we were inside our room.  The room was not updated but was clean and  did have a flat screen tv, refrigerator and microwave. My only disappointment was there was no fan for ventilation in the bathroom.   Breakfast was good with eggs, sausage, waffles, yogurt, cereal, coffee and juice.  If you are visiting Disneyland you have the option to pick up an ART bus right in front of the hotel or drive a short distance to Harbor Blvd and park there.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your room and saw the value in our hotel. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The hotel itself was very nice and comfortable. However, the maids steal. A child that was with us left a cell phone in the room and we didn't realize it until after we checked out. We came back an hour later and the maid that cleaned the room denied finding it. We saw the maid walk to her car when we went in to talk to the manager. So now this little girl doesnt have her birthday present. I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We do apologize for your issue with the cellphone.  We do appreciate you staying with us and understand your frustration. We apologize again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Excellent place to stay. Convenient to key attractions. Low cost shuttle service option from ART to many area attractions. Quiet property, clean room, sink separate from shower and toilet area, spacious, plenty of towels in addition to those provided at pool area, exceptionally friendly, helpful employees, full breakfast to enjoy in dining area or in room. All systems worked well, comfortable bed. No complaints with this one!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank  you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn and Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay. It really does make our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back again very soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This was a fantastic budget motel.  I would definitely stay here again.  Service was friendly, room was clean, the breakfast was a great bonus and not much different than other hotels that charge a lot more.  They even helped me jump start my car when we were ready to check out and the battery was dead.  ART bus picks up right in front of motel rooms are all non-smoking!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank  you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn and Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had such a wonderful stay. It really does make our staff feel great knowing all our hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back again very soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Our stay here was great! We traveled with our 4 children and stayed in the family suite so all the space was very good to have. Our suite had the two beds and one restroom in one room and bunk beds and another restroom in the other. The kids room was decorated very cute Disney themed which was perfect for our two little ones first time at Disneyland. The breakfast was a good way to get the day started, plenty to choose from hot foods to on the go foods. We will definitely stay there every time were in that area!! Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for  your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to hear your first Disney trip was a big success! The two bathroom family suite is such a great option for our guests (especially the little ones.) We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back here again at the Stanford Inn, Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We arrived after camping for a week and sitting in traffic for hours. Our two bedroom, 2 bath suite was clean, comfortable, and roomy. The night manager was welcoming, helpful and kind. We had a fridge and microwave, plenty of towels and the housekeeping was through and attentive. The air conditioner and property were quiet, the beds were comfortable. We slept well and enjoyed the breakfast be goring heading to the park. We took the ART bus picked us up and dropped us off right in front of the motel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your room, our staff, and our amenities. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Absolutely loved staying here... Hotel is within Walking distance to the convention center, fair prices, clean rooms, free breakfast  and a bus to Disney... Would recommend to any families on a budget..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We are delighted to  hear you had such a pleasant stay and we hope to see you back again soon at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: hotel really close from disneyland, very close from target, walmart, ross,very friendly staff and the kids love the pool.... dont look for another hotel stay in Stanford inn and suites... next trip we are staying in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn - Anaheim. We are happy to hear your visit went so well. We want all our guests to have a great stay and we do hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Conveniently located 5 minute drive from the parking lot. If you have little ones, this is such a benefit. A shuttle is also available if you don't drive. Staff and Front desk where kind, courteous and always accommodating. Breakfast and pool also available and clean. Ample parking. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn. We are so glad to hear you had a great visit. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back here again soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Family friendly! Hotel came in clutch last minute, with good customer service.  Good vending machine amenities. The pool was fair, it did its job. Good eaterys around the area. Overall I'd rate 7/10 😉
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn. We are so glad to hear you had a good visit. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back soon on your next Disney vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: rooms was super clean.. I found them on hotels.com at a great price.. Staff is friendly excellent customer service.. Was to breakfast have more options but it was OK.. The one block from Disney's parking lot $17 and a free shuttle to the parking deck that was cool.. I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn. We are so glad to hear you had a good visit. I'll be sure to let our management know your comment about the breakfast - we are always trying new things to make improvements and your feedback is very valuable to us. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back soon on your next Disney vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Our stay at the Stanford Inn & Suites was something a trio of tween girls and me (the mom) all agree was a great choice. Comfy beds, clean, storage space for 4, pool, plus close proximity to key sights.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn. We are so glad to hear you had a great visit. We really do want all our guests stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: What a wonderful Motel! Each morning we were greeted by Janette the lovely lady who served us our hot sausage and egg. However busy she was, she always had a smile and time for a chat. Breakfast was eat as much as you like and being British we like our egg,sausage,toast,butter and several cups of hot tea. The youngsters enjoy milk and cereal, while the teens like bananas,apples and bagels. The reception was 24 hours and nothing was too much trouble for them. They were always helpful.Even the night security man had time for a friendly few words. The team of housekeepers kept the rooms clean and tidy as well as the whole motel. The fridge in the room and the free ice machine meant we always had a cold drink waiting for us after a long day of touring around or a wonderful day at
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your extremely kind and detailed review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had such a good stay and that our staff was more then accommodating to you and your family. I couldn't agree with you more that having the family suite makes such a big difference especially when you have teens in the mix. I will be sure to pass on your praises to all our staff. It really does make us feel good knowing our hard work is paying off and we can't wait to see you back on your next trip to America.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very good service from staff and good sister in walking distance to Disneyland park, mediocre breakfast but fair considering the low roommates. The rooms are far from clean! Wear your shoes inside to avoid black feet!!! New carpets is a must!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our service. We do apologize for your issue with the room cleanliness as well as the carpet. We have definitely been very busy this summer with a lot of traffic in and out but we still want our guest rooms to be as clean as possible. I will be sure to pass this comment to the housekeeping department so we can make improvements. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I loved it but the lights outside and workers pushing the carts made it difficult to sleep overall great stay  I would stay here again it had great fast service when we left and came back from Disney its was cleaner than when be left!!! I recommend this hotel because it's close to disney
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our room service and we do apologize for the noise and lights while you were trying to sleep. I'll be sure to let our staff know so we can make room for improvements. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Good price, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Good price, walking distance to Disneyland. Staff was very helpful regarding Disneyland visit. Breakfast was good by motel standards. It was among the better hotels/motels on our vacation, and the price was among the lower ones.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a great visit. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for all our guests and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We checked in, no problem. Great room (especially for the price), good restaurants a straight shot up Harbor Blvd, bought our Disney tickets right from the front desk and got shuttle passes to & from Disneyland ($5).. Didn't have to hassle any parking- we had some really late night pizza delivery right to our room, and a 24 hr (super nice CVS) like 2 blocks away. Great flat screen TV with all the HBO channels for free & lots of towels & pillows.  To top it off they gave us a late check out without any problem!  I would definitely go back, we didn't percieve any noise issues on the bottom floor, and liked that there was a very clean cut security officer (in uniform) walking the grounds, he was cordial when I spoke to him.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay so much as well as all our amenities. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard working is paying off. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon. If you book again be sure to ask about our new "Best Guest Program." Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Very nice place next to Disneyland
Summary: Breakfast was good, nothing really fancy but certainly all the essentials (bagels, toast, cereal, oatmeal, eggs, sausage, juices, coffee etc.)  to fill your stomach!  Breakfast "girl" was the best part of the hotel.  Very friendly and helpful.  We got the suite (two queens with bunk beds), which was perfect for our family of five.  Two TVs (one in each room).  Pool was heated (believe it or not-often times people advertise this but it is actually cold).  Not this one, it was so nicely heated!  Jacuzzi as well.  Pool hours 9am-11pm.  Also had a small gym.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Icecream/slush stand right close by.  Rooms clean.  Many food places nearby.  Vending machines with sodas only $1.  No, its not the Hyatt but it is certainly very good for the money.  Oh ya,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay so much as well as all our amenities. It makes our staff feel great knowing all our hard working is paying off. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back soon. If you book again be sure to ask about our new "Best Guest Program." Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We weren't looking for a glamorous resort, just a clean place to crash after a long day at the park.  We arrived at the park at opening and returned to the hotel after dark and for that this place was perfect.  If you are looking for a fancy pool or other amenities, this isn't the place for you, but if the hotel is not your destination it could be perfect.  It was clean, quiet and convenient and a good option for the price.  The bed was comfortable and we slept soundly.  The only recommendation I would make is that the breakfast could use an upgrade.  Other than pre-constituted eggs and sausage, it the only options were cold cereal and breads, plus a small selection of fruit.  I would love to see waffle irons and other breakfast foods available.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our hotel served it's purpose which is a budget friendly economy hotel for families. I will be sure to pass on your comment about the breakfast to our management team. We are always looking for ways to make improvements to provide our guests with exceptional service. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Really good place. Great value and location. It was great that the kids had their own bunk beds in their own room. Breakfast was great. Wished they they had longer hours but it worked ok. The pool was fantastic. We were in it at least once a day.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had such a pleasant stay. It makes our staff feel good knowing all their hard work is paying off. We want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see  you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Didn't have much time to appreciate the motel due to three frantic days at Disney but the staff here were always helpful and everything was convenient for us. The walk to Disney was a bit long however
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as our staff. The walk to Disney can be exhausting- we always suggest for our guest's to take the ART which stop right out front of the hotel and we also sell the bus passes at the front desk. We want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see  you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We booked this location for the first time due to the price.  It was a great decision.  The only thing that we didn't like was that the air conditioners smelly bad.  When passing a few rooms, we could smell the same scent as our room did.  It went away after awhile.  The staff was very friendly & they have an all day shuttle for a few dollars that takes you right to Disney land every 20 minutes!  We will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We do apologize for your issue with the air conditioner - I will be sure to pass this on to our maintenance staff so we can address the issue. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very good me and my girlfriend enjoy our stayed there. Very well kept clean and look forward to staying there again in the near future. Thanks you alot and I will be in contact for our next stay. Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear your stay went so well. We work hard to make sure all our guest's stay is the best possible and we can't wait to see you back. Be sure to enquire about our new "Best Guest" Program on your next booking. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We have stayed here twice when visiting Disneyland. The rooms are always clean, staff is more than helpful and nice, it's close to Disneyland, and you can get shuttle tickets as well. The breakfast wasn't the best, but we brought a lot of your own food anyways, since they have mini fridges. The staff is exceptionally nice, every single person that helped us.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had a great stay (again). It makes our staff feel great reading your kind review. We work hard to make sure all our guest's stay is the best possible and we can't wait to see you back. Be sure to enquire about our new "Best Guest" Program on your next booking. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The hotel was comfortable and the room was clean.  Coffee in the room but we had to ask for cream and sugar.  Convenient location to Disneyland and the Convention Center.  Continental breakfast was adequate but not fantastic.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your room as well as our location. I will be sure to pass on your comment about our breakfast to the management team. We are always making changes to ensure our guest have the best stay possible. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Our family had a one Night stay in Anaheim. The room was spacious enough for 3 adults and one child (11 yrs). The location is good quite close to Disneyland. We were positively surprised by the breakfast. It was better than typically in the US.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your room as well as our breakfast. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: It was excelent time.. the room was clean all the time..  space on the parking lot and very clean..  Good, healthy  and different  kind of breakfast to choices.  If you need something they help you right away.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so pleased to hear you had such a pleasant stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The place was very clean and enjoy staying there! The breakfast was sufficient! All staff were very friendly and helpful! I definitely stay there again. I like how easy it was to get back and forth to Disneylavd with kids. The pool area was well kept, kids enjoyed swimming!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had such a great time at our hotel. Our staff works hard to make sure all our guests have a pleasant stay and it makes us feel good when we reading your kind review. We hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room we stayed in was a suite with a door that closed between the two rooms. The rooms were dated, but seemed to be quite clean. And they were very affordable.   Each had a tub/shower combo and large vanity with a sink. One bedroom had bunks, and we were able to put the pack'n'play, for the baby, in the closet and had a tension rod with a black-out curtain that we used to make a canopy.   The main room had 2 queen beds that were quite comfortable. The only complaint I had was that we'd registered 6 adults and 1 child and we didn't have enough towels in one bathroom. However, they did bring extra pillows when we asked, so I think they'd have done the same for the towels.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your family suite. It really is great to have the extra space for a large family (especially when you're winding down from a long day at the park.) We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back real soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: From my kids, "its a good hotel, big rooms, had a place to eat, bunk beds were fun, we would come back". We were looking for a cheap yet accommodating place for our family of 6. We got the suite and were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for yours and your children's positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear everything went well and that you enjoyed our family suite. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The hotel is very close to Disney. You could walk to the park if you aren't so tired from the amusement park. There is a shuttle that works all day, and one of the stops is right in front of the hotel. Helpful and kind staff, breakfast good if compared to similar hotels in USA. Easy parking and good wifi
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on  your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our locations as well as our staff and free amenities. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The private bunk bed section for the kids was a favorite.  The complimentary breakfast was as expected and the staff were constantly replenishing the food supply.  We walked to the parks.There is a bus.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on  your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our family suite as well as our breakfast. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best possible and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Fair price. Booked in advance but no prepay. Clean room. 2 Queen beds. Friendly staff. Free parking. 10 min drive to Mickey and Friends Parking Structure. Close to Target. Fridge, microwave and safe. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you had such a smooth stay. We really do want all our guest's stay to be the best one possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Loved the children's room with bunk beds-the girls felt like they had some time alone wheat from the parents! Clean rooms, linens, and towels! The only item was the bathroom faucet was difficult to turn on-too tight to pull...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear your stay went well - the family suite is really nice to have the separate living areas to wind down after a long day. We do apologize for your issue with the faucet - if you come back we encourage all our guests to let us know if there is an issue with our room so our maintenance can fix the issue. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: A little gem of a hotel.
Summary: This hotel was great to stay in.  The complimentary continental breakfast was adequate. The hotel was clean and the staff were friendly and very helpful. The shuttle to Disneyland stopped right out front of the hotel. There were also a couple of cafe/takeaway food options close by.  The pool area and the pool was nice, clean and well kept.  A little gem. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your kind review on your stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves! We are so happy to hear everything went so well. I will be sure to pass on your positive feedback to our staff. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: this hotel was clean and had Excellent service me and my family enjoyed staying here. The location is great and price was great. Overall this was a nice, clean hotel to stay and not far from Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had such a pleasant stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and on arrival it was like signing to own a house, more signatures required than a bank loan. Then on the third day we return at 4.00pm to find our door left open by housekeeping. Later housekeeping returned to advise us that she ran out of towels and forgot to return.  Breakfast is very poor, not enough seating and the area is way too small to accommodate breakfasts.  Would not stay here again, location is great, but you only get what you pay for out of this place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We apologize for the issues you have mentioned. We really do want all our guest's stay to be a positive one and I will be sure to talk to all our members of staff so these types of issues can be prevented in the future. We do apologize again.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Lovely staff at reception were beyond amazing! Super helpful! Will definately recommend to our friends and family and come back also!! Cant rave enough and the service
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had such a pleasant customer service experience. Our staff really is awesome! I will be sure to pass on your praises to them. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We were there for 4 days. The staff was helpful and friendly, the location is great if you are going to Disneyland, the breakfast is hearty and delicious. Comfortable and friendly is the way I would describe it in two words!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had such a wonderful stay. It makes us feel good knowing our hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The room was very nice and was clean. Is a Hotel for Kids. The Hotel is near of Disneyland. The room was decorated with Disney stickers The Breakfast was perfect, many options. The Staff was very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your positive review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear everything went so smoothly. We really do want all our guests to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We loved the service, room, location and our family of 6 were very comfortable in the two bedroom/bathroom suite. We will be back. Thank you for making our first trip to Disneyland awesome and memorable
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so delighted to hear you had such a great stay - I totally agree with you that the suite is the best option for families. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit every time (especially or Disneyland first timers.) We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Looking at pictures and reading reviews and looking for a solid deal had me kinda freaked out.  Our stay was excellent.  Clean, solid value. Quiet and the 2 bath family suite was perfect for the 5 of us. Centrally located with plenty of food options in the immediate area.  I will stay there again next time Disney beckons.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on  your recent stay at Stanford Inn - Anaheim. We are so glad you decided to stay with us - making a decision really is hard with all the information on the internet. I couldn't agree with your more that the family suite is such a great option for larger families. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The service was very good at the desk and the room was taken care off the same.  The motel was located in a perfect area for us because we were familiar with one of the stores and the eating places were within walking distance as were the stores for shopping for memorabilia.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your feedback on  your recent stay at Stanford Inn - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our rooms as well as our location. We really do hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Everything was perfect from beginning to end.
