The room they assigned us to was a lot bigger than we had expected plus we were located on the 2nd floor at the very corner from everyone else.  It was perfect!  Check in/our was quick, the room was clean, the laundry room with folding table was great to have and our stay was wonderful.  I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear that every aspect of your stay went so well. We really do want all our guest's to have a great stay and we hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I did a lot of research on finding a good place to stay while in Anaheim, and I booked so many hotels in the surrounding area and cancelled due to bad reviews I ended up picking the Stanford Inn and was very satisfied.  I found this hotel to be clean, no bugs, good service and safe, close to Disneyland.  Best price on Hotels.com.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you chose us over all the hotels in Anaheim. We strive to provide the best accomodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Okay, so the breakfast had NO fresh fruit, and everything was pretty much previously frozen or canned. However, the staff was very friendly, the rooms were clean, there is a shuttle stop right in front of the hotel for Disneyland, and.. a pool that we never got to see because we spent all our time at the park. All in all, a great hotel that I would be happy to stay in again for another trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad you enjoyed your staff as well as our property and we do apologize fo your issue with the breakfast. We are working hard to make improvements to our breakfast so all our guest's stay is the best one possible. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We were in town for a couple of Angels games. The location was great and the price was good. We got a family suite which worked out perfect. We were traveling with 2 adult children and 2 small children (6 of us in total) The main room has two queen beds and there was another bedroom with a set of bunk beds, decorated in Disney theme. It included their own TV, a child size table and chairs and their own dresser. My 2 little boys LOVED this. When we left they said they were really going to miss this room. The breakfast was decent. It included a few hot items. Overall a very good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay (especially the family suite.) We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for ever guest on ever visit every time and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I really wanted to write a positive review about this place. There were a lot of positive things. The staff is friendly, the beds are comfortable, the grounds are well maintained, but the morning before checkout my daughter woke me up screaming about the cockroach in the bathroom. After chasing it with a shoe for awhile I sent it to cockroach heaven, and a potential positive review went to Hell. For the location and price there are plenty of other cleaner motels in the area. Trust me, I'm a SoCal local just staying for a weekend get away. As for the Stanford Inn I recommend you "stay away"!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are so sorry to hear about your issue with the pest in your room. We do have a pest procedure we follow with a pest control company and wish you would have let us know when it happened so we could have responded appropriately. We would really appreciate a follow up phone call so we can formally apologize and get more information to pass on to our pest control vendor. Please call us at your earliest convenience so we can make this right. We genuinely apologize again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The staff here is friendly and thoughtful.  The room was clean, nicely appointed and large enough to move around.  The location is ideal...close to Disney and walking distance to several restaurants suitable for any palate.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had such a wonderful stay. It makes us feel great knowing our hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back here soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Very pleased with family suite room, Grandson loved it!
Summary: We stayed here in July 2015 for 2 nights to take my grandson to Disneyland for his 5th birthday. We were very pleased with the room for the value. We got the family suite, and my 5 year old grandson just loved the kid room. He didn't want to leave actually. Shuttle right in front of office was a nice option for getting back & forth to Disneyland. Staff was very nice too! Price was reasonable considering how much other hotels in area cost that were just little closer to Disneyland. We were still only about a mile or two away from Disneyland though. Continental breakfast had nice variety of food to select from. Would definitely stay here again!! Thank you Stanford Inn & Suites!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so delighted to hear everything about your stay went so well. The family suite really is awesome for kids (and parents) to both have their own space to wind down after the park. I will be sure to pass on your praises to our staff. We hope to see you back here soon and thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Room was very clean,  extra room for the kids. Staff were friendly.  Breakfast was good. Close to Disneyland.  Free parking and the swimming pool was clean. Loved every bit about this little motel. It's nothing fancy but it's a good stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive comments on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed every element of  your stay. It really does make all our staff feel good reading your kind review. We hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We got a good deal on a basic motel. I would stay there again if I get another good rate. A huge thank you to the assistant manager who found my husbands wallet at the vending machine and returned over $800 to us. You saved us a lot of grief!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a good stay and our staff is always happy to help (especially when it comes to something so serious!) We hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel exceeded expectations by far.  The room was clean, the decor was simple. The bathroom and sink were clean and organized.  There was no disgusting smell.  The carpet look freshly vacuumed.  The appliances were convenient.  The pool was nice.  The air conditioning worked effectively w no malfunctions. The location is good, if you're going to Disney- you could walk to the park just fine.    This and many other hotels need to have healthier breakfasts.  Tired of bread, pancakes, bagels, biscuits, muffins, pastries paired with soda, greasy cheese and sausage etc.  People need vegetables, fruit, and lean protein (chicken at least, lean sausage at least, omelettes/egg whites, skim milk, granola, whole wheat pancakes) will be the day I'll appreciate a good breakfast instead
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your room so much. It really does make us feel good knowing you were so comfortable staying at our hotel. Your feedback is very valuable to us and I will be sure to pass on your comment about the breakfast to our management team so we can make room for some improvements. We truly want all our guest's to have the best stay every visit, every time and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Good value, and close to park!
Summary: I booked this room as part of a package with Disneyland and Universal Studios tickets. The staff was friendly and helpful, rooms were fairly clean, continental breakfast was pretty descent, free in room on-demand was the bomb!... My complaints: 1) Our room was in the very back corner of the building, and there was no parking back there, it was quite a trek to get to the room after a long day at the park. 2) the wi-fi worked excellent for the first two days of our stay, but would not work for the rest of the week.  Also, just fyi...it's pretty inconvenient to be a smoker at this hotel. There is no smoking allowed on the balconies, only in the aforementioned, very far, parking lot...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our staff and our rooms. We do apologize for your room being so far away and the smoking area being so far away. We try to accommodate all our guest's requests and if you let us know the next time you stay you'd like to be near the parking/smoking area we will gladly try our best to fulfill your request. I will be sure to let the management team know about your issue with the wifi as well. We want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: When we drove in, the Inn looked like a motel but the room is surprisedly big and clean with hotel quality. We're happy to stay there, close to Disneyland. My kid enjoyed the pool and spa. The front desk staff are very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you were pleasantly surprised by our hotel - it makes us feel good knowing our hard work is paying off. We want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Good sized clean rooms which were well serviced on a daily basis. Plenty of towels supplied and replaced regularly. The buffet breakfast was plentiful although slightly repetitive but it would be churlish to complain as it is included in the price which was reasonable for a two bedroom accommodation which slept 5 comfortably. Very pleasant staff who served you with a smile and kept the breakfast area spotless. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for comfortable accommodation at a reasonable price and near to the attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your most recent stay  at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. It really does make us feel good knowing all our hard work is paying off. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed here last year with the little ones. It was perfect and and staff made usre to make our stay plesent. It was great to be taken care of by such a wonderful staff. We will come back for sure and loved our stay
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive review on your most recent stay  at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. Our staff really does want everyone to be happy and we are delighted to hear that it shows. We can't wait to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Only negative comments would be that you CANNOT check in until 3 pm.  We traveled all day in the car with 3 young children and tried to check in around 1:30 pm and we're told we had to wait until 3 pm which was a little frustrating.  The breakfast was limited on selections and was really busy. The rooms were roomy and clean.  We rented the kids' suite, which was very nice.  Beds were comfortable and housekeeping was nice. Very convenient location for Disneyland and can catch the ART right outside the office.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are sorry to hear you weren't able to get into your room earlier - we will gladly check in any of our guest's as early as they like just as long as the room is clean and available. It is during the busy right now so our rooms aren't always ready right away (especially since you had a kids suite which we have less of than our standard rooms with two queen beds.) We are still really glad to hear you enjoyed your room and our location. We really do want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We highly recommend staying here for your next family vacation. We booked this hotel through getawaytoday.com, and was extremely satisfied! This hotel is located only a mile away from Disneyland, and is close to restaurants as well as Target and Walgreens. Our room was very clean and was spacious. Although breakfast was not the best, it still was adequate enough for a hearty breakfast  (and best of all, it was complimentary). Having a 24 laundromat was a life saver (it was also a reasonable cost too). We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay so much. It really does make all our staff feel good to know their hard work is paying off. We can't wait to see you back here soon on your next trip. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The Stanford Inn exceeded my expectation. I stayed a week in June, and everything was up to par every single day. Upon arrival i was able to get early check-in. My family & I got double queen bed room on the second floor facing the opposite side of Habor. So it was very quiet. Never had a noise issue. I was impressed with the cleanliness of the room. The staff was very polite, and we were able to get discounted tickets for Disneyland at the front desk. The breakfast had a variety of stuff. It was good to grab something before heading to the parks. The breakfast area does get a full so you wanna get there early. The last day we were also able to get late check out, which was great!!! I would definately go back & recommend the Stanford Inn!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves! We really do want all our guest's to have the best stay possible and it is so nice to hear that you had a very stress free trip. We can't wait to see you back here on your next Disneyland vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I stayed here with my boys the last 5 nights, there is a Art station right in front so it made it very convenient for disneyland and Angels stadium. They have a friendly staff and the breakfast wasn't bad I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you had a good stay with your boys (the ART shuttle stop really is great awesome to have right in front too!) We strive to provide the best stay possible for all our guests and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I was booked on the first floor with 2-Queens.  The room was spacious and the AC kept the room comfortable (OAT~98 F).  The outdoor pool was enjoyed by my children as well as the continental breakfast.  My wife took advantage of the laundry facilities which is impt on long trips!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your trip (I couldn't agree with you more - the laundry is a must for long trips.) We can't wait to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed in the family suite with the extra bathroom and let me tell you, with 6 people it was al godsend!!  We took our three grandkids ages 8,5,4 and a 22 year old friend on vacation. We were at this hotel for 10 days. The kids loved the pool and swam everyday. The separate room, with a door, was great for the kids because my husband snores and I was afraid they wouldn't be ale to sleep. It wasn't an issue for them. The beds were queen size although they were crowded to me they were very comfortable.  If they had the same room with king beds I would never stay anywhere else. My only complaint we had was with housekeeping. It was done well but we never knew when they would be there. One day we came back from Disney to give the kids a nap at 3 and housekeeping was just starting
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your room so much. I couldn't agree more that having the two separate living areas really does make all the difference. I do sincerely apologize on behalf of our housekeeping and will be sure to talk with them about the issue you stated in your review. We really do want all our guests to have the very best stay possible and we hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed in 2queens room with my family - spatious and clean. good fridge and micro. Good internet. Not too loud aircon. Only thing we didn't like was breakfast. And we hoped to get later check out (1pm), but we got just until 12h (my baby sleeps between 11 and 1pm, and we had our flight back home to Europe at 23h..) Location was also good  - we used ART (which is right in front of the hotel) to go to Disneyland. It was very smoothly to go there and back.   Overall we enyoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thanks of your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. It sounds like you had a great visit (aside from your issue with the carpet - we will let our housekeeping staff know.) We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time. Hope to see you back real soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great place to stay on your Disney vacation!
Summary: This is a comfortable and convenient place to stay for the perfect Disney vacation! The rooms are nice and clean, with the exception of the carpet. (Wear socks or shoes). The staff are helpful and friendly. Breakfast does the job. Pool is great. The ART bus stops right out in front (so nice!). We have stayed twice and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thanks of your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. It sounds like you had a great visit (aside from your issue with the carpet - we will let our housekeeping staff know.) We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time. Hope to see you back real soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Having a seperate sleeping area for kids and having two tv'swas great.  Also having the shuttle take us and pick us up for a small fee was good.  Breakfast could have been better by having fresh waffles and pancakes.  Even if we had to make them.  Overall I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. I couldn't agree with you more that having the extra room for kids makes a huge difference (especially when you're winding down from a long day at the park.) I will definitely pass on your comment about the breakfast to our management team - we are always trying to make improvements so all our guest's stay is the best possible. We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great for families - value for money.
Summary: This hotel was lovely - great value for money. The staff were lovely and helpful and we felt safe staying here too. The rooms are clean and comfortable and it was easy to walk about 15 minutes to Disneyland and save $5 each (USD) on the bus, each way. Lots of families out and about to and from Disneyland. Great pool and laundry facilities too. The hotel had a lovely buffet breakfast each morning, but lots of places around to eat at other times of the day too. The hotel also helped us book our Disney passes for however long suited. They also had free wi-fi which was essential for our stay. There were snacks and tea/coffee at reception also. The hotel booked a tour of Hollywood and universal studios for us through a company called VIP TOURS - these people, we would NOT recommend
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear everything went so well with your stay (aside from your issue with VIP tours which we do sincerely apologize for.) We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit, every time and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Affordable, Central, Great Customer Service, highly recommend..
Summary: I would definetly recommend Stanford Inn accommodation to friends!  We were only a hop skip and a jump from disney and a fantastic restaurant called Coco's which was recommended by the hotel. Plus the bus stop for disney etc is out front of hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive comments on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our location, customer service, and hotel room. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel is great it is close to disneyland u could walk if you wanted to the staff was great always there to help the breakfast was good the checking in and out was easy the rooms were always cleand everyday would deffently stay again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive comments on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear everything went so well with your stay and we can't wait to see you back here next time.  Thank you again, Sarah

Summary: This was the second time we've stay while going to Disneyland. It was comfortable, clean, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. We had a little problem with our door handle and it was dealt with immediately without any inconvenience to us. The hotel itself is not fancy or updated, but more importantly it is clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are delighted to hear all your nice comments about our hotel and our staff - it's good to hear your issue with the door was handled immediately. I will be sure to pass on your praises to our staff (especially our awesome maintenance team!) We can't wait to see you back on your next Disneyland trip. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: 4 nights at the Stanford Inn & suites
Summary: We had a kids suite with 2 bathrooms.      Our two 17 year old grandkids were   thrilled with the bunk beds & own bathroom.  Hotel was quite & clean.  Front desk staff was very helpful.  A 1/2 hr. walk to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear the suite was a big hit for your family. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back here soon on your next Disneyland Vacation. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel is nice for the price.  It is close to Disneyland and one of the few hotels that would allow 3 adults and 2 children in one room.  It is clean and the staff is friendly and helpful.  The suites are nice and roomy.  Our fridge had a broken control so it froze our drinks, and the free breakfast is only OK.  All in all I would say for a family on a budget that this hotel is a good choice.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room and do apologize about your issue with the fridge. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for all our guests and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very clean and quite. Good location, around a mile drive to the mickey and friends parking. Plus a block from another disney parking. Loved our stay. Hotel also has a big parking lot which is always a plus! At night a security guard walked the hotel. The breakfast wasn't decent. Had eggs and sausage one night and egg muffins another, plus cereal, fruit, toast, and waffles. Will defiantly be staying in our next trip. We have stayed at a lot of others around the area, from cheaper to much more expensive and this is by far our favorite.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves! We are so happy to hear you positive feedback. It makes all our staff feel great knowing their hard work is paying off. We hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I just stayed at the Stanford Inn near Disneyland.  The place was in a great neighborhood.  3 Long block to Disneyland.  However, one night just our room did not have hot water.  But the breakfast was very well and laundry was convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and are so sorry for your issue with the hot water. Obviously these things do occasionally happen and are out of our control but we genuinely want all our guests stay to be the best one possible. We hope to see you back soon and do apologize again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Perfect place! Rooms were very clean, roomy and beds are comfy. Loved that the ART shuttle for Disneyland picked us up right in front of hotel. Breakfast buffet was great. Receptionist at desk was super friendly. Bought our tickets for Disneyland and shuttle at hotel when we checked in. Lots of free parking. Not a single complaint. We have stayed at mutiple hotels in the area. Del Sol Inn, Sheraton Garden Grove, Wyndham Anaheim, Best Western, and for the price this beats them all!! So happy we found this little gem. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves! We are so happy to read these reviews it truly makes all our staff feel good knowing our hard work is paying off. Thank you again and we can't wait to see you next time. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This is a great family hotel it is located down the street from Disneyland. Free parking and free WiFi. They also include complimentary breakfast which is nothing fancy just ceral and toast but it is enough to start the day. The pool is heated and really private.The hotel is with in walking distance to a bunch of restaurants and gas stations.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel and all of our free amenities. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, on every visit and we do hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We came for a 4 day trip. We wanted something close to Disneyland and affordable. We did the same trip a year ago and stayed at motel 6 maingate. It wasn't great. The Stanford Inn was a pleasant surprise for just a few dollars more per night. Clean rooms. Good tv's. Very comfortable beds with lots of pillows (a nice bonus if you're a pillow hugger). The bathroom area had a huge mirror. Lots of drawer space. Breakfast was good enough. They had fruit loops which I can eat all day everyday so I was happy. So was my 3 year old daughter. My wife wasn't as happy with the breakfast. She liked the mornings when they put out waffles that pop in the toaster. Breakfast was the only place where we disagreed, but we can both agree that the Stanford inn is where we will stay from now on when
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you were so pleasantly surprised by our hotel. We do apologize for your wife not enjoying our breakfast us much as she'd hoped - we are always making changes to make sure all our guest's stay is a great one and I will be sure to pass on your comments to our management team. Thank you again and we hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms.  Highly recommend the room with two bathrooms if you are traveling with kids!  Reasonable price for the room.  Breakfast bar was not set up well.  It was very slow! Two more toasters would help tremendously!  Staff was helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear your family suite was such a hit - I couldn't agree with you more about the second bathroom. I will be sure to pass on your praises to all our staff. We hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We returned to Stanford Inn & Suites after we had stayed here in February 2015. Both stays we had the the kids suite with 2 bathrooms. I feel that it is worth the extra cost to have the extra bathroom. The room we had this most recent stay was even better than in February. It seemed more updated and had Mickey & Friends decals on the wall. The room was clean and the staff were friendly. I wish they would have kept the make-your-own waffles. It has been changed to pancakes that need to be heated up. They also have eggs, sausage, yogurt, cereal, toast, oatmeal, and fruit. We will definitely stay here again. The kids like the bunk beds and the extra bathroom is helpful. Also, has free parking. I recommend this hotel especially for families.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay (especially since you're a returning guest.) We are always making changes around here and your feedback is very valuable to us. I will be sure to pass on your praises to all our staff. We can't wait to see you on your next trip. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: A little pricey for what you get.  I found the hotel in Hotwire and the information was not accurate as they compared this hotel with a Holiday Inn express.  I have stayed in different hotels before and this hotel is not near a Holiday Inn.  It's a fine little hotel but it's not worth the money you pay for it.  The best advantage is the closeness to Disneyland, you can actually walk there (about 2 miles).
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We do apologize for your issue with the rate - our rate obviously changes all the time and we want all our guest's to feel like they got a good deal. If you do want to book again we have a new "best guest" program that we encourage all our returning guests to use. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible on every guest, every visit and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: They are just a few minutes from Disneyland so you could walk there if you wanted to. We decided to use the ART System to save our feet. The check in was quick and easy. The room was nice and quiet. The bed was comfortable and the pillows were great. The breakfast was good for being free. Many reviews indicated that the breakfast wasn't great. Well if you want a 5 star breakfast pay for a 5 star hotel. For the money this hotel met all of our expectations. The price was good and the service was good. We will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites  - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we will definitely pass on your praises to all our staff. We hope to see you back soon. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The service was great, the staff was always helpful and nice.  My kids enjoyed the heated pool and having their own space in the kids suite.   Location was perfect with restaurants in walking distance which was awesome with the beautiful weather. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a great visit and that the suite and our pool was a hit for your family. Our staff works hard to make sure all our guest's stay is a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your praises. Thank you again and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: This hotel was great. The room as amazing we had the kids suite. The beds were comfortable, the room was always nice and cool, the room was cleaned every day and the fridge and microwave were super helpful for dinners for us. Every morning breakfast was awesome we were always full and had enough to eat. The hotel was close to Disneyland and the bus we needed to get there was right in front of the hotel. My kids loved the pool and that it was heated and that there were towels out by the pool for people to use after swimming. I also really liked that there was a room were people who smoked cigarettes could go so they would not be around kids and that cigarette butts were not all over the place. All in all it was a awesome trip with a very comfortable room and the staff was very
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves. All our staff works hard to make sure every guest's stay is great and it is so validating to hear our work has paid off. We do hope to see you back here again soon. Thank you again for your kind words. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay with teens
Summary: I LOVED the extra room for the kids. (13 and 15) The kids had their own space to relax, watch TV, and nap. A very short drive to Disney, lots of places to eat within blocks + a Target less than 1/2 mile away.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. It's so great to hear the suite worked out for you and your family. The extra room really does make a big difference when everyone is winding down from a long day at the park. We hope to see you back again soon. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The family suite with a separate bedroom for the kids was really nice. All of the staff were very professional and helpful too. They had a good warm breakfast that would fill us up and last us a long time. Out of the 6 hotels my family of 5 stayed at during our 10 day road trip, we all liked this one the best.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your positive review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear our hotel was a big hit for your family (especially our suite.) We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time and we do hope to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stayed here in one of the family rooms (separate room with bunk beds and own bathroom from main bedroom).  Spent a week in this lovely and convenient location.  Our room faced the back of the hotel - so nice and quiet.  Occasional noise from children running in the corridor but not a problem. The main bedroom is fairly standard US bedroom - with 2x queen beds, fridge, microwave, TV and small table and 2 chairs.  The sink and vanity counter outside bathroom.  Decent closet size.  A door with glass panels and sheer curtain gives parents privacy from children's room.  The children's room has own TV, a child-size table and 2x stools.  Same closet, sink, vanity counter and bathroom set as main room.  The children's room does not get natural light. The complimentary breakfast is OK.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear your stay went well and it is also very kind of you to detail your stay so others reading our reviews can really get a feel for our hotel. We are definitely trying new things with out breakfast and we do hope to have it down soon. We thank you again for staying with us and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My stay was great and easy in and out service, the front service desk was dealing with a difficult customer and yet was able to keep her cool and assist me without missing a beat... I would happily come back
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as our awesome staff. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very friendly staff.  Breakfast was decent.  We had a convenient room.  The kids suite is a must.  It was challenging during check in and out because the property did not have an elevator.  We'll lit parking.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear our family suite was a big hit for your family. We apologize for not having an elevator unfortunately this is an older property. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Stay at Stanford inn was awesome
Summary: Room I stayed in was perfect for kids. I just love the two separate spaces for the adults and kids. My kids love the bunk beds and their own private bath. Breaskfast was way cool choice of hot or cold. Staff was great! They have shuttle service and it took us to Disneyland and back so you don't have to bother with asking. I will stay with them again and again it's a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive comments on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear your stay went well. I couldn't agree with you more that having the different living areas really does make all the difference especially when you're winding down from a long day at Disneyland. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for all our guests on every visit and we can't wait to see you back here again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We slept on the first floor and can here all the footsteps from the second floor all night. The breakfast wasn't what we expected. The breakfast room was very small. The coffee was bad. Food options were extremely small.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We apologize for your noise issue with the people upstairs from you and that our breakfast didn't meet your expectations. We are constantly making changes to make all our guest's stay a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your comments to our management team.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Booking the hotel room i was very skeptical about the cleanliness and size of the room.  Upon arriving I was pleasantly surprise at the amenity the room had to offer such as microwave and mini fridge. It was a great value and our family stay was wonderful I would book this place again and again for my travel to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear your stay went so well and that you enjoyed your room. Our staff works hard to make sure all our guest's stay is a positive one and I will be sure to pass on your praises to our staff (especially our awesome housekeeping staff.) We hope to see you back soon our your next visit to Disneyland. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I travel alot for family trips, and across America, this has been by far the best inn I've stayed at. Everything was clean, roomy, and cozy. The staff was professional and very nice.  Best experience :)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you have a great stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We enjoyed our stay there.  We were able to take the shuttle to Disneyland which was so nice.  The breakfast was okay but there could've been a little bit more selection.  The Keurig pods needed to be put in the rooms every morning when the room was cleaned instead of having to buy them.  That would've been an added touch.  The rooms were nice and the beds were comfy.  Overall we had a good stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room and do apologize for breakfast not having as many selections as you would have hoped. I will be sure to pass on your comment about breakfast and the k-cups to management so we can make improvements. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: pretty good but missing lots of things.
Summary: We liked the hotel ok. The tub didn't drain very well and the breakfast was so so we decided we'd use the hotel again till we got home and realized 3 of our 5 rooms had items missing out of them. When I called to report it all I got was a call back saying the same maids cleaned all of our rooms and that there would be no investigation because those maids had been a long time and they trusted them. So we well not recommend nor use this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We do apologize for the inconvenience with your things going missing. We do have a system in place with our housekeeping staff to be sure our guest's things are kept safe while their room is serviced. They are all trained the same way and expected to not leave your room open when they are cleaning for security purposes. We have honestly never had this happen before and will gladly cooperate with any authority if need be. We want all our guest's to feel safe on our property and we do apologize again.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Could've been better, but worth the location. I really wished the breakfast was better, it was awful even for hotel standards. They were super accommodating though. Our toilet broke and the fixed it the same day.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are sorry to hear you didn't care for the breakfast - we are constantly making changes around here and I will be sure to pass on your comment about the breakfast to our management team. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time. We do hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed in room 141 on the backside of the property. We didn't hear the street noise at all. We loved having the second bathroom and space to spread out. Breakfast was average, but definitely fit the bill. The pool was blocked off with a privacy fence and felt secluded. We got a great price on our room and would definitely stay here again. It's a quick hop to the Toy Story parking lot, or ART picks up in front of the hotel. We have APs so we used the parking lot and getting to the parks was so easy!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you had a stress free visit (I couldn't agree with you more - the second bathroom makes all the difference.) We work hard to make all our guest's stay a positive one and we can't wait to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great, reasonably priced place to stay!
Summary: We were just looking for an easy, inexpensive place to stay on a spur-of-the-moment stay-cation down to Disneyland from LA. We found Stanford Inn on HotelTonight and decided to give it a try!  The Indian gentleman at the front desk (wish I remembered his name!) was extremely friendly and helpful, very sweet to give us a late check out the next day. Parking was close and on site, shower was hot with great water pressure, beds were comfortable and the room was very spacious.  Only complaints: no conditioner in the room (only shampoo and bar soap). We were set for late check out at 12 PM and housekeeping knocked around 11:30, but not a big deal as we were already up and getting dressed, so we just let them know to return after we left.  Bonus points: I accidentally left my Fitbit
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad you had a great visit and it means a lot to our staff to know their hard work is appreciated. I will be sure to pass on your nice comments to them. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time and we can't wait to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Had a great stay! Room was nice & updated. Loved the shower. The kids loved Mickey on the wall. Parking was great. Service at front desk was very helpful & friendly. Hot tub was awesome. Breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear our hotel was a big hit for your family. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, on every visit, every time. We hope to see you back again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We were very excited to stay here. We had 5 rooms for 3 nights. The excitement didn't last long. My elderly grandmother needed to wash laundry but the light didn't work so we had to use our cell phones for her to see. The day we got back from Disneyland, I noticed a necklace my daughter spent her hard earned money on was missing from the counter. My mom then informed me that she had hidden some money in a pouch in her luggage along with her silver earrings. She stated that when she got back, they were gone. My sister then told me that her baby's new clothes were missing from the room. She had just purchased them and he hadn't even worn them. My hubby then saw a child that same size in the employee laundry room. So, stuff was taken from 3 of the 5 rooms. My sister called the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We do apologize for the inconvenience with your things going missing. We do have a system in place with our housekeeping staff to be sure our guest's things are kept safe while their room is serviced. They are all trained the same way and expected to not leave your room open when they are cleaning for security purposes. We have honestly never had this happen before and will gladly cooperate with any authority if need be. We want all our guest's to feel safe on our property and we do apologize again.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Good for families who want Disney
Summary: Very clean, breakfast was the usual pancakes, sausage, bacon etc, the breakfast room was a bit crowded but seating outside helped. Ideal for families who want to visit Disney as it's just a stones throw away.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We do apologize for the breakfast being crowded. We are constantly making changes so all our guest's have the best stay possible. I will be sure to pass your comment onto management. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We found this hotels location great noting we were there to go to Disneyland. We were a large family so having a family room with the extra space in the kids room was a perfect set up. The rooms were clean and tidy and we felt our things were safe during the day when we went out. Breakfast was a good and and staff were very helpful
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a comfortable stay. We truly want all our guest to have the best stay possible and it is so nice to hear when these things work out. We hope to see you back again soon. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: On the exterior, the Stanford Inn is not very impressive.  It is obviously an older motel with a small lobby and exterior opening room doors.  But, they are doing a great job remodeling the room interiors and, even more importantly, they place great importance on customer satisfaction.  And, we were very satisfied customers!  Our suite had freshly tiled bathrooms, new carpet, very comfortable high-end bedding, was well designed for families, and very clean.  The extras included character sheets on the bunk beds, a miniature table and chair set in the bunk room,  housekeeping that took the time to " tuck" my granddaughter's special blanket around her stuffed lamb, and a life- size Mickey Mouse decal on the wall.  The breakfast area was designed for efficiency when 50 families
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves. We work really hard to make all our guest's stay positive and it makes us feel really good to know it is recognized. I will be sure to pass on your praises to all our staff and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: urine soaked mattress, non responsive manager
Summary: The lower bunk in our suite was made with just a bottom sheet and comforter over a urine soaked mattress.  The manager wasn't available until the day we checked out and didn't do much at that point except to say that it was impossible
Manager Response: Dear Deanna K from Phoenix;  The General Manager as you requested, is not available on the weekends.  After our brief discussion at your 9AM check out, I conducted a thorough investigation.  Your claim of a " urine soaked mattress " was unsubstantiated with our Housekeeping Supervisors who were on duty through the weekend.  We don't stock mattresses.  And all our mattresses are protected with a waterproof sealed solution.  The Laundry Attendant also did not corroborate your claim of urine soaked items.   Additionally, we have (3) levels of inspections that are conducted every day in our rooms.   My comment on being " impossible " was in response to your claim that the room was left in this fashion.    It is for these reasons that we were not able to warrant any guest recovery refunds from your request.

Summary Heading: CLOSE TO DISNEY, REASONABLY PRICED, FREE PARKING, FREE WIFI, FREE BREAKFAST GREAT FOR FAMILIES
Summary: My husband, 2 sons (aged 2.5yrs & 8months old) & I stayed 3 nights at Stanford Inn & Suites between May 11th to 13th 2015.  We booked 2queen bed with an ensuite bathroom.  We were charged $99 per night and booked through site, booking.com  Pros > Very reasonably priced. > Free parking, > Free WIFI > Free breakfast (which consisted of fresh fruit, yoghurt pots, cereal, pancakes, bread for toast, cooked eggs and cooked sausages) as well as hot tea, coffee and juice.  It was all you can eat.  Some mornings they ran out of fruit, but overall I can't complain about the breakfast, especially for the price we paid for our stay. >  Maid service was good, they were friendly and very tidy (even placed my kids teddies neatly on the made up beds!).  They even replaced the towels we didn't
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our staff  We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every stay and we do hope to see you back soon.   Kind Regards, Sarah K

Summary Heading: Second time staying and better than the first
Summary: We stayed here back when it was a Comfort Inn I believe, but we had a different experience so I thought it deserved another review. First off there are bunch of us so finding an affordable hotel that we can all stay in one room near Disneyland is tough but the Kid's suite here is great it has to queen beds in one room then in a separate room there is a bunk bed. It worked out perfect for us. We go the one bathroom kids suite and my only regret is that we should have paid the little bit extra for the 2 bathroom it would have helped us out a bit in the mornings. We also had sick kids one day so we used the laundry a lot and it was nice. They have laundry soap and stuff for sale at the front desk which was handy. Overall great place they have updated the rooms it seems pretty
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you loved the kids suite. It is such a great option for larger families. Next time the 2 bathroom is a must! We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest, every visit, every time and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great for groups of 4. Close to Disneyland
Summary: Nice place for you to stay with a group of friends, you get 2 double beds in an otherwise  room for 2. Checkin was super easy and fast and it gives access to the spa/pool/hot tub, which I didnt have time to use. Breakfast is not great, but you do get toasts, some sort of eggs, coffee that sort of thing, so it suffices. Its a 15/20 minute walk to disney which is a great location for the price you pay!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you loved your stay and some of our amenities. We are now starting a new best guest program so we'd love to welcome you back and encourage you to book directly through the hotel. Thank you again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Picked up this hotel through Trip Advisor for a Disneyland experience. Was skeptical at first but once we checked in, everything turned out fabulous.  The rooms were very large, clean and recently renovated. Housekeeping was timely for service everyday, coming back from being exhausted.  Did not experience any negative area.  Breakfast was a different item each day.  Didn't have to wait in any line for a waffle machine.  Great move there.  I highly recommend this hotel. Seems like a budget place on line but the entire place and service exceeded our expectations for a family of 5.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you were pleasantly surprised. We work hard to provide the best accommodations for all our guests and it is very rewarding for us to hear you positive comments. We can't wait to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We have been coming to Disneyland with my children for 20 years and we have finally found the perfect hotel for our needs.  We have had the unpleasant experience of the room looking nothing like the pictures when we booked it, and endured dirty rooms and big disappointments, but not with Stanford Inn and Suites!  We'll use this Hotel from now on for our Southern California vacations.  We booked the Jr. Kid Suite.  The room was big and very clean.  The two full bathrooms was very nice and convenient to get ready quickly in the morning.The bedding was very nice and the towels were good...not the thin cheap ones!  The staff was very polite and accommodating.  The pool and spa was great and we like that it was open until 11PM.  The only suggestion I have is the breakfast could be a
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear your positive feedback on our hotel. It really does mean a lot to us. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, on every visit, every time and we do hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We've stayed here several times when we want to get a room during a Disneyland trip (we're annual Passholders). Hotel is great for families. Our only complaint this last time was the change in breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad that you stayed with us again. We do apologize for not enjoying our new breakfast. We are constantly switching up the menu and we hope to have a system down soon that works for all of our guests. The next time you book you should make a reservation through our front desk to be a part of our new Best Guest program. Thanks again and we can't wait to see you soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: My friends and I wanted to get to Disneyland early, so we booked this room at a very reasonable rate.  I was pleasantly surprised at how clean and comfortable it was.  The Disney decals on the wall gave a whimsical effect to the room.  My friends took the bed, and I took the sofa bed, which was very IKEA style. But the base of the sofa bed was a hard wood, so my feet had to dangle off the edge so my whole body can be on the soft part.  I also had to request a blanket because there were no extras.  The breakfast buffet in the morning was nice! It had cereals, toasts, some little pancakes you have to put in the toaster, some egg type product, and sausages. But it's free!  It's a pretty decent hotel and definitely worth the price!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room. We do apologize for the sofa bed not being big enough - we normally encourage our guest's to book a two queen room unless they have a child with them. We hope to see you back soon. Thanks you again.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, good for what you're paying for
Summary: We stayed at the Stanford Inn and Suites during a family trip to Disneyland. We selected the hotel based on price, distance from Disney, and reviews. No reviews of bedbugs or cockroaches? Good enough for us. We were looking for a bed to sleep in at night with a substantial breakfast in the morning that we didn't have to pay for. I poured over the trip advisor reviews before booking, so it only makes sense to leave a review for others to consult before their trip.  The staff that we encountered was very friendly. We had a voucher from GetAwayToday and did not have any trouble checking in or out. They offered us a choice of an upstairs room or downstairs room. I highly recommend an upstairs room (as have others.) Excitable families going to Disneyland= noise, noise, noise at all
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your extremely thorough review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. It's really great that some of our guest's write extensive reviews because I completely agree with you that this helps a lot when making a choice for a hotel. We were happy to hear your positive comments about your room and our staff. We are constantly making all kinds of changes (especially breakfast) to see what works so hopefully next time we'll have it all figured out. Thank you again and we can't wait to see you back.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Very nice hotel for a family trip to disneyland. Kids love the kids suite and the beds were comfortable. The cons are they ran out everything the seem to have a low supply after your first night. They took all.the towels weather they were used or not and never replaced the face towel the 4 nifhts we stayed there...the hot breakfast was sticking pancakes in a toster. If you handle those cons then this is a nice hotel for you to stay in just bring face towels and expect to eat out  unless you enjoy cereal.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room. We do apologize for your issue with the towels - we encourage our guest to always let front desk know when they need something so we can make everyone's stay a good one. We do hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Great place to stay. About 1.5 miles away from Disneyland w/ shuttle available of course there is a fee. Free parking and continental breakfast rooms clean pillows alittle too bulky for me but other then that the stay was great. Thanks guys for your great service😃
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed some of our amenities and our customer service. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every visit (especially our Disney guests.) We hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: It was good but not great!
Summary: Front desk when we checked in was amazing and friendly! Also the night auditor was super friendly as well! Rooms were fine... Online it says shuttle $5.00 but didn't give details that it was per person... Janette was very helpful on the last day!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our staff and do apologize for the mix up with the ART shuttle passes. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest on every stay and we do hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Upon arrival check in was quick and easy, the customer service was great.  We were directed to our room and given all information about the breakfast and shuttle schedule.  When we entered the room, we were pleasantly surprised by how nice they were and greeted with a huge Mickey Mouse on the wall(the 3 kids loved). We were on the first floor and close to the breakfast.  Which was an extra plus to be that close. Some would complain of the noise, but we were up early as well so I guess you could say we were the noise, even our neighbors were friendly.  The breakfast is not just pre made wrapped muffins you get at costco.  There is actual food, pancakes, waffles, toast(white and wheat), cereal, eggs and sausage, along with yogurt and fruit for those watching what they eat.  All
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, every visit, every time. We will be sure to pass on your praises to all our staff. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: For the price, we were pleasantly surprised with this motel.  It was clean, comfortable, and the decor was quite nice.  The fridge and microwave were handy, and the included breakfast was very nice to have before setting off for the day.  A  little traffic noise since we had a room close to the street but all in all, a good place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you were pleasantly surprised by our hotel. It delights us to hear your positive feedback and knowing our hard work has paid off. We do apologize for the traffic noise - be sure to request a room away from the road next time you visit. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Stanford Inn and Suites is an awesome place to stay! The rooms are very very clean and the staff is so friendly and helpful! They have a security guard on at all times. The pool is a little stinky, but I would stay here again in a heart beat!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear that you loved your room and our awesome staff. We do apologize for the issue with the pool I will be sure to let our pool cleaner know so we can take care of this. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for every guest, on every visit, every time and we hope to see you back here soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: the walls are very thin.  you can hear your neighbors, but we were so tired we slept fine.    breakfast was filling and my kids had seconds.  great deal to get a free hot breakfast with your stay.  my kids and I enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and we do apologize for the noise issue with your neighbors. We are always making changes and improvements around here and I will be sure to let management know about your issue. We hope to see you back soon and we thank you again for staying with us.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We found our suite clean and comfortable, the breakfast was adequate and best of all the hotel is right on the ART line to Disneyland! The kids loved the Disney themed bunk bed room too. The only drawback when you have six people is only one bathroom, but you can't beat the price of this place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your family suite. We do have a two bathroom family suite option so next time you visit you should definitely book this. We strive to provide the best accommodations possible for all our guests (especially our Disneyland visitors.) We hope to see you back soon be sure to ask about our new Best Guest Program if you book through us again. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stayed here for the nights worth the kids suite attached in a separate room to the other room work two double beds. Really close to Disneyland and not a long drive to the beaches. Rooms were clean but no elevator to the second floor. You had to either carry it or put it in a bin and carry it up yourself. The continental breakfast want that good at all and the recommended pizza place is terrible. Other than that it was a great place to lay your head.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim.  We are happy to hear our location and room worked great for your family. We are, unfortunately, a much older property so we do not have elevators - if you do return and want to stay on the second floor our staff is always happy to help you move your luggage. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we hope to see you back soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The hotel was worth the price as long as you bundle it with your Disney tickets. Rooms were very noisy, water smelled and tasted very strong of sulfur. Good breakfast, lots of options. Nice pool and hot tub. Family suite was a great choice for us, gave kids their own room. Very cute decor with Mickey and friends. We thought is was weird how the housekeeping come in whenever they want. We went to get breakfast and returned to our room that was now being cleaned. A little notice would be nice. Room service was not very impressive, did not put clean blankets on bedding when we asked. Toilet kept randomly flushing non stop and fridge was not working. Otherwise it was fine! Shuttle came when expected but seemed kinda pricey.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim.  We are glad to hear you loved your room and as well as some of our amenities. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we will be sure to pass on your negative comments to our staff so we can make improvements. Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon. Sarah

Summary: excellent rooms, very clean and nice. Surprised that they didn't have a shuttle to Disney, I thought I had read they do. You can pay for one though. Staff was friendly and very helpful. I'd stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your room. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit, every time. We do apologize for the mix up with the shuttle services to Disney - the ART is a great option and takes you all over Anaheim and even to Buena Park as well as Costa Mesa. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit and thank you again for choosing us. Sarah

Summary: I have stayed here before and was very happy with it. This time we were here for the Disneyland Half Marathon. This is a very affordable place to stay, only about one mile from Disney.  Doesn't look like much from outside, but the rooms have bathrooms that have been upgraded and the beds are very good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had yet another pleasant stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest, on every visit, every time (especially our returning guests.) Your positive feedback makes it all worth our efforts. Ask for our "repeat" guest discount next time you stay to be part of our new Best Guest Program. We thank you again and hope to see you soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: exceptional hotel for a family disney trip
Summary: the hotel was very clean. two bedroom suite was perfect for extra room for children.  a lot of parking and security. pool area was clean. continental breakfast was wonderful they actually cooked eggs a sausage which I did not expect. Disney shuttle stopped right in front and came every 20 min. No complaints. would definitely stay again and recommend to others
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We couldn't have said it better ourselves. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed every aspect of your stay and we hope to see you again on your next trip. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: I stayed at the Stanford from April 30-May 3. I chose this hotel because it was near the Hyatt where I attended Lab Day West. The Stanford is also about 1.5 miles from Disneyland. I chose to drive to Disneyland, but it is possible to walk. The rooms are newer, clean and spacious. The only down side was that there was a huge gap under the door and bugs could possibly get in, even though I never saw any. Wifi was weak, I was hardly able to get on. Breakfast was limited. Overall I will stay here agin.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room as well as our location. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest, on every visit, every time. We do apologize for the inconveniences you mentioned  in your review. I will be sure to pass on your comments to management and all our staff to make improvements. We  hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Our room was recently updated, it is not super close to disney, so we took the ART bus, which stops right in front of the hotel. The tool was a bit cold, but it was May. It would probably be nice in July
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for posting a review on your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room and having an ART stop so close. We apologize for the issue with the pool being cold - the pool heater actually went out during your stay and we were waiting for parts to fix it. We do hope you return again and thank you for your feedback.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We had a very nice 4 night stay at this motel.  There were four adults and 2 little kids.  The separate bedroom with the bunk beds and 2nd bathroom was a big plus.  Two queen beds in the main room.  We stayed in a family suite.  While not fancy, room was very clean with some cute decorations.  Very comfortable beds.  Good size fridge.    Too far to walk to Disneyland, but public bus service is pretty good from there.  Never had a problem.  Free breakfast each morning fills you up, but nothing fancy at all.  This is one area that could be improved.  Very accommodating staff and front desk was helpful and friendly.  If you are on a budget, I would highly recommend this motel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our family suite with the two bath really is perfect for big families and the extra bath makes all the difference when everyone is in a rush to get ready in the morning. We are actually starting on a new breakfast menu so we hope you return soon to try it out. Thank you again for your feedback. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: We stay at the Stanford Inn and Suites every time we come to Disneyland.  The rooms are always clean, staff is friendly and it never lets us down.  I've stayed in the family suites, which are perfect for some separation from the kids after a long day.  Looking forward to our next trip!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear your stay went perfectly. We strive to provide the best accommodations for all our guests  (especially our return guests) and we thank you for always staying with us. We can't wait to see you on your next trip. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was great.  We had two rooms.  Loved the family suite.  The pool was clean but chilly.  The only thing that was off was housekeeping helped themself to the treats we had for the children.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad you enjoyed our breakfast and our rooms (the family suite is so the best!) We do apologize for the pool being cold and the issue with housekeeping. We will be sure to pass on your comment to our staff so we can resolve this issue. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Rooms were recently upgraded and very clean. Property is a little noisy but our room did face Harbor, which is a busy street.  Pool is small but was perfect for the kids.  The ART stop was right in front of property so it was very convinient to hop on. The free breakfast in the morning was interesting. It consisted of frozen sausage links or patties, pre-made egg patties or omelett filled with a mystery cheese, waffles or pancakes, various breads, packaged oatmeal, generic Cheerios, corn flakes and fruit loops. They did have fresh melon which was nice. Although, the adults didn't enjoy the breakfast all that much, the kids loved it! It was very conviinient and it saved us a ton of money as food down there is very expensive. Loved the room had a fridge as we brought our lunch
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your room as well as some of our amenities. The tip on packing your own lunch really helps you save in Disneyland and having a fridge in the room makes it easy to store lunches. We are really working on perfecting a great breakfast menu and making lots of new changes around here so we hope you will come back to see our improvements. Thank you again for reviewing your stay and for picking Stanford Inn.  Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary: Had a family room with bunk beds for the kids.  Room is everything you need, nothing you don't. Pool is 3.5ft - 8.5ft, little kids can't use it.  Breakfast is dull, but passable. ART stops outside. They sell 1 and 3-day passess for ART, but not the 5.  If we woke up at 7 we could get the kids fed and to the bus and be at the park for 9. Target is 10 minute walk away for snacks and supplies. A couple of fast food places close, fun restaurants a little further.  Only downside is the need to use ART to get to the park.  THere can be a whole bus load of people waiting at the stop in the morning.  Also, there is very little sound proofing between the walkway outside of the motel-style rooms and the rooms themselves.  Often awoken by families having a normal-volume conversation as
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your kids suite as well as our location. We strive to provide the best accommodations for every guest on every visit and we do apologize on behalf of ART - it can obviously be crowded at times especially during the busy season but it is certainly a great alternative for families to get to Disneyland. I will be sure to relay your comments on noise and wifi to our management team to make improvements. We thank you again and do hope to see you next time. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: Great Stay at the Stanford Inn
Summary: Excellent room when traveling with children. They had their own room with TV bunk Beds and you could close the door. Close to everything with Roscoe's Chicken and waffles across the street, will go again!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for reviewing your most recent stay at Stanford Inn & Suites - Anaheim. We are so glad to hear you had a nice stay. We strive to provide the best accommodations for all our guests on every stay, every time. We hope to see you again soon. Kind Regards, Sarah

Summary Heading: ART BUS STOPS OUT THE FRONT
Summary: Good accommodation, very comfortable haveing the two rooms and the two bathrooms.  Carpet needs a good clean but overall the room was very clean.  Children running past our room woke us up at least every second morning, maybe some signs asking for quite until 8.30 ??  The ART bus stopped right out the front which was very handy.  Staff were extremely friendly and helpful.  Overall a good place to stay.
